“Tepe hɛ mina malɔkɔ ma bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma niiye, awa iŋ bɛyi ba yenke niyɔ ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na lɔkɔ baŋ tɛŋ ba bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma niiye.”
Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ wɔ be tha bena thɔkɔŋ.
Biya bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ seeye ka keŋ kukiyaŋ, awa wɔ o wɔ ka bindɛ kɔŋ dɔmɔkɔ, na ‘Yama Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ,’ awa bi kɔŋ thɔkɔŋ biya bibɔyɛ.

Awa baŋ ni thathukuma thakendeŋ thaŋ thɔɔrɔ naa beŋ yuye masɔnkɔ ma ka ŋayombo wuthuriye bena mɛnɛ maseriŋ ma ka ŋayombo wuthokiye bena. Muŋ muŋ fooma mu kiŋ ba yenke niyɔ. Kɛrɛ mapeye ma ka lɔkɔ ba ka fa woŋ baŋ kutɛ hɛ.

Kuyɛkɛŋ ku kɔŋ dekeyi kuyɛkɛŋ, awa hugbakine hu kɔŋ dekeyi hugbakine, kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ ku kɔŋ thɛnɛŋ ka thani ka bɔyɛ, awa ŋakɔnthɔ ŋamandiŋ ŋa kɔŋ niyɔ. Kɛrɛ muŋ muŋ fooma athɔyande iŋ wuthoonɛ wumayoŋ wu naa yɛrɛmɛ bohe ba saa ka mpaa.

“Beŋ gbeeŋ ka yɛthɛ bakendeŋ niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ. Beŋ kɔŋ bɔha e beŋ kato ka kaamani beŋ. Beŋ kɔŋ gbuduŋa ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ; beŋ kɔŋ kiya ka kɔtɔkɔy ka bakɛrɛni beŋ mɛnɛ ka gbakuiŋ beŋ saathɛ ba kiyaŋ ba bindɛ tepe Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ.
Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ hu kɔŋ hintiŋ yenke niyo kɛwandi ka biyamɛti fooma saanuŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ba niyɔ.

Awa naa beŋ boho e beŋ kato ka kaamani beŋ, baŋ ni thɔɔrɔ ba hu beŋ gbonkoy; naa lɔkɔ baŋ tɛŋ, tɛpaŋ humo huma hu beŋ dɔma ba gbonkiya. Baa thayimbɛŋ tha beŋ gbonkoy thaŋ beŋ kutɛ biyɛ thɛŋ; tha kɔŋ ŋaye ka Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ.

Ka lɔkɔ babɛina biya bi kɔŋ ni mbɛndamɛŋ na gbɔŋ ka bi iŋ sɛmbɛŋ baŋ beŋ haaŋ e bindɛ niya ba bindɛ koro. Komisɛŋ bibiyɛthɛŋ bi kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ ni ka mpati namɛŋ. Mpati bi kɔŋ nɔŋ ŋayi e bindɛ sɔkinɔkɔ biya namɛŋ e bindɛ niya ba bindɛ kooruwo.
Wɔ yo wɔ kɔŋ bena thambo saathɛ ba kiyaŋ. Kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo ni muyuŋ haaŋ ka mapeye ma ka sii nama baŋ, ndɛ na nɔŋ niyɔ kisi.

“Beŋ kɔŋ kutu Ntha Kithambiyo ki sɔkinɔkɔ Masaala na kiŋ ki kooye ka ba kiŋ sisande ba kɔɔ.” (Yindo ni karaŋ woŋ tute thukuma; yi be wuŋ metho.) “Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, bi ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya yɔkɔŋ bi be kite ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ.
Wɔ wo penko ndɛ tute ka banka bakɛnama baŋ ka thinthi, ndɛ be tha nda thuhu ba ka sɛkitha mu ka banka nama baŋ kaake.
Awa wɔ wo nda ka dumgbu nama ka, ndɛ be tha nda duu ba ka sɛkitha kuhɔli nama koŋ.
Nambara ba kɔŋ nɔŋ niyɔ ka yɛrɛmɛŋ bi niyɔ iŋ thahɔɔyɛ beŋ mɛnɛ bi bɔpɔŋ malɛɛthɛŋ ka lɔkɔ babɛina.
Niyaŋ kuraminɛ ka Masaala haliko bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ba be tha nɔŋ niyɔ thamɔ.
Ba nambarɛŋ babɔyɛ ba kɔŋ niyɔ ba be hɛ nɔŋ niyɔ hanthe kabi na thɛrɛŋ nde Masaala ka fa woŋ haaŋ saaŋ bohi ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ. Awa bɛyi bahɛna sa nɔŋ nda niyɔ ba thɔyande iŋ baŋ baŋ.
Kɛrɛ Masaala thanki thuruna malɔkɔiŋ ma ka nambarɛŋ baŋ baŋ. Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ nde, wɔ yo wɔ sa buthurɔ tuka. Kɛrɛ saathɛ ba bi thanki Masaala yɛtha beŋ, ndɛ thuruŋ mɛŋ.
“Huna mɛnɛ wɔ kɔŋ bena tepe, na ‘Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ na woŋ,’ maa ‘Ndɛ na kanka woŋ,’ baŋ niŋ ni lanɛya.

Ba bi dɔmɔkɔ beŋ na Baninikisiŋ bina bindɛ mahɛŋ ma bindɛ ka nɛŋ, mɛnɛ banabiŋ bibahothiŋ, bi kɔŋ fuŋ. Bi kɔŋ ni lamanthoni iŋ bɛyiniŋ bathakaba haliko ba thɔkina biya bi thanki Masaala yɛtha beŋ, mɛnɛ wu kɔŋ ŋɛnɔ.
Tuteŋ thukuma, wuna biyɛ yaŋ kɔŋ bena yenke tepe bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ saanuŋ bɛŋ ba niyɔ.
“Ka wuthurɔy wu nambarɛŋ baŋ baŋ see wuŋ, kaŋ woŋ kɔŋ niyɔ huntuma, awa sɛnkɛ woŋ sa nda bɛndi.
Sosɛŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ yayi maŋaye ka kuthahinɛ koŋ; sɛmbɛŋ ba ka kuthahinɛ koŋ baŋ ba kɔŋ thɛnɛŋ.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina na ntiŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ e ndɛ kɔ saa ka thawuruma thaŋ iŋ sɛmbɛ bamandiŋ mɛnɛ yiki bamandiŋ.
Ndɛ kɔŋ ŋindi malekɛŋ nama beŋ ba kɔminande ka tha banthe bi thanki Masaala yɛtha beŋ maŋaye ka fa wobunthu woŋ fooma.

“Niyaŋ ba kuyeŋ ku tiŋ mutiŋ muthɔma mu dɔma muŋ na fiki, ku thɔyande nɔŋ kugbemgbeŋ, bena thaninuwa mathanani. Naa beŋ kute nthɔŋ bathalɛŋ biŋama beŋ thaha e bindɛ fuŋuna bompa, kɔthɔŋ ba dɔma na thamɔ bohe thɔɔ.
Nɛna hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ, naa beŋ kute nthɔŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ba si niyɔ, kɔthɔŋ ba dɔma na lɔkɔ baŋ thuriye, awa bɛŋ bohe nda sɛsuwa ba niyɔ.
Siyuwaŋ ba dɔma na biya bi ka yamana bahɛ baŋ baŋ sa niye daŋiyande fooma e bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ niyɔ.
Kuthahinɛ koŋ iŋ ka fa woŋ mu kɔŋ daŋande fooma, kɛrɛ thampa niŋ thaŋ sa daŋande.
“Wɔ yo ka wo kɔthɔ malɔkɔ mɛnɛ wakathi wo Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see, hali hintiŋ malekɛŋ bi ka ariana beŋ, maa Hati woŋ. Yɔkɔŋ Fandaŋ woŋ nagbɛti ndɛ na kɔthɛ.
Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ baa beŋ kɔita malɔkɔ ma Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see.

Wu kɔŋ nɔŋ niyɔ nɔŋ mathɔyande ma ka wɔ bathɔy ba fuŋa biyasi ba kaa kuyɛkɛŋ napooŋ. Naa bathɔy ndɛ ba kaa, ndɛ peye bawaliŋ nama beŋ waliŋ ba womo woma ni. Awa ndɛ tepe badethiteke biyo haŋ woŋ ndɛ be tha nine hali.
Bɛna dethitekeŋ, baa beŋ kɔita lɔkɔ ba mariki wo ka banka baŋ woŋ see. Thampo wu kɔŋ niyɔ naa kaŋ woŋ thɔɔyɛ, maa huyɛ teete, maa saanuŋ kaŋ ba puthɔ, maa naa kaŋ puthɔy.
Mɛnɛ ndɛ see kuthurunɔ, ndɛ be tha bena pɛnki bi nine.
Hu yaŋ bena tepe haŋ, yaŋ tepe huŋ ba womo woma: Dethitekeŋ!”

Naa pɛyɛ wuŋ hura kaye bindɛ ba dɔŋɔ ba siyuwa malɔkɔ ma puntiyando nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ iŋ maleka wo ka tuka haŋ woŋ, iŋ wiki wo ka thɔma kutoŋ ku ka iŋ yisithi woŋ koŋ, bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ bohe deethuwa gboŋɛŋ ba bindɛ bohe Yisɔs na ka gbundu ba niŋ kɔra.
Bindɛ dome, na “Miŋ bɛiŋ wuŋ ni ka wiki wo ka thɔma humandiŋ haŋ woŋ, baa thampo biya muŋ niya sɔnkɔ-sɔnkɔ.”

Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Yisɔs kiŋ nde ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthani ka banka ba ka Saimɔŋ wo boho nde iŋ nthoonaŋ kinɛnɔy ki bohe ka kɔtɔ ku ka wɔmɛti koŋ ka thinthi. Naa dɔŋɔy Yisɔs ka thɔma haŋ, hati yɛrɛmɛ wunthe key ka Yisɔs wo iŋ bithira hu mayɔ ma thimɔy huru, awa e mɛŋ nde hɛlɛŋ niyɔ ma kahɛ mɔlɔŋ, ma dɔma maŋ na naadi. Bithira hubɛina hu yehinuwo maŋaye ka raka hu kahɛ mɔlɔŋ hu dɔma na alabasata. Hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ key pɛthi bithira haŋ e koŋe Yisɔs na mayɔ maŋ ka yaha ka doŋe ndɛ ka thɔma haŋ ka.
Naa kute wuŋ biya binɔndi bi nde kɛndɛ beŋ, wuŋ thoŋ bindɛ e bindɛ dɔma ka wunthe iŋ ntɔ nama, na “Mbɛ hu teetuwe hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ mayɔ maŋ maŋ?

Mayɔ maŋ maŋ ma kɔŋ nde niya gbɔŋ e mɛŋ fuŋuna kɔbiri wo bɛrɛ ba kuthunkuŋ ku ka wɔ wunthe ba nina hunthe, e bamɔnɛŋ beŋ dunkuno kɔbiri wobɛina.” Bindɛ tharatharani hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ wubɔyɛ-bɔyɛ ba huŋ.
Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Penekeŋ hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ. Mbɛ hu beŋ niŋ niye thɔɔrɔ? Wundɛ thanki yama niyiyɛ bɛyi bayɔhɔy-yɔhɔy.
Beŋ kiŋ iŋ bamɔnɛŋ beŋ timo tima. Awa timo tima ti thimo beŋ ba bindɛ niyiyɛ, beŋ kɔŋ punku bindɛ niyiyɛ. Kɛrɛ beŋ sa niyɔ iŋ yaŋ timo tima.
Wundɛ ni ti punke wundɛ. Mayɔ ma koŋe ndɛ yama ka kɔtɔ maŋ, ndɛ ni wuŋ ba yama kɔsinɔkɔ haliko na yaŋ si mankuwo.
Yaŋ thimoŋ ba beŋ siyuwa haŋ haŋ baŋ, kamo kama ka Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ haŋ baŋ niya kɛwandi ka fa woŋ baŋ fooma, ba ni hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ ba kɔŋ doŋe tepo ba niŋ siyuwa.”
Kɛna ŋaye wunthe ka bakarandeni nama bikɔhi iŋ biye beŋ, wo dɔma Yudasi Isakariyɔti woŋ, e ndɛ kaa ka bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ ba ka dɛɛnka ba niyite bindɛ Yisɔs na gbɔŋ.
Naa yuye bindɛ huŋ, wuŋ yehe bindɛ wumandiŋ e bindɛ niŋ niya lahiri ba niŋ dunkune kɔbiri. Kɛna bohe nda Yudasi deethuwa hɛɛra bayɔhɔy na ndɛ niye Yisɔs na gbɔŋ kɛnamɛŋ.

Ka lɔkɔ bamayoŋ ka wiki wo thɔŋ bindɛ kutoŋ ku ka iŋ yisithi woŋ koŋ, ka lɔkɔ ba takɛŋ bimpatiyɛŋ beŋ fuŋuna saraka ba thɔma haŋ, bakarandeni bi ka Yisɔs beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ ba dɔma, na “Kama thimo yi ba miŋ kosineke ba thɔma hu ka siyuwa malɔkɔ ma puntiyando nde siya ntuŋ baŋ iŋ maleka wo nde katitɔkɔ tuka haŋ woŋ?”
Kɛna ŋindi Yisɔs bakarandeni biye e ndɛ bindɛ nunkunɔkɔ, na “Kaaŋ ka mɛti bamandiŋ baŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi, awa beŋ kɔŋ pɛnki wɔ wathe tuteke mumune. Yemaŋ niŋ
ka banka ba ndɛ biyande baŋ, e beŋ ka dɔma ka wo biyɛ banka baŋ woŋ: na ‘Karimɔkɔ woŋ dome, na kama makonko niŋ maŋ ka yaŋ iŋ bakarandeni niŋ beŋ thome thɔma humandiŋ haŋ?’
Wundɛ kɔŋ bena toŋine makonko mamandiŋ ka banka baŋ ka thinthi, ma yehinuwo nda wuyɔhɔy, ma beŋ ka kɔsinɔkɔ ntha yo ntha ba miŋ.”
Bakarandeni beŋ key ka mɛti ka e bindɛ ka pɛnka ntha yo ntha nɔŋ na tepe nthɔŋ Yisɔs bindɛ na. Awa bindɛ kɔsinɔkɔy thɔma haŋ haŋ baŋ ba malɔkɔ ma puntiyande maŋ.
Naa thɔɔyɛ kaŋ woŋ, Yisɔs tɛŋ iŋ bakarandeni nama kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ.
Awa naa bindɛ thɔŋ, Yisɔs dome ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, wunthe ka beŋ wo miŋ thɔŋ ka tha banthe woŋ kɔŋ yama ni gbɔŋ ka hadeni niŋ beŋ.”
Naa yuye bindɛ haŋ haŋ baŋ, wuŋ niyɔy bindɛ nkinikiniŋ wumandiŋ. Kɛna bohe bindɛ niŋ thɔnthiŋinuwa ka wunthe-wunthe, na “Mariki, yaŋ kutɛ ye.”
Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Wunthe ka bendo kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ, wo yaŋ thiyitande yɔnkɔ ka karo banthe woŋ, ndɛ na yama ni gbɔŋ.
Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ tuke nɔŋ na gbalo nde wuŋ na ka magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ ba ndɛ. Kɛrɛ nambara ba kɔŋ see ka wɔ wo ni Hati ka Wɔ woŋ gbɔŋ. Wu kɔŋ nde niyɔ hita ba wɔ bɛina nde nɔŋ thana mpoo.”

Naa nde bindɛ thɔŋ, Yisɔs sekithe kutoŋ koŋ, e ndɛ thiyiyɛ kuŋ maamo. Naa thankaŋ ndɛ, ndɛ thinkinuwande kuŋ, e kuŋ dunkune bakarandeni beŋ e bindɛ tepe ba dɔma, na “Sɛkithaŋ kutoŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ e beŋ kuŋ thɔma. Kɔtɔ niŋ koŋ kuna.”
Ndɛ sekithe hɛlɛŋ kɔɔpu haŋ e ndɛ thiya Masaala na maamo. Naa thanki ndɛ thiya maamo, ndɛ dunkune bindɛ, awa bindɛ fooma thiiye.
Yisɔs dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Mampa maŋ maŋ mɛna wasi niŋ baŋ ba dunkuŋ yaŋ saathɛ ba biya bibɔyɛ. Wasi bakiyaŋ baŋ bɛna thiŋinɛ mayukunande ma ka Masaala maŋ.
Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe ba dɔma na yaŋ sa nɔŋ nda thiiye mampa ma ka mutiŋ muŋ muŋ baŋ, yɔkɔŋ nda ti yaŋ thiiye maŋama maŋ ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.”
Naa thanki bindɛ thɔma, bindɛ soŋe kuiŋa ku ka Masaala koŋ, kɛna pɛyɛŋ bindɛ kɛndɛ ba kaa ka kusɛri ku dɔma koŋ na Ɔlifisi.

Kɛna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Beŋ fooma beŋ kɔŋ yama pɛyɛŋ e beŋ kita napooŋ. Wu kɔŋ niyɔ nɔŋ na tepe Masaala ka magbali nama maŋ na ba dɔma, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ kɔri batɔli woŋ, awa takɛŋ beŋ fooma ka kubinthi koŋ bi kɔŋ paŋande.’
Kɛrɛ naa yaŋ ŋayino ka tuka haŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ yenke kaa ka Kalili, kɛna beŋ yama penke.”
Huna dome Pita kɛnama, na “Hali beŋ beŋ fooma bi pɛyɛnaŋ yina, yaŋ sa yina pɛyɛŋ.”
Yisɔs dome kɛnama, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe, saanuŋ koki woŋ ba kokira kaye huyɛ baŋ baŋ, yi kɔŋ yama buuhu dɔŋɔ kataati ba dɔma na yi kɔita yama.”
Kɛna yame hɛlɛŋ Pita dɔma kɛnama, na “Hali wu pɛnkaŋ nthɔŋ ba dɔma na yaŋ kɔŋ tuku iŋ yi ka nanthe, yaŋ sa yina buuhu.” Bakarandeni bibintheŋ beŋ fooma dome hɛlɛmaŋ nɛŋ.
Yisɔs mɛnɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ fuŋ ba kaa ka tha ka dɔma na ka Kɛthɛsɛmɛni. Naa tɛŋ bindɛ kɛndɛ, ndɛ tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Dɔŋɔŋ dondo baŋ. Yaŋ kɔŋ key kanka baŋ ba ka niya kuraminɛ.”
Kɛna diŋe ndɛ Pita na, Yemisi, mɛnɛ Yɔni ka kaa. Ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ ndɛ bohe kutɔkɔ nkinikiniŋ, awa e thukuma nama haŋ kɔ niya thɔɔrɔ.
Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kiŋ iŋ nkinikiniŋ wumandiŋ ka thukuma niŋ haŋ, wu yama kɔ ba kɔra. Bɛna pɛyɔŋ dondo baŋ, beŋ be huru gbele ka nanthe iŋ yaŋ.”
Kɛna key ndɛ ka kɔtɔkɔy hɛlɛŋ wuyete, e ndɛ putɔ nasɔli-sɔli ka niya kuraminɛ, ba mɛnɛ wu kɔŋ ŋɛnɔ, wakathi wo ka nambara baŋ woŋ be niŋ buthurɔ.

Wundɛ ni kuraminɛ, na “Papaŋ, Fandaŋ woŋ, bɛyi yo bɛyi ba kiŋ baŋɛnɔy kɛnda. Bɛna niya ba kɔɔpu hu ka nambara haŋ haŋ hu be yama buthurɔ. Kɛrɛ wu bɛiŋ niyɔ ka mathimo niŋ nde, kɛrɛ wu niyɔyŋ ka mathimo makɛnda maŋ.”

Naa thanki ndɛ niya kuraminɛ, ndɛ teŋiteke ka bakarandeni bitaati beŋ. Kɛrɛ ndɛ penke bi si nine. Huna dome ndɛ ka Pita, na “Saimɔŋ, e nine na beŋ nine? Mbɛ hu sa beŋ punku hure gbele hali ba wakathi wunthe?”
Wundɛ dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Huraŋ gbele e beŋ niya kuraminɛ wuna sa beŋ thiika ba niya hakɛ. Thukuma haŋ hu thimoŋ ba niya bɛyi bathumbɛ, kɛrɛ huwɔmɛtiya haŋ ka iŋ sɛmbɛ ba bɛŋ niya.”
Kɛna teŋiteke hɛlɛŋ ndɛ ba ka niya kuraminɛ. Kuraminɛ kukunthe koŋ thuuŋ kuŋ ma key ka niya.
Ndɛ key hɛlɛŋ ka bakarandeni beŋ e ndɛ pɛnka bi si nine; baa bi thiŋo nde mandɛ ka thaaya namɛŋ thaŋ. Ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ, bindɛ tha nda bohi hu bindɛ niŋ konde.
Naa key hɛlɛŋ ndɛ hu tɛŋinɛ hutaati haŋ, ndɛ dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “E haaŋ hɛ nine na beŋ nine e beŋ kɔ hɛɛmuwa? Atɛŋ nda! Wakathi woŋ tɛŋ wo Hati ka Wɔ woŋ niyo gbɔŋ woŋ ka thɛnkɔ tha ka bahakɛŋ.
Ŋayeŋ ka kɔɔ, miŋ beŋ key. Dethaŋ hɛ, wo yama ni gbɔŋ woŋ, ndɛ kiŋ nda mina wuthuriye.”

Naa nde hintiŋ Yisɔs gbonkoy, kɛna see Yudasi, wo nde wunthe ka bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ, iŋ sɛthɛ babɔyɛ bi iŋ silanhiŋ mɛnɛ ŋagbemgbe, bi ŋindi bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ, karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, mɛnɛ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ.

Saanuŋ bindɛ ba kaa ka bɔha Yisɔs na, Yudasi, banigbɔŋ woŋ, toŋine bindɛ na wundɛ ka ni na bindɛ kothiye Yisɔs na. Ndɛ tepe bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Hati wowathe wo nthɔŋ yaŋ dɔɔkɔ ka maana woŋ ndɛ na; bɔhaŋ niŋ e beŋ niŋ diŋa ka kaa.”
Naa tɛŋ Yudasi, ndɛ key toloŋ ka Yisɔs ka e dɔma, na “Maande, Karimɔkɔ.” Awa ndɛ dɔɔkɔy niŋ ka maana.
Kɛna key sɛthɛ baŋ ŋote Yisɔs na e bindɛ niŋ bɔha wukahɛ-kahɛ.
Naa kute wuŋ wunthe ka bi kɔɔyɛ kɛndɛ kuwaŋ beŋ, ndɛ yose silanhi nama baŋ e ndɛ yuwa waayi wo ka bafode womandiŋ woŋ e gbaara kuiha nama koŋ.
Kɛna dome Yisɔs ka sɛthɛ baŋ, na “E beŋ asee iŋ silanhiŋ mɛnɛ ŋagbemgbeŋ ka bɔha yama nɔŋ ka beŋ see ka bɔha wɔ wo sa putiyɔ siraŋ?
Timo tima yaŋ kɔŋ dɔŋɔ iŋ beŋ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ ka thaninuwa, kɛrɛ beŋ tha yama bohi. Kɛrɛ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ niyɔy fooma haliko magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ ma be niyɔ nɔndi.”
Ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ bakarandeni beŋ fooma pɛyɛŋ niŋ e bindɛ kita napooŋ.
Naa bindɛ kati Yisɔs na, hati lamgba wunthe wo pithɛ nde thoombo yemeŋ nde Yisɔs na mahɛŋ. Kɛna yole bindɛ ba bɔha hati lamgba woŋ baŋ,
kɛrɛ ndɛ thare bunthu napooŋ e ndɛ pɛya thoombo wo pithe nde wundɛ woŋ.
Kɛna kato Yisɔs ka banka ba ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ, ka kɔmande nde fooma bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ, bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ, mɛnɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ.

Naa Yisɔs kata, Pita yeme kahɛŋ kɛrɛ wuthɔkiyande iŋ bindɛ. Naa biyande Pita, ndɛ key dɔŋɔ ka gbada hu ka banka ba ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ baŋ. Ndɛ key dɔŋɔ ka poye iŋ bi ni kantha beŋ ba detha ba niyɔ.
Kɛna bohe bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ bakaamani beŋ fooma deethuwa maseriŋ mahothi ma sɔkinɔkɔ Yisɔs na haliko na ndɛ koro. Kɛrɛ bindɛ tha kutu hu bindɛ niŋ thonkine.
Biya bibɔyɛ key kɔɔ ka kɔtɔkɔy ba niŋ kɛriŋiyɛ hothi, kɛrɛ magbonkoy namɛŋ maŋ tha mɛyiyande hali.
Yɔkɔŋ hu mankɛ nagbɔŋ baseriŋ binɔndi key kɔɔ ba kɛriŋiyɛ Yisɔs na hothi e bindɛ dɔma, na
“Miŋ yuye nde si dɔŋ, na ‘Yaŋ punkeŋ teetuwa yikiya ba ka Masaala ba yeheni biyamɛti baŋ, awa e yaŋ hɛlɛŋ yehinuwa ba sa yehinuwa iŋ biyamɛti na gbɛɛŋ wotaati woŋ daŋande.’ ”
Hali bindɛ hɛlɛŋ gbeeŋ magbonkoy namɛŋ maŋ tha mɛyiyande.
Naa yuye huŋ Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ, ndɛ ŋaye e kɔɔ ka kɔtɔkɔy kɛnamɛŋ e thɔnthiŋina Yisɔs na, na “E yi ka iŋ yaabi ba yi ni ka maseri ma lamgbeŋ beŋ beŋ ni ma sɔkinɔkɔ yina maŋ?”
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tha hintiŋ nthɔŋ niŋ tɔtiyɔkɔ. Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ hɛlɛŋ niŋ, na “E yina Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ, Hati ka Masaala wo biyamɛti gbuŋunu woŋ?”
Yisɔs ni niŋ yaabi, na “Yama, awa beŋ fooma beŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ kutu Hati ka Wɔ woŋ doŋe kuwaŋ ka yɔnkɔ huthome hu ka Masaala wo biyɛ sɛmbɛŋ fooma woŋ e ndɛ kɔ thuha iŋ thawuruma thaŋ maŋaye ka ariana.”
Naa yuye huŋ Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ, ndɛ saayaŋ ŋahɔli ŋa thooye ndɛ ŋaŋ ba tɔŋina ba ndɛ thɔɔ ka mathoŋ, e ndɛ dɔma, na “Miŋ thimota nda maseri yo maseri mahɛna.
Beŋ fooma yuye magbonkoy manɛnɔy maŋ maŋ. Nama tepe beŋ?” Bindɛ fooma niyɔy hunthe ma sɔkinɔkɔ niŋ e bindɛ dɔma na ndɛ asisande ba koro.

Kɛna sɛsi binɔndi ka bindɛ ba niŋ thuthe e bindɛ niŋ pututa thaaya ba niŋ thiika thɔkɔ e bindɛ niŋ kɔ haanka. Naa bindɛ haaŋe nthɔŋ niŋ, bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “Tɔŋina hɛ wo haaŋɛ yina woŋ.” Kɛna ŋaye bi ni kantha beŋ e bindɛ niŋ thorinuwa.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Pita doŋeŋ nde ka gbada ka. Kɛna key hati bɛthɔ wo nde wunthe ka bawaliŋ bi ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ kɛnama.
Naa kute ndɛ Pita si poye, ndɛ dethe niŋ natiŋ e ndɛ dɔma, na “Yi hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ gbeeŋ yina nɔŋ iŋ Yisɔs wo ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Nasarɛthi baŋ woŋ.”
Kɛrɛ Pita buuhu e ndɛ dɔma, na “Yaŋ methota awa yaŋ hakiyandota hu yi gbonkoy haŋ.” Kɛna fuŋ ndɛ ka gbada ka. Naa fuŋ nthɔŋ ndɛ, koki woŋ kokori.
Hati bɛthɔ wo bawali woŋ kute niŋ. Kɛna bohe hɛlɛŋ ndɛ dɔma ka bi kɔɔyɛ kɛndɛ kuwaŋ beŋ, na “Wunthe na ka bindɛ.”

Kɛrɛ Pita buuhu hɛlɛŋ huŋ. Naa nambe nthɔŋ wuŋ wuyete, bi kɔɔyɛ kɛndɛ kuwaŋ beŋ dome ka Pita, na “Yi sa punku buuhuwa ba dɔma na yi ka wunthe ka bindɛ, baa yi hɛlɛŋ gbeeŋ wɔ na yi wo ŋaye ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili.”
Kɛna bohe Pita thiyiyɔkɔ danka e ndɛ kɔ gbiŋa ba dɔma, na “Haliko Masaala gbasiŋita yama mɛnɛ hothi na yaŋ tɛpi haŋ. Yaŋ kɔita hati wowathe wo beŋ dɔŋ woŋ.”

Naa gbanthaŋ nthɔŋ ndɛ, koki woŋ kokori hukaye. Kɛna siyi Pita hu tepe nde niŋ Yisɔs haŋ ba dɔma, na “Saanuŋ koki woŋ ba kokira kaye, yi kɔŋ yama buuhu dɔŋɔ kataati ba dɔma na yi kɔita yama.” Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina wundɛ sɛsi ba berina.

Kuputhɔ ku kaŋ sanka-sanka, bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ, bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ, karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, mɛnɛ bakaamani beŋ fooma thuŋande ka tha banthe e bindɛ bɔha madɛɛnki. Bindɛ bohe Yisɔs na, e bindɛ niŋ lɔŋa iŋ yɔlɔnkɔiŋ, e bindɛ niŋ kata ka Pailɛti ka, wo ŋindo nde ba niyɔ bakɛrɛŋ woŋ iŋ biRomaŋ beŋ.
Naa kute niŋ Pailɛti, ndɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “E yina gbaku wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ?” Yisɔs ni niŋ yaabi, na “Na tepe nda nɛŋ yi.”
Bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ tepiye Yisɔs na bɛyiniŋ babɔyɛ ba niŋ sɔkinɔkɔ.
Kɛna thɔnthɔŋɔŋ hɛlɛŋ niŋ Pailɛti, na “E yi ka iŋ hu yi tɛpi? Pona hɛ kuiha bɛyiniŋ babɔyɛ baŋ baŋ fooma ba yi tɛpiya baŋ.”
Yisɔs tha hɛlɛŋ niŋ sikiniyande sɔkɔ yo sɔkɔ. Awa Pailɛti ni thakaba wumandiŋ.
Nina yo nina naa biYusu beŋ siyi malɔkɔ ma puntiyando nde bindɛ iŋ maleka woŋ, Pailɛti kiŋ nde iŋ mabari ma ka pɛniyɛ biya beŋ wɔ lɔŋɔy wunthe wo bindɛ yɛthi woŋ.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, hati lamgba wunthe kiŋ nde kɛndɛ wo lɔŋɔy, wo dɔma Barabasi. Awa wundɛ kiŋ nde wɔ wunthe ka bi kɔrɛ wɔmɛti beŋ ka dekiya ma sɔkinɔkɔ makɛrɛŋ maŋ.
Naa kɔmande sɛthɛ baŋ ka tha banthe, bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Pailɛti na ba mabari ma ka kuta nkinikiniŋ kiŋ maŋ.
Pailɛti thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bindɛ ba dɔma, na “E beŋ thimoŋ ba yaŋ bena pɛniyɛ gbaku wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ?”
Wundɛ kɔthɛŋ nagberekethe ba dɔma na ka hunaŋ kɛna kate bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ Yisɔs na kɛnama ka.
Kɛrɛ bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ heŋite sɛthɛ baŋ ba bindɛ thɔnthiŋina ba peniyo Barabasi na.
Pailɛti thɔnthɔŋɔŋ hɛlɛŋ sɛthɛ baŋ, na “Nama thimo beŋ ba yaŋ niya wo beŋ dɔŋ woŋ na gbaku wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ?”
Bindɛ fooma thiye masɔnkɔ, na “Yanta niŋ ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ ba kɛndɛ tuke.”
Pailɛti thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bindɛ, na “Mbɛ banɛnɔy ba ni ndɛ?” Kɛrɛ bindɛ yame ntiŋ thiya masɔnkɔ, na “Yanta niŋ ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ ba kɛndɛ tuke.”
Pailɛti pɛniyɛ bindɛ Barabasi na, baa ndɛ thimoŋ nde ba yehina sɛthɛ baŋ thathukuma. Wundɛ ni ba Yisɔs tawo e wundɛ niŋ dunkuna ba wundɛ be ka yanta.
Kurugbani beŋ biiti Yisɔs na kaake ka banka ba ka bakɛrɛŋ woŋ baŋ. Kɛna thiyande bindɛ fooma.
Bindɛ thiye niŋ kuhɔli ku niyɛ maŋ pothita, e bindɛ yehinuwa nɛmu maŋaye ka bathalɛŋ bibasoi, e bindɛ niŋ tuta Yisɔs na ka yaha.
Kɛna bohe bindɛ niŋ maana e bindɛ kɔ dɔma, na “Yindo gbaku wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ, haliko yi thɔɔkuwa sii.”
Bindɛ hɔrɔni niŋ kuyeŋ ka yaha, e bindɛ niŋ kɔ thuthe. Bindɛ bohe kaa kaŋ puutuwɔ ka kɔtɔkɔy e bindɛ niŋ kɔ kunthuŋuyɛ.
Naa thanki bindɛ niŋ thɔtha dɛkuiŋ, bindɛ ŋututu niŋ kuhɔli ku niyɛ maŋ pothita koŋ, e bindɛ niŋ hɛlɛŋ thiya yaba nama baŋ. Kɛna fuŋutu bindɛ niŋ ba niŋ ka yanta ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ ba niŋ kɔra.

Naa kurugbani beŋ key ba ka yanta Yisɔs na, bindɛ pɛnkande iŋ hati lamgba wunthe wo dɔma na Saimɔŋ, wo nde biyande ka mɛti bamandiŋ ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi baŋ. Kɛna pithite niŋ kurugbani beŋ ba ndɛ be kati kuyeŋ kubariŋande ku nde Yisɔs kati koŋ. Saimɔŋ woŋ baŋ wɔ na nde wo ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Sairini, awa wundɛ na nde fanda ka Alɛsanda mɛnɛ Rufɔsi.
Bindɛ kati Yisɔs na ka tha ka dɔma na Kɔlɔkɔtha, wu thalintando ba dɔma, na “Ka tha ka kugbomgbokoro ku ka yaha.”
Kɛna yole bindɛ ba niŋ dunkune mampa ma tikitinuwando iŋ tɛɛni ba dɔma na mari ba ndɛ be thiiye, kɛrɛ Yisɔs tha mɛyi ba mɛŋ thiiye.
Kɛna yanti bindɛ niŋ ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ. Naa thanki bindɛ niŋ yanta, bindɛ hanande yabɛŋ nama baŋ kaŋ yɛla makoro ba womo woma be kutu bakɛnama.
Bɛrɛ ba ka matheyani yanti na bindɛ niŋ.
Kɛna gbale bindɛ bɛyiniŋ ba gbonkiyo baŋ ba niŋ sɔkinɔkɔ. Magbali maŋ tepe ba dɔma, na “Gbaku wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ.”
Ka lɔkɔ ba yanto Yisɔs ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ, biya biye bi tha putiyɔ siraŋ yanto nde hɛlɛŋ ka ŋayeŋ ŋabariŋande ka lɔkɔ babɛina, wunthe ka yɔnkɔ huthome haŋ, wunthe ka hupɔkɔdɔ haŋ. [
Awa magbali maŋ see niyɔ nɔndi ma tɛpɛ maŋ ba wuŋ niyɔ, na “Wundɛ kɔŋ kɔnditando iŋ bithinkɛ siraŋ baŋ beŋ.”

Ka lɔkɔ babɛina hanimaa bi daŋande nde kɛndɛ beŋ akey kaŋ yila thankaha kaŋ hɛtha Yisɔs na e gbonkiya wunɛnɔy ba wundɛ, e bindɛ kɔ dɔma, na “Ahaaŋ! Yindo dɔmɛ nde na yi kɔŋ teeti yikiya ba ka Masaala baŋ, e yi hɛlɛŋ bɛŋ thanka thoya ka gbɛɛŋ wo tɛŋinɛ wotaati woŋ.
Bɛna thuha hɛ ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ e yi niyɔkɔ kisi.”
Hali hɛlɛŋ bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ athɔɔtɔ ka thɔtha Yisɔs na dɛkuiŋ e bindɛ dɔma, na “Ndɛ ni biya bihɛna kisi, kɛrɛ ndɛ sa punku niyɔkɔ kisi.

Miŋ kutɛŋ hɛ Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ, wo dɔma gbaku wo ka Isirɛli woŋ, be thuhu ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ tete, wuna miŋ niŋ ni lanɛya.” Hali hɛlɛŋ biya biye bi tha putiyɔ siraŋ bi yanto iŋ wundɛ ka nanthe beŋ gbeeŋ bindɛ gbonkoy hɛlɛŋ wunɛnɔy ba Yisɔs.
There ka hatɔ teete huntuma humandiŋ huna lɔŋande nde ka kuyɛkɛŋ kubɛyna. Huntuma haŋ haŋ niyɔy ba wakathiŋ bitaati.
Ka wakathi wotaati woŋ, Yisɔs bereŋ iŋ thampa thatɔɔkɛ e dɔma, na “Iloy, Iloy, lama sabakathani?” wu thalintando ba dɔma, na “Masaala niŋ woŋ, Masaala niŋ woŋ, mbɛ hu baŋine yama yi?”
Binɔndi ka biya bi kɔɔyɛ nde kɛndɛ kuwaŋ bi yuyɛ ndɛ si bereŋ beŋ dome, na “Hati lamgba woŋ baŋ kɔŋ thiyi Ilaiya na.”

Wunthe ka biya beŋ thare yako e ka yɔthiŋita ntha ka mampa ma ba thanki yɔhɔ maŋ, e thɔtha kuyeŋ ka ntha kiŋ, e yekiniyɛ Yisɔs na ba ndɛ be sɔɔsi mɛŋ, e dɔma, na “Yumbaŋ hɛ, miŋ dethɛŋ hɛ mɛnɛ Ilaiya kɔŋ see ba niŋ si niya kisi.”
Kɛna yele Yisɔs thampa thatɔɔkɛ e ndɛ ntiŋ kɔ thathina.
Thika babimɛ ba yanto nde ba hakinande biya beŋ iŋ makonko ma ka kupɛnkintiyande ku ka Masaala koŋ kaake ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ saayande mateete, ŋaye ka thinthi haaŋ athuhu ka pothi.
Naa kute bayaha wo ka kurugbani beŋ wo kɔɔyɛ nde kɛndɛ ka kɔtɔkɔy ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ na tuke Yisɔs na, wundɛ dome, na “Hunɔndi yaathi, hati lamgba woŋ baŋ Hati ka Masaala na nde.”

Yɛrɛmɛŋ binɔndi bi kiŋ ndɛ kɛndɛ ka koro Yisɔs ka bi kɔɔyɛ wuthokiye wuyete, thiitaŋ beŋ beŋ baŋ: Mariyama wo ŋaye nde ka mɛti ba ka Makadala, Salomi, mɛnɛ Mariyama nanda ka Yemisi wohatiyɛ mɛnɛ Yosesi.
Bindɛ beŋ beŋ baŋ bina yeme nde Yisɔs na naa ndɛ ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili ba niŋ mase ka wali nama baŋ. Yɛrɛmɛŋ bihɛna bibɔyɛ bi yeme nde niŋ ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi bi kiŋ nde hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ kɛndɛ.

Naa tɛŋ wuŋ mahɔnkɔlɛŋ, hati wathe wunthe see wo dɔma na Yusufu wo ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Arimathiya. Wɔ na nde wundɛ wo thiyɔi yiki wumandiŋ ka Kaama wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ, wo nde yumbu ba saa hu ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ. Malɔkɔ mɛna nde saanuŋ Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ, malɔkɔ ma biya beŋ kosineke ba Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ. Kɛna key Yusufu iŋ thunka ka Pailɛti ka e niŋ ka thɔnthiŋina ba dunkuno kubeli ku ka Yisɔs koŋ ba niŋ mankuwa.
Pailɛti ni thakaba wumandiŋ ba yuyɛ na Yisɔs thɔkɔti hɛ nda tuka. Kɛna thiyi ndɛ bayaha wo ka kurugbani beŋ woŋ e niŋ thɔnthiŋina mɛnɛ wuŋ nambe hɛ nda naa tuku Yisɔs.
Naa thanki nthɔŋ Pailɛti yuyɛ kuna koŋ ka bayaha woŋ, wundɛ tepe Yusufu na ba ndɛ ka sɛkitha kubeli koŋ.

Yusufu boye thika bahuhɛ e ka thathina kubeli koŋ, e kuŋ huitutuwa thika baŋ. Wundɛ key kuŋ manki ka yoma hu gbusiyo ndɛ ka kuthara koŋ haŋ nɔŋ makonko. Kɛna binkiliŋ wundɛ raka humandiŋ e ndɛ huŋ ŋatha ka biyo hu ka yoma haŋ.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, Mariyama wo ka Makadala mɛnɛ Mariyama nanda ka Yosesi bi kiŋ nde kɛndɛ kuwaŋ ba detha ka taye bindɛ Yisɔs na.
Naa daŋande malɔkɔ ma nde biYusu beŋ hemuwe maŋ, Mariyama wo ka mɛti ba ka Makadala, Salomi, mɛnɛ Mariyama nanda ka Yemisi boye mayɔ mathimɔy huru ba ka konke kubeli ku ka Yisɔs koŋ.
Ka Sɔnde sanka-sanka naa thɛri theyaŋ haŋ, bindɛ key ka yoma ka.

Naa bindɛ key, bindɛ bohe kaa kaŋ gbonkiya ka wunthe iŋ ntɔ nama, na “Mbɛ mina ka binkiliniyɛ raka haŋ maŋaye ka biyo hu ka yoma haŋ?” Raka huna nde humandiŋ-mandiŋ. Naa bindɛ hintiŋ wuthokiye wuyete, bindɛ kute ba dɔma na raka haŋ binkilino maŋaye ka yoma haŋ ka.
Huna biyande bindɛ kaake ka yoma haŋ e bindɛ kuta kɛndɛ hati lamgba wunthe doŋe kuwaŋ ka yɔnkɔ huthome haŋ, wo thɔɔyɛ kuhɔli kuhuhɛ napooŋ. Kɛna ni bindɛ thakaba wumandiŋ.

Hati lamgba woŋ tepe bindɛ, na “Baŋ ni thakaba; yaŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na beŋ kɔŋ dethi ba Yisɔs wo ka Nasarɛthi woŋ, wo yanto ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ woŋ. Wundɛ ka dondo baŋ; ndɛ ŋayino ka tuka haŋ. Saaŋ dethi du taaye nde bindɛ niŋ do.

Bɛna kaaŋ e beŋ ka tɛpa huseri haŋ haŋ baŋ ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, thiyitaŋ Pita na: na ‘Wundɛ kɔŋ bena kɔtiyɔkɔ ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili koŋ; kɛna beŋ niŋ ka kute, nɔŋ na tepe nde nthɔŋ ndɛ bena na.’ ”
Kɛna pɛyɛŋ bindɛ ka yoma ka e bindɛ kaa kaŋ thara iŋ gbɛki mɛnɛ payɔ humandiŋ. Bindɛ tha gbonkiye wɔ yo wɔ baa bi nde iŋ payɔ humandiŋ.
Yɛrɛmɛŋ beŋ key ka Pita ka mɛnɛ binyathiki nama beŋ e toŋe bindɛ kuna kuthurɔy ba bɛyiniŋ fooma ba thanki bindɛ tepo baŋ.
Naa daŋande wuŋ kɛndɛ, Yisɔs ka yɛthɛ nama wundɛ ŋindi bakarandeni nama beŋ iŋ huseri hu ka Masaala hu niyɔ ba kɔy yo kɔy haŋ ka fa woŋ fooma.]
Naa yuye bindɛ Mariyama si dɔŋ na Yisɔs kiŋ wohɛmɛ awa ndɛ kutiyɔkɔi niŋ, bindɛ tha niŋ ni lanɛya.
Naa daŋande wuŋ, Yisɔs tɔŋinɔkɔy ka bakarandeni nama biye ka maniyɔ mahɛna naa kooye nde bindɛ gboŋa maŋaye ka mɛti baŋ.
Kɛna dapiyɔkɔy bindɛ ba ka tepe bakarandeni bihɛna beŋ, kɛrɛ bi tepo beŋ tha huŋ ni lanɛya.

Ka wumankɛ nagbɔŋ, Yisɔs tɔŋinɔkɔy ka bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ wunthe beŋ naa nde bindɛ thɔŋ. Wundɛ tepe bindɛ ba bindɛ niya nde wunɛnɔy, baa bindɛ ka nde iŋ lanɛya awa banapiŋ bina nde hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ ba thana niya lanɛya hu tepe bi kutɛ niŋ naa ŋaye ndɛ ka tuka haŋ.
Wundɛ tepe bindɛ, na “Kaaŋ ka fa woŋ fooma e beŋ kaa kaŋ niya kɛwandi Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ ka biyamɛti fooma.
Wo ni lanɛya woŋ e ndɛ biyo biye hu ka Masaala haŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ niyɔ kisi; kɛrɛ wundɛ wo sa ni lanɛya woŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ thonkino.
Balanɛyani beŋ bi kɔŋ dunkuno sɛmbɛ ba niya bɛyiniŋ bathakaba: bi kɔŋ kaninande biya mbayiŋ naa bindɛ hiŋ keŋ kukiyaŋ koŋ; bi kɔŋ gbonkoy ka thayuni thahɛna.
Mɛnɛ bindɛ boheke bikɛkɛni maa bindɛ thiiye mayara yo mayara, bindɛ sa kutu bɛyi yo bɛyi; bi kɔŋ tutu bithoonɔy beŋ thɛnkɔ, awa bi kɔŋ pethɔ.”
Naa thanki Mariki woŋ Yisɔs gbonkiya iŋ bakarandeni beŋ, ndɛ ŋatito ka ariana e ka dɔŋɔ ka yɔnkɔ huthome hu ka Masaala haŋ ka madoŋe mayiki maŋ.
Kɛna fuŋ bakarandeni beŋ ba kaa kaŋ niya kɛwandi kamo kama, awa Mariki woŋ ni wali iŋ bindɛ haaŋ e wuŋ tɔŋina ba dɔma na kɛwandi namɛŋ woŋ woseŋa na maŋaye ka bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba bindɛ ni baŋ.]
Yama gbali kuthagba koŋ koŋ ka bayiki niŋ woŋ Thiyafilɔsi. Biya bibɔyɛ yole nda si punke bindɛ ba gbala kuna ku ka bɛyiniŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ ka mateete makɛntuŋ maŋ.
Bindɛ gbale ba thanki nde miŋ tepo baŋ iŋ biya bi kutiyɔkɔy bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ beŋ ka thaaya thakɛnamɛŋ thaŋ kabi ka mathɛrɛŋ maŋ, bi koyiŋɛ huseri haŋ beŋ.

Bɛna, bayiki niŋ woŋ, naa thanki yaŋ thanuwa bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, e yaŋ bɛŋ yekiyɔkɔ fooma there ka mathɛrɛŋ maŋ, yaŋ simɔkɔy ba dɔma na wu kɔŋ niyɔ wuyɔhɔy ba yina gbalite bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ toloŋ nɔŋ na niiye bɛŋ na.
Yaŋ ni wuŋ haliko yi be punku ba kɔthɔ nɔndi baŋ nagberekethe ba bɛyiniŋ ba thanki yi tepo baŋ.

Ka lɔkɔ ba nde Hɛrɔdi gbaku wo ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya, bafode wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ wo dɔma na Sɛkaraiya wo nde ka kufɛŋ ku ka hufode hu ŋaye ka Abaiya haŋ. Keŋ ku ka wɔtɔ nama woŋ nde kuna dɔma Ilisabɛthi; wundɛ hɛlɛŋ nde wɔ na wo ŋaye ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka bafodeni.
Sɛkaraiya iŋ wɔtɔ nama Ilisabɛthi biya bina nde biyɔhɔy ka thaaya tha ka Masaala thaŋ, e bindɛ putiyɔ sirani bi ka Masaala beŋ bi niyo nde bindɛ yamari beŋ fooma.
Sɛkaraiya iŋ wɔtɔ nama Ilisabɛthi see thanthi wu ka hati, baa Ilisabɛthi badithi na nde wundɛ.
Lɔkɔ banthe nde Sɛkaraiya ni wali bakɛnama baŋ nɔŋ bafode ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, naa tɛŋ wuŋ malɔkɔ namɛŋ maŋ wundɛ ba kɛndɛ niya wali.

Wundɛ see yɛtha naa yele bindɛ makoro ba niya wali ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ nɔŋ na nde bindɛ yethe bafodeni beŋ na, ba tɔɔnuwa gbomgbo ba thimɔy huru ka bɛsɛ ba ka Masaala baŋ. Wundɛ see biyande ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ,
awa e sɛthɛ baŋ fooma kɔ niya kuraminɛ ka gbada ka, ka wakathi wo gbomgbo ba thimɔy huru baŋ toonuwo woŋ.
Kɛna see maleka wo ka Mariki woŋ niŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ e wundɛ si kɔɔ ka yɔnkɔ huthome hu ka bɛsɛ ba gbomgbo ba thimɔy huru baŋ toonuwo kɛ.
Naa kute niŋ Sɛkaraiya, wundɛ thunɔkɔy; wundɛ see thooyo payɔ.
Kɛrɛ maleka wo ka Masaala woŋ tepe ka Sɛkaraiya, na “Sɛkaraiya, ba payɔ! Masaala thanki yɛrɔkɔ kuraminɛ kukɛnda koŋ; wɔtɔ nda woŋ Ilisabɛthi kɔŋ mpuu hati wathe; yi kɔŋ ba niŋ thunda keŋ na Yɔni.
Awa mpoo hu ka hati woŋ baŋ haŋ hu kɔŋ sisi mayehitɔkɔ mamandiŋ kɛnda iŋ ka biya bibɔyɛ.
Ndɛ kɔŋ niyɔ wɔ mandiŋ ka thaaya tha ka Mariki woŋ thaŋ, awa wundɛ sa thiiye mampa, awa Masaala kɔŋ niŋ thiŋiŋ Yina wokɛnama woŋ there ka hɔɔyɛ.
Awa wundɛ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ si duutu biIsirɛli bibɔyɛ ka kuwaŋ ku ka Mariki woŋ Masaala wokɛnamɛŋ woŋ.

Wundɛ kɔŋ kɔtiyɔkɔ Mariki woŋ, awa wundɛ kɔŋ see iŋ sɛmbɛ, iŋ punka humandiŋ nɔŋ na nde banabi woŋ na Ilaiya, ba si bohinande komisɛŋ bibiyɛthɛŋ iŋ mpati namɛŋ. Wundɛ kɔŋ si sikinande bi sa mɛyi ba putiyɔ sirani ba ka Masaala baŋ ka gboŋa ba ka siyuwa nɔŋ na biya bithumbɛ siyuwe. Wundɛ kɔŋ si kɔsinɔkɔ biya bi ka Mariki woŋ beŋ.”
Sɛkaraiya thɔnthɔŋɔŋ maleka woŋ, na “Nama yaŋ kothiye ba bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ niyɔ nɔndi. Detha hɛ, yaŋ thanthe nda, awa yɛrɛmɛ niŋ woŋ hɛlɛŋ wothanthɛ.”
Maleka woŋ tepe, na “Yama Kebirɛli na, wo kɔɔyɛ woŋ ba niyiyɛ Masaala na wali timo tima. Masaala ŋindi yama kɛnda do ba yina si gbonkitiyande iŋ ba yina si tepe huseri huyɔhɔy haŋ haŋ.
Kɛrɛ yi, yi tha ni kulanɛya huseri hu sisiyɛ yaŋ yina haŋ. Bɛna there nda hɛ, yi kɔŋ niyɔ babobo haaŋ yɔkɔŋ bɛyiniŋ ba thanki yaŋ yina gbonkitiyande baŋ thanki nɔŋ niyɔ.”
Ka lɔkɔ babɛyna, sɛthɛ baŋ ba kooyeŋ thuŋ ka yumba Sɛkaraiya na ka gbada ka e bindɛ kɔ tutunuwande mu nde niŋ niyɔ kaake ka.

Naa fuŋ nda wundɛ, wundɛ tha nda punku gbonkitiyande bindɛ, bindɛ see kɔthɔ ba dɔma na wundɛ kute bɛyi ka maniyɔ mathɔɔkɔ nɔŋ ka mandɛ kaake ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ; wundɛ tha nda punku ba gbonkiya yɔkɔŋ ayili nda thɛnkɔ.
Naa thankaŋ wundɛ lɔkɔ nama baŋ ba niya wali ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ, Sɛkaraiya duu ka yikiya nama ka.
Naa yole wuŋ namba, wɔtɔ nama Ilisabɛthi see niyɔ hɔɔyɛ, awa wundɛ tha fuŋ ka gbada ba sɛnkɛni bisɔhi.
Ilisabɛthi tepe, na “Ka tete Masaala kutiye yama nkinikiniŋ; wundɛ mase yama ka wumankɛ wuŋ nthɔŋ nda nagbɔŋ. Masaala gbɔnɔŋ kuyaahu ka yaha niŋ haŋ.”
Ka sɛnkɛ wosɔŋ-wunthe woŋ naa niyɔy Ilisabɛthi hɔɔyɛ, Masaala ŋindi maleka woŋ Kebirɛli na ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili, ka mɛti ba dɔma na ka Nasarɛthi,
ka hati bɛthɔ wo nde Yusufu wo ŋaye ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Dauda hathi woŋ, keŋ nama kuna Mariyama.
Maleka woŋ see ka Mariyama; wundɛ tepe, na “Maande! Yaathi, Mariki woŋ kɔŋ iŋ yi, awa wundɛ thanki yina thiyiyɛ thaduba thamandiŋ.”
Naa yuye Mariyama huseri hu sisiyɛ niŋ maleka woŋ haŋ, huŋ niyɔy niŋ kɔnthɔhili, kɛna bohe wundɛ tutunuwande kolo ba kaake ka huseri haŋ haŋ.
Kɛrɛ maleka woŋ tepe niŋ, na “Mariyama, ba payɔ, baa Masaala thanki tɔŋina makutiyɛ nama maŋ kɛnda.
Detha, yi kɔŋ niyɔ hɔɔyɛ, awa yi kɔŋ mpuu hati wathe, awa yi kɔŋ niŋ thundu keŋ na Yisɔs.
Wundɛ kɔŋ si niyɔ wɔ mandiŋ awa ndɛ kɔŋ si tuta keŋ na Hati ka Masaala wo ka thinthi woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma. Mariki woŋ Masaala kɔŋ niŋ tutu hugbakine hu ka Dauda haŋ mbemba nama kɔŋ,
awa ndɛ kɔŋ si kɛriŋiyɛ bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Yakuba baŋ haaŋ ka wuŋ key; hugbakine nama haŋ huŋ sa niyɔ iŋ mapeye.”
Mariyama thɔnthɔŋɔŋ maleka woŋ, na “Nama yaŋ niiye hɔɔyɛ; yaŋ kɔyta hɛ wathe?”

Maleka woŋ tepe ka Mariyama, na “Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ kɔŋ thuhu kɛnda, awa sɛmbɛ ba ka Masaala wo ka thinthi woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma ba kɔŋ si tɔŋinɔkɔ yina; ba kolo babɛyna hati wo see ka mpoo woŋ kɔŋ dɔma na wɔ mɛthɛ, Hati ka Masaala woŋ.
Detha hɛ Ilisabɛthi na, mpoo nda kɔŋ wo domo nde nda woŋ na ndɛ sa mpuu, kɛrɛ ka tete wundɛ kɔŋ nda iŋ hɔɔyɛ husɛnkɛni bisɔŋ-wunthe,
baa Masaala punkeŋ niya bɛyi yo bɛyi.”
Huna tepe Mariyama, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ ka thɛnkɔ tha ka Mariki woŋ thaŋ; wu niyɔyŋ yama nɔŋ na tepe yi na.” Awa kɛna duu maleka woŋ.
Ka malɔkɔ mabɛina Mariyama ŋaye yako; wundɛ ŋate ka mɛti banthe ka ŋasɛri ŋa ka Yudiya.
Ndɛ key biyande ka banka ba ka Sɛkaraiya; ndɛ key maaŋ Ilisabɛthi na.
Naa yuye Ilisabɛthi mamaaŋ ma ka Mariyama maŋ, hati woŋ ŋɛnɔkɔy ka kotho hu ka Ilisabɛthi haŋ, awa Ilisabɛthi boho iŋ Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ.
Kɛna yele Ilisabɛthi thampa thatɔɔkɛ e tɛpa, na “Wɔ thaduba na yi nthɔŋ nda fooma mateete ma ka yɛrɛmɛŋ fooma; hati wothaduba na wo yi see ka mpaa woŋ.
Mbɛ mu dɔmɛ bɛyi bamandiŋ baŋ baŋ bɛ be niyɔ kiyaŋ, ba saa ka maano iŋ nanda ka Mariki wokiyaŋ woŋ?
Baa, naa yuye nthɔŋ yaŋ na maaŋ yi, hati woŋ ŋɛnɔkɔy ka kotho hukiyaŋ haŋ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ.
Wɔ thaduba na yi ba niya kulanɛya ba dɔma na huseri hu ka Mariki woŋ haŋ kɛnda hu kɔŋ niyɔ nɔndi.”
Mariyama tepe, na “Huthukuma hukiyaŋ haŋ thunkunu Mariki woŋ.
Yina wokiyaŋ woŋ yehitɔkɔy ba Masaala, Banikisi wokiyaŋ woŋ,
baa wundɛ siyi bawali nama wothathinɔkɔy woŋ. There nda hɛ biya fooma bi kɔŋ yama dɔŋ wɔ wothaduba,
ba saathɛ ba bɛyiniŋ babukuyuwɛ ba thanki Masaala wo iŋ sɛmbɛ woŋ yama niyiyɛ baŋ. Keŋ nama koŋ kukuwɛ kuna.
Awa nkinikiniŋ kikɛnama kɔŋ ki kɔŋ ka thankaha tha ka bi payɔy niŋ beŋ, ŋaye nthɔŋ nda ka mpati bi mpɔy beŋ, mɛnɛ mpati bi see ka mpoo beŋ fooma.
Wundɛ tɔŋɔŋ yɔnkɔ nama husɛmbɛ haŋ kaŋ pankitinuwande biya bi niyɔkɔ kaba beŋ e teetuwa madɛɛnki makɛnamɛŋ maŋ fooma.
Wundɛ kɔŋ thathaŋ gbakuiŋ beŋ ŋaye ka madoŋeŋ namɛŋ maŋatinɔkɔy maŋ, e wundɛ ŋatina bithathinɔkɔy beŋ.
Wundɛ theriye bi kaho kɔnthɔ beŋ muthɔma muyɔhɔy, e wundɛ kantha bananhuluiŋ beŋ wu ka ntha.
Wundɛ thiŋiŋ lahiri ba ni nde wundɛ ka mbembɛŋ ntuŋ kɔŋ baŋ, awa wundɛ see ka mase Isirɛli na, bawali wokɛnama woŋ.
Wundɛ simɔkɔy ba tɔŋina nkinikiniŋ ka Ebrahim iŋ ka bɔnsɔŋ nama baŋ fooma haaŋ ka wuŋ key.”
Mariyama dɔŋɔy iŋ Ilisabɛthi ba sɛnkɛni bitaati, saanuŋ wundɛ ba duwa ka banka nama ka.
Naa tɛŋ lɔkɔ baŋ Ilisabɛthi ba mpaa, wundɛ see mpuu hati wathe.
Bi thuriyande wundɛ beŋ ndo, biya nama beŋ ndo, bindɛ fooma yehitɔkɔy iŋ wundɛ wumandiŋ naa yuye bindɛ ba dɔma na Mariki woŋ kutiye niŋ nkinikiniŋ.
Naa daŋande wuŋ hura kasɔŋ-kaye, bindɛ see ba saa ka thiya hati woŋ ka bintɔni nama. Bindɛ ŋaye ba niŋ thunda keŋ ku ka fandama koŋ Sɛkaraiya,
kɛrɛ nandama tepe, na “Ade, wuŋ ka nɛŋ; ndɛ kɔŋ ba thundo keŋ na Yɔni.”
Huna tepe bindɛ, na “Kɛrɛ wɔ ka ka bɔnsɔŋ ndeŋ baŋ wo dɔma na Yɔni.”
Bindɛ yiliyɛ fandama na yɔnkɔ ba niŋ thɔnthiŋina keŋ ku ka hati woŋ.
Huna thiye wundɛ ba yekiniyo mugbale. Naa yekiniyo wundɛ muŋ, wundɛ gbale, na “Keŋ nama kuna Yɔni.” Biya beŋ fooma ni ŋakabanɛ ŋamandiŋ.
Ka yako babɛyna hothi nama haŋ pɛɛkɔy; hiliŋ nama haŋ yethɔy ba gbonkiya. Kɛna bohe wundɛ gbuŋunuwa Masaala na.
Biya bi tɔpɛ bindɛ beŋ fooma thooyo payɔ, awa bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ key kaŋ gbonkiyo ka mɛtiŋ batɔpɛ baŋ iŋ ba ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ fooma ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya.

Biya fooma bi yuyɛ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ beŋ thiye bɛŋ ka thathukuma, e bindɛ kɔ kaa kaŋ thɔnthiŋina, na “Mbɛ mu hati woŋ baŋ si ni yee?” Bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ kuthɔnthɔŋɔŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ baa sɛmbɛ ba ka Masaala baŋ ba kɔŋ iŋ wundɛ.
Fanda ka Yɔni woŋ Sɛkaraiya see bɔha iŋ Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ. Wundɛ ni hunabi ba tɛpa,
na “Yaŋ thunkunu Mariki woŋ Masaala wo ka biIsirɛli beŋ woŋ, wo sɛɛ ka mase iŋ ba bakɔŋa biya nama beŋ.
Wundɛ mina tɔŋita banikisi womandiŋ, wo there ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka gbaku woŋ Dauda, bawali nama woŋ.
Nɔŋ na ni nde wundɛ lahiri na ka banabiŋ bikɛnama beŋ na.
Ba mina si niya kisi ŋaye ka hadeni ntuŋ beŋ, iŋ ka sɛmbɛ ba ka bi thambo mina beŋ fooma.
Wundɛ tepe nde ba dɔma na wundɛ kɔŋ toŋine mbembɛŋ ntuŋ kɔŋ nkinikiniŋ, awa na ndɛ kɔŋ simɔkɔ mayuku nama makuwɛ maŋ iŋ mbembɛŋ kikɛntuŋ kɔŋ.
Nɔŋ na ni nde wundɛ lahiri na e sɛkitha magbiŋ ka fanda ntuŋ woŋ Ebrahim,
ba mina niya kisi ŋaye ka hadeni ntuŋ beŋ. haliko na miŋ niŋ niye kubatho wumɛthɛ, wuthumbɛ, wu ka iŋ payɔ, ka malɔkɔ ma ka siini bakɛntuŋ baŋ fooma.
“Yi, yindo hatiŋ woŋ, yi kɔŋ si thunda keŋ na banabi wo ka Masaala wo ka thinthi woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma. Yi kɔŋ kɔtiyɔkɔ Mariki woŋ, ba niŋ kaa kaŋ pɛthiyɛ gboŋa ba wundɛ si fuŋuye baŋ,
ba kaa kaŋ tepe biya nama beŋ ba dɔma na bi kɔŋ niya kisi naa bindɛ peniyo hakɛŋ bikɛnamɛŋ.
Masaala ntuŋ woŋ wɔ bankinikiniŋ na; wundɛ ni ba mina kaŋ womatheyani wo ka kisi baŋ woŋ mina bende,
iŋ ba bɛnda ŋaye ka ariana ka bi dɔŋɔy ka huntuma haŋ beŋ fooma, ba mina katitɔkɔ ka gboŋa ba ka mathɛbɛ.”
Hati woŋ see fuŋ lamgba haaŋ e thiya thukuma. Ndɛ niyɔy ka wula ka haaŋ lɔkɔ baŋ tɛŋa ba see wundɛ toŋineke baŋ nagberekethe ka biya biIsirɛli beŋ.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, Gbaku Womandiŋ wo ka biRomaŋ beŋ woŋ, Ɔkɔsɔtɔsi, koyoŋ ba ŋakeŋ ŋa ka biya beŋ fooma ka hugbakine nama haŋ ŋaŋ gbalo.
Gbalo haŋ haŋ huna mayoŋ; huŋ niyɔy ka lɔkɔ ba nde Kiriniyɔsi bakɛrɛŋ wo ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Siriya.
Bindɛ fooma key ba ka gbalo ŋakeŋ, wɔ yo wɔ akey ka mɛti bakɛnama.

Huna see Yusufu fuŋe ŋaye ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili, ka mɛti ba ka Nasarɛthi, ba kaa ka Bɛthɛlɛhɛmi ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya, ka mpoo nde gbaku woŋ Dauda kɛ. Huna biyɛ Yusufu kɛndɛ kaaye baa wundɛ kɔŋ nde bɔnsɔŋ banthe iŋ gbaku woŋ Dauda.
Wundɛ key iŋ Mariyama wo nde wundɛ hathi woŋ, hali na niyɔy wuŋ na wundɛ kɔŋ nde nda iŋ hɔɔyɛ huthankɛ ka lɔkɔ babɛina, ba bi be ka gbala ŋakeŋ.
Kɛrɛ naa bindɛ kɛndɛ, lɔkɔ baŋ see tɛŋ ba wundɛ mpee baŋ.
Wundɛ see mpuu hati womayoŋ woŋ wowathe, wundɛ huitutu niŋ ka thika, e wundɛ niŋ taaya ka kuma ba muthɔma mu ka ndansi kɔŋ thiyo kɛ baŋ, baa bindɛ tha nde nda kutu yikiya kaake.
Ka bompi wobɛina, batɔliŋ bi kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ ka wula ka bi nde dethiteke ndansi namɛŋ kɔŋ huyɛ babɛina.
Maleka wo ka Mariki woŋ Masaala see bindɛ tɔŋinɔkɔ, awa yiki ba ka Masaala baŋ see bindɛ pɛnkande nɔŋ mumɔɔli, awa payɔ humandiŋ see bindɛ thɔɔ.
Kɛrɛ maleka wo ka Masaala woŋ tepe kɛnamɛŋ, na “Baŋ payɔ! Yaŋ sisiyɛ bena huseri huyɔhɔy hu sisi mayehitɔkɔ mamandiŋ ka biya ndeŋ beŋ fooma.
Dethaŋ hɛ, hɛ gbeeŋ, ka mɛti ba ka Dauda baŋ, Banikisi ndeŋ woŋ mpoo! Ndɛ na Kraist, Mariki woŋ.
Beŋ kɔŋ kɔthɔ ba yaŋ bena tepe nɔndi, baa naa beŋ key, beŋ kɔŋ pɛnki malɛɛthɛ ma huitutuwɔy ka thika, e wundɛ taayo ka kuma ba muthɔma mu ka ndansi kɔŋ muŋ thiyo kɛ.”
Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina malekɛŋ bibɔyɛ see ŋaye ka ariana iŋ maleka wo yenke hɛ tɔŋinɔkɔ woŋ, e bindɛ kɔ gbuŋunuwa Masaala na e bindɛ kɔ tɛpa,
na “Yiki ba kɔŋ ka Masaala wo ka thinthi ka ariana woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma. Ka dunia baŋ, mathɛbɛ ka biyamɛti bi niŋ yeheŋ thukuma beŋ!”
Naa pɛyɛŋ bindɛ malekɛŋ beŋ e bindɛ duwa ka ariana, batɔliŋ beŋ tɛpiyande ba dɔma, na “Nkaaŋ ka Bɛthɛlɛhɛmi; miŋ be ka kutiyɔkɔ bɛyiniŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ baŋ ba see Mariki woŋ ni ba miŋ kɔthɔ baŋ.”
Bindɛ ni kuyaagba ba kaa; bindɛ key pɛnki Mariyama na iŋ Yusufu. Bindɛ kute malɛɛthɛ maŋ ma ŋoye ka kuma ba muthɔma mu ka ndansi kɔŋ muŋ thiyo kɛ.
Awa naa see batɔliŋ beŋ kutu malɛɛthɛ maŋ maŋ, batɔliŋ beŋ toŋe kuna ba thanki bindɛ tepo iŋ maleka woŋ ba malɛɛthɛ maŋ maŋ.
Fooma bi yuyɛ kuna ku ka batɔliŋ beŋ koŋ ni ŋakabanɛ ŋamandiŋ.
Mariyama kɔsɔŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ka thukuma, e wundɛ bɛŋ kɔ tutunuwande.
Batɔliŋ beŋ duu kaŋ thunkunuwa Masaala na iŋ kaŋ gbuŋunuwa niŋ ba ba thanki bindɛ yuyɛ baŋ e kutiyɔkɔ; wuŋ niyɔy nanthe nathesi nɔŋ na tepo nthɔŋ bindɛ iŋ maleka woŋ na.
Naa daŋande wuŋ hura kasɔŋ-kaye, lɔkɔ baŋ tɛŋ wundɛ ba thiyo ka bintɔni nama. Wundɛ thundo keŋ na Yisɔs, keŋ ku thundo nde ndɛ iŋ maleka woŋ koŋ saanuŋ wundɛ ba niyiyo hɔɔyɛ.
Lɔkɔ baŋ see tɛŋ ba Mariyama iŋ Yusufu niye wali ba ka mɛthinɔkɔ haŋ baŋ, nɔŋ na tepe Siraŋ ba ka Musa baŋ na. Bindɛ sisi Yisɔs na ba niŋ si dunkuna ka Mariki woŋ,
nɔŋ na gbalo wuŋ na ka Siraŋ ba ka Mariki woŋ baŋ na, na “Hati wathe yo hati wathe wo pɛthi yuku haŋ woŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ dunkuna ka yɔnkɔ hu ka Mariki woŋ.”
Bindɛ key hɛlɛŋ ba ka fuŋuna saraka ba ka ŋarotho biye maa kukuni bimpatiyɛŋ biye, nɔŋ na tepe Siraŋ ba ka Mariki woŋ baŋ na.

Ka lɔkɔ babɛina wɔ kɔŋ nde ka Yɛrusalɛmi wo dɔma na Simiɔŋ, wɔ thumbɛ, wo gbonkoy ka kuwaŋ ku ka Masaala koŋ, wo nde yumbu ba malɔkɔ ma biIsirɛli beŋ niyo kisi maŋ. Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ kɔŋ nde iŋ wundɛ,
e niŋ tepe ba dɔma na wundɛ sa tuku gbɔ, yɔkɔŋ na wundɛ kutiyɔkɔy Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ iŋ Mariki woŋ.

Simiɔŋ, naa wundɛ katitoko iŋ Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ, wundɛ key biyande ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ. Naa sisi komisɛŋ beŋ hati woŋ Yisɔs na ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ ba si niyo nɔŋ na tepe Siraŋ baŋ na,
Simiɔŋ sekithe hati woŋ ka thɛnkɔ nama thaŋ e ndɛ thiya Masaala na maamo, e tɛpa,
na “Ka tete, Mariki, yi kɔsɔŋ lahiri nda baŋ; bawali wokɛnda woŋ kɔŋ nda key iŋ thɛbina thukuma.
Yaŋ kutiyɔkɔy kisi baŋ ka thaaya thakiyaŋ thaŋ,
ba thanki yi kɔsinɔkɔ ka kupɛnkintiyande ku ka biya fooma:
Mumɔɔli mu si ni ba siyani bahɛna baŋ kuta gboŋa bakɛnda baŋ, mu sisi yiki ka biya bikɛnda beŋ biIsirɛli.”
Fandama iŋ nandama ni kaba wumandiŋ ba bɛyiniŋ ba tepe Simiɔŋ ba hati namɛŋ woŋ baŋ.

Simiɔŋ thiyɛ bindɛ thaduba; wundɛ tepe ka Mariyama nanda ka Yisɔs woŋ, na “Detha hɛ, hati woŋ baŋ ndɛ yetho iŋ Masaala ba si niya biya bibɔyɛ ŋɔta e biya bibɔyɛ ŋayinɔkɔ ka mateete ma ka biIsirɛli beŋ. Wundɛ kɔŋ si niyɔ wɔ wo tɔŋɔŋ madɛɛnki ma ka Masaala maŋ. Awa biya bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ gbonkoy ba sɔkinɔkɔ niŋ,
awa wundɛ kɔŋ si fuŋuŋ gbada masimɔkɔ ma ka biya bibɔyɛ. Awa nkinikiniŋ ki kɔŋ yina thɔɔ nɔŋ silanhi bɛna loopo yi ka thukuma.”
Banabi wo bagbokora wothanthɛ wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ, wo dɔma na Ana, hati ka Fanuɛli, wo ŋaye ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Asa. Naa yento wundɛ, thaninɛŋ thasɔŋ-thaye sekithe na wuŋ e wandama kɔ tuka.

Wundɛ pɛyɛ nda bagbokora haaŋ e hukalaŋ nama haŋ tɛŋa thaninɛŋ kɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-kataati iŋ thanaŋ awa wundɛ tha pɛyɛŋ banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ; gbɛɛŋ iŋ piripiri wundɛ kɔŋ ka niya Masaala na kubatho, abohi suŋ, ani kuraminɛ.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, Ana see biyande; wundɛ thiyi Masaala na maamo, e wundɛ gbonkiya ba hati woŋ ka biya muŋ fooma bi nde dethiteke ba malɔkɔ ma Masaala pɛyɛŋ mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi kuyankaŋ.
Naa thanki Yusufu iŋ Mariyama niya bɛyi yo bɛyi ba thimo Siraŋ ba ka Mariki woŋ baŋ ba bindɛ niya, bindɛ duu ka Nasarɛthi ba ka Kalili.
Hati woŋ see bɔyi; wundɛ kaahi kɔtɔ. Wundɛ thiye thukuma; thaduba tha ka Masaala thaŋ niyɔy iŋ wundɛ.
Nina yo nina biya bi ka Yisɔs bi kɔŋ key ka Yɛrusalɛmi ba ka penkitiye ka malɔkɔ ma masiyuwe na puntiyando nde biIsirɛli beŋ iŋ maleka wo ka tuka haŋ woŋ ka Iyipiti.
Naa sekithe Yisɔs thanina kɔhi iŋ thaye, bindɛ see key ka Yɛrusalɛmi nɔŋ na bare nde bindɛ kɔ niya na.
Naa thankaŋ bindɛ mathuŋande maŋ maŋ, bindɛ bohe duwa. Kumaŋ, Yisɔs pɛyɛ ka Yɛrusalɛmi ka, kɛrɛ biya nama beŋ tha wuŋ kɔthɔ.
Bindɛ simɔkɔy ba dɔma na Yisɔs kɔŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy iŋ biya beŋ. Bindɛ yiŋe yatha nagbɛɛŋ, kɛna thɛrɛŋ bindɛ ba niŋ deethuwa ka mateete ma ka biya namɛŋ beŋ iŋ binyathiki namɛŋ beŋ.
Kɛrɛ bindɛ tha niŋ kutu. Bindɛ duu hɛlɛŋ napooŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi ba niŋ saa kaŋ deethuwa.
Ka gbɛɛŋ bataati baŋ, bindɛ penke niŋ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, e wundɛ dɔŋɔ iŋ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ, e wundɛ bindɛ kɔ poniyɛ kuiha e bindɛ kɔ thɔnthiŋinuwande.
Fooma bi yuyɛ niŋ beŋ ni ŋakabanɛ ba yaabiŋ nama bakele baŋ.
Naa kute niŋ biya nama, bindɛ ni kaba. Nandama tepe kɛnama, na “Hatiŋ woŋ, mbɛ ba niye nɛŋ yi mina? Detha hɛ, yaŋ iŋ fanda thɔkɔti hɛ nda ka niya yaagba ka deethuwa yina.”
Yisɔs tepe, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ yama deethuwe? E beŋ kɔyta ba dɔma na yaŋ kɔŋ ba niyɔ ka banka ba ka Fandaŋ baŋ?”
Kɛrɛ yaabi ba ni Yisɔs baŋ tha bindɛ methe.
Yisɔs duu iŋ bindɛ ka Nasarɛthi. Wundɛ putiyɔy biya nama timo tima. Nandama kɔsɔŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma ka thukuma.
Yisɔs fuŋ lamgba iŋ kele e wundɛ thimiyo iŋ Masaala mɛnɛ biyamɛti.

Thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ see ka Yɔni, hati ka Sɛkaraiya, naa nde ndɛ ka wula baŋ, ka nina hukɔhi iŋ thasɔhi ka makɛrɛŋ ma ka Gbaku Womandiŋ wo ka biRomaŋ beŋ woŋ Taibiriyɔsi, ka yamana ba ka Pɔntiyɔsi Pailɛti ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya. Hɛrɔdi niyɔ bakɛrɛŋ wo ka Kalili, e wɛndama Filipi niyɔ bakɛrɛŋ wo ka bompi wo ka Ituriya iŋ ka Tirakɔnaitisi, e Laiseniyasi niyɔ bakɛrɛŋ wo ka Abilini. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Anasi iŋ Keyafasi niyɔ bafodeni bimandiŋ beŋ.

Yɔni fuŋ ba kaande fooma bompi wo ka mankɔ ma ka Yɔdaŋ, e kaa kaŋ niya kɛwandi ba dɔma, na “Sikinaŋ sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ bikendeŋ, e beŋ biyo biye hu ka Masaala haŋ, awa Masaala kɔŋ bena pɛniyɛ hakɛŋ bikendeŋ.”

Wuŋ, wuŋ niyɔy nɔŋ na gbale nde banabi woŋ Aisaya ka buku nama woŋ na: na “Wɔ wunthe kɔŋ yɛli thampa ka wula baŋ ba dɔma: na ‘Kɔsinɔkɔŋ gboŋa ba ka Mariki woŋ baŋ, awa thumbunwaŋ bɛŋ natoloŋ ba wundɛ ba kaandiyande!
Madumgbu yo madumgbu yɔkɔŋ mɛ be thiŋina, kusɛri yo kusɛri yɔkɔŋ ku be mɛlimɛlina. Gboŋɛŋ basikuwɔy baŋ yɔkɔŋ bɛ be thumbunuwa, gboŋɛŋ bayokoli-yokoli baŋ yɔkɔŋ bɛ be mɛlimɛlina.
Biyamɛti fooma bi kɔŋ kutiyɔkɔ na Masaala niye kisi!’ ”
Huna tepe Yɔni biya beŋ fooma bi sɛɛ ba si biyo biye hu ka Masaala haŋ beŋ, na “Beŋ, bendo bɔnsɔŋ ba ka wɔthɔiŋ! Nkaana yelɛ bena ba kita kugbasaŋati ku ka Masaala koŋ, ku wundɛ ba bena niya koŋ?

Niyaŋ bɛyiniŋ ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na beŋ sikiyɔkɔy ŋaye ka hakɛŋ bikendeŋ. Baŋ thɛrɛŋ ba kathiŋɔkɔ ba dɔma, na ‘Miŋ kɔŋ mpati bi ka Ebrahim.’ Yaŋ tepe bena, Masaala punkeŋ sɛkitha tharaka thaŋ thaŋ e wundɛ thɛŋ sikinande mpati bi ka Ebrahim.
Hali ka tete kubapi koŋ deŋo nda ka nthanthɛŋ ki ka ŋayeŋ ŋaŋ kɔŋ, kuyeŋ ndo kuyeŋ ku sa tiŋ mutiŋ muyɔhɔy ku kɔŋ muka e kuŋ yelo ka buu buŋ.”
Huna thonthiŋine niŋ biya beŋ, na “Mbɛ ba ntiŋ nda miŋ ni?”
Wundɛ tepe bindɛ, na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo iŋ yabɛŋ baye, wundɛ kɔŋ ba dunkuna banthe ka wɔ ka hɛ iŋ banthe woŋ. Wɔ yo wɔ wo iŋ muthɔma, wundɛ kɔŋ ba hanande iŋ wo ka iŋ woŋ.”
Bathuuni duthu woŋ beŋ see ba si biyo biye hu ka Mariki woŋ haŋ. Bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “Karimɔkɔ, mbɛ ba nda miŋ ni?”
Wundɛ tepe bindɛ, na “Baŋ bohoti wɔ wuyamɛ ba si domo beŋ ba niŋ bohita.”

Kurugbani binɔndi beŋ see hɛlɛŋ niŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ, na “Mbu miŋ? Mbɛ ba nda miŋ ni?” Huna tepe wundɛ bindɛ, na “Baŋ kanati wɔ ntha yo ntha ka kansuŋ, maa ba kɛrɛŋiyɛ wɔ hothi. Kuthunkuŋ kukendeŋ ku tɛŋɛŋ bena.”
Masimɔkɔ ma ka biya beŋ bohe ŋayi; bindɛ thɛrɛŋ thɔnthiŋinɔkɔ ba saathɛ ba Yɔni, ba thampo wundɛ na Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ.

Yɔni tepe bindɛ fooma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena biye iŋ mandi, kɛrɛ hiŋ wɔ wo see wo yamɛ bukuya ba yaŋ. Yaŋ teŋeta hintiŋ ba pɛɛka nkalɛŋ ki ka dagbalɛŋ nama baŋ kɔŋ. Wundɛ wobɛina kɔŋ bena si biiye Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ mɛnɛ buu.
Wundɛ boheŋ kubonka koŋ ka yɔnkɔ nama haŋ, ba hukuwa gbethe nama baŋ. Wundɛ kɔŋ kɔsɔŋ paka baŋ ka kuhunkuŋ nama koŋ, e sɛkitha ŋawoy ŋaŋ, e ŋɛŋ yɛla ka buu bu sa dɔmɔ buŋ.”
Yɔni ni kɛwandi Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ ka biya beŋ ka gboŋɛŋ bahakuwande, e niya bindɛ ŋathɔnthɔ ba bi be thikipi maniyɔ makɛnamɛŋ maŋ.
Kɛrɛ Yɔni tepiyeke gbaku woŋ Hɛrɔdi na, ba na kane wundɛ Hɛrɔdiyasi na, wɔtɔ wo ka wɛndama woŋ nde, awa e niya hɛlɛŋ bɛyiniŋ babɔyɛ banɛnɔy bahɛna.
Bɛna manke ntiŋ Hɛrɔdi niya ba yamɛ nɛnɔ baŋ nthɔŋ nda, ba thiya Yɔni na ka yeeli woŋ.
Naa thanki biya beŋ fooma biyo biye hu ka Masaala haŋ, Yisɔs hɛlɛŋ nɛnɛ ndɛ biyo. Naa Yisɔs ni kuraminɛ, ka ariana pɛthɔy.
Kɛna thuhe Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ ka mathɔyande ma kurotho, awa thampa fuŋ ŋaye ka ariana, na “Yina hati wokiyaŋ wowathe wo thimo yaŋ woŋ. Yi yeheŋ yama thukuma.”
Naa sɛsi Yisɔs wali nama baŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ nde nda bɛrɛ ba thanina kɔnthɔ-kataati. Wundɛ kɔŋ nde hati wathe wo ka Yusufu, ka nɔŋ na simeke biya beŋ na. Yusufu na nde hati ka Hilay,
hati ka Mathati, hati ka Libay, hati ka Mɛlɛkay, hati ka Yanay, hati ka Yusufu,
hati ka Matathaiasi, hati ka Emɔsi, hati ka Nehɔmi, hati ka Ɛsalay, hati ka Nekay,
hati ka Maathi, hati ka Matathaiasi, hati ka Sɛmaiŋ, hati ka Yosɛki, hati ka Yoda,
hati ka Yoanaŋ, hati ka Risa, hati ka Sɛrubabɛli, hati ka Sialitɛli, hati ka Niray,
hati ka Mɛlɛkay, hati ka Aday, hati ka Kosami, hati ka Ɛlɛmadami, hati ka Eri,
hati ka Yasuwa, hati ka Ɛliesa, hati ka Yorimi, hati ka Mathati, hati ka Libay,
hati ka Simiɔŋ, hati ka Yuda, hati ka Yusufu, hati ka Yonami, hati ka Ɛliakimi,
hati ka Milia, hati ka Mɛna, hati ka Matatha, hati ka Nethaŋ, hati ka Dauda,
hati ka Yɛsi, hati ka Obɛdi, hati ka Boasi, hati ka Salamoŋ, hati ka Nasoŋ,
hati ka Aminadabi, hati ka Adimiŋ, hati ka Arini, hati ka Hɛsirɔŋ, hati ka Pirɛsi, hati ka Yuda,
hati ka Yakuba, hati ka Aisaki, hati ka Ebrahim, hati ka Tira, hati ka Nehɔ,
hati ka Sɛruku, hati ka Riyu, hati ka Pilɛki, hati ka Iba, hati ka Sila,
hati ka Kenaŋ, hati ka Arafasadi, hati ka Sɛmi, hati ka Nowa, hati ka Lemɛki,
hati ka Mɛthusɛla, hati ka Inɔki, hati ka Yerɛdi, hati ka Mahelalili, hati ka Kenaŋ,
hati ka Inɔsi, hati ka Sɛthi, hati ka Mbemba Adama, hati ka Masaala.
Naa see Yisɔs pɛyɛŋ mandi ma ka Yɔdaŋ, wo bɔhɔy nda iŋ Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ, Yina woŋ katitande niŋ ka wula ka.
Wundɛ niyɔy kɛndɛ ba hura kɔthɔ-kanaŋ, wundɛ ka gberiŋinuwo iŋ Sithani, Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ. Ka malɔkɔ maŋ maŋ fooma, ntha yo ntha thooyeta niŋ ka hothi. Naa see malɔkɔ maŋ kunthu, kɔnthɔ see niŋ bohi.
Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ tepe niŋ ba dɔma, na “Mɛnɛ yina Hati ka Masaala woŋ, niya yamari raka haŋ haŋ hu be sikiyɔkɔ muthɔma.”
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe niŋ, na “Magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ tepe, na ‘Muthɔma nagbɛti kutɛ ni ba wɔmɛti niyɔ iŋ sii.’ ”
Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ sekithe niŋ e niŋ ka dunkuta ka thinthi, e niŋ toŋine fooma thagbakine tha ka faido ka malɔkɔ mathurɔy,
e tɛpa kɛnama, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ yina dunkune fooma sɛmbɛŋ baŋ baŋ, iŋ nanhulu baŋ baŋ; baa yaŋ thanki nde nda muŋ dunkuno, awa yaŋ punkeŋ muŋ dunkune wɔ o wɔ wo thimo yaŋ ba muŋ dunkune.
Muŋ muŋ fooma yi kɔŋ muŋ biyɔ, mɛnɛ yi ni yama kubatho.”
Yisɔs tepe, na “Magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ tepe, na ‘Yi kɔŋ ba niya kubatho Mariki woŋ Masaala wokɛnda woŋ; wundɛ wuntheŋ nape, ndɛ na yi ba niyiyɛ wali.’ ”

Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ sekithe hɛlɛŋ niŋ, e niŋ kata ka Yɛrusalɛmi, e niŋ ka tuta ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ ka thinthi, e tepe niŋ ba dɔma, na “Mɛnɛ yina Hati ka Masaala woŋ, yɛlɔkɔ hɛ ka pothi ŋaye dondo,
baa magbali maŋ tepe ba dɔma, na ‘Masaala kɔŋ ni yamari malekɛŋ nama beŋ ba yina dethiteke.’
Mɛŋ tepe hɛlɛŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Bindɛ kɔŋ yina thaye, haliko kuthaki nda koŋ ku be tha hintiŋ thuŋɔ raka hunthe.’ ”
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe, na “Magbali maŋ tepe, na ‘Yi ka ba gbɛriŋina Mariki woŋ Masaala wokɛnda woŋ.’ ”
Naa thanki Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ gbɛriŋinuwa Yisɔs na gboŋa yo gboŋa, wundɛ pɛyɛŋ hintiŋ niŋ haaŋ ba malɔkɔ manɔndi.
Naa Yisɔs katitoko iŋ sɛmbɛ ba ka Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ baŋ, wundɛ see duu ka Kalili. Huseri haŋ haŋ see gbanthande ka bompi wobɛina fooma ba dɔma na Yisɔs duu.
Wundɛ thanani biya beŋ thampɛŋ tha ka Masaala thaŋ ka bankɛŋ namɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ, awa e gbuŋunuwo iŋ wɔ yo wɔ wo yuyɛ niŋ.

Yisɔs tɛŋ ka mɛti ba ka Nasarɛthi ka dinko nde ndɛ kɛ. Ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe ma ka biYusu beŋ maŋ wundɛ key biyande ka banka bathuŋuyande baŋ nɔŋ na bare nde wundɛ kɔ niya na. Kɛna kɔɔyɛ wundɛ ba niya karaŋ magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ.
Wundɛ dunkuno kuthagba ku ka banabi woŋ koŋ Aisaya. Wundɛ pɛɛkinande kuŋ; kɛna kute wundɛ ka tha ka gbalo wuŋ kɛ ba dɔma, na

“Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ kɔŋ iŋ yaŋ, baa wundɛ yɛthi yama ba sisa huseri huyɔhɔy haŋ ka bamɔnɛŋ beŋ. Wundɛ ŋindi yama ka bilɔŋɔy beŋ ba ka koyiŋa huseri hu ka kuyankaŋ haŋ, iŋ ba bi mankɔy thaaya beŋ ba kuta, ba pɛyɛna kuyankaŋ bi niya thɔrɔ beŋ,
iŋ ba bindɛ tepe ba dɔma na malɔkɔ maŋ tɛŋ ma Mariki woŋ kutiye biya nama beŋ.”
Naa thanki wundɛ niya karaŋ kuthagba koŋ koŋ, wundɛ huyu kuŋ, e wundɛ dunkuna kuŋ ka wo dethiteke banka bathuŋuyande baŋ woŋ kɛndɛ e dɔŋɔy. Kɛna lope biya bi dɔŋɔy kɛndɛ beŋ niŋ thaaya.
Awa e wundɛ bindɛ tepe ba dɔma, na “Magbali maŋ maŋ dondo du ni yaŋ karaŋ do fuŋ hɛ nɔndi naa yuye beŋ na ni yaŋ karaŋ na.”
Bindɛ fooma bi yuyɛ niŋ beŋ, wuŋ yehe bindɛ, e bindɛ niya kukabanɛ ba thampɛŋ thayɔhɔy ka yuyɛ tha tepe Yisɔs thaŋ. Huna tepe bindɛ, na “E woŋ kutɛ hati ka Yusufu woŋ?”

Huna tepe wundɛ ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ beŋ kɔŋ yama kaaye thayiŋ thaŋ thaŋ, na ‘Bapuyi, puya yɛthɛ bakɛnda.’ Beŋ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ tɛpi, na ‘Niya dondo ka mɛti bakɛnda baŋ bɛyiniŋ ba ni yi ka Kapaniyɔmi baŋ.’
Kɛrɛ nɔndi yaathi, yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, na banabi sa yeroko ka mpoo wundɛ.
Nɔndi yaathi, bagbokorani bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ nde ka Isirɛli ka lɔkɔ ba ka Ilaiya, naa kɔɔyɛ kole ba thanina thataati iŋ sɛnkɛni bisɔŋ-wunthe, e kɔnthɔ kumandiŋ si hɔrande ka kuyɛkɛŋ kubɛyna fooma.
Halisa Ilaiya tha nde ŋinda ka wɔ wunthe ka bagbokorani bi ka Isirɛli beŋ, kɛrɛ yɔkɔŋ ka bagbokora wunthe wo nde ka mɛti ba ka Sɛrafɛthi, ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Saidɔŋ.

Nɛna nde hɛlɛŋ ka Isirɛli, biya bibɔyɛ bi iŋ nthoonani kinɛnɔy ki bohe ka kɔtɔ ku ka wɔmɛti koŋ bi kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ ka yamana ba ka Ilaisa, kɛrɛ wunthe ndɛ tha kɛndɛ puya iŋ banabi woŋ Ilaisa, yɔkɔŋ Neemaŋ nape, woSiriya woŋ, ndɛ na puyi wundɛ.”
Naa yuye biya beŋ magbonkoy maŋ maŋ, bindɛ thɔɔyɛ ka mathoŋ.
Bindɛ ŋaye narɛ, e bindɛ kantha Yisɔs na ka mɛti baŋ. Bindɛ key niŋ tutu ka kusɛri koŋ ka thinthi ka tute mɛti namɛŋ baŋ kɛ, ba haliko ba niŋ ka yɛla ka pothi ba niŋ kɔra.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs kɛriŋande mateete sɛthɛ baŋ baŋ e kɔ kaa ba ntha nama.
Yisɔs key ka Kapaniyɔmi, mɛti ba ka Kalili, e wundɛ thaninuwa bindɛ kɛndɛ ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.
Bindɛ fooma ni kukabanɛ ba na wundɛ thaninuwe na, baa wundɛ kɔŋ thanani iŋ mayoho mamandiŋ.
Hati lamgba wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ wo boho iŋ wayi wonɛnɔy, e wundɛ kɔ tɛntitɔkɔ wutɔɔkɛ e tɛpa,
na “Mbɛ ba thimo yi ba mina niya, yindo Yisɔs wo ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Nasarɛthi baŋ woŋ? E yi kɔŋ dondo baŋ ba mina teetuwa? Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ yina; yina Wɔ Womɛthɛ wo ŋaye ka Masaala ka woŋ.”

Kɛna ni Yisɔs wayi wonɛnɔy woŋ yamari ba dɔma, na “Niya nayeŋ, awa e yi fuŋa ka hati lamgba woŋ baŋ!” Wayi wonɛnɔy woŋ lɔpitande hati lamgba woŋ mateete ka sɛthɛ baŋ, kɛrɛ wundɛ tha niŋ ni muthoonɛ, awa wundɛ pɛyɛŋ niŋ.
Biya beŋ ni kukabanɛ wumandiŋ e bindɛ kɔ thɔnthiŋinuwande, na “Mbɛ magbonkoy maŋ maŋ siiya? Hati lamgba woŋ baŋ ni yamari mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ ka sɛmbɛ iŋ ka mayoho ba bindɛ fuŋa, awa bindɛ fuŋ nɛnɛ!”
Keŋ ku ka Yisɔs koŋ see gbanthande ka bompi wobɛina fooma.

Yisɔs fuŋ ka banka bathuŋuyande baŋ, e wundɛ kaa ka banka ka Saimɔŋ ka. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, nanda ka wɔtɔ wo ka Saimɔŋ ŋoyeŋ kɛndɛ wo ŋɔtitɛ iŋ nthoonaŋ ki ka kɔtɔ kutɔɔkɛ. Bindɛ tepe Yisɔs na ba mɔɔŋ woŋ baŋ.
Yisɔs biyande e ka kooye niŋ kuwaŋ e niya yamari kɔtɔ kutɔɔkɛ koŋ ba pɛyɛna niŋ. Ka yako babɛina, kɔtɔ koŋ thebe na pɛthɛ. Wundɛ ŋayinɔkɔy. Ka yako babɛina wundɛ ni bindɛ barɛy.
Naa kaŋ woŋ thɔɔ, biya beŋ fooma sisi bathoonani bihakuwande bi nde bindɛ dethiteke ba Yisɔs be bindɛ si puyi. Wundɛ tute bindɛ thɛnkɔ e wundɛ bindɛ puya fooma.

Mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ gbeeŋ fuŋ ka biya bibɔyɛ e bindɛ kɔ kaa kaŋ tɛntitɔkɔ, e ka tɛpa, na “Yina Hati ka Masaala woŋ.” Kɛrɛ Yisɔs ni mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ yamari ba bi be tha gbonkoy, baa bi kɔthɛŋ niŋ ba wundɛ niyɔ Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ iŋ Masaala.
Naa puthɔy kaŋ woŋ, Yisɔs fuŋ ka mɛti ka e wundɛ kaa ka tha ka ndɛ wuntheŋ. Biya beŋ bohe niŋ deethuwa. Naa kute bindɛ niŋ, bindɛ bohe niŋ niya kuthɔnthɔ ba wundɛ be tha nda bindɛ pɛyɛŋ.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe bindɛ, na “Yɔkɔŋ yaŋ ni Huseri Huyɔhɔy hu ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ kɛwandi ka mɛtiŋ bahɛna baŋ, baa ba kolo baŋ baŋ bɛna ŋindo nde yaŋ.”
Wundɛ ni Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ kɛwandi ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka biYusu beŋ koŋ.
Lɔkɔ banthe, naa kooye Yisɔs ka gbaraŋ ba mankɔ ma ka Kɛnɛsɛrɛti e kɔ niya kɛwandi, biya beŋ bohe niŋ nɔthita ba yuyɛ thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ.
Wundɛ kute gbeni baye ba yuke ka thɛkɛyaŋ haŋ, ba peyo iŋ bathithini, e bindɛ kɔ kaa ka kasikasina ŋapɛli namɛŋ ŋaŋ.
Yisɔs thɔɔyɛ ka gbe banthe, ba biiyo iŋ Saimɔŋ, e wundɛ tepe niŋ ba wundɛ ndinta thɔɔ ka teete ka. Wundɛ dɔŋɔy ka gbe baŋ, e wundɛ bɔha thaninuwa biya beŋ ŋaye ka doŋe wundɛ ka gbe baŋ kɛ.
Naa thanki wundɛ gbonkiya, wundɛ tepe Saimɔŋ na, na “Ndinta thɔɔ ka sunŋɔy ka e beŋ yɛla ŋapɛli ndeŋ ŋaŋ ba haliko beŋ be bohi heni.”
Huna tepe Saimɔŋ, na “Karimɔkɔ, miŋ hure hɛ thithuwa napiripiri, hali he wunthe miŋ tha bohi. Mba, kɛrɛ na tepe nɛŋ yi, yaŋ kɔŋ ni ba ŋɛŋ yelo.”
Awa naa pɛyɛŋ bindɛ ŋapɛli ŋaŋ ka mankɔ maŋ, bindɛ bohe heni bibɔyɛ haaŋ ŋapɛli ŋaŋ bɔha ba teetuwɔ.
Kɛna yiliyɛ bindɛ bintɔni namɛŋ beŋ yɔnkɔ bi nde ka gbe babantheŋ baŋ beŋ ba bindɛ si mase. Naa see bindɛ, bindɛ see thiŋiŋ gbeni babaye baŋ fooma, haaŋ bɛŋ bɔha mula.
Naa kute Saimɔŋ Pita bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, wundɛ ŋɔti ka ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs ŋaŋ, e wundɛ tɛpa, na “O Mariki, thokiye yama, baa wɔ bahakɛ na yaŋ.”
Wundɛ tepe huŋ baa wundɛ iŋ bintɔni nama beŋ fooma ni ŋakabanɛ ŋamandiŋ ba heni bibɔyɛ-bɔyɛ bi bohe bindɛ beŋ.
Bintɔni nama bi thiyi bindɛ beŋ fooma Yemisi iŋ Yɔni, mpati bi ka Sɛbɛdi beŋ, ni ŋakabanɛ ŋamandiŋ. Yisɔs tepe ka Saimɔŋ, na “Ba payɔ, there nda hɛ yi kɔŋ yɔsi biyamɛti.”
Kɛna yose bindɛ gbe baŋ ka thithɛ ka, e bindɛ pɛyɛna ntha yo ntha e yema Yisɔs na.

Naa nde Yisɔs ka mɛti banthe, hati lamgba wunthe see kɛnama wo iŋ nthoonaŋ kinɛnɔy ki bohe ka kɔtɔ ku ka wɔmɛti koŋ ka thinthi. Naa kute wundɛ Yisɔs na, wundɛ see ŋɔti ka ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs ŋaŋ, e theteke niŋ e tɛpa, na “Mariki, mɛnɛ yi kɔŋ thimo ba yama puya, yi kɔŋ punku ba yama pethina.”
Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina, Yisɔs yekeŋ yɔnkɔ nama haŋ. Wundɛ bohe niŋ e tɛpa, na “Yaŋ thimoŋ ba yi pethɔ. Awa, pethɔ!” Ka yako babɛina nthoonaŋ kinɛnɔy kɔŋ pethɔy niŋ.

Yisɔs yeli niŋ wukahɛ-kahɛ e tepe niŋ, na “Ba tepe huŋ wɔ yo wɔ, kɛrɛ kaa toloŋ ka bafode woŋ. Wundɛ be yina ka dethi wuyɔhɔy, awa e yi ka fuŋuna saraka ba saathɛ ba na pethɔy yi, nɔŋ na ni nde Musa yamari na, wuna wɔ yo wɔ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na yi pethɔy.”
Kɛrɛ huseri haŋ haŋ baŋ ba Yisɔs yame ntiŋ gbanthande. Sɛthɛ bamandiŋ see ba saa ka yuyɛ mathanani nama maŋ, iŋ ba puyo nthoonani namɛŋ kihakuwande.
Kɛrɛ, Yisɔs kɔŋ fuŋ nasɔii e wundɛ kaa ka ndɛ wuntheŋ e ka niya kuraminɛ.

Ka lɔkɔ banthe naa wundɛ thanani thampɛŋ tha ka Masaala thaŋ, binɔndi ka kiki ba dɔma baŋ na biFaresini beŋ mɛnɛ binɔndi ka karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, bi ŋaye ka mɛtiŋ bamɛɛsuwɛ baŋ beŋ fooma ka Kalili, ka Yudiya, iŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi fooma, bi kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ. Sɛmbɛ ba ka Masaala baŋ niyɔy iŋ Yisɔs ba puya biya.
Biya binɔndi sisi hati lamgba wogbɛsinkɔy ka yala. Bindɛ yole ba niŋ biita ka banka ka ba niŋ ka dɛŋiyɛ Yisɔs na.
Kɛrɛ na biya beŋ bibɔyɛ, bindɛ tha kutu gboŋa ba biite niŋ. Huna dunkutiye bindɛ niŋ ka banka baŋ ka thinthi, e bindɛ ka hɛkina matha e bindɛ niŋ kɛndɛ fuŋuntande toloŋ ka kooye Yisɔs kɛ kaake.
Naa kute Yisɔs ti kulanɛya namɛŋ koŋ, wundɛ tepe ka hati lamgba wogbɛsinkɔy woŋ, na “Hatiŋ woŋ, yi peniyo hakɛŋ bakɛnda baŋ.”
Karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ iŋ biFaresini beŋ bohe gbonkiyɔkɔ, na “Mbɛ hati lamgba woŋ baŋ, wo gbonkoy nanaŋ ba yethinuwa sɛmbɛ ba ka Masaala baŋ? Masaala nagbɛti ndɛ na pɛniyɛ wɔ hakɛ!”
Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina Yisɔs kɔthɛ hu bindɛ siyi ka thathukuma thakɛnamɛŋ thaŋ. Huna thonthiŋine ndɛ bindɛ, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ simeke bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ?
Mbɛ mu yamɛ niyɔ sɔɔnɛya: ba yaŋ dɔma ka hati lamgba woŋ, na ‘Yi peniyo hakɛŋ bikɛnda beŋ,’ maa, na ‘Ŋayi ka kɔɔ e yi kaande’?

Ka tete, yaŋ kɔŋ bena toŋine ba dɔma na Hati wo ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ iŋ sɛmbɛ ka faido ba pɛniyɛ wɔ hakɛŋ bikɛnama.” Huna tepe wundɛ hati lamgba wogbɛsinkɔy woŋ ntiŋ, na “Yaŋ tepe yina, ŋayi ka kɔɔ, sɛkitha muŋoye nda, e yi kaa ka banka nda ka!”
Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina hati lamgba woŋ ŋayinɔkɔy ka kɔɔ ka mateete namɛŋ fooma, e sɛkitha muŋoye nama muŋ, e kɔ kaa kaŋ thunkunuwa Masaala na.
Thakaba iŋ hupayɔ see bindɛ thɔɔ, awa bindɛ fooma thunkunu Masaala na e ka tɛpa, na “Mbɛ bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba kute hɛ miŋ baŋ!”
Naa daŋande bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, Yisɔs ŋaye. Wundɛ key kutu bathuu duthu wo dɔma na Libay. Ndɛ doŋe ka tha ka ndɛ thuuwe duthu woŋ kɛ. Yisɔs tepe niŋ, na “Yema yama.”
Libay ŋayinɔkɔy. Wundɛ pɛyi ntha yo ntha, e yema Yisɔs na.
Kɛna key Libay yehiniyɛ Yisɔs na muthɔma mumandiŋ e thiya niŋ ka banka nama ka iŋ bathuuni duthu woŋ beŋ iŋ biya bihɛna fooma athɔŋ ka tha banthe iŋ Yisɔs.

BiFaresini binɔndi iŋ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ bohe gbonkiyɔkɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ bakarandeni bi ka Yisɔs beŋ, e kɔ tɛpa, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ thome e beŋ ka thiiye ka tha banthe iŋ bathuuni duthu beŋ mɛnɛ bahakɛŋ beŋ?”
Huna tepe bindɛ Yisɔs, na “Biya bithoonɔy beŋ bindɛ bina thimo bapuyi, kɛrɛ biya bipethɔy beŋ bindɛ thimota bapuyi!
Yaŋ tha see ba bithumbɛ beŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ see ba haliko bahakɛŋ beŋ bi be sikiyɔkɔ ŋaye ka banɛnɔy bakɛnamɛŋ baŋ.”

BiFaresini beŋ iŋ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ tepe Yisɔs na, na “Bakarandeni bi ka Yɔni beŋ abohi suŋ e bindɛ kɔ niya kuraminɛ yako-yako, nɛna hɛlɛŋ biFaresini beŋ ni abohi suŋ, ani kuraminɛ yako-yako, kɛrɛ bakarandeni nda beŋ athɔŋ, athiiye.”
Huna tepe bindɛ Yisɔs, na “E beŋ, beŋ tuteŋ thukuma ba biya bi thiyo ba penkitiye ka kuyɛntande koŋ ba bindɛ kɔ dɔŋɔ wu ka muthɔma naa hintiŋ bayɛnti woŋ iŋ bindɛ? Wuŋ sa nɛŋ niyɔ!
Kɛrɛ malɔkɔ maŋ mɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ tɛŋ ma bayɛnti woŋ sekitho; ka lɔkɔ babɛina bindɛ kɔŋ bohi suŋ.”

Kɛna gbonkitiyande wundɛ bindɛ ka thayini, na “Wɔ o wɔ ka wo sayaŋ thika baŋama ba bɛŋ puta rombo ka thika batiyɔ. Mɛnɛ wundɛ ni wuŋ wundɛ teeti thika baŋama baŋ, awa hɛlɛŋ rombo hu sayaŋ wundɛ ka thika baŋama baŋ haŋ, huŋ sa niyɔ nanthe iŋ thika batiyɔ baŋ.

Ba hintiŋ tɛpa na wɔ kɔŋ thiyi mampa maŋama ma huitu ka muthiye mutiyɔ mu yehinuwo ka kuthagba ku ka baahu e muŋ lɔŋita, baa maŋama maŋ mɛ kɔŋ muŋ tambi. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina mampa maŋ mɛ kɔŋ teetuwɔ, awa muthiye muŋ mu kɔŋ tambɔ.
Huna mampa maŋama yɔkɔŋ ka muthiye muŋama.
Wɔ yo wɔ ka wo thimo ba thiiye makathiŋ, mampa maŋama, mɛnɛ wundɛ thanki nda bara ba thiiye matewɛ, mampa matiyɔ maŋ, baa mɛŋ atɛŋ ba wundɛ.”

Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ bi kɔŋ nde daŋande ka dumgbu ba ka muthɛri ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ. Bakarandeni nama beŋ bohe kaa kaŋ thinka muthɛri muŋ, e bindɛ muŋ ka sɔkiyuwa ka yɔnkɔ e bindɛ muŋ kɔ kaa kaŋ thɔma.
Kɛrɛ biFaresini binɔndi bi pɛnkintiyande kɛndɛ beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bindɛ, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ niye ba tepe Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ ba thana niyo ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ?”
Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ bindɛ, na “E beŋ niyeta hɛ karaŋ ba ni nde Dauda iŋ biya bi nde iŋ wundɛ ka biyasi haŋ beŋ naa kaho bindɛ kɔnthɔ?

Wundɛ biyande ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ e ka sɛkitha ŋatoŋ ŋa deŋo nde kɛndɛ ŋaŋ nɔŋ munkii ka Masaala, e ŋɛŋ thɔma e dunkuna ŋɛŋ ka biya bi nde iŋ wundɛ ka biyasi haŋ beŋ. Halisa wuŋ wu kɔŋ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ ba wɔ hɛna ba thɔma ŋatoŋ ŋaŋ ŋaŋ daŋandeŋ bafodeni beŋ.”
Huna gbanthine ntiŋ Yisɔs, na “Mba Hati wo ka Wɔ woŋ ndɛ na kɛriŋiyɛ Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.”
Ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe mamantheŋ maŋ, naa key Yisɔs biyande ka banka bathuŋuyande ba ka biYusu beŋ baŋ e kɔ thaninuwa thampɛŋ tha ka Masaala thaŋ, hati lamgba wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ wo tukɛ yɔnkɔ huthome.
Karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ bi thimoŋ ba kuta gboŋa ba bindɛ thonkine Yisɔs na. Bɛna bindɛ bohe nda yila Yisɔs na ba mɛnɛ wundɛ kɔŋ puyi wɔ ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs kɔthɛŋ masimɔkɔ namɛŋ maŋ. Kɛna tepe wundɛ hati lamgba wo iŋ yɔnkɔ hutukɛ haŋ woŋ, na “Ŋayi ka kɔɔ, e yi si kɔɔ ka kɔtɔkɔy dondo.” Hati lamgba woŋ ŋaye; wundɛ see kɔɔ.

Huna tepe bindɛ Yisɔs, na “Yaŋ be hɛ bena thɔnthɔŋɔŋ: Mbɛ mayoho ma dunkuŋ mina Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ ba miŋ ba niya ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ? Ba mase maa ba teetuwa? Ba niya sii ba ka wɔ kisi maa ba bɛŋ teetuwa?”
Kɛna dethe ndɛ bindɛ natiŋ. Huna tepe wundɛ ka hati lamgba wo tukɛ yɔnkɔ haŋ woŋ, na “Thumbuna yɔnkɔ nda haŋ.” Wundɛ thumbuŋ huŋ. Kɛna thɔhɔy yɔnkɔ nama haŋ huŋ pethɔ nagbelebe.
Bindɛ thɔɔyɛ ka mathoŋ, e bindɛ bɔha thɔnthiŋinuwande ba ba nda bindɛ ni Yisɔs na.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Yisɔs see key ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ ba ka niya kuraminɛ; wundɛ hure niya kuraminɛ ka Masaala kɛndɛ.
Naa puthɔy kaŋ woŋ, kɛna thiyi wundɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ, e yɛtha kɔhi iŋ biye bi thunde wundɛ keŋ na baseriŋ bithɔɔkɔ.
Wundɛ yɛthi Saimɔŋ na, wo thunde wundɛ keŋ woŋ na Pita, iŋ wɛndama Anduru, Yemisi iŋ Yɔni, Filipi, iŋ Batholomiyu,
Mathiyu, iŋ Thɔmɔsi, Yemisi wo hati ka Alifiyɔsi, iŋ Saimɔŋ wo nde kurugba woŋ,
Yudasi hati ka Yemisi, iŋ Yudasi Isakariyɔti wo dunkunɛ Yisɔs na ka hadeni nama beŋ woŋ.

Naa thuhe Yisɔs ŋaye ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ iŋ baseriŋ nama bithɔɔkɔ beŋ, wundɛ see kɔɔ ka kuyɛkɛŋ kugbɛnthɛŋ-gbɛnthɛŋ koŋ iŋ sɛthɛ bamandiŋ ba ka bakarandeni nama, mɛnɛ biya bimandiŋ bi nde kɛndɛ ŋaye fooma ka Yudiya, ka Yɛrusalɛmi, iŋ ka kufɛŋ ku ka Taya iŋ ka Saidɔŋ ku tɔpɛ mankɔ mamɛɛti maŋ koŋ. Beŋ beŋ fooma see ba niŋ saa ka yuyɛ iŋ ba si puyo nthoonani namɛŋ kɔŋ.
Bi boho iŋ mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ fooma puyo.
Biya beŋ fooma ayɔli ba boheke Yisɔs na, baa sɛmbɛ ba puyi hiŋ ba niŋ fuŋ ka kɔtɔ e bɛŋ bindɛ kɔ puya fooma.
Yisɔs dethe bakarandeni nama beŋ e tɛpa, na “Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka beŋ, bendo bamɔnɛŋ beŋ, baa bena biyɛ hudinhaŋiya hu ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.
“Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka beŋ, bendo kaho hɛ kɔnthɔ beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ thimbina. “Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka beŋ, bendo bereŋ hɛ beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ hɛthi.
“Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka beŋ, mɛnɛ biya thambo bena, e bena baŋina, e bena thɔtha dɛkuiŋ, e bena gbonkiyiyɛ bɛyiniŋ banɛnɔy fooma ba saathɛ ba Hati wo ka Wɔ woŋ.
Yehitɔkɔŋ, e beŋ mala iŋ mayehitɔkɔ mamandiŋ mɛnɛ wuŋ niyɔy nɛŋ, baa kuthunkuŋ kumandiŋ ku kɔŋ ba beŋ ka ariana, baa nɛna ni nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ kɔŋ ka banabiŋ beŋ nde.
“Kɛrɛ nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ba beŋ, bendo bananhuluiŋ beŋ, baa beŋ thiŋiŋ nda ŋafiyo ŋakendeŋ ŋaŋ.
“Nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ba beŋ, bendo hɛ nda bendo thimbɔy beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ kaho kɔnthɔ! Nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ba beŋ, bendo hɛ hɛthi beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ bereŋ!
“Nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ka kuwaŋ kukendeŋ mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ gbonkoy wuyɔhɔy ba beŋ, baa nɛna nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ kɔŋ gbeeŋ gbonkoy wuyɔhɔy ba banabiŋ biŋasɔkɛ beŋ.
“Kɛrɛ beŋ, bendo yama yuyɛ beŋ, yaŋ tepe bena, thimoŋ hadeni bikendeŋ beŋ; niya wuyɔhɔy bi thambo bena beŋ.
Thiyiyaŋ thaduba bi bena thiyiyɛ thadanka beŋ. Niyaŋ kuraminɛ ba bi bena gbonkiyiyɛ wunɛnɔy beŋ.
Mɛnɛ wɔ thoroŋ yina ka kuwaabu kuthome koŋ, dapiniyande niŋ kuwaabu kupɔkɔdɔ koŋ hɛlɛŋ. Mɛnɛ wɔ ŋututu yina kuhɔli, mba ŋutiyɛ nda niŋ yaba bakaake baŋ.
Dunkune wɔ yo wɔ wo yina thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba ntha, awa mɛnɛ wɔ sekithite yina ntha, ba nda niŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba wuŋ.
Niyiyɛ biya bihɛna nanthe nathesi nɔŋ na thimo yi ba bindɛ yina niyiyɛ na.
“Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ beŋ thimo hɔkɔŋ nthɔŋ bi thimo bena beŋ, mbɛ thaduba tha beŋ kutu? Baa hali bahakɛŋ beŋ, nɛŋ mɛiŋ ni.
Awa mɛnɛ beŋ ni hɔkɔŋ bayɔhɔy ka bi bena ni bayɔhɔy beŋ ŋagbɛti beŋ, mbɛ thaduba tha beŋ kutu? Baa hali bahakɛŋ beŋ, nɛŋ mɛiŋ ni.
Mɛnɛ beŋ thɔhɔŋ hɔkɔŋ bi bena punku thunkuna beŋ, mbɛ thaduba tha beŋ kutu? Baa hali bahakɛŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ thɔhɔŋ bintɔni namɛŋ ba thunkuno nanthe nathesi.

Kɛrɛ thimoŋ biya bi thambo bena beŋ, awa e beŋ niya bayɔhɔy, awa e beŋ thɔhina wu ka matute yima ba thunkuno. Awa kuthunkuŋ kukendeŋ koŋ ku kɔŋ niyɔ kumandiŋ, awa beŋ kɔŋ niyɔ mpati bi ka Masaala wo ka thinthi woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma. Baa Masaala wɔ yɔhɔy na ka bi ka thiya beŋ, iŋ binɛnɔy beŋ fooma.
Bɛna, niyɔŋ bankinikiniŋ nɔŋ na Fanda ntuŋ woŋ bankinikiniŋ na.
“Baŋ niyɔkɔ bakɔnsɔŋɔni, awa Masaala sa nɛnɛ bena kɔnsɔŋɔŋ; baŋ thonkine biya bihɛna, awa Masaala sa nɛnɛ bena thonkine; pɛniyaŋ biya bihɛna, awa Masaala kɔŋ nɛnɛ bena pɛniyɛ.

Nkaaŋ biya bihɛna, awa Masaala kɔŋ nɛnɛ bena nkii. Yaathi, beŋ kɔŋ thubutiya ka muthubute mu ka iŋ kɔɔtha, wu kɔŋ thiya e wuŋ ŋeno, e wuŋ noinko, e wuŋ thiyo ka thɛnkɔ thakendeŋ thaŋ. Baa ka muthubute mu beŋ thubutiye biya bihɛna muŋ, muna nɛnɛ Masaala bena thubutiye.”
Kɛna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ thabɔrɔ thaŋ thaŋ ba bindɛ thaninuwa ba Masaala: na “Wɔ mankɔy thaaya sa katitɔkɔ wɔ mankɔy thaaya. Mɛnɛ wundɛ ni wuŋ, ti bindɛ biye bi kɔŋ ŋɔti ka kufo ka.
Karandeŋ yameta bukuya ba karimɔkɔ nama, kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wundɛ thanki thanuwa, wundɛ kɔŋ niyɔ nɔŋ karimɔkɔ nama.
“Nama yi kute kuthopi ku ka hooya hu ka ntɔ nda haŋ koŋ, kɛrɛ yi tha kutu kugboŋ ku yinthande ka hooya hukɛnda haŋ koŋ?

Nama yi tepe ntɔ nda na, na ‘Ntɔŋ, yaandi saa be yina fuŋuŋ kuthopi koŋ ka hooya hukɛnda haŋ,’ halisa yi kuita kugboŋ ku ka hooya hukɛnda haŋ koŋ? Wɔ banitɔkɔ na yi! Yenke hintiŋ fuŋuna kugboŋ koŋ ka hooya hukɛnda haŋ. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina yi kɔŋ kutu nagberekethe. Yi kɔŋ punku kuta nagberekethe ba fuŋuna kuthopi ku ka hooya hu ka ntɔ nda haŋ koŋ.
“Kuyeŋ kuyɔhɔy sa tiŋ mutiŋ munɛnɔy, ba hintiŋ nɛnɛ tɛpa na kuyeŋ kunɛnɔy ku kɔŋ tiŋ mutiŋ muyɔhɔy.
Kuyeŋ ndo kuyeŋ ku kɔŋ kothiyo ka detha mutiŋ nama muŋ. Yi sa thadi mutiŋ muthɔma ŋaye ka kuyeŋ ku sa thɔma, ba hintiŋ tɛpa na yi kɔŋ thadi mutiŋ muyɔhɔy ŋaye ka kuyerethe.

Wɔ yɔhɔy ndɛ kɔŋ fuŋutu bɛyiniŋ bayɔhɔy ŋaye ka bɛyiniŋ bayɔhɔy ba kɔsɔŋ wundɛ ka thukuma nama haŋ. Wɔ nɛnɔy nɛnɛ, wundɛ kɔŋ fuŋutu bɛyiniŋ banɛnɔy ba kɔsɔŋ wundɛ ka thukuma nama haŋ, baa hothi haŋ hu kɔŋ gbonkoy ba thiŋɛ ka thukuma haŋ.
“Mbɛ ba beŋ yama thiye ‘Mariki,’ mahɛŋ mabɛina beŋ niyeta ba yaŋ bena tepe baŋ?
Wɔ yo wɔ wo see kiyaŋ do, e wundɛ yuyɛ thampa thakiyaŋ thaŋ, e wundɛ thɛŋ bɔha, yaŋ kɔŋ bena toŋine wo thɔyande iŋ wundɛ:

Wundɛ athɔyande nɔŋ wɔ wo ŋaye nde ba thoya banka. Wundɛ gbuse wusunŋɔy haaŋ wundɛ pɛnka kuthara. Kɛna tute wundɛ banka nama baŋ. Naa see mandi maŋ tɛnki, e mandi mabɛina si haŋɔ banka babɛina, mɛŋ tha beŋ punku ŋɛna, baa bɛŋ kiyo ka tha ka kahɛ.

Kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo yuyɛ thampa thakiyaŋ thaŋ, kɛrɛ wundɛ tha thɛŋ putiyɔ, wundɛ thɔyandeŋ nɔŋ wo thoyɛ banka, wundɛ tha bɛŋ suŋuyɛ wukahɛ-kahɛ haaŋ wundɛ pɛnka kuthara. Naa see mandi maŋ tɛnki, e mandi maŋ haŋɔ banka babɛina, bɛŋ ŋɔti kɔɔ hanthe, awa ŋɔta hubɛina huŋ niyɔy ŋɔta hukasara bamandiŋ.”
Naa thanki Yisɔs gbonkiya bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma ka biya beŋ, wundɛ key ka mɛti ba ka Kapaniyɔmi.
Bayaha wunthe ka kurugbani bi ka biRomaŋ beŋ, bawali wokɛnama wo thimo wundɛ wumandiŋ woŋ see thoona wukahɛ-kahɛ ba tuka.
Naa yuye bayaha woŋ baŋ ba Yisɔs, wundɛ ŋindi bakalani bibayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ kɛndɛ yako ba ka thɔnthiŋina Yisɔs na ba puyiyo bawali woŋ.
Naa key bakalani beŋ beŋ, bindɛ key theteke Yisɔs na wumandiŋ, e tepe Yisɔs na, na “Bayaha woŋ asisande ba kuta kumase ŋaye kɛnda,
babiyɛ wundɛ athimo biya ntuŋ beŋ, awa wundɛ thoyiye mina banka bathuŋuyande.”

Kɛna ŋaye Yisɔs. Wundɛ key iŋ baseriŋ bi ŋindi bayaha woŋ beŋ. Naa thuriye Yisɔs banka ba ka bayaha woŋ baŋ, bayaha woŋ ŋindi binyathikɔŋ nama beŋ ba ka tepe Yisɔs na, na “Karimɔkɔ, ba nda niyɔkɔ thɔrɔ; yaŋ ka yando tɛŋɛ ba yi ba biyande ka banka bakiyaŋ baŋ.
Ba hintiŋ tɛpa, na yaŋ kɔŋ simɔkɔ ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ yando tɛŋɛ ba yina kutiyɔkɔ yethi. Niya hɔkɔŋ yamari ba bawali wokiyaŋ woŋ be pethɔ, awa wundɛ kɔŋ pethɔ.

Baa yaŋ, wɔ na yaŋ wo deŋo ka sɛmbɛ ka pothi, awa yaŋ hɛlɛŋ yaŋ kɔŋ iŋ kurugbani bi yama ka pothi. Yaŋ punkeŋ niya wunthe yamari, na ‘Kaa’ e wundɛ kaa; yaŋ punkeŋ niya yamari bawali wohɛna, na ‘Niya baŋ baŋ,’ awa e wundɛ bɛŋ niya!”

Naa yuye Yisɔs madunkunɔkɔy maŋ maŋ, wuŋ niyɔy niŋ thɛrɛnaŋ. Huna sikiyeke wundɛ e tepe sɛthɛ ba niŋ yeŋ baŋ, na “Yaŋ tepe bena, yaŋ kuita hɛ nɔŋ wɔ niyɛ yama lanɛya nɔŋ woŋ, hali hintiŋ ka mateete ma ka biIsirɛli beŋ!”
Naa duu baseriŋ beŋ ka banka ba ka bayaha woŋ baŋ, bindɛ penke bawali wo ka bayaha woŋ wopethɔy nagbelebe.
Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina, Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ, iŋ sɛthɛ bamandiŋ key ka mɛti ba dɔma baŋ na ka Neni.
Ndɛ si nthɔŋ tɛŋ ka biyo hu ka mɛti baŋ haŋ, wundɛ pɛnkande iŋ biya bi si kati kubeli ku hati wathe wo ka bagbokora wo niŋ wunthe napethi, iŋ biya bibɔyɛ ŋaye ka mɛti ka.
Naa kute niŋ Mariki woŋ, wundɛ niyɔy niŋ nkinikiniŋ, huna tepe wundɛ niŋ, na “Ba bereŋ.”
Kɛna thuriye wundɛ, wundɛ boheke mgbansi kɔŋ. Kɛna kɔɔyɛ biya bi tutɔkɔy kɔŋ beŋ. Yisɔs tepe, na “Hati lamgba, yaŋ konde yina, ŋayi ka kɔɔ.”
Kubeli koŋ ŋaye; kuŋ dɔŋɔy. Wundɛ bohe gbonkiya. Kɛna sekithe niŋ Yisɔs; wundɛ dunkuŋ niŋ ka nandama.
Bindɛ fooma thooyo payɔ, e thunkunuwa Masaala na, e tɛpa, na “Banabi womandiŋ tɛŋ! Masaala see ba saa ka kutiyɛ biya nama beŋ.”
Huseri haŋ haŋ baŋ ba bɛyiniŋ ba ni Yisɔs baŋ gbanthande fooma ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ.
Naa tepo Yɔni iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ ba bɛyiniŋ ba Yisɔs ni baŋ,
wundɛ thiyi biya biye ŋaye ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, e ŋinda bindɛ ka Mariki woŋ ka iŋ kuthɔnthɔŋɔŋ koŋ koŋ, na “E yina nde yaŋ dɔŋ woŋ, wo bɔhɛ ba saa woŋ, maa miŋ ba dethiteke wohɛna gboŋa?”

Naa see baseriŋ beŋ beŋ baŋ ka Yisɔs, bindɛ see niŋ tepe, na “Yɔni wo biye biye hu ka Masaala haŋ woŋ ŋindi mina ba yina si thɔnthiŋina mɛnɛ yina wunthe wo nde wundɛ dɔŋ woŋ wo bɔhɛ ba saa woŋ, maa miŋ ba dethiteke wohɛna gboŋa?”
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina gbeeŋ Yisɔs puyi biya bibɔyɛ bi iŋ nthoonani kihakuwande, wundɛ kanthe mbayiŋ binɛnɔy, wundɛ pɛthi thaaya bi mankɔy thaaya beŋ.

Kɛna tepe wundɛ baseriŋ bi ŋindi Yɔni beŋ, na “Kaaŋ kaŋ tepe Yɔni na ba thanki beŋ yuyɔkɔ e beŋ kutiyɔkɔ: bi mankɔy thaaya kute, bagbɛthɛŋ yathe, bi iŋ nthoonani kinɛnɔy ki bohe ka kɔtɔ ku ka wɔmɛti koŋ beŋ pethɔy, bi lɔŋɔi ŋaiha yuye, bitukɛ beŋ ŋayino ka thatuka thaŋ, Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ niyo kɛwandi ka bamɔnɛŋ beŋ.
Wɔ thaduba na wo sa kikɔŋ ba yaŋ.”

Naa duu baseriŋ bi ŋindi Yɔni beŋ, Yisɔs bohe gbonkitiyande biya beŋ ba Yɔni. Huna thonthiŋine Yisɔs biya beŋ, na “Naa key nde beŋ ka Yɔni ka ka wula ka, mbɛ mu key nde beŋ ka detha? E bompa bu huru haŋ yɛlande na thimo huŋ? Hali wuŋ ka nɛŋ.
Mbu mbɛ ntiŋ nda mu key nde beŋ ka detha? E wɔ wo iŋ mugbɛkitɔkɔ muyɔhɔy? Biya bi gbɛkitɔkɔy mugbɛkitɔkɔ muyɔhɔy iŋ bi ka hariyeke beŋ, ka bankɛŋ ba ka bananhuluiŋ beŋ baŋ kɛna bindɛ.
Kɛrɛ tepeŋ hɛ yama, mbɛ wɔ wo key nde beŋ ba ka detha ka wula ka? E banabi? Yaathi, banabi, kɛrɛ beŋ kute nde wu yamɛ ba banabi.
Baa Yɔni na gbonkiyiyo nde ka magbali maŋ iŋ Masaala ba dɔma, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ yenke ŋinda baseri wokiyaŋ woŋ ba yina ka pɛthiyɛ gboŋa baŋ.’ ”
Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy, na “Yaathi, yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, Yɔni yameŋ bukuya ba wɔ yo wɔ nɔŋ ka faido. Kɛrɛ wundɛ wo yamɛ thahuwɔ ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ woŋ, wundɛ yameŋ bukuya ba Yɔni.”
Naa yuye biya beŋ fooma iŋ bathuuni duthu woŋ beŋ kɛwandi wo ka Yisɔs woŋ, bindɛ tepe ba dɔma na gboŋa ba ka Masaala baŋ ba kɔŋ nɔndi, baa bindɛ biyo iŋ Yɔni.
Kɛrɛ biFaresini beŋ ndo, karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ ndo, bindɛ bina thanthiye madɛɛnki ma ka Masaala maŋ ba bindɛ, baa bindɛ baŋaŋ ba biyo iŋ Yɔni.
Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy, na “Mbɛ mu nda yaŋ thɔyintande biya bi ka lɔkɔ bahɛ baŋ ndee? Mbɛ mu thɔyande bindɛ?

Bindɛ athɔyande nthɔŋ nɔŋ mpati bi dɔŋɔy ka gbɔni baŋ niyo ka, beŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ yɛli beŋ beŋ thampa, na ‘Miŋ haŋiye bena yakali ba ka mayehitɔkɔ, kɛrɛ beŋ tha kaŋ; miŋ soŋiye bena nthenkey, kɛrɛ beŋ tha bereŋ!’
Naa see nde Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ, wundɛ thometa, wundɛ thiiyeta. Beŋ dome, na ‘Akutande ma iŋ wayi.’
Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see hɛlɛŋ wo thiiye, wo thɔŋ. Beŋ dome hɛlɛŋ, na ‘Dethaŋ hati lamgba wo batiki, wo thiiye haaŋ e yilɔ, nyathiki wo ka bathuuni duthu iŋ bahakɛŋ.’
Kele hu ka Masaala haŋ gboŋa yo gboŋa tɔŋinɔkɔy ba huŋ niyɔ nɔndi ka bɛyiniŋ ba bi yɛrɔkɔy huŋ beŋ ni baŋ.”
WoFaresi wunthe thiyi Yisɔs na ba ka thɔma iŋ wundɛ. Kɛna key wundɛ ka banka ba ka woFaresi woŋ baŋ e bindɛ ka dɔŋɔ ka thɔma ka tha banthe.

Ka mɛti babɛina yɛrɛmɛ wo bahakɛ kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ. Naa yuye wundɛ ba dɔma na Yisɔs thiyo ka thɔma ka banka ba ka woFaresi woŋ baŋ, kɛna sisi wundɛ bithira hu kahɛ mɔlɔŋ, hu yehinuwo maŋaye ka raka hu dɔma haŋ na alabasata, hu thiŋɛ iŋ mayɔ mathimɔy huru.

Wundɛ si kooye Yisɔs na kuwaŋ ka ŋathaki nama ŋaŋ, e kɔ berina, e manɛɛni nama maŋ kɔ thɔninuwa ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs ŋaŋ, awa e ŋɛŋ kɔ thithunuwe bɔɔyɛ nama buŋ, e ŋɛŋ kɔ dɔɔkɔ, e kɔ koŋe ŋɛŋ mayɔ mathimɔy huru maŋ.

Naa kute woFaresi woŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, wundɛ dome ka thukuma nama, na “Mɛnɛ hati lamgba woŋ baŋ kɔŋ nde banabi, wundɛ kɔŋ nde hakiyando wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ, wo boheke niŋ woŋ nɔŋ na wundɛ. Baa wundɛ kɔŋ nde kɔthɔ ba dɔma na bahakɛ na wundɛ!”
Kɛna tepe Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Saimɔŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ iŋ bɛyi ba yina tepe.” Huna tepe Saimɔŋ, na “Awa, karimɔkɔ, tɛpa; yaŋ poneŋ kuiha.”
Yisɔs tepe, na “Biya biye bi kɔŋ nde ba thunkuna wɔ wunthe dɔɔnthɔ. Wunthe woŋ kɔŋ ba thunkuna bɛrɛ ba liyoni kɛmɛŋ-bisɔhi, wo wuntheŋ woŋ bɛrɛ ba liyoni kɔnthɔ-kasɔhi.

Kɛrɛ na tha bindɛ punku ba thunkuna kɔbiri woŋ, wo biyɛ kɔbiri woŋ tepe, na ‘Yaŋ pɛniyɛ bena ti beŋ fooma.’ Ka tete, ka bi biye beŋ beŋ, mbɛ wo yaŋ thimo wumandiŋ hɛmɔŋ wo pɛniyɛ bindɛ dɔɔnthɔiŋ baŋ woŋ?”
Saimɔŋ tepe, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ siyi ba dɔma na wo peniyo dɔɔnthɔ bayamɛ baŋ woŋ na.” Yisɔs tepe, na “Yi tepe nɔndi.”

Yisɔs sikiyɔkɔy ntiŋ ka woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ e tɛpa ka Saimɔŋ, na “Yi kuteŋ wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ. Yaŋ see ka banka bakɛnda baŋ, kɛrɛ yi tha yama nkii mandi ba looka ŋathaki niŋ ŋaŋ. Kɛrɛ wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ looke ŋathaki niŋ ŋaŋ iŋ manɛɛni nama maŋ, e ndɛ ŋɛŋ thithinuwe iŋ bɔɔyɛ nama buŋ.
Yi tha yama dɔɔkɔ ka maana, kɛrɛ kabi na see hɛ yaŋ, wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ peyeta ba dɔɔkɔ ŋathaki niŋ ŋaŋ.
Yi tha yama koŋe mayɔ ka yaha niŋ haŋ ba yama maana, kɛrɛ wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ koŋe ŋathaki niŋ ŋaŋ mayɔ mathimɔy huru.
Bɛna yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe, mathimo mamandiŋ ma tɔŋɔŋ wundɛ maŋ tɔŋɔŋ nagberekethe ba dɔma na hakɛŋ nama bimandiŋ thanki peyeno, kɛrɛ wɔ wo peniyo wuthahuwɔy kɔŋ tɔŋɔŋ mathimo mathahuwɔy.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs ka wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ, na “Yi thanki peniyo hakɛŋ bikɛnda.”
Bihɛna bi doŋe wundɛ ka thɔma haŋ beŋ bohe gbonkiyɔkɔ, na “Mbɛ wɔ woŋ, wo pɛniyɛ wɔ hakɛŋ nama?”
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe wɔ yɛrɛmɛ woŋ, na “Lanɛya bakɛnda baŋ kiyaŋ ni yina kisi maŋaye ka hakɛŋ bikɛnda beŋ. Kaa iŋ mathɛbɛ.”

Naa daŋande malɔkɔ manɔndi, Yisɔs kaande ka mɛtiŋ babukuyuwɛ baŋ iŋ mɛtiŋ bamɛɛsuwɛ baŋ, kaŋ kaa kaŋ niya kɛwandi Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ ba Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ. Bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ yeme niŋ,
iŋ yɛrɛmɛŋ binɔndi bi kanthe wundɛ mbayiŋ binɛnɔy iŋ nthoonani kihakuwande: Mariyama wo ka mɛti ba ka Makadala, wo kantho mbayiŋ bisɔŋ-biye,
Yoana wo yento iŋ Kusa wo nde bayaha ka banka ba ka Hɛrɔdi baŋ woŋ, iŋ Susana, iŋ yɛrɛmɛŋ bibɔyɛ, bi nde mase Yisɔs na iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ ŋaye ka mu iŋ bindɛ muŋ.
Naa bohe biya bibɔyɛ saa ka Yisɔs ŋaye ka mɛti makey ka mɛti, sɛthɛ bamandiŋ see kɔmande ka tha banthe; Yisɔs tepe bindɛ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ:
na “Malɔkɔ manthe bapayi wunthe na fuŋɛ nde ba kaa kaŋ paya paka nama. Naa wundɛ key kaŋ paya, banɔndi ŋɔti ka gboŋa baŋ. Bɛŋ see yathuwa, awa bɛtiŋ beŋ see hɛlɛŋ bɛŋ thuu.
Banɔndi baŋ ŋɔti ka kuthara koŋ. Naa bɔɔti bɛŋ, bɛŋ see thithi, babiyɛ bɛŋ ka iŋ mandi matɛŋɛ.
Banɔndi ŋɔti ka thaka haŋ. Naa see bɛŋ muku, bɛŋ mukutande iŋ thaka haŋ, awa thaka haŋ see bɛŋ pɔthitinande.
Banɔndi ŋɔti ka kuyɛkɛŋ kuyɔhɔy koŋ. Bɛŋ see muku wuyɔhɔy, bɛŋ see fuŋuŋ humo huma kɛmɛ wunthe.” Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Ponaŋ kuiha, yindo ba pona kuiha!”
Bakarandeni beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ kolo ba ka mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ?”

Yisɔs tepe bindɛ, na “Beŋ dunkuno hɛɛra ba kɔthɔ gbundu ba ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ, kɛrɛ ka biya bihɛna beŋ, yɔkɔŋ ka thabɔrɔ na bindɛ kothiye, ‘hali na amayaŋ thaaya nabanthuŋ, bindɛ sa kutu; hali na apoŋ kuiha, bindɛ sa metho.’
“Kolo ba ka mbɔrɔ ki ka bapayi woŋ kɔŋ baŋ bɛna baŋ baŋ:

Paka ba ŋɔtɛ ka gboŋa baŋ baŋ bɛna thɔyande iŋ bi yuyɛ thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ beŋ, kɛrɛ Wayi Womandiŋ woŋ Sithani see. Wundɛ see fuŋuŋ thampa thabɛina ŋaye ka thathukuma namɛŋ thaŋ, ba haliko na sa bindɛ niye lanɛya e niyo kisi.

Ba ŋɔtɛ ka kuthara koŋ baŋ bɛna thɔyande iŋ biya bi yuyɛ thampa thaŋ beŋ e bindɛ thɛŋ yɛrɔkɔ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ, kɛrɛ thɛŋ tha thɔɔ wusunŋɔy ka thathukuma namɛŋ thaŋ. Bindɛ ni hɔkɔŋ lanɛya ba malɔkɔ mathurɔy, kɛrɛ naa lɔkɔ ba kugbɛrɛŋɛŋ koŋ baŋ tɛŋ nthɔŋ, bindɛ ŋɔti.

Ba ŋɔtɛ ka thaka haŋ baŋ, bɛna thɔyande iŋ biya bi yuyɛ thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ beŋ, kɛrɛ yaagbani beŋ ndo, dethuwa nanhulu baŋ haŋ ndo, wuthimɔy wu ka huwɔmɛtiya haŋ wuŋ ndo see niŋ thɔɔ ka thukuma, awa biya bibɛina sa punku fuŋuna munahaŋ.
Ba ŋɔtɛ ka kuyɛkɛŋ kuyɔhɔy koŋ baŋ, bɛna thɔyande iŋ biya bi yuyɛ thampa thaŋ beŋ e bindɛ huŋ putiyɔ, e bindɛ huŋ kɔsina ka thathukuma thakɛnamɛŋ, e niya kuthithi haaŋ e fuŋuna munahaŋ.

“Wɔ yo wɔ ka wo mɔɔli mumɔɔli ba muŋ pututa kuma, maa ba muŋ nɔra ka kuhinsi ka pothi, kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wɔ mɔɔli mumɔɔli ndɛ kɔŋ ba muŋ tuta ka thinthi, ba haliko wɔ yo wɔ wo biyande ka banka ka, ndɛ be kutu waŋ babɛina.
“Bɛyi na ka ba nunɔkɔy ba sa nɔŋ kuta nagberekethe; bɛyi na ka ba gbundu ba sa nɔŋ biya kɔthɔ, maa ba sa nɔŋ kiya ka waŋ.
“Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ na beŋ yuye, baa wo iŋ wuyete, wundɛ na ndintiya, kɛrɛ wo ka iŋ wuyete woŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ kanita hali wu simeke wundɛ wu iŋ wundɛ.”
Nanda ka Yisɔs iŋ mbɛndama see ka Yisɔs, kɛrɛ na biya beŋ bibɔyɛ, bindɛ tha niŋ punku thuriye.
Huna yele wɔ wunthe Yisɔs na thampa, na “Nanda iŋ mbɛnda bi kooyeŋ ka gbada ka ka yumba yina; bi thimoŋ ba yina kuta.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Biya beŋ beŋ, bindɛ bina binandaŋ iŋ mbɛndaŋ bi yuyɛ thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ beŋ, e bindɛ thɛŋ putiyɔ.”
Ka lɔkɔ banthe Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ thɔɔyɛ ka gbe, huna tepe wundɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Miŋ kaayɛŋ thuhaŋ mankɔ maŋ.” Kɛna fuŋ bindɛ ba kaa.
Kɛrɛ naa bindɛ key, Yisɔs bohe nine ka gbe baŋ. Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina huru humandiŋ see bindɛ pɛnki ka mankɔ maŋ. Kɛna bohe gbe baŋ thiŋo mandi, e bindɛ bɔha mula ka mandi maŋ.
