Kɛna key bakarandeni beŋ ka Yisɔs ka e niŋ ka thɔhina, e tɛpa, na “Karimɔkɔ, karimɔkɔ, miŋ bohe muluto?” Kɛna ŋayinɔkɔy Yisɔs. Wundɛ pinde huru haŋ iŋ thamunkulu thabukuyuwɛ thaŋ, na “Thɛbaŋ,” kɛna thebe muŋ nayeŋ.

Huna tepe Yisɔs ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Mbɛ ba sa beŋ niye lanɛya?” Kɛrɛ bindɛ fooma ni kukabanɛ ka payɔ ka tete, e tɛpiyande, na “Mbɛ woŋ, wo ni yamari huru haŋ woŋ iŋ thamunkulu thaŋ, e thɛŋ niŋ putiyɔ?”
Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ thuhande mankɔ maŋ e kaa ka bompi wo ka Kɛrasa ba dethande iŋ ka Kalili baŋ.

Naa fuŋ nthɔŋ Yisɔs ka gbe baŋ, kɛna see niŋ hati lamgba wo boho iŋ mbayiŋ binɛnɔy pɛnki ŋaye ka thayoma ka. Wundɛ thooyeta nɔŋ nda yaba. Wundɛ ka nɔŋ nda ka banka nama, yikiya bakɛnama nɔŋ nda ka thayoma ka.

Naa kute wundɛ Yisɔs na, wundɛ bereŋ wutɔɔkɛ, e hɔrande ka ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs, e yɛla thampa, na “Yisɔs, yindo Hati ka Masaala wo ka thinthi woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma, mbɛ ba thimo yi yama ba niye? Yaŋ theteke yina. Ba yama gbasaŋati!”

Wundɛgbonkoynɛŋ baa Yisɔs ni wayi wonɛnɔy woŋ yamari ba fuŋa kɛnama. Timo tima nde, hali na adeŋitoko na wundɛ e thɛnkɔ nama thaŋ iŋ ŋathaki nama ŋaŋ loŋo yɔlɔnkɔiŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ muŋ thenki, e wundɛ thiyo ka wula ka iŋ wayi wonɛnɔy woŋ.
Huna thonthiŋine niŋ Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ keŋ nda?” Huna dome wundɛ, na “Keŋ niŋ kuna dɔma Sɛthɛ,” baa wundɛ kɔŋ iŋ mbayiŋ bibɔyɛ bihɛna.
Mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ theteke Yisɔs na ba wundɛ be tha bindɛ yɛli ka tha ka tha kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ mankande kɛ.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina kɔsɛŋ bitɔlɔy bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ thɛri ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ. Kɛna theteke mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ Yisɔs na ba ndɛ bindɛ dunkune hɛɛra ba ka thɔɔ ka kɔsɛŋ beŋ. Yisɔs yɛrɔkɔy.
Mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ fuŋ ka hati lamgba woŋ. Bindɛ key thɔɔ ka kɔsɛŋ beŋ. Kɔsɛŋ beŋ thare fooma. Bindɛ key yɛlɔkɔ ka kudunku ku ka mankɔ maŋ koŋ, kɛna tuukuwe bindɛ fooma.
Naa kute batɔliŋ kɔsɛŋ beŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ, bindɛ key kaŋ thara e kaa kaŋ pankitinuwande bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ka mɛti ka iŋ ka dumgbuiŋ baŋ fooma.

Biya bibɔyɛ key ba ka kuta ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ. Naa see bindɛ pɛnki Yisɔs na, iŋ hati lamgba wo kanthe wundɛ mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ woŋ doŋe ka ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs wo thɔɔyɛ nda munki nama, wo kele nda nagberere, bindɛ fooma thooyo payɔ.
Biya bi kutiyɔkɔy beŋ tepe biya bihɛna nɔŋ na puyo hati lamgba woŋ baŋ wo boho nde iŋ mbayiŋ beŋ woŋ.
Bindɛ fooma thooyo payɔ. Huna biyɛ biya beŋ fooma ŋaye ka bompi wobɛina ka tepe Yisɔs na ba wundɛ kɛndɛ fuŋa. Huna thooye Yisɔs ka gbe e wundɛ fuŋa kɛndɛ.
Kɛrɛ saanuŋ Yisɔs ba fuŋa, hati lamgba wo kanthe ndɛ mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ woŋ theteke Yisɔs na ba diŋo ka kaa. Kɛrɛ Yisɔs duutu niŋ e tepe niŋ,
na “Kaa ka madoŋe makɛnda e yi ka tepe biya beŋ fooma ba niyiyɛ yina Masaala baŋ.” Hati lamgba woŋ duu kaŋ tɛpuwa ka mɛtiŋ baŋ fooma ba niyiyɛ niŋ Yisɔs baŋ.
Naa duu Yisɔs ka thuhaŋ ka, biya beŋ yɛritɔy niŋ wumandiŋ, baa bi nde nda niŋ yumbu.
Kɛna see wɔ wunthe wo dɔma na Yairɔsi, wo nde bakɛrɛŋ wo ka banka bathuŋuyande ba ka biYusu beŋ baŋ, e ŋɔta ka ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs ŋaŋ e theteke niŋ ba ndɛ be key ka banka nama ka.
Hati nama woyɛrɛmɛ wo bɛrɛ ba thanina kɔhi iŋ thaye, wo thankɛ niŋ nape, wundɛ ŋoyeŋ ba tuka. Naa Yisɔs key, biya beŋ pɛnkande niŋ kufɛŋ ndo kufɛŋ, e bindɛ niŋ kɔ nɔthita.
Ka mateete makɛnamɛŋ wɔ yɛrɛmɛ wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ wo nde iŋ nthoonaŋ ki ka yɛrɛmɛŋ ba thanina kɔhi iŋ thaye. Wɔ ka wo punkɛ ba niŋ puya.
Kɛna see wundɛ kaŋ funkande biya beŋ. Wundɛ kɔɔyɛ mahɛŋ ma Yisɔs e wundɛ boheke kulɛmpi-lɛmpi ku ka yaba nama baŋ koŋ. Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina wasi baŋ pɛyi niŋ fuŋa haŋ.
Huna thonthiŋine Yisɔs, na “Nkaana boheke yaba niŋ baŋ?” Wɔ yo wɔ thanthiye, huna tepe Pita, na “Karimɔkɔ, biya beŋ fooma yina pɛnkande e bindɛ yina kɔ nɔthita.”
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe, na “Wɔ boheke yama, baa yaŋ kutɔkɔy wuŋ naa fuŋ yama sɛmbɛ.”

Naa kute hati yɛrɛmɛ woŋ ba dɔma na ndɛ kothiyo, wundɛ see kaŋ thɛna e si ŋɔta ka ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs. Kɛna gbonkoy wundɛ ka kupɛnkintiyande ku ka biya fooma mu dɔmɛ haaŋ wundɛ boheke Yisɔs na, iŋ nɔŋ na pethiye wundɛ kɔɔ hanthe.
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Hatiŋ woŋ, lanɛya bakɛnda petheŋ yina; kaa iŋ mathɛbɛ.”
Saanuŋ wundɛ ba thanka gbonkiya, baseri tɛŋ ŋaye ka banka ba ka bayaha woŋ baŋ, ba dɔma, na “Hati nda woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ tuku; ba nda ni karimɔkɔ na thɔrɔ.”
Kɛrɛ naa yuye huŋ Yisɔs, wundɛ tepe Yairɔsi na, na “Ba payɔ; niya nthuŋ lanɛya, awa hati nda woŋ kɔŋ pethɔ.”
Naa biyande Yisɔs ka banka ba ka Yairɔsi baŋ, wundɛ tha mɛyi ba wɔ yo wɔ wohɛna biyande iŋ wundɛ, yɔkɔŋ Pita, Yɔni, Yemisi, iŋ fanda ka hati woŋ mɛnɛ nanda ka hati woŋ.
Wɔ yo wɔ abereŋ, aboki ba hati woŋ, huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Baŋ bereŋ, hati woŋ tuketa; nine huna hɔkɔŋ wundɛ nine!”
Biya beŋ fooma ahɛthi Yisɔs na, baa bindɛ fooma kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na hati woŋ tuku hɛ nda wuthɔɔkitɛ.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs bohe niŋ kugbeke; wundɛ yentheŋeŋ niŋ, e thiya niŋ wuŋatɛ, na “Hatiŋ woŋ, ŋayi ka kɔɔ!”
Kɛna duu yina wokɛnama woŋ e hɛma, e ŋayi ka kɔɔ kɔɔ hanthe. Yisɔs tepe bindɛ ba bindɛ niŋ dunkune muthɔma.
Komisɛŋ beŋ ni kukabanɛ, kɛrɛ Yisɔs yeli bindɛ ba bi be tha huŋ tepe wɔ ba bɛyiniŋ ba niyɔy baŋ.
Kɛna thiyi Yisɔs bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ ka tha banthe e dunkune bindɛ sɛmbɛ iŋ mayoho ba kantha mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ fooma iŋ ba puya nthoonani kihakuwande.
Kɛna ŋindi wundɛ bindɛ ba kaa kaŋ niya kɛwandi Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ iŋ ba puya bithoonuwɔy beŋ.
Huna tepe wundɛ bindɛ, na “Naa beŋ key biyasi haŋ haŋ na, baŋ diŋ ntha yo ntha ka kaa; baŋ diŋ kugbɔkɔdi maa pontho, muthɔma maa kɔbiri, maa yabɛŋ baye.
Ka beŋ yeroko kɛ, niyɔŋ ka banka babɛina haaŋ e beŋ nɔŋ pɛyɛna mɛti babɛina.
Kamo kama ka sa beŋ yeroko, fuŋaŋ ka mɛti babɛina e beŋ konka kuligbi koŋ ka ŋathaki ŋakendeŋ ŋaŋ haliko wu be niyɔ kuyeli ka biya bibɛina ba dɔma na bindɛ tha yɛrɔkɔ huseri haŋ.”
Naa thanki wundɛ bindɛ yela, bakarandeni beŋ fuŋ. Bindɛ key kaŋ kaande ka mɛtiŋ bamɛɛsuwɛ baŋ e kaa kaŋ niya Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ kɛwandi e kaa kaŋ puya biya kamo kama ka bindɛ kaaye.

Naa yuye Hɛrɔdi, bakɛrɛŋ wo nde ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili koŋ, bɛyiniŋ ba niyɔy baŋ, wundɛ see thooyo yaayi bamandiŋ, baa hiŋ biya binɔndi bi si tɛpi ba dɔma na Yɔni wo nde biye biye hu ka Masaala haŋ woŋ na ŋaye hɛlɛŋ ka tuka haŋ.
Binɔndi bi kɔŋ nɛnɛ tɛpi na Ilaiya banabi woŋ na tɔŋinɔkɔy hɛlɛŋ. Kɛrɛ binɔndi nɛnɛ na wunthe ka banabiŋ bi nde wutiyɔ beŋ na ŋaye hɛlɛŋ ka tuka haŋ.
Huna tepe Hɛrɔdi, na “Yaŋ ni nde ba yaha hu ka Yɔni haŋ thoŋo, kɛrɛ mbɛ hɛlɛŋ wɔ bɛina woŋ, wo yaŋ yuyɛ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ woŋ?” Hɛrɔdi bohe thuŋ deethuwa gboŋɛŋ ba wundɛ kute Yisɔs na.
Naa duu bakarandeni beŋ, bindɛ see toŋe Yisɔs na kuna ba thanki bindɛ ka niya. Kɛna sekithe wundɛ bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ e kaa iŋ bindɛ kufɛŋ ku ka mɛti ba dɔma na Bɛthɛseda.
Naa see huŋ biya beŋ kɔthɔ, bindɛ yeme niŋ kɛndɛ. Wundɛ yɛrɔkɔy bindɛ e bindɛ gbonkitiyande ba Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ e wundɛ puya bithoonuwɔy beŋ.

Naa bohe kaŋ woŋ ba thɔɔ, bakarandeni nama bikɔhi iŋ biye beŋ see niŋ tepe, na “Pɛyɛna nda biya beŋ bi be key ka mɛtiŋ batɔpɛ baŋ iŋ ka dumgbuiŋ baŋ ba ka deethuwa yikiyani iŋ muthɔma, baa dutha duyɔthiŋɔy duna miŋ do.”

Kɛrɛ huna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ, na “Awa beŋ dunkune bindɛ muthɔma.” Huna tepe bakarandeni beŋ, na “Miŋ ka iŋ wuyamɛ ŋatoŋ ŋasɔhi iŋ heni biye. E yi thimoŋ ba miŋ be key, e miŋ ka boya muthɔma ba biya beŋ beŋ fooma?”
Ba biyɛthɛŋ bi kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ bɛrɛ ba wuluiŋ bisɔhi. Huna tepe wundɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Niyaŋ ba biya beŋ dɔŋɔ kikɔŋ-kikɔŋ, kiki yo kiki biya kɔnthɔ-kasɔhi.”
Bakarandeni beŋ ni nɛŋ e niya ba biya beŋ fooma dɔŋɔ.
Kɛna sekithe Yisɔs ŋatoŋ ŋasɔhi ŋaŋ iŋ heni biye beŋ e ŋatina thaaya ka ariana e muŋ thiyiyɛ thaduba, e muŋ thinkinuwande e dunkuna muŋ ka bakarandeni beŋ ba bindɛ be kiyɛ biya beŋ.
Kɛna thɔŋ biya beŋ haaŋ bindɛ thimbɔ. Bakarandeni beŋ thunkunuwande mupɛyɛ muŋ, bɛrɛ ba thadebe kɔhi iŋ thaye thɛna pɛyɛ.
Ka lɔkɔ banthe naa nde Yisɔs ni kuraminɛ ndɛ wuntheŋ, e bakarandeni nama beŋ niŋ pɛnkande, wundɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Mbɛ wo biya beŋ dɔŋ wo yaŋ?”
Huna tepe bindɛ, na “Binɔndi bi kɔŋ dɔŋ na yina Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ, kɛrɛ binɔndi na Ilaiya, binɔndi na wunthe ka banabiŋ bitiyɔ beŋ na ŋaye ka tuka haŋ.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Kɛrɛ mbu beŋ, nama dome beŋ ba yaŋ?” Pita tepe, na “Yina Banikisi woŋ wo ni nde Masaala lahiri woŋ.”
Kɛna yeli Yisɔs bindɛ wukahɛ-kahɛ, ba bi be tha huŋ tepe wɔ yo wɔ.

Wundɛ tepe hɛlɛŋ bindɛ, na “Yɔkɔŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ niyɔy thɔrɔ wumandiŋ, e wundɛ thanthiyo iŋ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ, bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ iŋ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ. Wundɛ kɔŋ kɔra, kɛrɛ ka gbɛɛŋ bataati baŋ wundɛ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ ŋayi iŋ sii.”
Huna tepe wundɛ bindɛ fooma, na “Mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ thimoŋ ba yama yema, yɔkɔŋ wundɛ be thanthiye yɛthɛ nama, e wundɛ yinthɔkɔ kuyeŋ nama kubariŋande ku ka nambara baŋ koŋ timo tima, e yema yama.
Ba wɔ yo wɔ wo thimo ba niya sii nama baŋ kisi, wundɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ piriŋiŋ; kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo piriŋiŋ sii nama baŋ ba saathɛ ba kiyaŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ ni kisi.
Mɛnɛ wɔmɛti kute munkɔŋ mu ka faido fooma, kɛrɛ wundɛ piriŋina sii nama baŋ, mbɛ munahaŋ ba kute wundɛ? Hali, wundɛ tha kutu munahaŋ ndo munahaŋ!

Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ niyɔy yama kuyaahu iŋ mathanani makiyaŋ maŋ, Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ niŋ niyɔ kuyaahu ti nɔŋ wundɛ see ka yiki nama baŋ iŋ ba ka Fandama woŋ baŋ iŋ ba ka malekɛŋ bi ka Masaala beŋ baŋ.
Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nagberekethe ba dɔma na binɔndi bi kooyeŋ dondo bi sa tuku, yɔkɔŋ na bindɛ kutiyɔkɔy Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.”
Bɛrɛ ba hura kasɔŋ-kaye naa thanki Yisɔs gbonkiya bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, wundɛ thiyi Pita na, Yɔni, iŋ Yemisi. Bindɛ key dunkɔ ka kusɛri koŋ ka thinthi ba niya kuraminɛ.
Naa wundɛ ni kuraminɛ, yethi nama haŋ see thikipi, awa muthɔɔ nama muŋ huhu napooŋ e muŋ kɔ maleke.
Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina biya biye see niŋ kɔɔ ka gbonkitiyande, wunthe kɔŋ dɔma na Musa, wunthe woŋ na Ilaiya.
Bindɛ see niŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ iŋ yiki ba ka ariana baŋ, e kɔ gbonkiya iŋ Yisɔs ba gboŋa ba bohe Yisɔs ba si thiŋine lahiri ba ka Masaala baŋ, ba si tuka ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
Pita iŋ bintɔni nama thanki thɔɔ ka mandɛ, kɛrɛ naa thɔhɔy bindɛ, bindɛ kute yiki ba ka Yisɔs baŋ iŋ biya bibiye bi kɔɔyɛ iŋ wundɛ beŋ.

Naa bohe biya beŋ ba pɛyɛna Yisɔs na, Pita tepe, na “Karimɔkɔ, ayɔhɔ ba miŋ niyɔ nda dondo. E miŋ kiyɛŋ bankɛŋ bataati bathikɛŋ, banthe ba yi, banthe ba Musa, banthe ba Ilaiya?” Kɛrɛ Pita methota nde ba wundɛ dunkunɔkɔy.
Naa wundɛ gbonkoy, kɛna see wuruma, awa e bindɛ pututiyo iŋ niŋ hubɛina. Bakarandeni beŋ thooyo payɔ naa see bindɛ pututiyo iŋ wuruma haŋ.
Kɛna fuŋ thampa maŋaye ka wuruma haŋ tha tɛpɛ ba dɔma, na “Woŋ baŋ wundɛ na Hati wokiyaŋ woŋ, wo thanki yaŋ yɛtha woŋ, huna poniyaŋ niŋ kuiha.”

Naa thanki thampa thaŋ gbonkiya, bindɛ tha nda kutu wɔ yo wɔ wohɛna yɔkɔŋ Yisɔs. Bakarandeni bitaati beŋ danɔkɔi nayeŋ ba bɛyiniŋ ba thanki bindɛ kuta baŋ, awa bindɛ tha bɛŋ tɛpi ka wɔ yo wɔ ka lɔkɔ babɛina.
Ka gbɛɛŋ babantheŋ baŋ Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni bitaati beŋ thuhe ŋaye ka kusɛri koŋ, kɛna see bindɛ pɛnki sɛthɛ bamandiŋ iŋ bakarandeni bi pɛyɛ hɛ beŋ. Biya beŋ beŋ fooma penke Yisɔs na.
Ŋaye mateete ka sɛthɛ baŋ hati lamgba wunthe tepe, na “Karimɔkɔ, yaŋ theteke yina, detha hatiŋ wowathe wo thankɛ yama woŋ nape.
Wayi wonɛnɔy na niŋ kɔ bohi. Wundɛ kɔŋ bereŋ wutɔɔkɛ. Wayi wonɛnɔy woŋ kɔŋ niŋ kahitinuwande e kuhɛ niŋ kɔ fuŋa ka hothi. Wundɛ kɔŋ niŋ ni wuthoonɛ haaŋ wundɛ sa niŋ pɛyɛŋ yako.
Yaŋ theteke bakarandeni nda beŋ ba yama niŋ kaninande iŋ wayi wonɛnɔy woŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha punku.”

Kɛna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Beŋ, bendo biya bi ka iŋ kulanɛya beŋ, tima thɔkɔti nɔŋ yaŋ iŋ beŋ? Tima nambe nda wuŋ ti thɔkɔti nda yaŋ bena kɔ niya muyuŋ?” Kɛna tepe Yisɔs hati lamgba woŋ, na “Sisa hɛ hati nda woŋ dondo.”

Naa hati woŋ see, wayi woŋ bohe hɛlɛŋ niŋ. Wundɛ toŋe niŋ ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ, e wundɛ ka thutha kuhɛ. Kɛna ni Yisɔs wayi wonɛnɔy woŋ yamari ba pɛyɛna hati woŋ; kɛna pɛyɛŋ wayi woŋ hati woŋ. Hati woŋ pethɔy. Yisɔs sekithe hati woŋ; wundɛ dunkuŋ niŋ ka fandama.
Biya beŋ fooma ni kukabanɛ ba wali basɛmbɛ ba ka Masaala baŋ. Naa biya beŋ ni thakaba ba bɛyiniŋ ba thanki Yisɔs niya baŋ, wundɛ tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ,
na “Thampɛŋ thaŋ thaŋ tha thɔɔiŋ wusunŋɔy ka thathukuma thakendeŋ thaŋ, ba dɔma na Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ dunkuna ka thɛnkɔ tha ka biyamɛti.”

Kɛrɛ bɛyiniŋ ba gbonkoy Yisɔs baŋ baŋ tha bindɛ methe, babiyɛ bɛyiniŋ bɛna ba nununɔi ŋaye kɛnamɛŋ, ba dɔma na bindɛ sa bɛŋ metho, awa bindɛ hɛlɛŋ bi nde payɔ ba thɔnthiŋina Yisɔs na ba bɛyiniŋ ba thanki wundɛ gbonkiya baŋ.
Kugbakali see thɔɔ mateete makɛnamɛŋ ba wo yamɛ niyɔ womandiŋ.
Kɛrɛ naa see Yisɔs kɔthɔ hu siyuwe bindɛ ka thathukuma thakɛnamɛŋ thaŋ, wundɛ sekithe hati woyete, e wundɛ niŋ kiteke,

e tɛpa kɛnamɛŋ, na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo yɛrɔkɔy hati woŋ baŋ ka keŋ kukiyaŋ koŋ, wundɛ yɛrɔkɔy yama. Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo yɛrɔkɔy yama, wundɛ yɛrɔkɔy wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ. Mba wo yamɛ thahuwɔ woŋ ka mateete makendeŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma, wundɛ na yamɛ nthɔŋ nda ba beŋ fooma.”
Yɔni tepe, na “Karimɔkɔ, miŋ kute wɔ si kanthi mbayiŋ binɛnɔy ka keŋ kukɛnda koŋ, awa miŋ pinde niŋ, baa wundɛ ka wunthe ka mindo bakarandeni nda beŋ.”
Yisɔs tepe, na “Baŋ niŋ pindi, baa wɔ wo tha kɔɔ ba bena sɔkinɔkɔ, wundɛ kɔŋ ba beŋ.”
Naa kunthu malɔkɔ ma wundɛ ba ŋate ka thinthi maŋ, wundɛ sekithe gboŋa toloŋ ba kaa ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
Wundɛ kɔɔtɔŋ baseriŋ ka mɛti banthe bayete ba ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Sameriya ba ka tepe biya beŋ ba kɔsiniyɔkɔ niŋ yikiya.
Kɛrɛ biya beŋ kɛndɛ tha niŋ yɛrɔkɔ, baa wukothiyo wuna nda nagberekethe ba dɔma na wundɛ kooyeŋ gboŋa ba kaa ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
Naa kute wuŋ bakarandeni beŋ Yemisi iŋ Yɔni, bindɛ tepe, na “Mariki, e yi thimoŋ ba miŋ thiya buu ŋaye ka ariana ba si tɔɔnuwa biya beŋ beŋ?”
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs sikiyɔkɔy; wundɛ pinde bindɛ.
Kɛna ŋaye bindɛ; bindɛ key ka mɛti bahɛna.
Naa bindɛ key, wɔ see tepe Yisɔs na, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ yina yeŋ kamo kama ka yi key.”
Huna tepe niŋ Yisɔs, na “Bayɔbɔini beŋ bi kɔŋ iŋ yikiyani; bɛtiŋ bi keŋɛ beŋ bi kɔŋ iŋ thahooti ka bindɛ hure; kɛrɛ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ ka hintiŋ nthɔŋ iŋ ka wundɛ taaye yaha nama haŋ.”
Kɛna tepe hɛlɛŋ Yisɔs ka wɔ wunthe, na “Yema yama.” Kɛrɛ wundɛ tepe, na “Mariki, yaŋ kaayɛŋ hintiŋ, yaŋ be ka manki fandaŋ na.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Pɛyɛna bitukɛ beŋ bi be manki bitukɛ beŋ. Yi kɔŋ ba kaa e niya kɛwandi ba Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.”
Wɔ hɛna tepe hɛlɛŋ, na “Mariki, yaŋ kɔŋ yina yeŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ kaayɛŋ hintiŋ yaŋ be ka sankaŋ biyaŋ bi ka banka bakiyaŋ baŋ beŋ.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo bohi kusala koŋ ba thɛɛluwa haŋ e wundɛ kɔ detha mahɛŋ, wundɛ sisandeta ba Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.”
Naa daŋande wuŋ, Mariki woŋ Yisɔs yɛthi biya kɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-kaye iŋ biye, e bindɛ kɔɔtina ka biye-biye ka mɛtiŋ baŋ iŋ ka bohe wundɛ ba kaande kɛ fooma.
Kɛna tepe wundɛ bindɛ, na “Ŋɔna haŋ abɔyi, kɛrɛ baŋɔni beŋ boyeta; niyaŋ kuraminɛ ba wobiyɛ yiya haŋ woŋ be ŋindi baŋɔni ka ŋɔna nama haŋ.
Kaaŋ! Dethaŋ, yaŋ ŋindi bena nɔŋ takɛŋ ka mateete ma ka yaŋɛŋ beŋ.
Baŋ diŋ pontho ba thiye kɔbiri, maa pontho, maa dagbalɛŋ. Baŋ kɔɔ wunambɛ ba maanuwa biya ka gboŋa.
Naa beŋ biyande banka, dɔmaŋ, na ‘Haliko Masaala thiya mathɛbɛ ka banka baŋ baŋ.’
Mɛnɛ wɔ kɛndɛ wo kɔsinɔkɔy ba kuta mathɛbɛ, mathɛbɛ makendeŋ maŋ mɛ kɔŋ kɛndɛ pɛyɔ; mɛnɛ wuŋ ka nɛŋ, mɛ kɔŋ duu hɛlɛŋ kendeŋ.
Dɔŋɔŋ kɛndɛ e beŋ kɔ thɔma e beŋ kɔ thiiye ntha yo ntha ki bindɛ bena kɛndɛ dunkune. Bawali woŋ kɔŋ ba kuta kuthunkuŋ ŋaye ka wali ba wundɛ ni baŋ. Baŋ key kaŋ pɛnkande ŋaye ka banka ba kaa ka banka.
Naa beŋ tɛŋ ka mɛti e beŋ kɛndɛ yeroko, thɔmaŋ ntha yo ntha ki beŋ dunkuno.
Puyaŋ kɛndɛ biya bithoonuwɔy beŋ e beŋ bindɛ tepe, na ‘Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ thuriye bena.’
Kɛrɛ mɛti yo mɛti ba beŋ key beŋ thana yeroko, fuŋaŋ ka gboŋɛŋ babukuyuwɛ baŋ e beŋ bindɛ tepe,

na, ‘Kuligbi ku ka mɛti bakendeŋ baŋ, ku kahitɛ ka dagbalɛŋ ntuŋ baŋ koŋ, miŋ kɔŋ kuŋ konki ba ku be niyɔ maseri ba bena sɔkinɔkɔ. Kɛrɛ simɔkɔŋ nde, Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ thanki thuriye bena narɔthɔ.’ ”
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, na ka malɔkɔ ma ka kɔnsɔŋ koŋ maŋ, Masaala kɔŋ kutiyɛ nkinikiniŋ mɛti ba ka Sɔdɔmi ayaŋ ba mɛti baŋ baŋ!

“Nambara ka kuwaŋ kukendeŋ, bendo biKoresiŋ iŋ biBɛthɛseda, baa mɛnɛ wali bathakaba ba niyo kendeŋ do baŋ na bɛna niyo nde ka Taya iŋ ka Saidɔŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ thɔɔyɛ nde nɔŋ nda yabɛŋ babɛkɔŋ e puyinɔkɔ hɔɔtɔ ba tɔŋina ba dɔma na bindɛ kutɔkɔy mathonko e sikiyɔkɔ ŋaye ka banɛnɔy bakɛnamɛŋ baŋ.
Ka malɔkɔ ma ka kɔnsɔŋ koŋ maŋ, Masaala kɔŋ kutiyɛ biTaya iŋ biSaidɔŋ nkinikiniŋ wuŋ yama ba beŋ.
Awa beŋ, bendo biKapaniyɔmi, e beŋ kɔŋ ba yenthiŋina yɛthɛ bakendeŋ ka thinthi ka ariana? Beŋ kɔŋ thathina ka pothi ka yahanama!”
Yisɔs tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo bena yɛrɔkɔ, wundɛ yɛrɔkɔy yama; awa wɔ yo wɔ nɛnɛ wo bena baŋaŋ, yama baŋaŋ wundɛ. Wɔ yo wɔ nɛnɛ wo yama baŋaŋ, wundɛ baŋaŋ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ.”
Bakarandeni kɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-kaye beŋ iŋ biye duu ŋaye biyasi haŋ iŋ thathukuma thayɔhɔy. Bindɛ tepe, na “Mariki, naa key miŋ, ŋaye ka keŋ kukɛnda koŋ, hali mbayiŋ beŋ gbeeŋ aputiyɔ mina.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Hiŋ yando nde dethi, yaŋ kute naa ŋɔti Sithani nɔŋ kuwalani ŋaye ka ariana.
Dethaŋ, yaŋ dunkune bena sɛmbɛ ka thinthi ka Hadeŋ woŋ, iŋ ba yaathuwa bikɛkɛni iŋ dempuiŋ fooma, awa ntha yo ntha sa bena punku niya muthoonɛ.
Kɛrɛ halisa, baŋ hɔkɔŋ yehitɔkɔ ba wuŋ nagbɛti, ba dɔma na mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ putiyɔy bena. Kɛrɛ yehitɔkɔŋ ba kɔthɔ ba dɔma na ŋakeŋ ŋakendeŋ ŋaŋ gbalo ka ariana.”

Ka wakathi wobɛina gbeeŋ, Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ thiŋiŋ Yisɔs na iŋ mayehitɔkɔ, e Yisɔs tɛpa, na “Yaŋ thiyi yina maamo Fandaŋ woŋ, Mariki wo ka ariana woŋ, iŋ ka faido, ba dɔma na yi nunuŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ka bikele beŋ, iŋ bikɔthɛ beŋ, kɛrɛ e yi bɛŋ toŋine malɛɛthɛŋ. Fandaŋ woŋ, yi ni bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma nɔŋ na thimo yi bɛŋ ba bɛŋ niyɔ.”

Yisɔs tepe biya beŋ, na “Fandaŋ woŋ thanki yama dunkune ntha yo ntha. Wɔ yo wɔ ka wo kɔthɛ nɔŋ na Hati woŋ, yɔkɔŋ nthɔŋ Fandaŋ woŋ; maa wo kɔthɛ Fandaŋ woŋ yɔkɔŋ nthɔŋ Hati woŋ mɛnɛ wo Hati woŋ yɛthi ba niŋ toŋine Fandama woŋ.”
Huna sikiyeke wundɛ ka bakarandeni beŋ naa pɛyɛ bindɛ bindɛ bintheŋ, e tɛpa, na “Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ba biya bi kutɛ bɛyiniŋ ba thanki beŋ kuta baŋ.

Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, banabiŋ bibɔyɛ iŋ gbakuiŋ bibɔyɛ bi thimoŋ nde nɔŋ ba kuta bɛyiniŋ ba beŋ kutu baŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha bɛŋ punku kuta; awa bi thimoŋ nde nɔŋ ba yuyɛ ba beŋ yuyɛ baŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha bɛŋ punku yuyɛ.”
Karimɔkɔ wunthe wo ka Siraŋ baŋ woŋ see ba saa ka gbɛriŋina Yisɔs na, e tɛpa, na “Karimɔkɔ, mbɛ ba yaŋ ni gbeeŋ ba kuta sii ba kɔy yo kɔy?”
Huna thonthiŋine niŋ Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ ba gbalo ka Siraŋ baŋ? Mbɛ ba ni yi kɛndɛ karaŋ?”

Karimɔkɔ woŋ tepe, na “Yi kɔŋ ba thimo Mariki woŋ Masaala wokɛnda woŋ iŋ thukuma hukɛnda haŋ fooma, iŋ sii bakɛnda baŋ fooma, iŋ sɛmbɛ bakɛnda baŋ fooma, iŋ masiyi makɛnda maŋ fooma; awa yi kɔŋ ba thimo ntɔ nda na nɔŋ na thimo yi yɛthɛ bakɛnda.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yi gbonkoy wuyɔhɔy. Niya nɔŋ na gbonkiye yi na, awa yi kɔŋ kutu sii ba kɔi o kɔi.”
Kɛrɛ karimɔkɔ woŋ thimoŋ ba kanɔkɔ kuyaahu, huna thonthiŋine wundɛ Yisɔs na, na “Nkaana ntɔŋ?”

Huna tepe Yisɔs mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ, na “Wɔ wunthe kɔŋ nde thathi ŋaye ka Yɛrusalɛmi ba kaa ka Yɛriko. Kɛna see wundɛ ŋooto iŋ batuwani ka gboŋa. Bindɛ kanite niŋ ntha yo ntha ki iŋ wundɛ; bindɛ gbuduŋe niŋ haaŋ; bindɛ niŋ pɛya ŋoye wo ba tuka.
Wuŋ see pɛnkande bafode wunthe kɔ fuŋe gboŋa babɛina. Naa kute wundɛ niŋ wundɛ ŋoye, wundɛ gbɔrɔŋ gboŋa bahɛna.
Nɛna ni hɛlɛŋ wɔ wunthe wo ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Libay baŋ ba nde iŋ wali ba ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ. Naa kute wundɛ hati lamgba woŋ ŋoye, wundɛ gbɔrɔŋ hɛlɛŋ gboŋa bahɛna.
Kɛrɛ hati lamgba wothahinɛ napooŋ woSameriya wo ka kubiyasi nama, naa see wundɛ tɛŋ ka ŋoye hati lamgba woŋ baŋ kɛ e niŋ kuta, nkinikiniŋ bohe niŋ.

Kɛna thuriye wundɛ niŋ. Wundɛ thiye mayɔ mɛnɛ mampa nɔŋ tɛɛni ka mathimɔyŋ maŋ. Wundɛ yuuku mɛŋ wuyɔhɔy e niŋ sɛkitha e tuta niŋ ka maama wo niŋ katitɔkɔ woŋ, e niŋ ka niya yikiya, e niŋ dethiteke wuyɔhɔy.

Naa puthɔy kaŋ woŋ, wundɛ fuŋuŋ kɔbiri wonɔndi, e wundɛ dunkune wo niyɛ niŋ yikiya woŋ e tɛpa, na ‘Ya niŋ; dethiteke niŋ wuyɔhɔy. Timo tima ti yi thiyi ba wundɛ, naa yaŋ see, yaŋ kɔŋ yina si thunkuŋ.’ ”
Huna thonthiŋine Yisɔs karimɔkɔ woŋ, na “Ka biya bitaati beŋ beŋ, nkaana yi simɔkɔ wo tɔŋinɛ huntɔndiya huyɔhɔy ka hati lamgba wo ŋɔtɛ ka mateete ma ka batuwani beŋ maŋ woŋ?”
Huna tepe wundɛ, na “Wo kutiyɛ niŋ nkinikiniŋ woŋ na.” Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Awa, kaa, e yi nɛŋ ka niya.”
Naa Yisɔs iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ key kubiyasi namɛŋ koŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy, wundɛ key tɛŋ ka mɛti banthe. Wɔ yɛrɛmɛ wo dɔma na Matha yɛrɔkɔy niŋ ka banka nama baŋ.
Awa Matha kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ iŋ wɛndama woyɛrɛmɛ wunthe wo dɔma na Mariyama wo dɔŋɔy ka pothi ka Yisɔs, e kɔ poniyɛ mathanani nama maŋ kuiha.
Kɛrɛ na thanki Matha kaho wali baŋ, wundɛ key tepe Yisɔs na, na “Mariki, e yi wuŋ ka yina bɛyi ba yama wɛndaŋ peyene wali baŋ yaŋ wuntheŋ? Tepe niŋ ba yama mase.”
Kɛrɛ Mariki woŋ tepe niŋ, na “Matha, Matha, yi ni yaagba haaŋ e bɛyiniŋ babɔyɛ yina kɔ niya thɔrɔ ka thukuma.
Kɛrɛ bɛyi banthe bɛna bakolo baŋ; Mariyama thanki yɛtha kufɛŋ kukolo koŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma, ku sa wundɛ punku ba kanito iŋ wɔ yo wɔ koŋ.”

Lɔkɔ banthe, Yisɔs kɔŋ nde ni kuraminɛ ka tha banthe. Naa thanki wundɛ niya kuraminɛ, wunthe ka bakarandeni nama beŋ tepe kɛnama, na “Mariki, thaninuwa mina na na niye kuraminɛ nɔŋ na thanani Yɔni bakarandeni nama beŋ na.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Naa beŋ kɔ ni kuraminɛ, tɛpaŋ, na ‘Fanda ntuŋ woŋ, haliko biya niya yiki keŋ nda koŋ. Haliko malɔkɔ ma saa ma Hugbakine nda haŋ maŋ keriŋe.
Nkaa mina timo tima muthɔŋ ntuŋ.
Pɛniyɛ mina hakɛŋ bikɛntuŋ baa miŋ pɛniyɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo mina ni wunɛnɔy. Ba mina kati ka miŋ ka gbɛriŋinuwo.’ ”
Kɛna tepe Yisɔs ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Mbu na wuŋ niyɔy na wunthe ka beŋ key ka banka ba ka nyathiki nama huyɛ teete, e niŋ ka tepe, na ‘Nyathiki, mase yama ba muthɔma.
Ntɔŋ wo key biyasi na pɛnkɛ yama huyɛ baŋ baŋ ka banka niŋ ka, awa yaŋ ka iŋ muthɔma kɛndɛ’?
Nyathiki nda mɛyi kaake ba dɔma, na ‘Ba yama ni thɔrɔ. Yaŋ lɔŋ nda biyo haŋ, awa yaŋ ŋɔyɛ nda iŋ mpatiŋ. Yaŋ sa nda punku ŋayi ba yina dunkune ntha o ntha.’

Mbɛ mu nda niyɔ? Hali na niyɔy wuŋ na na wundɛ tha ŋayi e yina dunkune muthɔma mu yawe yi muŋ na na wundɛ nyathiki nda, kɛrɛ saathɛ ba kunapi kukɛnda koŋ, yɔkɔŋ nthɔŋ wundɛ be ŋayi e yina dunkune mu thimo yi muŋ.
Huna yaŋ tepe bena: Thɔnthiŋinaŋ; beŋ kɔŋ dunkuno. Deethuwaŋ; beŋ koŋ kutu. Gbɛdiŋaŋ; awa beŋ kɔŋ pɛthiya iŋ Masaala.
Baa wɔ yo wɔ wo thɔnthɔŋɔŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ dunkuno ntha; wɔ yo wɔ wo deethi, wundɛ kɔŋ kutu; wɔ yo wɔ wo gbɛdɛŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ pɛthiya.
Mbɛ komisa wobɛina ka mateete makendeŋ wo, mɛnɛ hati nda thɔnthɔŋɔŋ yina ba he, saanuŋ yi ba niŋ dunkune he, adunkune niŋ wokɛkɛŋ?
Maa mɛnɛ wundɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba heeli, e yi kɔŋ niŋ dunkune thokoŋa?
Mɛnɛ beŋ, bendo nɛnɔy beŋ beŋ, thɔyiŋ ba dunkuna munki muyɔhɔy ka mpati bikendeŋ, mbu ntiŋ nda Fanda ndeŋ woŋ ka ariana? E wundɛ sa dunkuŋ Yina Wokɛnama woŋ ka bi niŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ beŋ?”
Lɔkɔ banthe Yisɔs kanthe wayi wo thiyɛ hati lamgba wunthe hubobo. Naa fuŋ wayi woŋ, babobo woŋ dunkunɔkɔy, awa biya beŋ ni kukabanɛ wumandiŋ.
Kɛrɛ binɔndi tepe, na “Wundɛ kɔŋ kanthe mbayiŋ binɛnɔy beŋ ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Beelesibuli, gbaku wo ka mbayiŋ beŋ woŋ.”
Binɔndi niŋ kɔ yɔla ba gbɛriŋinuwa ka thɔnthiŋina niŋ ba wundɛ be ni bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na Masaala na ŋindɛ niŋ.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs, naa kɔthɛ wundɛ masimɔkɔ makɛnamɛŋ maŋ, wundɛ tepe, na “Mɛnɛ hugbakine hakande e huŋ kɔ dekiyande, hu kɔŋ teetuwɔ; awa mɛnɛ mpoo hakande e kɔŋ kɔ dekiyande, ki kɔŋ teetuwɔ.
Beŋ tepe na yando kanthe mbayiŋ ka sɛmbɛ ba ka gbaku wo ka mbayiŋ beŋ woŋ. Kɛrɛ yaŋ be hɛ bena thɔnthɔŋɔŋ, mɛnɛ biya bi ka hugbakine hu ka Sithani haŋ hakande e bindɛ ka dekiyande, nama huŋ kooye?
Mɛnɛ yaŋ kɔŋ kanthe mbayiŋ ka sɛmbɛ ba ka gbaku wo ka mbayiŋ beŋ baŋ, mbu mbɛ sɛmbɛ ba bakarandeni bikendeŋ beŋ kanthe mbayiŋ? Bakarandeni bikendeŋ beŋ gbeeŋ, bindɛ bina bena kɔnsɔŋɔŋ.
Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wu kɔŋ nɛnɛ ba dɔma na ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Masaala baŋ na yaŋ wuŋ niye, wuŋ tɔŋɔŋ nagberekethe ba dɔma na Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ thuriye bena.
“Mɛnɛ wɔ kahɛ wo iŋ mudekiye mukɛnama kɔɔyɛ e kɔ pama banka bakɛnama baŋ, munki mukɛnama muŋ mu kɔŋ mupankɔy bɛyi.
Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wɔ yamɛ kahuwa ba wundɛ see niŋ ŋote e niŋ punka, wundɛ kɔŋ kanati niŋ mudekiye nama muŋ mu dekinteke wundɛ muŋ. Wundɛ kɔŋ sɛkɛthi munki mu tuwe wundɛ muŋ e hanuwa muŋ bi yemɛ niŋ beŋ.
“Wɔ yo wɔ wo ka ba yaŋ, wundɛ kooyeŋ ba yama dekiya yaathi. Wɔ yo wɔ wo sa yama mase kɔminande haŋ, yaathi pankitinuwande huna wundɛ pankitinuwande.
“Naa wayi wonɛnɔy fuŋ ka wɔmɛti, wundɛ kɔŋ key kaŋ tharɔkɔ ka wulani ka ba kaa kaŋ deethuwa mahemuwe. Mɛnɛ wundɛ tha kutu, wundɛ kɔŋ tɛpi, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ duu ka banka ba ka ŋaye nde yaŋ ka baŋ.’
Mɛnɛ wundɛ see, wundɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ pɛnki bapithinuwɔy natharaŋ, bakosinoko wuyɔhɔy.

Wundɛ kɔŋ fuŋ, e wundɛ ka diŋa mbayiŋ bisɔŋ-biye bihɛna bi yamɛ nɛnɔ ba wundɛ. Bindɛ fooma bi kɔŋ si biyande, e bindɛ kɛndɛ dɔŋɔ, awa makooye ma ka wɔ bɛina mɛ kɔŋ nda si yaŋ nɛnɔ daŋande na nde wundɛ mayoŋ na.”
Naa thanki nthɔŋ wundɛ huŋ gbonkiya, wɔ yɛrɛmɛ yele thampa mateete ka sɛthɛ baŋ e tepe niŋ, na “Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka wɔ yɛrɛmɛ wo mpɛɛ yina woŋ e bɔpina yina!”
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe, na “Mayehitɔkɔ ma yameŋ niyɔ ka biya bi yuyɛ thampɛŋ tha ka Masaala thaŋ beŋ e bindɛ thɛŋ bɔha.”

Naa yame sɛthɛ baŋ kɔ ndintɔ, Yisɔs tepe, na “Biya bi ka yamana bahɛ baŋ beŋ anɛnɔ; bi kɔŋ deethi bɛyi bathakaba ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na Masaala na iŋ yaŋ, kɛrɛ bɛyi yo bɛyi bathakaba ka nda ba bindɛ Masaala dunkune daŋandeŋ bɛyi bathakaba ba niyɔy nde ka banabi woŋ Yona baŋ.
Baa, nɔŋ na see nde nthɔŋ Yona niyɔ bɛyi bathakaba na ba biya bi ka Niniba, nɛna hɛlɛŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ si niyɔ bɛyi bathakaba ba biya bi ka lɔkɔ bakɔɔyɛ baŋ baŋ.

Gbaku woyɛrɛmɛ wo ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Siba woŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ ŋayi ka lɔkɔ ba ka kɔnsɔŋ koŋ ba thonkine biya bi ka lɔkɔ bakɔɔyɛ baŋ baŋ, baa wundɛ ŋaye nde napooŋ ka mapeye ma ka dunia baŋ ba si yuyɛ kele hu ka Silamani haŋ. Kumaŋ ntiŋ ntha ki yamɛ bukuya ba Silamani ki kɔŋ dondo.

Biya bi ka Niniba bi kɔŋ nɔŋ ŋayi ka lɔkɔ ba ka kɔnsɔŋ koŋ baŋ iŋ biya bi ka lɔkɔ bahɛ baŋ beŋ e thonkine bena, babiyɛ bindɛ sikɔŋ nde sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ namɛŋ baŋ naa ni Yona bindɛ kɛwandi. Kumaŋ ntiŋ ntha ki yamɛ bukuya ba Yona ki kɔŋ dondo.”
“Wɔ ka wo mɔɔli mumɔɔli ba muŋ nununa, maa ba muŋ pututa ntha. Kɛrɛ ba muŋ tuta ka thinthi, ba haliko biya beŋ fooma bi biyande ka banka baŋ bi be kutu waŋ babɛina.

Thaaya thakɛnda thaŋ tha kɔŋ nɔŋ mumɔɔli ba kɔtɔ koŋ. Mɛnɛ thaaya thakɛnda thaŋ tha kɔŋ thayɔhɔy, kɔtɔ kukɛnda koŋ fooma ku kɔŋ kuthiŋɛ iŋ waŋ. Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ thaaya nda thaŋ yeheta, kɔtɔ kukɛnda koŋ fooma ku kɔŋ thiŋa iŋ huntuma.
Dekiyɔkɔ ba kɔthɔ ba dɔma na waŋ ba iŋ yi baŋ huntuma kutɛ.
Mɛnɛ kɔtɔ kukɛnda koŋ fooma ku kɔŋ kuthiŋɛ napɛ iŋ waŋ, huntuma topeta kɛndɛ; ku kɔŋ niyɔ nagberekethe fooma nɔŋ mumɔɔli muna yina bende.”
Naa thanki Yisɔs gbonkiya, woFaresi wunthe thiyi niŋ ba kaa ka thɔma iŋ wundɛ.
Wuŋ niyɔy woFaresi woŋ thɛrɛnaŋ ba na tha Yisɔs yenke looka thɛnkɔ nɔŋ na naamu namɛŋ woŋ na saanuŋ ba thɔma.
Huna tepe Mariki woŋ, na “Beŋ, bendo biFaresini beŋ, beŋ kɔŋ looki kɔɔpu haŋ iŋ panɛ haŋ kahɛŋ. Kɛrɛ kaake, bendo thiŋɛ iŋ ŋatuwaŋ mɛnɛ banɛnɔy ka thathukuma.
Bendo mayɛini beŋ beŋ. E wo yehinuwɛ kahɛŋ woŋ kutɛ yehinuwɛ hɛlɛŋ thathukuma ndeŋ thaŋ?
Dunkunaŋ munki mu ka thathukuma ndeŋ thaŋ munkii mu ka nkinikiniŋ ka bamɔnɛŋ beŋ. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina ntha o ntha ki kɔŋ niyɔ kimɛthɛ ba beŋ.

“Kɛrɛ nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ba beŋ, bendo biFaresini beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ dunkuŋ wu tɛŋɛŋ kɔhi wuŋ naa beŋ kɔ thubututu muthuuni mu yamɛ nthɔŋ nda thahuwɔ muŋ fooma ŋaye ka thasayo ndeŋ thaŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ pɛyɛŋ mathumbɛ iŋ ba tɔŋina mathimo ka Masaala. Wuŋ, beŋ kɔŋ ba wuŋ niya ka nanthe iŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma.

“Nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ba beŋ, bendo biFaresini beŋ, baa beŋ athimo ba deŋo ka madoŋeŋ mayɔhɔy maŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ iŋ ba niyo yiki ka maano naa beŋ kɔ daŋande ka thani ka gbɔni baŋ niyo ka.
Nambara ba beŋ, baa beŋ athɔyande nɔŋ thayoma tha sa kuta kaake; biya bi kɔŋ kaande thɛŋ ka thinthi, kɛrɛ bindɛ kuita nɔŋ na neniye thɛŋ kaake.”
Wɔ wunthe ka karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ tepe, na “Karimɔkɔ, naa gbonkiye yi nanaŋ na, yi gbonkiye mina kɛnsɛma.”

Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Nambara ba beŋ, bendo karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, baa beŋ kɔŋ tutuŋ biya doniŋ badimbɔy-dimbɔy, kɛrɛ beŋ ka yɛthɛ bakendeŋ, beŋ sa hintiŋ nthɔŋ bɛŋ tɔpɔŋ kuthenke kunthe ba bindɛ mase ba bɛŋ kata.
Nambara ba beŋ, baa beŋ thoyite thayoma tha ka banabiŋ bi kore nde mbembɛŋ ndeŋ kɔŋ beŋ.
Awa beŋ, beŋ see nda tɔŋɔŋ nagberekethe ba dɔma na beŋ yɛrɔkɔy wali ba ni nde mbembɛŋ ndeŋ kɔŋ baŋ; baa bindɛ kore nde banabiŋ beŋ, awa beŋ, beŋ see thoyiti thayoma namɛŋ thaŋ.
Ba kolo baŋ baŋ, kele hu ka Masaala haŋ tepe, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ bindɛ tɔŋɔti banabiŋ iŋ baseriŋ; bi kɔŋ kɔri binɔndi e gbasiŋita binɔndi.’
Huna biya bi ka dunia bahɛ baŋ beŋ, bi kɔŋ gbasiŋita ba koruwo hu koruwo nde banabiŋ beŋ haŋ there nthɔŋ na thɛri dunia baŋ.

There nthɔŋ nda ka koro hu ka Ebɛli haŋ iŋ hu ka Sɛkaraiya, wo koro nde mateete ma ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ mɛnɛ bɛsɛ baŋ ka saraka baŋ fuŋuno kɛ. Yaathi, biya bi ka dunia bahɛ baŋ beŋ, bi kɔŋ nɔŋ gbasiŋita ba bi koro nde beŋ beŋ.
“Nambara ba beŋ, bendo karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, beŋ kosineŋ masaapa ma pɛthɛ biyo hu ka kele haŋ maŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ, beŋ biyandeta kaake, e beŋ ntiŋ kɔ pinda bi yɔli ba biyande kaake beŋ.”

Naa ŋaye kɛndɛ Yisɔs, karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ iŋ biFaresini beŋ thɛrɛŋ ba niŋ sɔkinɔkɔ wusɔbɛ-sɔbɛ e kɔ thɔnthiŋinuwa niŋ ŋathɔnthɔŋɔŋ ŋabɔyɛ e nda niŋ kɛntha ba niŋ bɔha ka Siraŋ mɛnɛ wundɛ kɔŋ piriŋinɔ ka gbonkiya.

Naa thuŋande biya wuluiŋ-wuluiŋ haaŋ e bindɛ nda kɔ yathitituwande, Yisɔs gbonkitiyande hintiŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ, beŋ be tha thɔɔtɔ yisithi wo ka biFaresini beŋ woŋ, hunitɔkɔ namɛŋ haŋ.
Baa bɛyi yo bɛyi ba pututuwɔy bɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ kubunuwa, awa gbundu yo gbundu bɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ kothiyo.
Huna bɛyi yo bɛyi ba gbonkoy yi ka huntuma haŋ, bɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ gbonkiya hatɔ teete nadewu, awa bɛyi yo bɛyi ba ŋɔintɔkɔy yi ka makonko kaake, bɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ koyiŋa ka gbanthaŋ ka.
“Yaŋ tepe bena, bendo binyathikɔŋ bikiyaŋ beŋ, baŋ payɔ bi kɔri kɔtɔ koŋ beŋ, mahɛŋ mabɛina bindɛ ka nda iŋ ba bindɛ punku ba niya bena.
Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe wo beŋ ba payɔ; payɔŋ Masaala na wo, naa ndɛ sekithe siini bakendeŋ baŋ woŋ, e hɛlɛŋ niyɔ iŋ sɛmbɛ ba bena yɛla ka yahanama. Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, woŋ, ndɛ na beŋ ba payɔ.
“E sɛntiŋ biye kutɛ sonkoiŋ bisɔhi niyo gbɔŋ? Kɛrɛ hali wunthe Masaala sa niŋ piitɔ.
Masaala thanki kɔnda bɔɔyɛ ndeŋ buŋ. Huna baŋ payɔ, beŋ akaahi mɔlɔŋ daŋandeŋ sonkoiŋ bibɔyɛ.
“Huna yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ yo wɔ wo sa yama niyɔ kuyaahu ka mateete ma ka biyamɛti, Hati ka Wɔ woŋ sa nɛnɛ nɔŋ niŋ niyɔ kuyaahu ka mateete ma ka malekɛŋ bi ka Masaala beŋ.
Kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo yama buuhu ka mateete ma ka biyamɛti, wundɛ kɔŋ nɛnɛ buuhuwa ka mateete ma ka malekɛŋ bi ka Masaala beŋ.
“Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo gbonkoy thampa ba sɔkinɔkɔ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ punku peniyo; kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo dunkunɔkɔy thampa ba teetuwa keŋ ku ka Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ koŋ, wundɛ sa punku peniyo.
“Awa mɛnɛ bindɛ kati bena ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ ba bena kɔnsiŋina, maa ka kɔtɔkɔy ka bakɛrɛni beŋ mɛnɛ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ, baŋ niyɔkɔ yaagba ba hu beŋ ka tɛpi iŋ na beŋ huŋ ka tepe,
baa Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ kɔŋ bena thanani ka malɔkɔ mabɛina gbeeŋ hu beŋ ba tɛpa.”
Wɔ wunthe ka sɛthɛ baŋ tepe Yisɔs na, na “Karimɔkɔ, yaandi tepe wɛndaŋ na ba miŋ hanande kɛɛ baŋ iŋ wundɛ.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs niŋ, na “Hati lamgba, nkaana niyɛ yama bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ maa bahaninande bena kɛɛ?”
Kɛna key Yisɔs ka kɔtɔkɔy kaŋ yela bindɛ fooma e tɛpa, na “Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ e beŋ pamɔkɔ ŋaye ka milɛŋ bihakuwande, baa sii bakɛnda baŋ dekinteketa ka nanhulu bakɛnda baŋ hali kɔyta ti bɛŋ ka bɔya.”
Kɛna sisiyɛ wundɛ bindɛ mathɔyande maŋ maŋ e tɛpa, na “Bananhulu wunthe kɔŋ nde wo kutɛ nde paka bamandiŋ ka yiya hukɛnama.
Wundɛ see tutunuwande ka thukuma hukɛnama haŋ, na ‘Yaŋ ka nda iŋ ka kosine paka niŋ baŋ. Nama nda yaŋ ni yee?’
Huna tepe wundɛ, na ‘Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ na yaŋ ni. Yaŋ kɔŋ thinki ŋahunkuŋ niŋ ŋaŋ fooma e yaŋ thoya ŋa yamɛ bukuyuwa, e yaŋ kɛndɛ kosine paka niŋ baŋ iŋ nanhulu niŋ baŋ.
Yaŋ kɔŋ tepe yɛthɛ niŋ, na “Yi kɔsɔŋ nanhulu bamandiŋ ba thaninɛŋ thabɔyɛ. Hɛmuwa nda, thɔma, thiiye, yehitɔkɔ.” ’
Kɛrɛ Masaala tepe kɛnama, na ‘Yi, wɔ thɔkɔy na yi! Ka huyɛ bahɛ baŋ yɔkɔŋ yi tuku; awa munki muŋ fooma mu thanki yi kɔsinɔkɔ muŋ, nkaana muŋ biyɔ?’
“Nɛna wuŋ niyɔ ba wɔ yo wɔ wo kɔminuwande nanhulu ba yɛthɛ bakɛnama, kɛrɛ e Masaala niŋ kɔthɔ ba wundɛ niyɔ bamɔnɛ ka thaaya nama thaŋ.”
Huna tepe wundɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Yaŋ tepe bena, baŋ niyɔkɔ yaagba ba siini bakendeŋ baŋ ba mu beŋ thɔŋ, maa ba ŋakɔtɔ ŋakendeŋ ŋaŋ ba mu beŋ thɔɔ.
Baa sii baŋ bɛna yamɛ ba muthɔma muŋ, e kɔtɔ koŋ nɛnɛ yama ba muthɔma muŋ.
Siyuwaŋ hɛ bɛtiŋ beŋ: bindɛ payeta, bindɛ ŋoneta, bindɛ ka iŋ ŋahunkuŋ, kɛrɛ Masaala athɛriyɛ bindɛ. Beŋ, beŋ yameŋ kolo ba bɛtiŋ beŋ!
E wɔ kɔŋ ka mateete makendeŋ wo, ŋaye ka yaagba ba wundɛ ni baŋ, wo punku ba ndinta thɔɔkuwa hu ka sii bakɛnama baŋ?
Mɛnɛ beŋ tha punku niya bɛyi bathahuwɔy baŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma ka siini bakendeŋ baŋ, mbɛ ba beŋ niye kuyaagba ba bapɛyɛ baŋ?

Siyuwaŋ hɛ musɛnkɛŋ mu ka ŋayeŋ ŋaŋ muŋ nɔŋ na muŋ senkine na. Muŋ niyeta wali, muŋ yehinuweta mupithi, kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe bena, hali gbaku woŋ Silamani iŋ hudinhaŋiya nama haŋ fooma wundɛ tha punku ba pitha wuyɔhɔy wuŋ doŋe nanthe iŋ muŋ.
Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ Masaala wundɛ pithe hande hu hɛ hɔkɔŋ ka boi ka hupethɔy haŋ, mɛmpɛ nda e huŋ si tɔɔka, mbu ntiŋ nda beŋ, e wundɛ sa bena yaŋ pitha? O beŋ, bendo ka iŋ kulanɛya kutɛŋɛ beŋ!
“Awa baŋ niyɔkɔ yaagba ba kɔɔ timo tima ka deethuwa mu beŋ thɔŋ iŋ mu beŋ thiiye.
Baa munki muŋ muŋ fooma, muna siyani ba be kɔthɔ Masaala na baŋ deethi. Awa Fanda ndeŋ woŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na beŋ ka iŋ muŋ.
Yɔlaŋ hintiŋ ba deethuwa Hugbakine nama haŋ ka siini bakendeŋ baŋ, awa munkɔŋ muŋ muŋ fooma beŋ kɔŋ muŋ kutu.
“Baŋ payɔ, bendo thahuwɔy beŋ ka kiki, baa mathimo ma ka Fanda ndeŋ woŋ mɛna ba bena dunkune Hugbakine haŋ.
Niyaŋ gbɔŋ fooma mu iŋ beŋ, e beŋ niya bayɔhɔy ka bamɔnɛŋ beŋ. Dethiyɔkɔŋ ponthoiŋ ba sa tiyɔ, e beŋ kɔsina kɛɛ ka ariana ba sa teetuwɔ, ka sa batuwani biyande kɛ, mɔɔki sa bɛŋ teeti.
Baa kamo kama ka kɛɛ bakɛnda, kɛna thukuma hukɛnda.
“Kɔsinɔkɔŋ yɛthɛ bakendeŋ, e beŋ kɔsina mumɔɔli mukendeŋ muŋ mumaye timo tima.
Niyɔŋ nɔŋ biya bi yumbu ba mariki wokɛnamɛŋ woŋ be tɛŋ ŋaye ka yakali ba ka kuyɛntande koŋ baŋ, ba haliko bi be niyɔ bikɔsinɔkɔy ba niŋ pɛthiyɛ yako naa wundɛ see gbɛdɛŋ ka biyo haŋ.
Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka bawaliŋ bi pɛnka bithɔhɔy iŋ mariki namɛŋ woŋ. Nɔndi yaathi, yaŋ tepe bena, mariki woŋ kɔŋ si kɔsinɔkɔ yɛthɛ bakɛnama e bindɛ dɛŋa ka tha banthe, e si niya bindɛ fantha.
Hali na asɛɛ na wundɛ huyɛ teete, maa ka kuputhɔ ku kaŋ koŋ, mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka bawaliŋ bi pɛnka bithɔhɔy!
Kɛrɛ kɔthɔŋ ba dɔma na mɛnɛ wo biyɛ banka kɔthɛ wakathi wo batuwaŋ woŋ see, wundɛ kɔŋ huru gbele, awa wundɛ sa mɛyi ba batuwaŋ woŋ thinka banka nama baŋ.
Beŋ hɛlɛŋ, beŋ kɔŋ ba kɔsinɔkɔ ba yɛritɔ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ, baa wundɛ kɔŋ see ka malɔkɔ ma ba beŋ niŋ tute thukuma.”
Huna tepe Pita, na “Mariki, e thabɔrɔ thaŋ thaŋ tha kɔŋ ba miŋ hɔkɔŋ nagbɛti, mindo bakarandeni beŋ, maa tha kɔŋ ba biya fooma?”

Kɛna tepe Mariki woŋ, na “Nkaana bawali woyɔhɔy niyo lanɛya e wundɛ niyɔ wokele? Wundɛ na bawali wo dɛŋo iŋ mariki nama ka thinthi ba dethiteke banka babunthu baŋ e hana bawaliŋ bibintheŋ beŋ muthɔma ka lɔkɔ ba bindɛ ba kute muthɔma.
Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka bawali wobɛina wo mariki nama woŋ pɛnki si ni wali bakɛnama.
Nɔndi yaathi, yaŋ tepe bena, wundɛ kɔŋ niŋ dɛŋ ka thinthi ka ntha yo ntha ki iŋ wundɛ.
Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ bawali wobɛina tepe ka yɛthɛ bakɛnama, na ‘Mariki wokiyaŋ woŋ nambe tindɛ ba duwa,’ e bɔha ba gbuduŋa bawaliŋ bibintheŋ beŋ e kɔ thɔma, e kɔ thiiye haaŋ e yilɔ.

Mariki wo ka bawali wobɛina kɔŋ see malɔkɔ manthe ma be wundɛ niŋ tute thukuma, ka wakathi wo ba wundɛ kɔthɔ. Mariki woŋ kɔŋ niŋ thonkande, awa wundɛ kɔŋ niŋ kɔnditande iŋ biya bi be yɔhɔ niyo lanɛya beŋ.
“Bawali wo kɔthɛ ba thimo mariki nama ba wundɛ be ni, kɛrɛ wundɛ tha kɔsinɔkɔ yɛthɛ nama e ŋayi ka kɔɔ e bɛŋ niya, wundɛ kɔŋ yaŋ gbuduŋo wuthoonɛ.

Kɛrɛ bawali wo be kɔthɔ ba thimo mariki nama woŋ ba wundɛ niya, mɛnɛ wundɛ ni ba tɛŋɛ wundɛ ba gbuduŋo, wundɛ kɔŋ kutu kugbuduŋ kuyete. Wo dunkuno wubɔyɛ-bɔyɛ, ndɛ kɔŋ thɔnthiŋina ba wubɔyɛ-bɔyɛ; wɔ bɛina wo dunkuno wubɔyɛ-bɔyɛ, wundɛ kɔŋ thɔnthiŋina ba dunkuna wu yamɛ bɔya.
“Yaŋ see ba si thiya hɛrɛ hu buu ka dunia baŋ, awa yaŋ kɔŋ nda kufiyo ba buu bubɛina maye.
Yaŋ boheŋ ba muluno ka nambarɛŋ, awa thukuma niŋ haŋ hu ka yaagba ba daŋinande nambarɛŋ babɛina.
E beŋ simekeŋ ba dɔma na yaŋ see ba saa ka thiya mathɛbɛ ka dunia baŋ? Ade, yaŋ tha see ba thiya mathɛbɛ, kɛrɛ ba si thiya mabarinkande wɔ iŋ ntɔ nama.
There nda hɛ, mpoo ki biya bisɔhi ka banka banthe ki kɔŋ hakuwande; biya bitaati bi kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ biya biye, biya biye bi kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ biya bitaati.

Komisa wowathe kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ hati nama wowathe; hati wathe kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ fandama na; komisa woyɛrɛmɛ kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ hati nama woyɛrɛmɛ; hati yɛrɛmɛ kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ nandama na; thɔnɔ kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ thamba nama; thamba woŋ kɔŋ kɔɔ ba sɔkinɔkɔ thɔnɔ nama.”
Huna tepe hɛlɛŋ wundɛ biya beŋ, na “Mɛnɛ beŋ kute thawuruma thaŋ thɛ si ŋati ka koyoŋ woŋ ŋaye ka, beŋ kɔthɛ yako na koyoŋ kɔŋ tete see; yaathi, e wundɛ nɛnɛ saa.
Awa mɛnɛ beŋ kute hɛlɛŋ huru hu ka kuheda koŋ haŋ hu si hɔŋ, beŋ kɔŋ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na, naa huŋ daŋande, nthonthoŋ kɔŋ ki kɔŋ see; yaathi, e kɔŋ nɛnɛ saa.
Bendo banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ, beŋ punkeŋ ba detha dunia baŋ iŋ kuthahinɛ koŋ, e beŋ tɛpa ba niyɔ. Mbɛ ba sa beŋ kothiye kolo ba ka lɔkɔ bahɛ baŋ baŋ?
“Mbɛ ba sa beŋ kɔnsiŋiniyande nɔŋ na thumbe wuŋ?

Mɛnɛ yi thohite wɔ dɔɔnthɔ, e ndɛ yina bɔha ba yina kata ka kaama, ka dekiyɔkɔ ba huŋ dɛɛnka iŋ wundɛ ka gboŋa saanuŋ beŋ ba biyande ka kaama ka. Mɛnɛ yi tha wuŋ ni, wundɛ kɔŋ yina kati ka bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ woŋ ka, awa e bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ woŋ yina ka dunkuna ka bayaha woŋ, awa e bayaha woŋ yina ka thiya ka yeeli.
Yaŋ tepe yina, yi sa kɛndɛ fuŋ gbɔ, yɔkɔŋ na yi thunkuŋ fooma dɔɔnthɔ baŋ, sɛnti wunthe ndɛ sa peyɔ.”
Ka malɔkɔ mabɛina biya binɔndi bi kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ bi tepe Yisɔs na ba biKalili bi kore nde Pailɛti beŋ ka lɔkɔ ba nde bindɛ kore maamiŋ beŋ baŋ ba bindɛ fuŋuna saraka ka kuwaŋ ku ka Masaala koŋ.
Yisɔs tepe bindɛ, na “E ba na niyɔy wuŋ na biKalili beŋ beŋ kore nde ka gboŋa baŋ baŋ, e huna beŋ siyi ba dɔma na bi yameŋ niyɔ bahakɛŋ ba biya bi ka Kalili fooma?
Hali wuŋ ka nɛŋ, kɛrɛ mɛnɛ beŋ tha sikiyɔkɔ ŋaye ka hakɛŋ bikendeŋ beŋ fooma, beŋ kɔŋ tuku nɔŋ na tuku nde nthɔŋ bindɛ na.
Mbu biya kɔhi iŋ bisɔŋ-bitaati bi ka Silowami, bi tukɛ nde naa ŋoto bindɛ iŋ banka bathɔɔkuwɛ-thɔɔkuwɛ baŋ? E beŋ siyi ba dɔma na bindɛ bina yamɛ nde nɛnɔ ba biya beŋ fooma ka Yɛrusalɛmi?
Ade, wuŋ ka nɛŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe bena, mɛnɛ beŋ tha sikiyɔkɔ ŋaye ka hakɛŋ ndeŋ beŋ, beŋ fooma beŋ kɔŋ tuku nɔŋ na tuku nde nthɔŋ bindɛ na.”

Kɛna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ, na “Wɔ wunthe kɔŋ nde wo thuuwɛ kuyeŋ ku tiŋ mutiŋ muthɔma ku dɔma koŋ na fiki ka sayo hukɛnama haŋ. Lɔkɔ banthe wundɛ key kɛndɛ ba ka detha ba mutiŋ ba thɔma, kɛrɛ wundɛ tha pɛnki mutiŋ kɛndɛ.

Huna tepe wundɛ bawali nama woŋ, na ‘Dethaŋ hɛ, bɛrɛ ba thanina thataati nda yama see ka deethuwa mutiŋ ka kuyeŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ, kɛrɛ hali hanthe yaŋ penketa mutiŋ. Yuutaŋ kuŋ. Mbɛ ba kuŋ kooye dondo e kuŋ kɔ teetuwa kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ ba gboŋ?’
Kɛrɛ bawali woŋ tepe niŋ, na ‘Hɛmɔŋ, pɛyɛna kuŋ ba nina hunthe hɛlɛŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ pɛnkande gbusuta kuŋ e yaŋ kuŋ thiya tɛɛni ba kuŋ yeheŋ.
Awa mɛnɛ kuŋ tiŋ kohira, wu kɔŋ mina niyɔ kuhita daŋandeŋ ba kuŋ yuuta haŋ. Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ kuŋ tha nɛnɛ tiŋ, yi kɔŋ kuŋ yuutu.’ ”
Ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe manthe, Yisɔs kɔŋ nde thanani ka banka bathuŋuyande baŋ.
Wɔ yɛrɛmɛ wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ wo iŋ wayi wonɛnɔy wo niyɛ niŋ ba thana pethɔ kɔtɔ ba thaninɛŋ kɔhi iŋ thasɔŋ-thataati. Wundɛ puto nda iŋ nthoonaŋ kɔŋ; wundɛ punketa nda thumbunɔkɔ hali.
Naa kute Yisɔs niŋ, wundɛ thiyi niŋ, na “Wɔ yɛrɛmɛ, yi pɛɛkuwɔy ŋaye ka nthoonaŋ kikɛnda kɔŋ.”
Yisɔs tute niŋ thɛnkɔ. Ka wuyako wubɛina, wundɛ thumbunɔkɔy, e thunkunuwa Masaala na.

Wuŋ thoŋ bayaha wo ka banka bathuŋuyande baŋ woŋ na baa Yisɔs puyi ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ. Huna tepe wundɛ biya beŋ, na “Hura kasɔŋ-hanthe miŋ kɔŋ ba niya wali bakɛntuŋ, huna saaŋ ka lɔkɔ babɛina ba beŋ be puya, kɛrɛ beŋ ka ba saa ba beŋ be puya ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.”
Huna tepe Mariki woŋ bindɛ, na “Beŋ, bendo banitɔkɔiŋ beŋ beŋ! Beŋ kɔŋ pɛɛki ndansi kikendeŋ ŋaye ka binthi ka e kata kɔŋ ka thiiye ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.
Ka tete detha wɔ yɛrɛmɛ wo ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Ebrahim baŋ, wo thanki Sithani yuka bɛrɛ ba thanina kɔhi iŋ thasɔŋ-thataati. E wuŋ ka wuyɔhɔy ba niŋ pɛɛka ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ?”
Thampɛŋ thaŋ thaŋ ni ba bindɛ kutɔkɔ kuyaahu ka yɛthɛ bakɛnamɛŋ. Biya beŋ nɛnɛ ayehitɔkɔ ba bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba Yisɔs ni baŋ.
Yisɔs thɔnthɔŋɔŋ, na “Mbɛ mu yaŋ thɔyintande Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ dee?

Huŋ athɔyande nɔŋ wɔ wunthe wo sɛkithɛ thaa humɛɛsɛ hu dɔma na mɔstadi awa e huŋ thuuwa ka dumgbu bakɛnama. Thaa humɛɛsɛ haŋ haŋ see muku. Huŋ thɔɔki. Huŋ see niyɔ kuyeŋ kumandiŋ haaŋ e bɛtiŋ beŋ si thooyuwa ka bathalɛŋ bibɛina.”
Huna tepe hɛlɛŋ wundɛ, na “Mbɛ mu yaŋ thɔyintande Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ dee?
Huŋ athɔyande nɔŋ yisithi wo sekithe wɔ yɛrɛmɛ, e niŋ tikitinuwande iŋ kutoŋ kuthithɛ ku bankɔ hunthe haaŋ e yisithi woŋ niya ba kutoŋ koŋ fooma ŋata.”
Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy kubiyasi nama koŋ ba kaa ka Yɛrusalɛmi. Naa wundɛ key, wundɛ fuŋe ka mɛtiŋ babukuyuwɛ baŋ iŋ bamɛɛsuwɛ baŋ fooma kaŋ kaa kaŋ thaninuwa biya beŋ.
Wɔ wunthe thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “Mariki, e biya biyete bina hɔkɔŋ niya kisi?” Huna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ fooma,
na “Dekiyɔkɔŋ ba biiyande ka biyo hunɔthitɔy haŋ, baa biya bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ gbɛrɛŋɛŋ yaathi ba biyande kaake, kɛrɛ bindɛ sa punku biyande.

Mariki wo ka banka baŋ woŋ kɔŋ ŋayinɔkɔ e lɔŋa biyo haŋ, awa naa beŋ kɔɔyɛ ka gbada ka e beŋ bɔha gbɛdiŋa ka biyo haŋ e beŋ kɔ dɔma, na ‘Pɛthiyɛ mina biyo haŋ, mariki!’ Wundɛ kɔŋ bena tepe ba dɔma, na ‘Yaŋ kɔyta ka ŋaye beŋ!’
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina beŋ kɔŋ tɛpi, na ‘Yi bareŋ nde ka thɔma, e ka thiiye iŋ miŋ, e thaninuwa ka mɛtiŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ.’
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina wundɛ kɔŋ tɛpi, na ‘Yaŋ kɔyta ka ŋaye beŋ, gbɔniyɔkɔŋ yama, bendo bare nde niya wunɛnɔy beŋ.’
Beŋ kɔŋ bereŋ e beŋ kɔ ŋakitinande thathithi ka wuthoonɛ ka tete ka lɔkɔ ba beŋ kutu Ebrahim na, Aisaki, Yakuba, iŋ banabiŋ beŋ fooma ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ, beŋ, e beŋ yelo ka gbada ka.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina biya bi kɔŋ see ŋaye ka thadoŋ tha ka dunia baŋ fooma e bindɛ dɔŋɔ ka thɔma ka tha banthe ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, bi hɛ mahɛŋ beŋ, bindɛ bina nɔŋ niyɔ ka kɔtɔkɔy; awa bi hɛ ka kɔtɔkɔy beŋ, bindɛ bina nɔŋ niyɔ mahɛŋ.”
Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina biFaresini binɔndi see niŋ tepe, na “Wu kɔŋ kuhita ba yi ŋayi dondo, baa Hɛrɔdi dɛɛnki ba yina kɔra.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Kaaŋ tepe bakɔɔtha wobɛina, na ‘Detha, yando kanthi mbayiŋ binɛnɔy e yaŋ kɔ puya biya hɛ iŋ mɛmpɛ, mɛmpɛthɔ yaŋ kɔŋ thankaŋ wali bakiyaŋ baŋ.
Halisa, yɔkɔŋ yaŋ be key ka kɔtɔkɔy biyasi niŋ haŋ hɛ, mɛmpɛ, iŋ mɛmpɛthɔ, ba wuŋ thumbeta ba banabi koro ka tha ka hɛna wuŋ daŋande ka Yɛrusalɛmi.’

“Beŋ, bendo biya bi ka Yɛrusalɛmi, beŋ lɔɔpi banabiŋ beŋ iŋ baseriŋ bi ŋindi Masaala beŋ haaŋ beŋ bindɛ kɔra. Tima thɔkɔti nɔŋ nda yaŋ niyɔ kufiyo ba bena kɔmitɔkɔ ka thɛnkɔ niŋ thaŋ nɔŋ na thɛɛ wokomisa pɛnkinande ŋapɛli nama ŋaŋ ka mpati nama, kɛrɛ beŋ tha mɛyi ba yaŋ bena nɛŋ niya.
Huna banka bakendeŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ bɛ kɔŋ fuŋoko. Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe, beŋ sa nda yama kutu haaŋ yɔkɔŋ na beŋ dome nɔŋ, na ‘Wɔ thaduba na, wo see ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Mariki woŋ baŋ!’ ”
Ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe manthe Yisɔs thiyo ba kaa ka thɔma ka banka ba ka bakɛrɛŋ wunthe ka biFaresini beŋ. Awa biya beŋ fooma lope niŋ thaaya.
Kumaŋ, wɔ doŋeŋ niŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy wo thiinkɛ.
Huna gbonkitiyande Yisɔs karimɔkɔiŋ beŋ iŋ biFaresini beŋ, na “E wu kɔŋ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ baŋ ba puya wɔ ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ, maa wuŋ ka nɛŋ?”
Kɛrɛ bindɛ tha gbonkoy bɛyi yo bɛyi. Kɛna sekithe Yisɔs hati lamgba woŋ; wundɛ puyi niŋ; wundɛ pɛyɛŋ niŋ ba wundɛ duwa.

Huna thonthiŋine wundɛ bindɛ, na “Mɛnɛ wɔ wunthe ka beŋ kɔŋ iŋ hati, maa manaŋ, awa mɛnɛ wuŋ niyɔy na wundɛ key ŋɔti ka sobo ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ, e wundɛ sa niŋ ka fuŋuŋ yako ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ?”
Kɛrɛ bindɛ tha punku niya yaabi kuthɔnthɔŋɔŋ koŋ koŋ.
Naa thanki Yisɔs detha nɔŋ na biya bi thiyo ka thɔma haŋ beŋ yethe madoŋeŋ mayiki maŋ, wundɛ gbonkitiyande bindɛ fooma mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ e tɛpa,
na “Naa wɔ thiyi yina ka thɔma humandiŋ, ba yɛthiyɔkɔ ba dɔŋɔ ka gbɔdɔ huyiki haŋ, athamɔkɔ niyɔ wɔ yamɛ yiki ba yi thiyo ka thɔma hubɛina.
Lɔkɔ hɛ wo thiyɛ bena ka thɔma haŋ ka nanthe woŋ kɔŋ see e yina si tepe, na ‘Ŋayiyɛ woŋ ka madoŋe maŋ. Hɛɛra yo ka, yɔkɔŋ yi be dɔŋɔ ka madoŋe ma ka pothi maŋ.’ Ka lɔkɔ babɛina yi kɔŋ kutɔkɔ kuyaahu.

Huna mɛnɛ yi thiyo ka thɔma, kaa e ka dɔŋɔ ka madoŋe ma ka pothi maŋ, huna mɛnɛ wo thiyɛ yina woŋ see, ndɛ kɔŋ yina si tepe, na ‘Nyathiki, saa ka madoŋe ma yamɛ ka thinthi maŋ.’ Wuŋ, wu kɔŋ yina dunkuŋ yiki ka mateete ma ka biya fooma bi thiyo ka thɔma haŋ beŋ.
Baa wɔ yo wɔ wo ŋatinɔkɔy, wundɛ kɔŋ thathina; awa wɔ yo wɔ nɛnɛ wo thathinɔkɔ, wundɛ kɔŋ ŋatina.”

Huna tepe hɛlɛŋ Yisɔs ka hati lamgba wo thiyɛ niŋ ka thɔma haŋ woŋ, na “Naa yi kɔsinɔkɔy ba thiya biya ka thɔma humandiŋ, ba thiyi binyathikɔŋ bikɛnda, maa mbɛnda, maa mpoo kikɛnda, maa bintɔni nda bi bananhuluiŋ, baa bindɛ kɔŋ nɛnɛ yina thiyi ka thɔma, awa ka lɔkɔ babɛina yi kute kuthunkuŋ ba wu ni yi wuŋ.
Kɛrɛ, naa yi kɔ thiyi biya ba thɔma, thiya bamɔnɛŋ beŋ, bagbɛthɛŋ beŋ, biyɔŋɛ beŋ, iŋ bi mankɔy thaaya beŋ.
Yi kɔŋ nɔŋ kutu thaduba, baa bindɛ sa yina punku tɛnkiniyɛ, kɛrɛ Masaala kɔŋ nɔŋ yina thunkuŋ ka malɔkɔ ma biya bithumbɛ beŋ ŋayi ka hutuka haŋ.”
Naa yuye huŋ wɔ wunthe ka bi nde thɔŋ iŋ Yisɔs beŋ, wundɛ tepe, na “Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka wɔ wo nɔŋ penkitiye ka thɔma hu ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.”
Huna tepe niŋ Yisɔs mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ, na “Wɔ na yehinuwɛ nde thɔma humandiŋ. Wundɛ see thiyi biya bibɔyɛ ba si penkitiye ka thɔma haŋ haŋ.
Naa tɛŋ lɔkɔ ba ka thɔma haŋ baŋ, wundɛ ŋindi bawali nama woŋ ba si tepe bi thiyi wundɛ ka thɔma haŋ beŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Saaŋ, yaŋ thanki kɔsinɔkɔ ntha o ntha.’

Kɛrɛ naa key bawali woŋ, bindɛ fooma bi thiyo beŋ ka wunthe-wunthe thɛrɛŋ ba dunkuna kabariŋ bihakuwande. Womayoŋ woŋ tepe baseri woŋ, na ‘Yaŋ thanki boya yiya, yɔkɔŋ yaŋ be key ba huŋ ka detha. Yaandi, yɛrɔkɔ kabari wokiyaŋ woŋ.’
Wowuntheŋ woŋ tepe, na ‘Yaŋ boye manani kɔhi bi niye wali. Yaŋ kɔŋ nda gboŋa ba bindɛ ka gbɛriŋina. Yaandi yɛrɔkɔ kabari niŋ woŋ.’
Wowuntheŋ woŋ dome, na ‘Yando yɛntɛ wuŋama. Ba kolo babɛina yaŋ sa punku kaa ka thɔma haŋ.’

Bawali woŋ duu awa wundɛ key tepe mariki nama woŋ fooma bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ. Mariki nama woŋ thɔɔyɛ ka mathoŋ, wundɛ tepe ka bawali nama woŋ, na ‘Kaa yako ka gboŋɛŋ babukuyuwɛ baŋ iŋ ka thapɛthandeŋ thaŋ e yi ka thiya bamɔnɛŋ beŋ, bagbɛthɛŋ beŋ, bimankɔy thaaya beŋ, iŋ biyɔŋɛ beŋ fooma.’
Wundɛ key ni nɔŋ na nunkunoko wundɛ na. Kɛna duu wundɛ; ndɛ see tɛpi, na ‘Mariki, ba ni yi yamari baŋ, yaŋ thanki bɛŋ niya, kɛrɛ madoŋe pɛyɛ hɛlɛŋ kɛndɛ ba bihɛna.’
Huna tepe mariki woŋ ka bawali nama woŋ, na ‘Kaa ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ fooma, ka gboŋɛŋ baŋ, ka thapɛthandeŋ thaŋ; biita bindɛ haliko banka niŋ baŋ bɛ be thiŋ biya.
Yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ wunthe ka bi yenke thiyo beŋ, wundɛ sa miŋ sisa niŋ baŋ.’ ”
Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy biyasi nama haŋ e sɛthɛ bamandiŋ kɔ yema. Huna sikiyeke wundɛ. Ndɛ tepe bindɛ,
na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo yama yeŋ, wundɛ sa punku ba niyɔ bakarandeŋ wokiyaŋ mɛnɛ wundɛ tha yenke sikina sɔkɔrɔ fandama, nandama, wɔtɔ nama, mpati nama, mbɛndama, iŋ yɛthɛ bakɛnama gbeeŋ.
Wɔ yo wɔ wo sa yinthɔkɔ kuyeŋ nama kubariŋande ku ka nambara baŋ koŋ e yama yema, wundɛ sa niyɔ bakarandeŋ wokiyaŋ.
Nkaana wɔɔŋ, wo ŋayi ba thoya banka, ndɛ tha hintiŋ yenke dɔŋɔ e kɔnda si niŋ bɛŋ yaki, ba mɛnɛ wundɛ kɔŋ iŋ wutɛŋɛ ba bɛŋ thankina?
Mɛnɛ wundɛ tha wuŋ ni, wu kɔŋ niyɔ naa wundɛ thɛrɛŋ nthɔŋ bɛŋ, wundɛ thamɔi, awa fooma biya bi bɛŋ kutu beŋ, bi kɔŋ niŋ hɛthi, e bindɛ kɔ tɛpa, na
‘Hati lamgba woŋ thɛrɛŋ nde ba thoya, kɛrɛ wundɛ tha bɛŋ punku thankina.’

Mbɛ hɛlɛŋ gbaku wobɛina wo ŋayi ba kaa ka dekiya gbaku wohɛna, ndɛ tha hintiŋ yenke dɔŋɔ e wundɛ simɔkɔ iŋ thukuma nama mɛnɛ ndɛ kɔŋ punku dekiye kurugbani wuluiŋ kɔhi gbaku wo see woŋ iŋ kurugbani wuluiŋ kɔnthɔ kaye?
Mɛnɛ wuŋ ka nɛŋ, naa hintiŋ gbaku wowuntheŋ woŋ wuthokiye, wundɛ kɔŋ ŋindi baseri ba haliko bi be pɛyɔ ka mathɛbɛ.”
Huna thuhune ntiŋ Yisɔs, na “Wɔ yo wɔ sa punku ba niyɔ bakarandeŋ wokiyaŋ mɛnɛ wundɛ tha sikɔŋ sɔkɔrɔ ntha yo ntha ki iŋ wundɛ.
“Mɛɛti maŋ athimɔ, kɛrɛ mɛnɛ mɛɛti maŋ piriŋiŋ wuthimɔy wukɛnama wuŋ, mbɛ mu nda mɛŋ thimiŋ?
Mɛŋ sa nda yɔhɔ ba bɛyi yo bɛyi yɔkɔŋ mɛ be yɛla. Wundɛ wo ba pona kuiha, wundɛ ponɛŋ kuiha.”
Lɔkɔ banthe bathuuni duthu woŋ beŋ iŋ biya bi simeke bayahɛŋ bi ka dina wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ ba bindɛ niyɔ bahakɛŋ thuriye Yisɔs na ba niŋ poniyɛ kuiha.
Kɛna bohe biFaresini beŋ iŋ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ gbonkiyɔkɔ e kɔ tɛpa, na “Hati lamgba woŋ baŋ ayɛrɔkɔ bahakɛŋ beŋ e ka thɔma iŋ bindɛ.”
Kɛna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ:

na “Mbu na wuŋ niyɔy naa wɔ wunthe ka mateete makendeŋ kɔŋ iŋ takɛŋ kɛmɛ wunthe, e wunthe niŋ kɛndɛ si piriŋe? Nama wundɛ ni? Wundɛ kɔŋ pɛyɛŋ bikɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-kanaŋ beŋ iŋ bisɔŋ-binaŋ beŋ bi si thɛri ka wula ka, e kaa kaŋ deethuwa wunthe wo piriŋe niŋ woŋ haaŋ ndɛ niŋ kuta.
Awa naa wundɛ kute niŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ niŋ yinthɔkɔ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ mamandiŋ.
Naa wundɛ tɛŋ ka banka nama ka, wundɛ kɔŋ thiyi binyathikɔŋ nama iŋ biya bi thuriyande wundɛ beŋ fooma. Wundɛ kɔŋ bindɛ tepe, na ‘Nyehitɔkɔŋ, baa yaŋ kute taka niŋ wo piriŋe nɔŋ yama woŋ.’

Yaŋ tepe bena, mayehitɔkɔ ma yamɛ mɛ kɔŋ niyɔ ka ariana ba bahakɛ wunthe wo sikinɛ sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ nama baŋ ayaŋ ba bikɔnthɔ kasɔŋ-kanaŋ iŋ bisɔŋ-binaŋ bithumbɛ bi ka nda ba sikina sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ namɛŋ baŋ.

“Mbu na wuŋ niyɔy naa wɔ yɛrɛmɛ kɔŋ iŋ kɔbiri wo siliniŋ kɔhi nagbɛti, e siliŋ wunthe kɛndɛ piriŋa? Nama wundɛ ni? Wundɛ kɔŋ mɔɔli mumɔɔli e pithinuwa banka baŋ fooma e deethuwa kuthɛgbɛ haaŋ ndɛ niŋ kuta.

Naa wundɛ kute niŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ thiyi binyathikɔŋ nama beŋ iŋ bithuriyuwande wundɛ beŋ ka tha banthe e tepe bindɛ, na ‘Yaŋ kɔŋ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ, baa yaŋ kute kɔbiri niŋ wo piriŋe yama woŋ. Miŋ yehitɔkɔyŋ ka tha banthe!’
Yaŋ tepe bena, nɛna hɛlɛŋ wuŋ niyɔ ka malekɛŋ bi ka Masaala beŋ. Bi kɔŋ yehitɔkɔ wumandiŋ ba bahakɛ wunthe wo sikinɛ sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ nama baŋ.”
Huna tepe wundɛ hɛlɛŋ, na “Wɔ wunthe kɔŋ nde wo iŋ mpati biye bibiyɛthɛŋ.
Wohatiyɛ woŋ tepe ka fandama, na ‘Papaŋ, haninande mina kɛɛ bakɛnda baŋ e yama yi dunkune kufɛŋ ku yaŋ ba kuta.’ Fandamɛŋ hakinande bindɛ kɛɛ baŋ.
Naa sɛsi wuŋ hurukuta, wohatiyɛ woŋ sekithe kɛɛ bakɛnama baŋ. Wundɛ fuŋutɔkɔy iŋ kɔbiri woŋ. Wundɛ key ka kuyɛkɛŋ kuthokiye napooŋ. Wundɛ key thanki teetuwa kɔbiri nama woŋ ka maniyɔ manɛnɔy.
Wundɛ teeti ntha yo ntha ki iŋ wundɛ. Kɛna see kɔnthɔ kumandiŋ ŋɔti ka kuyɛkɛŋ kubɛyna. Wundɛ nda, ntha yo ntha ka nda iŋ wundɛ.
Kɛna key wundɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ lasiri wunthe ba dunkuno wali. Lasiri woŋ baŋ toŋite niŋ ka dumgbu ba ka kɔsɛŋ beŋ ba kaa ka thɛriyɛ kɔsɛŋ nama beŋ.
Wundɛ kaho kɔnthɔ haaŋ e wundɛ nda niyɔ kufiyo ba thɔma muthɔma mu ka kɔsɛŋ beŋ muŋ, kɛrɛ wɔ ka wo niŋ nkii muthɔma.
Ka wumankɛ nda nagbɔŋ thukuma nama haŋ see ntiŋ duu, huna tepe ndɛ, na ‘Fooma bawaliŋ bigbako beŋ iŋ papaŋ athɔŋ e bindɛ pɛyɛta, kɛrɛ yaŋ yama see ka tuka dondo woŋ iŋ kɔnthɔ.
Yaŋ kɔŋ ŋayi dondo. Yaŋ kɔŋ duu ka fandaŋ ka. Yaŋ kɔŋ niŋ ka tepe, na “Papaŋ, yaŋ thanki niya hakɛ ba sɔkinɔkɔ Masaala na mɛnɛ ba yina sɔkinɔkɔ.
Yaŋ ka nda yando tɛŋɛ ba domo na hati nda, kɛrɛ sɛkitha nda yama nɔŋ wunthe ka bawaliŋ nda bigbako beŋ.” ’
Kɛna ŋaye wundɛ. Wundɛ bohe gboŋa ba duwa ka fandama ka. “Fandama kute niŋ naa wundɛ wuthokiye. Kɛna see niŋ nkinikiniŋ bohi. Kɛna thare wundɛ; wundɛ key niŋ pɔpitɔkɔ; wundɛ dɔɔkɔy niŋ.
Huna tepe hati woŋ, na ‘Papaŋ, yaŋ ni hakɛ ba sɔkinɔkɔ Masaala na mɛnɛ ba yina sɔkinɔkɔ. Yaŋ ka nda yando tɛŋɛ ba domo na hati nda.’
Kɛrɛ fandama thiyi bawaliŋ nama beŋ, na ‘Sisaŋ yako kuhɔli ku yamɛ yɔhɔ koŋ, e beŋ niŋ kuŋ si thiya. Thiyaŋ niŋ gbɛtu iŋ dagbalɛŋ ka ŋathaki.
Kaayiyaŋ manaŋ wo yamɛ bukuya woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma, e beŋ niŋ si kɔra, awa miŋ thɔmɛŋ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ.
Baa hati niŋ woŋ wotukɛ na nde nda, kɛrɛ hɛ ndɛ thɔhɔy; wopiriŋɛ na nde nda, kɛrɛ hɛ yaŋ kute niŋ?’ Kɛna bohe bindɛ fooma yehitɔkɔ.
“Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, hati nama wowathe wobakalaŋ woŋ kɔŋ nde ka dumgbu ka. Naa kooye wundɛ gboŋa ba duwa ka mɛti ka, wundɛ si nthɔŋ thuriye, wundɛ yuye sɔnkɔ ba muhaŋ muŋ mɛnɛ kama hubɛina.
Huna thiye wundɛ wunthe ka bawaliŋ bi ka fandama beŋ, na ‘Mbɛ mu niyɔy?’
Huna dome wundɛ, na ‘Wɛnda wohatiyɛ wo kaayɛ nde woŋ na tɛŋɛ, awa fanda kore manaŋ wo yamɛ bukuya woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma, baa wundɛ kute hɛlɛŋ niŋ wopethɔy nakeŋ!’
Wɛndama wobakalaŋ woŋ thɔɔyɛ ka mathoŋ. Wundɛ tha mɛyi ba biyande ka banka ka. Kɛna see niŋ fandama theteke ba wundɛ be biyande.

Kɛrɛ wundɛ tepe fandama na, na ‘Detha, thaninɛŋ thaŋ thaŋ fooma yaŋ bareŋ nɔŋ yina niyiyɛ wali. Hanthe yaŋ baŋineta hɛ yamari nda, kɛrɛ mbɛ mu dunkune yi yama? Hali hintiŋ baahu woyete ba yaŋ be yehitɔkɔ iŋ binyathikɔŋ niŋ, yi tha yama niŋ dunkune.
Kɛrɛ hati nda woŋ baŋ, wo teetuwɛ kɛɛ bakɛnda baŋ fooma ka yɛrɛmɛŋ bi katitoko nama yo nama beŋ, naa see hɛ wundɛ, yi koriye niŋ manaŋ wo yamɛ bukuya woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma!’
Huna tepe fandama, na ‘Hatiŋ woŋ, yi, yi kɔŋ iŋ yaŋ dondo timo tima awa ntha yo ntha kikiyaŋ yina biyɛ.
Kɛrɛ miŋ kɔŋ ba niya yakali, e miŋ yehitɔkɔ, baa wɛnda woŋ baŋ ndɛ tuku nde nda, kɛrɛ hɛ ndɛ thɔhɔy; wundɛ piriŋe nde, kɛrɛ hɛ ndɛ kuto.’ ”

Yisɔs tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ: na “Bananhulu wunthe kɔŋ iŋ nde badethiteke wunthe wo dethiteke nanhulu nama baŋ fooma. Wundɛ sisiyo ŋafuŋutu ba dɔma na badethiteke woŋ thanki teetuwa nanhulu nama baŋ.
Bananhulu woŋ ŋindi ba badethiteke woŋ be ka thiya, na ‘Mbɛ hu yaŋ yuyɛ haŋ ba yi? Awa saa tɔŋ kuna si kute yi iŋ si thunkuŋ yi, baa yi sa nda niyɔ bawali wokiyaŋ hali.’
Huna tepe badethiteke woŋ ka yɛthɛ nama, na ‘Mbɛ hu yaŋ ni yee naa see hɛ yaŋ ka kanito wali bakiyaŋ baŋ na? Yaŋ sa nda punku wali ba ka kusaala koŋ baŋ; yaŋ nɛnɛ kɔŋ niyɔ kuyaahu ba yawa.
Ka tete yaŋ kɔthɛŋ nda na yaŋ ni, haliko na yama biya yereke ka bankɛŋ bakɛnamɛŋ naa yaŋ fuŋuto ka wali ba ka dethiteke haŋ baŋ.’
Huna thiye wundɛ bi ba thunkuna mariki nama woŋ beŋ. Wundɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ womayoŋ woŋ, na ‘Tima yi ba thunkuna mariki wokiyaŋ woŋ?’
Wundɛ tepe, na ‘Mayɔ thakiyanɛ kɛmɛŋ biye.’ Huna tepe badethiteke woŋ, na ‘Ya dondo kuthagba nda koŋ; dɔŋɔ, e yi thikipa magbali maŋ ka thakiyanɛ kɛmɛ wunthe.’

Wundɛ thiyi hɛlɛŋ wobiye woŋ, na ‘Mbu yi, tima yi ba thunkuna mariki wokiyaŋ woŋ?’ Wundɛ tepe, na ‘Paka yankamani kɛmɛŋ bitaati.’ Wundɛ tepe, na ‘Ya dondo kuthagba nda koŋ e yi thikipa magbali maŋ ka paka yankamani kɛmɛ wunthe e kɔnthɔ kasɔhi.’

Mariki woŋ baŋ thunkunu badethiteke wo be yɔhɔ niyo lanɛya woŋ baŋ ba kele nama haŋ ba na kɔsinɔkɔy wundɛ ba malɔkɔ ma see maŋ. Biya bi dɔŋɔy ba deethuwa nanhulu ba ka dunia baŋ baŋ beŋ hɛ akele haaŋ adaŋande mpati bi ka waŋ baŋ beŋ.
“Bɛna yaŋ tepe bena, dethuweŋ thayathikiya ka nanhulu ba ka dunia baŋ baŋ, baa, mɛnɛ bɛŋ pɛyi bena, beŋ kɔŋ yɛroko iŋ Masaala ka madoŋe ma kɔy yo kɔy maŋ.
Wɔ yo wɔ wo thimɔy niyo lanɛya ka wuyete, wundɛ kɔŋ thimɔ niyo lanɛya ka wubɔyɛ.
Mɛnɛ beŋ tha niyɔ bendo yɔhɔy niyo lanɛya ka nanhulu ba ka dunia baŋ baŋ, nkaana bena piteke ba nanhulu ba yamɛ yiki baŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma?
Naa beŋ tha niyɔ bendo yɔhɔy niyo lanɛya ka ntha ki ka wɔ hɛna kɔŋ, mbɛ bena dunkune wukendeŋ wuŋ gbeeŋ?

“Bawali ka wo punku niyiyɛ marikɔŋ biye wali, baa lɔkɔ hɛ ndɛ kɔŋ thambo wunthe e wundɛ thimo wunthe, maa ndɛ kɔŋ dunkuŋ wunthe yiki e niŋ putiyɔ e yethitɔ wunthe. Yi sa punku niyiyɛ Masaala na wali e yi hɛlɛŋ niyɔ waayi wo ka nanhulu kɔɔ hanthe.”
Naa yuye huŋ biFaresini beŋ, bi thimo kɔbiri wumandiŋ-mandiŋ beŋ, wuŋ thime bindɛ dɛkuiŋ.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe bindɛ, na “Beŋ, bena tɔŋinɔkɔ ka biya nɔŋ bendo thumbɛ, kɛrɛ Masaala kɔthɛŋ thathukuma thakendeŋ thaŋ. Bɛyiniŋ ba biyamɛti kutu wumandiŋ, Masaala kute bɛŋ nɔŋ ntha kituunuwɛ.

“Bɛyiniŋ ba gbalo ka Siraŋ baŋ baŋ iŋ magbali ma ka banabiŋ beŋ maŋ ni wali haaŋ ka malɔkɔ ma ka Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ. There nda ka malɔkɔ mabɛina, Huseri Huyɔhɔy hu ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ niyo kɛwandi. Wɔ yo wɔ nda adekiyɔkɔ ba biyande kɛndɛ.
Kɛrɛ ba soora wunthe wo ka Siraŋ baŋ ba fuŋa, bɛyi bɛna bakahɛ-kahɛ; wu kɔŋ yaŋ niyɔ wuŋɛnɔy ba ariana iŋ dunia baŋ ba daŋande.
“Wɔ yo wɔ wo baŋaŋ wɔtɔ nama e wundɛ ka yɛnta yɛrɛmɛ wohɛna, wundɛ ni kubɛy. Awa wɔ yo wɔ wo yɛnti yɛrɛmɛ wo baŋino iŋ wandama, wundɛ ni kubɛy.
“Bananhulu wunthe kɔŋ nde wo thɔɔ mupithi muyɔhɔy mu kahɛ mɔlɔŋ, e wundɛ kɔ thɔma wumandiŋ timo tima.
Bamɔnɛ wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ wo dɔma Lasarɔsi wo thiŋɛ iŋ mathimɔyŋ, wo ŋɔɔ timo tima ka biyo hu ka bananhulu woŋ.
Lasarɔsi thimoŋ ba thɔma ŋaboba ŋa bananhulu woŋ tɔnki ŋaŋ ka karo nama baŋ. Yɔkɔŋ ŋatheŋ bina see ba minuwa mathimɔyŋ nama maŋ.
Malɔkɔ manthe bamɔnɛ woŋ see tuku. Wundɛ see kata iŋ malekɛŋ beŋ e ka thiyo ka thɛnkɔ tha ka Ebrahim thaŋ. Bananhulu woŋ see hɛlɛŋ tuku e wundɛ mankuwo.
Ka yahanama kɛna niyɔy wundɛ ka nambara bathoonɛ. Kɛna dethe wundɛ ka thinthi. Wundɛ kute Ebrahim na wuthokiye e Lasarɔsi niŋ doŋe kuwaŋ.

Kɛna yele wundɛ thampa, na ‘Fandaŋ Ebrahim, kutiyɛ yama nkinikiniŋ. Ŋinda Lasarɔsi na ba wundɛ be muluŋ kuthenke nama koŋ ka mandi e wundɛ yama thondine ka hiliŋ niŋ haŋ baa yaŋ kɔŋ ka nambara bamandiŋ ka buu buŋ buŋ!’
Kɛrɛ Ebrahim tepe, na ‘Hatiŋ woŋ, siyuwa naa nde yi ka dunia baŋ ka hɛri bakɛnda e Lasarɔsi kɔ niyɔ thɔrɔ. Kɛrɛ ka hɛ woŋ wundɛ kɔŋ ka mathɛbɛ, yi nɛnɛ yi kɔŋ ka wuthoonɛ.

Hali ba huŋ kutɛ hintiŋ, mateete makɛntuŋ iŋ beŋ, matha masunŋɔy maŋarinɛ nɔŋ ka tha ka tha kuyɛkɛŋ mankande ma kɔŋ mina mateete ba bi dondo beŋ bi ba kaa kendeŋ ka beŋ, bi be tha kɛndɛ punku kaa, awa wɔ be tha hɛlɛŋ punku ŋayi kɛndɛ ba saa dondo.’
Huna tepe bananhulu woŋ, na ‘Mba yaŋ theteke nda yina, fandaŋ woŋ, ba yi be ŋindi Lasarɔsi na ka biya niŋ ka,
baa yaŋ kɔŋ iŋ mbɛndaŋ bisɔhi, haliko wundɛ be bindɛ ka yeli na sa nda bindɛ see du tha du thɔrɔ dondo.’
Kɛrɛ Ebrahim tepe, na ‘Bi kɔŋ iŋ magbali ma ka Musa maŋ iŋ ma ka banabiŋ beŋ maŋ ba bindɛ yela, awa bi kɔŋ ba mɛŋ poniyɛ kuiha.’
Huna tepe bananhulu woŋ, na ‘Ade, fandaŋ woŋ Ebrahim, huŋ sa ni wali, kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wɔ ŋaye nda ka tuka haŋ e wundɛ bindɛ ka yela, bi kɔŋ sikiyɔkɔ maŋaye ka hakɛŋ bikɛnamɛŋ.’
Huna tepe Ebrahim, na ‘Mɛnɛ bindɛ tha poniyɛ kuiha magbali ma ka Musa maŋ iŋ ma ka banabiŋ beŋ maŋ, hali aŋaye na wɔ ka tuka haŋ bindɛ sa sikiyɔkɔ.’ ”
Huna tepe Yisɔs ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Nɔndi yaathi, bɛyiniŋ ba thiiki biya ba ŋɔta ka hakɛ bɛ kɔŋ see, kɛrɛ nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ka wɔ bɛina wo bɛŋ sisi woŋ.
Ba niya wunthe ka bithahuwɔy beŋ beŋ ba ŋɔta ka hakɛ, wu kɔŋ niyɔ kuhita ba wɔɔŋ yantino raka humandiŋ ka nkoyo e ka yelo ka mandi masunŋɔy-sunŋɔy.
Bɛna niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ ba ba beŋ ni. “Mɛnɛ wɛnda ni hakɛ, pinda niŋ; naa wundɛ sikɔŋ sɔkɔrɔ hakɛŋ nama baŋ, pɛniyɛ niŋ.
Mɛnɛ wundɛ ni yina bɛyi banɛnɔy dɔŋɔ kasɔŋ-kaye e wundɛ yina theteke dɔŋɔ kasɔŋ-kaye ba gbɛɛŋ woŋ, yi kɔŋ ba niŋ pɛniyɛ.”
Huna tepe baseriŋ bithɔɔkɔ beŋ ka Mariki woŋ, na “Yaandi, ndintiyɛ mina kulanɛya ntuŋ koŋ.”

Huna tepe Mariki woŋ, na “Mɛnɛ beŋ niyɔy iŋ kulanɛya nɔŋ thaa humɛɛsɛ hu dɔma na mɔstadi, hu thɔyande nɔŋ mpende, e beŋ tepe kuyeŋ kumandiŋ koŋ koŋ na ‘Mukɔ dondo e yi ka kɔɔ ka mankɔ ka,’ ku kɔŋ bena putiyɔ.

“Mbu na wuŋ niyɔy na wɔ wunthe ka beŋ kɔŋ iŋ bawali wunthe wo niŋ niyiyɛ wali ka yiya nama maa wo niŋ tɔliyɛ takɛŋ? Mɛnɛ bawali woŋ tɛŋ ŋaye ka dumgbu, e yi kɔŋ niŋ dɔŋ, na ‘Kahina, yi be sɛkɛthi muthɔma nda, yi be thɔŋ’?

Wuŋ sa niyɔ! Yi kɔŋ hintiŋ niŋ yenke tepe, na ‘Yehinuwa muthɔma mukiyaŋ muŋ e yi sɛkitha muthɔɔ mukɛnda e yi yama dunkune muthɔma muŋ. Naa yaŋ muŋ thɔŋ e yaŋ kɔ thiiye, mahɛŋ mabɛina yi kɔŋ ntiŋ sɛkɛthi muthɔma mukɛnda muŋ ba thɔma.’
Wuŋ ka na yɔkɔŋ bawali woŋ thiyo maamo ba putiyɔ nama yamari haŋ.
Nɛna hɛlɛŋ beŋ, naa beŋ thanki niya ba domo beŋ ba niya baŋ, tɛpaŋ, na ‘Miŋ kɔŋ hɔkɔŋ bawaliŋ; gbɛthɛŋ bakɛntuŋ bɛna ni miŋ baŋ.’ ”
Naa wundɛ ka biyasi nama haŋ ba kaa ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi, wundɛ fuŋe mateete ma ka Sameriya iŋ ka Kalili.
Naa bohe Yisɔs ba biyande ka mɛti banthe, kɛna penko wundɛ iŋ biya kɔhi bi iŋ nthoonaŋ kinɛnɔy ki bohe ka kɔtɔ ku ka wɔmɛti koŋ ka thinthi e bindɛ kɔɔ wuthokiye.
Bindɛ yele thampa e tepe Yisɔs na, na “Mariki, kutiyɛ mina nkinikiniŋ.”
Naa kute Yisɔs bindɛ, wundɛ tepe bindɛ, na “Kaaŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ bafodeni beŋ, ba bi be kɔthɔ na beŋ pethɔy.” Kɛrɛ naa bindɛ key, bindɛ kute ba dɔma na bindɛ pethɔy nagbelebe.
Wunthe ka mateete namɛŋ, naa kute wundɛ ba dɔma na wundɛ pethɔy, wundɛ duu kaŋ thunkunuwa Masaala na iŋ thampɛŋ thatɔɔkɛ.
Wundɛ see ŋɔti ka ŋathaki ŋa ka Yisɔs e niŋ thiya maamo, kɛrɛ hati lamgba woŋ, wɔ na nde wo ŋaye ka siya bayethitiyo ba dɔma baŋ na biSameriya.
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “E kɔhi kutɛ puyo? Mbu bisɔŋ-binaŋ beŋ?
E wɔ yo wɔ wohɛna tha kutɔ ba si thiya Masaala na maamo yɔkɔŋ thahinɛ woŋ baŋ?”
Huna tepe wundɛ hati lamgba woŋ, na “Ŋayi, kɔ, key ba ntha nda. Lanɛya bakɛnda petheŋ yina.”

Naa thonthiŋino wundɛ iŋ biFaresini beŋ ba malɔkɔ ma Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ see, wundɛ tepe, na “Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ seeta iŋ bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ tɛŋ.
Maa, ba hintiŋ tɛpa, na ‘Ya huŋ dondo,’ maa, ‘Ya huŋ kanka.’ Dethaŋ hɛ, Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ hu kɔŋ mateete makendeŋ.”
Huna tepe wundɛ ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Malɔkɔ mɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ see ma beŋ thimo ba hɛlɛŋ kutiyɔkɔ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ iŋ malɔkɔ makɛnama maŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ sa mɛŋ kutu.
Biya binɔndi bi kɔŋ bena tepe, na ‘Dethaŋ ka thuhaŋ ka,’ maa ‘Dethaŋ dondo,’ kɛrɛ baŋ kɛndɛ dethi, ba hintiŋ tɛpa na ba bindɛ yema.
Naa nthɔŋ beŋ kutu naa kuwalani koŋ ni ka kuthahinɛ koŋ na, ku kɔŋ mɔɔlɔti kuthahinɛ koŋ ŋaye kuwaŋ kunthe makey ka kuwaŋ kukuntheŋ koŋ, nɛna hɛlɛŋ wuŋ niyɔ ka malɔkɔ ma ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ maŋ.
Kɛrɛ wundɛ boheŋ hintiŋ ba niyo thɔrɔ e baŋinoko iŋ biya bi ka yamana nama baŋ.
Na nde nthɔŋ wuŋ ka yamana ba ka Nowa baŋ na, nɛna hɛlɛŋ wuŋ niyɔ ka yamana ba ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ baŋ.
Wɔ yo wɔ athɔŋ, athiiye, ayɛntuwande haaŋ saaŋ bohi malɔkɔ ma thɔɔyɛ Nowa ka gbe baŋ maŋ. Mandi matɛnkɛ maŋ bindɛ si kɔruwa fooma.
Wu kɔŋ niyɔ nɔŋ na niyɔy nde wuŋ ka yamana ba ka Lɔti baŋ na. Wɔ yo wɔ athɔŋ, athiiye, aboyi, ani gbɔŋ, athuu, athoyi.
Kɛrɛ ka malɔkɔ ma fuŋ Lɔti ka Sɔdɔmi, Masaala thuhuŋ kɛndɛ tharaka tha buu nɔŋ koyoŋ ŋaye ka kuthahinɛ koŋ e bindɛ si kɔɔruwa fooma.
Nɛna hɛlɛŋ wuŋ niyɔ ka malɔkɔ ma Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see.
“Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, wɔ yo wɔ wo penko ka gbada ka, ndɛ bɛiŋ nda biyande ba sɛkitha munki nama; nɛna hɛlɛŋ wɔ yo wɔ wo thɔthɔi ka dumgbu nama, ndɛ bɛiŋ nda kaho ba duwa.
Simɔkɔŋ ba yɛrɛmɛ wo ka Lɔti woŋ!
Wɔ yo wɔ wo gbɛrɛŋɛŋ ba niya sii nama baŋ kisi, wundɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ piriŋiŋ, kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo piriŋiŋ sii nama baŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ bɛŋ kutu.
Ka huyɛ babɛina biya biye bi kɔŋ ŋɔɔ ka kuhinsi kunthe; wunthe kɔŋ si sɛkitha e wunthe kɛndɛ peyo.
Yɛrɛmɛŋ biye bi kɔŋ kɔɔ ka yɔŋa ka kuthodo kunthe, wunthe kɔŋ sɛkitha e wunthe kɛndɛ peyo. [
Biyɛthɛŋ biye bi kɔŋ niyɔ ka dumgbu banthe; wunthe kɔŋ sɛkitha e wunthe kɛndɛ pɛyo.]”
Kɛna thonthiŋine bindɛ niŋ, na “Thɔ kɛndɛ ka wuŋ niiye, Mariki?” Huna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ, na “Naa beŋ kute ŋabeli ŋa ŋoye, beŋ kɔŋ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na yibani bi kɔŋ ŋɔti kɛndɛ.”
Kɛna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ ba bindɛ thaninuwa ba dɔma na bi kɔŋ ba niya kuraminɛ timo tima awa bindɛ ka ba yɔntuwa hali.
Wundɛ tepe, na “Bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ wunthe kɔŋ nde ka mɛti banthe. Wundɛ payeta Masaala na, awa ndɛ niyeta wɔmɛti yiki.
Awa bagbokora wunthe kɔŋ kɛndɛ ka mɛti babɛina, wo see yako-yako ka bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ woŋ, e kɔ tɛpa, na ‘Mase yama ba yama dunkune mayoho niŋ maŋ ka kithi ba miŋ iŋ ntɔŋ woŋ baŋ.’
Bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ woŋ tha mɛyi ba wuŋ niya yako, kɛrɛ naa nambe wuŋ haaŋ wundɛ tepe ka yɛthɛ nama, na ‘Hali na niyɔy wuŋ na yaŋ payeta Masaala na, yaŋ niyeta wɔmɛti yiki,
halisa bagbokora woŋ kɔŋ yama ni thɔrɔ. Yaŋ kɔŋ kɔnsɔŋɔŋ kithi nama baŋ. Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ, saa nama haŋ yako-yako hu kɔŋ yama thamaŋ.’ ”
Kɛna key Yisɔs ka kɔtɔkɔy e tɛpa, na “Yuyaŋ hu tepe bakɔnsɔŋɔŋ wosikɔi woŋ.
E Masaala sa kɔnsɔŋɔŋ wuthumbɛ biya nama beŋ bi niŋ berinteke gbɛɛŋ iŋ piripiri beŋ? E wundɛ kɔŋ kɔɔkɔ ba bindɛ mase?
Yaŋ tepe bena, wundɛ kɔŋ bindɛ mase ka kɔnsiŋina haŋ, awa ndɛ kɔŋ ntiŋ wuŋ ni yako. Kɛrɛ, e Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ pɛnki biya bi niyɛ lanɛya ka dunia baŋ naa wundɛ see?”
Yisɔs gbonkoy hɛlɛŋ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ ka biya bi niyɛ lanɛya yɛthɛ bakɛnamɛŋ ba bindɛ niyɔ bithumbɛ e bindɛ yethitɔ wɔ yo wɔ wohɛna:
“Biya biye bina kɔɔyɛ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ ba niya kuraminɛ, wunthe woŋ woFaresi, wowuntheŋ woŋ wo bathuu duthu.

WoFaresi woŋ kɔɔyɛ ndɛ wuntheŋ; ndɛ ni kuraminɛ ka yɛthɛ nama e tɛpa, na ‘Yaŋ thiyi yina maamo Masaala, baa yaŋ ka nɔŋ biya bihɛna; yaŋ ka bamilɛ, yaŋ ka wɔ nɛnɔy, yaŋ ka babɛy. Yaŋ thiyi yina maamo, baa yaŋ ka nɔŋ bathuu duthu wo kɔɔyɛ kanka woŋ na.
Yaŋ kɔŋ bohi suŋ kaye ba wiki, yaŋ kɔŋ dunkuŋ wu tɛŋɛŋ kɔhi wuŋ maŋaye ka ntha yo ntha ki iŋ yaŋ.’
Kɛrɛ bathuu duthu woŋ kɔɔyɛ wuthokiye. Wundɛ tha hintiŋ nthɔŋ ŋataŋ thaaya nama thaŋ ka ariana; wundɛ sinkɔŋ yaha nama haŋ e tɛpa, na ‘Masaala, kutiyɛ yama nkinikiniŋ, yando bahakɛ.’ ”

Yisɔs tepe, na “Yaŋ tepe bena, bathuu duthu woŋ baŋ si duu ka banka nama ka, Masaala yɛrɔkɔy niŋ nɔŋ wɔ thumbɛ. Kɛrɛ woFaresi woŋ, Masaala tha niŋ yɛrɔkɔ nɔŋ wɔ thumbɛ. Baa, wɔ yo wɔ wo ŋatinɔkɔy, wundɛ kɔŋ thathina; awa wɔ yo wɔ wo thathinɔkɔy, wundɛ kɔŋ ŋatina.”
Komisɛŋ binɔndi sisi malɛɛthɛŋ namɛŋ ba Yisɔs be bindɛ si tutu thɛnkɔ e bindɛ thiyiyɛ thaduba. Kɛrɛ naa kute bakarandeni beŋ bindɛ, bindɛ pinde bindɛ ba bi be tha wuŋ ni.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs thiyi ba bi be sisa, wundɛ tepe, na “Mpati beŋ saaɛŋ kiyaŋ do; baŋ bindɛ pindi, baa na mpati beŋ na, nɛna biya bi biyande ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ ba niyɔ.
Yaathi, yaŋ tepe bena, yɔkɔŋ wɔ yɛrɔkɔy Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ nɔŋ na huŋ hatiyɛ yɛreke na, mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ, wundɛ sa kɛndɛ punku biyande.”
Kɛna thonthiŋine niŋ wɔ wunthe wo iŋ makooye maŋatɛ, na “Karimɔkɔ woyɔhɔy, mbɛ ba yaŋ ni ba kuta sii ba kɔy yo kɔy?”
Huna thonthiŋine niŋ Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ ba yama yi thiye karimɔkɔ woyɔhɔy? Wɔ yo wɔ ka woyɔhɔy yɔkɔŋ Masaala pe.
Yi kɔthɛŋ Sirani ba ka Masaala baŋ: ‘Ba ni kubɛy, ba kɔri, ba tuwe, ba ni maseri maŋasɔkɛ, niya fanda na yiki iŋ nanda.’ ”
Huna tepe wundɛ, na “Sirani baŋ baŋ fooma yaŋ kooye bɛŋ kɔsina kabi yaŋ kɔŋ nde hatiyɛ.”

Naa yuye Yisɔs yaabi baŋ baŋ, wundɛ tepe hati lamgba woŋ, na “Kɛrɛ bɛyi banthe bɛna pɛyɛ yina, kaa ni gbɔŋ ntha yo ntha ki iŋ yi, e yi dunkuna ka bamɔnɛŋ beŋ. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina yi kɔŋ niyɔ iŋ kɛɛ bamandiŋ ka ariana. Mahɛŋ mabɛina e yi saa ba yama si yema.”
Kɛrɛ naa see hati lamgba woŋ yuyɛ yaabi ba ni Yisɔs baŋ baŋ, wundɛ teetuwɔy thukuma, baa bananhulu na nde womandiŋ.
Naa niŋ Yisɔs dethi, wundɛ tepe, na “Akaahi ba bananhuluiŋ beŋ ba biyande ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ!
Akaahi ba maama womandiŋ nɔŋ nyɔkɔmɛ ba fuŋande ka matha ma ka masandeŋ. Awa ba bananhulu ba biyande ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ, wu kɔŋ yaŋ kaahuwa.”
Biya bi yuyɛ huŋ beŋ tepe, na “Mbu mbɛ bi niyɔ kisi ntiŋ nda?”
Yisɔs tepe, na “Ba sa wɔmɛti punku niya, Masaala kɔŋ bɛŋ ni.”
Huna tepe Pita, na “Detha, miŋ fooma pɛyi yikiyani bakɛntuŋ e miŋ yina yema.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Nɔndi yaathi, yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ yo wɔ ka wo pɛyɛnɛ yikiya nama, maa yɛrɛmɛ nama, maa mbɛndama, maa biya nama, maa mpati nama ba saathɛ ba Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ,
wo sa muŋ duu ka kuta makɔɔni mabɔyɛ e daŋande ba mu pɛyɛŋ wundɛ muŋ ka yamana bahɛ baŋ, iŋ sii ba kɔy yo kɔy ka yamana ba nɔŋ see baŋ.”

Awa naa ŋakɔy wundɛ, wundɛ sekithe bakarandeni bikɔhi iŋ biye beŋ. Wundɛ tepe kɛnamɛŋ, na “Dethaŋ, kaa na miŋ key haŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi; bɛyi yo bɛyi ba thankɛ gbalo iŋ banabiŋ beŋ ba Hati ka Wɔ woŋ, bɛ kɔŋ niyɔ nanthe nathesi nɔŋ na gbalo nde bɛŋ na.
Baa wundɛ kɔŋ dunkuna ka thɛnkɔ tha ka biya bi be kɔthɔ Masaala na. Ndɛ kɔŋ hɛtha, e niyo kuyaahu, e thutho.
Bi kɔŋ niŋ gbuduŋ, e kɔra niŋ, awa ka gbɛɛŋ bataati baŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ ŋayi.”
Kɛrɛ bakarandeni beŋ tha metho bɛyi banthe. Kolo ba ka madunkunɔkɔy maŋ maŋ tha bindɛ methe. Bindɛ tha punku fuŋeke bɛyiniŋ ba gbonkoy Yisɔs baŋ.
Naa Yisɔs thuriye ka Yɛriko, wɔ mankɔy thaaya doŋeŋ nde ka gboŋa baŋ kuwaŋ e kɔ yawa.
Naa yuye wɔ mankɔy thaaya woŋ sɛthɛ baŋ bɛ si daŋande, wundɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bithuriye niŋ beŋ, na “Mbɛ mu niyɔy?”
Bindɛ tepe niŋ, na “Yisɔs wo ka Nasarɛthi woŋ na daŋande.”
Kɛna bereŋ wundɛ, na “Yisɔs! Hati ka Dauda, yaandi kutiyɛ yama nkinikiniŋ!”
Bi nde ka kɔtɔkɔy biya muŋ beŋ pinde niŋ ba ndɛ be daanɔkɔ, kɛrɛ wundɛ yame ntiŋ berina, na “Hati ka Dauda, yaandi kutiyɛ yama nkinikiniŋ!”
Kɛna kɔɔyɛ Yisɔs. Wundɛ ni yamari ba hati lamgba wo mankɔy thaaya woŋ be sisa kɛnama. Naa siso wundɛ, Yisɔs thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na
“Mbɛ ba thimo yi ba yaŋ yina niyiyɛ?” Huna tepe wundɛ, na “Karimɔkɔ, yaŋ thimoŋ ba hɛlɛŋ kuta.”
Yisɔs tepe kɛnama, na “Awa kuta; kulanɛya kukɛnda petheŋ yina.”
Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina hati lamgba woŋ punke ba kuta. Wundɛ ŋaye e yema Yisɔs na, e kaa kaŋ thiya Masaala na maamo. Naa kute wuŋ biya beŋ, bindɛ fooma thunkunu Masaala na.
Naa tɛŋ Yisɔs ka Yɛriko, wundɛ bohe ba kɛriŋande mɛti baŋ.
Bayaha wo ka thuuwa duthu wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ. Wundɛ kɔŋ dɔma na Sakiyɔsi, wo bananhulu womandiŋ.
Wo thimo nde ba kutiyɔkɔ wo dɔma Yisɔs woŋ. Kɛrɛ wundɛ niyɔ wothurɔy. Wundɛ punketa ba kuta Yisɔs na, na sɛthɛ baŋ babɔyɛ.
Huna thare wundɛ ka kɔtɔkɔy e ka dunkɔ ka kuyeŋ ba kuta Yisɔs na, wo nde ba fuŋe gboŋa babɛina woŋ.
Naa see Yisɔs kɛndɛ tɛŋ, wundɛ dethe ka thinthi e tɛpa ka Sakiyɔsi, na “Kahina thuha Sakiyɔsi, baa ka banka bakɛnda baŋ na hɛ yaŋ niye yikiya.”
Sakiyɔsi thuhe yako e yɛritɔ niŋ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ mamandiŋ.
Biya beŋ fooma bi kutiyɔkɔy wuŋ beŋ bohe gbonkiyɔkɔ e kɔ tɛpa, na “Hati lamgba woŋ bohe kaa kaŋ thɔma ka banka ba ka bahakɛ!”

Sakiyɔsi ŋayinɔkɔy e tepe Mariki woŋ, na “Detha, hɛmɔŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ haninande nanhulu niŋ baŋ mateete, e yaŋ dunkune bamɔnɛŋ beŋ. Mɛnɛ kanite wɔ ntha yo ntha ka kɔɔtha maa ka kansuŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ niŋ wuŋ dutiyɛ makɔɔni manaŋ.”
Huna tepe niŋ Yisɔs, na “Hɛ kisi baŋ biyande ka banka baŋ baŋ, baa wundɛ hɛlɛŋ hati Ebrahim na.
Hati ka Wɔ woŋ see ba saa ka deethuwa iŋ ba si niya kisi bipiriŋɛ beŋ.”

Naa bindɛ poniyɛ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ kuiha, wundɛ key ka kɔtɔkɔy kaŋ tepe bindɛ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ, baa ka lɔkɔ babɛina wundɛ bohe nda ba biyande ka Yɛrusalɛmi, awa biya beŋ fooma simɔkɔy nda ba dɔma na Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ hu kɔŋ tete tɛŋ.
Huna tepe wundɛ bindɛ, na “Wɔ ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka hugbakine kɔŋ nde ba kaa wuthokiye napooŋ ba ka boho hugbakine. Wundɛ dɛɛnki ba duwa ka mɛti nama ka naa wundɛ key kutu hugbakine haŋ.
Saanuŋ wundɛ ba kaa, wundɛ thiyi biya kɔhi ŋaye ka bawaliŋ nama beŋ, e dunkune bindɛ kɔbiri woboyi wunthe-wunthe, na ‘Pɛyɔŋ niŋ sikinuwande haaŋ yaŋ nɔŋ saa.’
Kɛrɛ biya bi doŋe wundɛ ka mɛti baŋ beŋ kaake tha niŋ thimo. Huna peyene bindɛ baseriŋ mahɛŋ nama ba ka tepe bayahɛŋ beŋ, na ‘Hati lamgba woŋ, miŋ thimota niŋ ba wundɛ niyɔ gbaku wokɛntuŋ.’
“Halisa hati lamgba woŋ key kutu hugbakine haŋ. Naa kute wundɛ huŋ, wundɛ duu. Wundɛ see thiyi bawaliŋ nama beŋ ba bi be si tɔŋ kuna ba wɔ yo wɔ si pɛyɛ wundɛ ka kuta.
Womayoŋ woŋ see wundɛ tepe, na ‘Gbaku woŋ, ka kɔbiri wo dunkune nde yama yi woŋ, ya kɔbiriŋ biboyi kɔhi ka thinthi.’
Huna tepe wundɛ, na ‘Yi, bawali woyɔhɔy na yi. Mba na niyɔy yi wɔ thimɔy niyo lanɛya ka wuthahuwɔy wuŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ yina dunkuŋ ba kɛriŋiyɛ mɛtiŋ kɔhi.’
Bawali wobiye woŋ see. Wundɛ tepe, na ‘Gbaku woŋ, yaŋ kute kɔbiriŋ bisɔhi biboyi ka thinthi ka wo dunkune nde yi yama woŋ.’
Huna tepe wundɛ niŋ, na ‘Yi kɔŋ niyɔ bakɛrɛŋ ka mɛtiŋ basɔhi.’
Bawali wowuntheŋ woŋ see hɛlɛŋ. Wundɛ tepe, na ‘Gbaku woŋ, ya dondo kɔbiri woboyi wunthe wo dunkune nde yi yama woŋ. Yaŋ kosineŋ nɔŋ niŋ ka kulɛmpi-lɛmpi ku ka yankisa niŋ woŋ.
Yando nde yina payɔ, baa yi, wɔ na yi wo thiyɛ dɛnkɛŋ. Yi kɔŋ sɛkɛthi wu ka wukɛnda; yi kɔŋ ŋɔŋ ka tha yi payi.’
Huna tepe gbaku woŋ, na ‘Yi, bawali wonɛnɔy na yi. Madunkunɔkɔy nda maŋ mɛna yaŋ sɛkɛthi ba yina thonkine. Yi, yi kɔthɛŋ ba yaŋ kɔ sɛkitha wu ka wukiyaŋ, e yaŋ kɔ ŋɔna ka tha yaŋ payi.
Mbu mbɛ ba tha nde yi thohinuwe kɔbiri niŋ woŋ? Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, naa yaŋ duu nde nɔŋ yaŋ kɔŋ nde nɔŋ si tutiya ka thunkuno.’
Huna tepe wundɛ biya bi kɔɔyɛ nde kɛndɛ beŋ, na ‘Bohitaŋ niŋ kɔbiri woŋ, e beŋ niŋ dunkuna ka wo iŋ kɔbiriŋ biboyi kɔhi woŋ.’
Huna tepe bindɛ, na ‘Kɛrɛ wundɛ kɔŋ nda iŋ kɔbiriŋ biboyi kɔhi ye!’
Huna tepe wundɛ, na ‘Yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ yo wɔ wo iŋ ntha woŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ ndintiya wumandiŋ. Kɛrɛ wo ka iŋ ntha woŋ, hali wuyete wu iŋ wundɛ wuŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ wuŋ kanita.
Ka tete, hadeni niŋ beŋ bi ka nde ba yaŋ niyɔ gbaku namɛŋ beŋ, sisaŋ bindɛ dondo e bindɛ si koro ka thaaya niŋ thaŋ!’ ”
Naa thanki Yisɔs gbonkiya, wundɛ key kubiyasi nama koŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy ba kaa ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
Naa bohe wundɛ thuriye ka mɛtiŋ ba ka Bɛthɛfɛki mɛnɛ ka Bɛthani, ka kusɛri ku dɔma na Ɔlifisi, Yisɔs ŋindi biya biye ŋaye ka bakarandeni nama beŋ ka kɔtɔkɔy.

Wundɛ ŋindi bindɛ iŋ manunkunɔkɔ maŋ maŋ, na “Kaaŋ ka mɛti ba bena ka kɔtɔkɔy baŋ. Naa beŋ biyande kɛndɛ, beŋ kɔŋ kɛndɛ pɛnki maama wotutuyo wohatiyɛ yuke wo be hɛ tutuyo bahanthe; pɛɛkaŋ niŋ, e beŋ niŋ sisa dondo.
Awa mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bena ba beŋ niŋ peeke, tepeŋ niŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Mariki woŋ na thimo niŋ ba niŋ niye bɛyi.’ ”
Bakarandeni biye beŋ key, awa bindɛ key pɛnki nɔŋ na tepo nthɔŋ bindɛ iŋ Yisɔs na.
Naa bohe bindɛ pɛɛka maama woŋ, bibiyɛ niŋ beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bindɛ, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ peeke maama woŋ?”
Huna tepe bindɛ, na “Mariki woŋ na thimo niŋ ba niŋ niye bɛyi.”
Bindɛ sisi niŋ ka Yisɔs, e bindɛ yiinthuwa maama wohatiyɛ woŋ ŋahɔli e bindɛ tuta kɛndɛ Yisɔs na.
Naa Yisɔs kata iŋ maama woŋ, biya binɔndi bohe taayuwa ŋahɔli ka gboŋa ba Yisɔs fuŋe baŋ.

Naa thuriye Yisɔs ka Yɛrusalɛmi, ka thuhe gboŋa ba ŋaye ka kusɛri ku ka Ɔlifisi koŋ baŋ, bakarandeni beŋ fooma bohe thiya Masaala na maamo ka thampa thaŋatɛ ba bɛyiniŋ babukuyuwɛ ba thanki bindɛ kutiyɔkɔ baŋ.
Bindɛ tepe, na “Masaala thiyiyɛŋ gbaku wobɛina thaduba wo see ka keŋ ku ka Mariki woŋ! Mathɛbɛ ka ariana! Yiki ka kuwaŋ ku ka Masaala!”
Awa biFaresini binɔndi ka mateete ma ka biya muŋ tepe Yisɔs na, na “Karimɔkɔ, pinda bakarandeni nda beŋ.”
Huna tepe wundɛ bindɛ, na “Yaŋ tepe bena, hali adaanɔkɔy na beŋ beŋ, tharaka thaŋ thaŋ gbeeŋ thɛ kɔŋ yɛli thampa.”
Naa thuriye wundɛ mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi baŋ e bɛŋ detha, wundɛ bokoti bɛŋ.
Wundɛ tepe, na “Wu niyɔyŋ nde hɛ ba dɔma na beŋ kɔthɛ bɛyiniŋ ba sisi mathɛbɛ! Kɛrɛ ka tete bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma ba nunɔkɔy bena.
Baa malɔkɔ mɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ bena see ma bohe hadeni bikendeŋ beŋ ba bena pɛnkande e bena lɔnkita kaake kufɛŋ ndo kufɛŋ.
Bi kɔŋ teeti mɛti ndeŋ baŋ iŋ wɔ yo wɔ wo kaake ka thatha baŋ. Bindɛ sa pɛyi raka hunthe hu tute ka ntɔ nama, baa beŋ tha ŋee malɔkɔ ma see Masaala ba bena si niya kisi.”
Kɛna biyande Yisɔs ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, e bɔha kanthuwa biya beŋ fooma bi nde ni kɛndɛ gbɔni bahakuwande beŋ.
Wundɛ tepe bindɛ, na “Wuŋ thanki nde gbalo ba dɔma na Masaala tepe, na ‘Banka niŋ baŋ, bɛ kɔŋ niyɔ banka ba ka kuraminɛ,’ kɛrɛ beŋ sikɔŋ bɛŋ ka tha ka batuwani nuneke.”
Awa timo tima wundɛ kɔŋ thanani ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ. Bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ, iŋ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, iŋ bayahɛŋ bi ka biya beŋ dethi gboŋa ba bindɛ kore Yisɔs na.
Kɛrɛ bindɛ tha kutu bɛyi yo bɛyi ba bindɛ ni, baa biya beŋ fooma bi thimoŋ ba yuyɛ thampa tha ka Yisɔs thaŋ.

Lɔkɔ banthe naa nde Yisɔs thanani biya beŋ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ e ka niya kɛwandi Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ, bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ iŋ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, mɛnɛ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ see niŋ pɛnkande.
Bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “Tepe hɛ mina, mbɛ mayoho ma iŋ yi ba niya bɛyiniŋ ba yi ni baŋ? Nkaana dunkune yina mayoho mabɛina?”
Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ bindɛ, na “Yaŋ hɛlɛŋ kɔŋ bena thɔnthɔŋɔŋ kuthɔnthɔŋɔŋ kunthe; ka tete tepeŋ hɛ yama,
kama ŋaye nde mayoho ma ka Yɔni maŋ ba biye biya, ka Masaala, maa ka wɔmɛti?”
Bindɛ bohe gbonkiya ka mateete makɛnamɛŋ e ka tɛpa, na “Mɛnɛ miŋ tepe, na ‘Ŋaye ka Masaala,’ wundɛ kɔŋ tɛpi, na ‘Mbu mbɛ hu tha nde beŋ niŋ niye kulanɛya?’
Mɛnɛ miŋ tepe nɛnɛ, na ‘Ŋaye ka biyamɛti,’ biya beŋ fooma bi kɔŋ mina lɔɔpi tharaka haaŋ miŋ tuka, baa bi simekeŋ nde ba dɔma na Yɔni banabi na nde.”
Huna meyiye bindɛ Yisɔs na, na “Miŋ kɔyta ka ŋaye nde mɛŋ.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yaŋ nɛnɛ, yaŋ sa bena tepe ka kute yaŋ mayoho ba niya bɛyiniŋ ba yaŋ ni baŋ.”

Kɛna tepe wundɛ biya beŋ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ, na “Wɔ na mahɛ nde dumgbu e wundɛ thuuwa ŋayeŋ ŋatimɛ e bɛŋ dunkuna ka bawaliŋ, e bindɛ tepe ba niŋ kɔsiniyɛ mutiŋ munɔndi ba naa wundɛ tɛŋ nɔŋ, e kaa kubiyasi ka kuyɛkɛŋ kuthokiye ba wunambɛ.

Naa tɛŋ lɔkɔ ba ka thada mutiŋ muŋ baŋ, bayɔy woŋ ŋindi waayi nama wunthe ka bawaliŋ bi peye wundɛ dumgbu baŋ beŋ, ba bi be niŋ ka dunkune mutiŋ munɔndi. Kɛrɛ bawaliŋ beŋ bohe baseri woŋ. Bindɛ gbuduŋe niŋ. Bindɛ tha niŋ dunkune ntha, nɛna duu wundɛ wu ka ntha.
Huna ŋindi hɛlɛŋ wundɛ waayi wobiye woŋ. Bindɛ bohe hɛlɛŋ niŋ. Bindɛ gbuduŋe niŋ haaŋ bindɛ niŋ niya kuyaahu, nɛŋ duu ma hɛlɛŋ wu ka ntha.
Wundɛ ŋindi hɛlɛŋ wotaati. Bindɛ bohe hɛlɛŋ niŋ. Bindɛ yɔmɔni niŋ e bindɛ niŋ gbanta ka kuyɔrɔ koŋ.
Huna tepe bayɔy woŋ, na ‘Nama nda yaŋ ni ye? Hu kute yaŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ nda ŋindi hatiŋ wo thimo yaŋ woŋ gbeeŋ; thampo bi kɔŋ nda niŋ yɛrɔkɔ.’
Kɛrɛ naa kute niŋ bawaliŋ beŋ, bindɛ tepe ka yɛthɛ bakɛnamɛŋ, na ‘Woŋ ndɛ na si pɛyɛtɔ kɛɛ baŋ, nkɔraŋ niŋ haliko na kɛɛ baŋ peyiye kɛntuŋ.’
Kɛna fuŋutu bindɛ niŋ ka dumgbu baŋ e kɔra niŋ.” Huna thonthiŋine Yisɔs biya beŋ, na “Nama nda bayɔy woŋ ni bindɛ ye?
Bayɔy woŋ kɔŋ see e si kɔɔruwa bawaliŋ beŋ beŋ fooma e dunkuna dumgbu nama baŋ ka bawaliŋ bihɛna.” Naa yuye bindɛ mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ, bindɛ tepe, na “Haliko Masaala niya wuŋ thanka.”

Kɛna dethe bindɛ Yisɔs natiŋ e tɛpa, na “Mbɛ kolo ba ka magbali maŋ maŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Raka hu baŋino iŋ bathoyini beŋ haŋ ba huŋ niyɔ mayɛini, huna see niyɔ raka hu yamɛ nthɔŋ nda niyɔ waŋ ka thoya haŋ’?
Yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ yo wɔ wo ŋote raka hubɛina hu kɔŋ niŋ yɔmɔŋ, awa mɛnɛ ntiŋ raka hubɛina ŋote wɔ hu kɔŋ niŋ gbɔkɔlɔti.”
Karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ iŋ bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ yole ba bɔha Yisɔs na kɔna iŋ kɔna, baa bi kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na Yisɔs gbonkoy mbɔrɔ kɔŋ kɔŋ baŋ ba bindɛ sɔkinɔkɔ, kɛrɛ bi payɔ biya beŋ.

Kɛna bohe bindɛ deethuwa gboŋa ba bindɛ niŋ bohe. Bindɛ gbake biya binɔndi ba bi be niyɔkɔ nɔŋ biya bi thimo ba thanuwe ka Yisɔs. Bindɛ ŋindi bindɛ ba ka bohe Yisɔs na ka ŋathɔnthɔŋɔŋ, ba haliko na bindɛ niŋ dunkune ka thɛnkɔ tha ka bayaha wo ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ woŋ, wo deŋo nde iŋ biRomaŋ beŋ woŋ.

Biya beŋ beŋ see tɛpi ka Yisɔs, na “Karimɔkɔ, miŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na yi, karimɔkɔ na yi wothumbɛ; yi detheta makɔɔ ma ka wɔ, kɛrɛ yindo thanani toloŋ nɔndi ba ka Masaala baŋ iŋ madɛɛnki nama maŋ ba wɔmɛti.
Tepe hɛ mina, e wu kɔŋ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ ba thunkuna duthu ka gbaku womandiŋ wo ka Romaŋ woŋ, wo dɔma na Siisa woŋ, maa wuŋ ka ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ?”
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs kute kɔɔtha kukɛnamɛŋ koŋ. Wundɛ tepe bindɛ,
na “Toŋineŋ hɛ yama kɔbiri woŋ. Mbɛ yethi haŋ haŋ iŋ keŋ koŋ koŋ?” Huna tepe bindɛ, na “Gbaku woŋ Siisa na.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Awa dunkune gbaku woŋ wu ka gbaku, e yi dunkune Masaala na wu ka Masaala.”
Bindɛ tha kɛndɛ punku kuta gboŋa yo gboŋa ba bindɛ bohe Yisɔs na ka kupɛnkintiyande ku ka biya beŋ fooma. Kɛna daanɔkɔy bindɛ nayeŋ e niya kukabanɛ wumandiŋ ba yaabi ba ka Yisɔs baŋ.
Kɛna see biSadusini binɔndi ka Yisɔs, bi tɛpɛ beŋ ba dɔma na biya sa nɔŋ nda ŋayi ka tuka haŋ,

e tɛpa, na “Karimɔkɔ, Musa gbale nde siraŋ baŋ baŋ ba miŋ: Mɛnɛ wɔ wathe tuku awa e wundɛ pɛya wɔtɔ nama, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha niye mpee mpati, wɛndama wowathe woŋ kɔŋ ba pɛɛtɔ bagbokora woŋ bi be mpuu mpati bi nde nɔŋ wɛndama ba mpaa beŋ.
Lɔkɔ banthe biya bisɔŋ-biye bi huwɛndiya bi kɔŋ nde ka tha banthe. Wokalaŋ woŋ yente yɛrɛmɛ, kɛrɛ wundɛ tuku wu ka hati.
Wo biye woŋ pɛɛtɔy bagbokora woŋ. Wundɛ tuku hɛlɛŋ wu ka hati.
Wotaati woŋ pɛɛtɔy hɛlɛŋ niŋ. Biya bisɔŋ-biye beŋ beŋ fooma thanki niŋ yɛnta e bindɛ tuka wu ka hati.
Naa thanki bindɛ tuukuwa, woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ tuku ntiŋ.
Ka mɔlɔkɔ ma ka ŋayi ka tuka haŋ maŋ nɔŋ, nkaana biyɔ woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ? Baa biya bisɔŋ-biye beŋ beŋ fooma thanki niŋ yɛnta.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Beŋ, bendo biya bi ka dunia bahɛ baŋ beŋ ayɛnti, adunkuŋ ŋayɛntande.
Kɛrɛ biya bi niyɔ bitɛŋɛ beŋ ba ŋayi ka hutuka haŋ e bindɛ nɔŋ niyɔ ka yamana ba biya beŋ ŋaye ka tuka haŋ baŋ, bindɛ yenteta, bindɛ dunkuneta yɛnta.
Baa bindɛ sa nɔŋ nda tuku, baa bi kɔŋ nda nanthe iŋ malekɛŋ e nda niyɔ mpati bi ka Masaala, baa biya bina nda bi ŋayino ŋaye ka tuka haŋ.

Musa tɔŋɔŋ wuŋ nagberekethe, ba dɔma na bitukɛ beŋ bi kɔŋ ŋayina ka tuka haŋ e bindɛ niyɔ iŋ sii. Ka gbonkiyo wuŋ kɛ ba kuyeŋ ku nde tɔɔki koŋ, e ndɛ kɛndɛ gbonkiya ba Mariki woŋ, ba wundɛ niyɔ Masaala wo ka Ebrahim, Aisaki, mɛnɛ Yakuba.
