Mariki wobɛina, wundɛ na Masaala wo ka bipethɔy beŋ, wuŋ ka wo ka bitukɛ beŋ, baa wu niyɔyŋ bipethɔy, maa bitukɛ, Masaala kute bindɛ ba bindɛ niyɔ iŋ sii ka kuwaŋ kukɛnama koŋ.”
Binɔndi ka karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ tepe, na “Karimɔkɔ, yi gbonkoy wuyɔhɔy.”
Baa bindɛ tha nda dɔinɔkɔ ba niŋ thɔnthiŋina hɛlɛŋ.
Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ Yisɔs, na “Nama dɔmɛ wu be dɔma na Banikisi woŋ kɔŋ niyɔ hati ka gbaku woŋ Dauda?
Baa wundɛ Dauda yaathi, wundɛ tepe ka buku wo ka Ŋaiŋa ŋaŋ woŋ, na ‘Mariki woŋ tepe ka Mariki niŋ woŋ: na Dɔŋɔ dondo ka yɔnkɔ niŋ huthome haŋ, ka madoŋe mayiki maŋ,
haaŋ yaŋ thanka sisa bihadeni bikɛnda beŋ fooma ka pothi ka ŋathaki nda ŋaŋ!’
Dauda thiyi niŋ na Mariki. Nama hɛlɛŋ wuŋ niiye na Banikisi woŋ kɔŋ niyɔ hati ka Dauda?”
Naa niŋ biya beŋ fooma poniyɛ kuiha, wundɛ yeli bakarandeni nama beŋ,

na “Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ, bi thimo ba pɛnkande iŋ ŋahɔli ŋathɔɔkuwɛ ba tɔŋina ba dɔma na bi kɔŋ kolo, e bindɛ kɔ kaa kaŋ maanuwo iŋ yiki ka thani ka wuŋ niyo gbɔni baŋ ka, e thimo ba kiiyo madoŋeŋ mathɔɔkɔ ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ iŋ madoŋeŋ ma yamɛ yɔhɔ maŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma ka thɔma.

Bindɛ kɔŋ tutu bagbokorani beŋ sɛmbɛ, awa e bindɛ ka kaa kaŋ tuuta bindɛ bankɛŋ ba bindɛ peyo iŋ biwandamɛŋ beŋ baŋ, e bindɛ kɔ kaa kaŋ niya ŋaraminɛ ŋathɔɔkuwɛ haliko ba pututa bɛyiniŋ banɛnɔy ba bindɛ ni baŋ. Kugbasaŋati kukɛnamɛŋ koŋ ku kɔŋ niyɔ kumandiŋ ayaŋ ba wɔ yo wɔ.”
Naa Yisɔs yili thaaya na wundɛ kaake ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ, wundɛ dethe natiŋ naa bananhuluiŋ beŋ thiye munkii namɛŋ muŋ ka kuma ba bindɛ kosine kɔbiri woŋ baŋ.
Kɛna kute wundɛ bagbokora wo bamɔnɛ-bamɔnɛ si thiyi sɛntiŋ biye.
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yaŋ tepe bena, bagbokora wo bamɔnɛ woŋ baŋ, yame thiya wumandiŋ ayaŋ ba beŋ beŋ fooma.
Baa binɔndi beŋ beŋ thiye maŋaye ka wuyete wu fuŋuŋ bindɛ ka nanhulu namɛŋ baŋ, kɛrɛ bagbokora wo bamɔnɛ woŋ baŋ thiye fooma wu iŋ wundɛ; wundɛ dunkuŋ fooma kɔbiri wo pɛyɛtɔi wundɛ ba thɔma nama.”

Bakarandeni binɔndi bi kɔŋ nde gbonkoy wunthe iŋ ntɔ nama ba banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ si peye bɛŋ ka yɔhɔ, tharaka tha yehinuwo bɛŋ thaŋ, munkii mu bindɛ dunkuŋ muŋ ba niya Masaala na yiki. Huna tepe Yisɔs bindɛ,
na “Fooma mu beŋ kutu muŋ muŋ, malɔkɔ mɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ see raka hunthe huŋ sa tutɔ ka ntɔ nama, thɛ kɔŋ pankitinuwando fooma.”
Huna thonthiŋine bakarandeni beŋ, na “Karimɔkɔ, tima bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ niiye? Mbɛ lamanthoŋ wo niyɔ wo mina toŋine ba dɔma na bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ tɛŋ ka niyɔ?”

Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Niyɔŋ bendo siyɔkɔy, awa baŋ mɛyi ba bena wɔ yo wɔ thiika thɔkɔ, baa biya bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ see ka keŋ kukiyaŋ koŋ. Bi kɔŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ ba bindɛ kɔ gbonkiya ba yaŋ. Awa bindɛ kɔŋ dɔmɔkɔ, na ‘Yama Banikisi woŋ,’ awa bi kɔŋ dɔŋ, na ‘Malɔkɔ maŋ tɛŋ.’ Yaŋ tepe bena, baŋ bindɛ yeŋ.
Baŋ payɔ mɛnɛ beŋ yuye ba ŋayombo iŋ ŋadekiyande kaake ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ. Bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma ba kɔŋ ba yenke niyɔ. Wuŋ, wuŋ kutɛ nda dɔŋ nde na mapeye maŋ thuriye.”
Wundɛ key ka kɔtɔkɔy kaŋ tɛpa, na “Kuyɛkɛŋ ku kɔŋ kɔɔ ba dekiya kuyɛkɛŋ ntɔ nama. Hugbakine hu kɔŋ ŋayinɔkɔ ba dekiya hugbakine.
Kuyɛkɛŋ ku kɔŋ thɛnɛŋ ka thani ka bɔyɛ, kɔnthɔ iŋ nthoonani kihakuwande ki kɔŋ niyɔ ka thani ka bɔyɛ, bɛyiniŋ bagbɛki iŋ lamanthoni bɛ kɔŋ see ŋaye ka kuthahinɛ koŋ.

Kɛrɛ, gboŋa yo gboŋa saanuŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ba niyɔ, beŋ kɔŋ yenke boho, e beŋ niyo thɔrɔ. Beŋ kɔŋ dunkuna ka thɛnkɔ tha ka bakɔnsɔŋɔni beŋ ka bankɛŋ bathuŋuyande baŋ haaŋ e beŋ thiyo ka nɔthitɔy. Ba saathɛ ba kiyaŋ, beŋ kɔŋ kata ka gbakuiŋ iŋ ka bakɛrɛni beŋ.
Wuŋ, wu kɔŋ niyɔ hɛɛra bakendeŋ ba tɛpa kɛndɛ Huseri Huyɔhɔy haŋ ba yaŋ.
Dɛɛnkaŋ nda ba thana niyɔkɔ yaagba ba hu beŋ ka tɛpi ba na lɔkɔ babɛina tɛŋ.
Baa yaŋ kɔŋ bena dunkune thampɛŋ iŋ kele hu sa hintiŋ nthɔŋ hadeni bikendeŋ beŋ punku sɔkinɔkɔ.
Hali hintiŋ biya bi mpɛɛ bena beŋ gbeeŋ, mbɛnda ndeŋ beŋ, mpooni kikendeŋ, iŋ binyathikɔŋ bikendeŋ bi kɔŋ bena dunkuŋ ka thɛnkɔ tha ka bakɔnsɔŋɔni beŋ, awa bendo binɔndi beŋ kɔŋ kɔra.
Wɔ yo wɔ kɔŋ bena thambo ba saathɛ ba kiyaŋ.
Kɛrɛ mbɔɔyɛ kinthe ka thankaha thakendeŋ thaŋ sa piriŋ.
Kɔɔŋ wukahɛ awa beŋ kɔŋ niya kisi.
“Mɛnɛ beŋ kute ka Yɛrusalɛmi pɛnkando iŋ kurugbani, kɔthɔŋ ba dɔma na kɛ kɔŋ tete teetuwa.
Awa bi ka Yudiya, bi tharɛŋ ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ. Awa bi kaake ka mɛti baŋ beŋ, bi fuŋɛŋ; awa bi nɛnɛ ka hee ka beŋ, bi bɛiŋ nda duu.
Baa, malɔkɔiŋ maŋ maŋ, mɛ kɔŋ niyɔ malɔkɔ ma ka kugbasaŋati ba haliko ba thiŋina hu tepe magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ haŋ.
Nkinikiniŋ ba yɛrɛmɛŋ bi iŋ thahɔɔyɛ iŋ bi bɔpɔŋ malɛɛthɛŋ. Wuthoonɛ wunkinikiniŋ wu kɔŋ ŋɔti ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ koŋ. Awa kugbasaŋati ku ka Masaala koŋ ku kɔŋ ŋote biya beŋ beŋ.

Binɔndi ka mateete namɛŋ silanhi bɛ kɔŋ bindɛ kɔɔri. Binɔndi bi kɔŋ diŋa huwaayinɛ ka ŋakuyɛkɛŋ ŋahɛna fooma. Siyani bahɛna ba be kɔthɔ Masaala na bɛ kɔŋ fuŋuŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi kasara haaŋ nɔŋ, yɔkɔŋ malɔkɔ ma ka siyani bahɛna baŋ maŋ thiŋe.
“Lamanthoni bi kɔŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ ka kaŋ woŋ iŋ sɛnkɛ woŋ, iŋ ka sosɛŋ beŋ. Siyani baŋ fooma ka dunia baŋ bɛ kɔŋ thɛŋ iŋ payɔ humandiŋ naa mankɔ mathanthɛ maŋ manki poro iŋ thamunkulu thabɛina.
Biyamɛti bi kɔŋ heŋɔ iŋ hupayɔ naa bindɛ dethiteke ba bɛyiniŋ ba see ka niyɔ ka dunia babunthu baŋ. Baa, sɛmbɛŋ ba ka kuthahinɛ koŋ baŋ bɛ kɔŋ ŋɛna e bɛŋ fuŋuto ka makooye makɛnamɛŋ.
Mahɛŋ mabɛina Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ see. Wundɛ kɔŋ see ka wuruma haŋ iŋ sɛmbɛ mɛnɛ yiki.
Naa bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ bohe niyɔ, dethaŋ ka thinthi; kisi bakendeŋ baŋ thuriye.”
Kɛna sisiyɛ Yisɔs bindɛ mathɔyande e tɛpa, na “Simɔkɔŋ hɛ kuyeŋ kuthɔma ku dɔma koŋ na fiki iŋ ŋayeŋ ŋahɛna ŋaŋ.
Naa ŋɛŋ yose nthɔŋ bompa buŋama, beŋ kɔthɛ nda ba dɔma na thamɔ thuriye.
Awa nɛna hɛlɛŋ, naa beŋ kute bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ bɛ si niyɔ, beŋ kɔŋ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ thuriye.
“Nɔndi yaathi, yaŋ tepe bena, biya bi ka yamana baŋ baŋ beŋ sa niye thanke tuukuwe, bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma bɛ kɔŋ thanki niyɔ.
Kuthahinɛ koŋ iŋ dunia baŋ mu kɔŋ daŋande, kɛrɛ huseri hukiyaŋ haŋ huŋ sa daŋande.

“Niyaŋ kuthɛgbɛ ba haliko beŋ be tha thɔŋ haaŋ e beŋ boho pumpuŋ. Baŋ thiiye haaŋ e yilɔ. Baŋ mɛyi ba yaagbani bi ka sii baŋ baŋ beŋ kɛriŋiyɛ thathukuma thakendeŋ thaŋ. Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ, malɔkɔ ma ka saa hu ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ haŋ mɛ kɔŋ bena bohi
nɔŋ mudikɔŋ. Babiyɛ mɛ kɔŋ see ka biya fooma bi dɔŋɔy ka dunia baŋ beŋ.
Kɛrɛ lɔkɔ timo tima, yilaŋ e beŋ niya kuraminɛ ba haliko beŋ be kutu sɛmbɛ ba daŋande bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma ba see ka niyɔ baŋ wupankɔy bɛyi iŋ ba kɔɔ ka kɔtɔkɔy ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ.”
Lɔkɔiŋ baŋ baŋ fooma Yisɔs dunkuŋ bɛŋ ba thaninuwa ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ. Naa mahɔnkɔlɛŋ tɛŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ key ka kusɛri ku ka Ɔlifisi e ndɛ kɛndɛ ka hura napii.
Timo tima kuputhɔ ku kaŋ, biya bi kɔŋ key ka poniyɛ niŋ kuiha ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ.
Wiki wo ka thɔma kutoŋ ku ka iŋ yisithi woŋ koŋ thuriye, malɔkɔ ma bindɛ dɔŋ maŋ, na “Malɔkɔ ma miŋ siyi na puntiyando nde mbembɛŋ ntuŋ beŋ iŋ maleka wo ka tuka haŋ woŋ maŋ ka Iyipiti.”
Bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ fooma, bi nde payɔ biya beŋ, huna bindɛ bohe deethuwa gboŋa ba ŋasɔiŋ ba bindɛ kore Yisɔs na.
Sithani thɔɔyɛ Yudasi na wo dɔma Isakariyɔti, wunthe ka karandeni kɔhi iŋ biye bi ka Yisɔs beŋ.
Kɛna fuŋ Yudasi, wundɛ key gbonkitiyande bafodeni bibukuyɛ beŋ mɛnɛ bayahɛŋ bi dethiteke banka ba ka Masaala baŋ beŋ ba nɔŋ na wundɛ bindɛ niyite Yisɔs na gbɔŋ.
Wuŋ yehe bindɛ haaŋ e bindɛ si bohinande ba niŋ thunkuna kɔbiri.
Yudasi yɛrɔkɔy huŋ. Wundɛ bohe nda deethuwa hɛɛra ba wundɛ dunkune Yisɔs na kɛnamɛŋ naa sa wuŋ biya kothiye.
Malɔkɔ mamayoŋ ma ka wiki wo bindɛ thome kutoŋ ku ka iŋ yisithi woŋ koŋ tɛŋ, ka lɔkɔ ba takɛŋ bi ka thɔma huthɔɔkɔ haŋ beŋ koro baŋ ba fuŋuno saraka.
Yisɔs ŋindi Pita na iŋ Yɔni e tɛpa, na “Kaaŋ e beŋ ka kɔsinɔkɔ thɔma hu siyuwe malɔkɔ ma puntiyando nde siya ntuŋ baŋ maŋ.”
Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ Yisɔs na, na “Kama thimo yi ba miŋ ka kosineke thɔma haŋ haŋ baŋ?”
Huna tepe wundɛ bindɛ, na “Naa beŋ kɔ biyande ka mɛti ka, beŋ kɔŋ pɛnkande iŋ hati lamgba wo tutɔkɔy mandi ka ntha. Yemaŋ niŋ ka banka ba wundɛ ka biyande baŋ,
e beŋ tepe wo biyɛ banka baŋ woŋ, na ‘Karimɔkɔ woŋ tepe, na ba miŋ yina si thɔnthiŋina ka yikiya baŋ ka wundɛ si thome thɔma hu ka mapuntande maŋ haŋ iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ.’
Awa wundɛ kɔŋ bena toŋine makonko mamandiŋ maŋ maŋ ka thinthi ka banka baŋ, ma kosinoko nda awa ma nda iŋ ntha yo ntha, kɛna beŋ kiye mu niye bɛyi ntuŋ muŋ fooma.”
Kɛna key bakarandeni beŋ, bindɛ key pɛnki bɛyi o bɛyi nanthe nathesi nɔŋ na tepe nthɔŋ bindɛ Yisɔs na. Bindɛ kɔsinɔkɔy kɛndɛ ba thɔma thɔma hu ka malɔkɔ ma puntiyando nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ maŋ.
Naa tɛŋ wuŋ ba thɔma thɔma hu ka mapuntande maŋ haŋ, Yisɔs dɔŋɔy iŋ baseriŋ nama bithɔɔkɔ beŋ ba thɔma.
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ nda kufiyo wumandiŋ ba thɔma thɔma haŋ haŋ baŋ iŋ beŋ saanuŋ yaŋ kɔ niyo nambara.
Awa yaŋ tepe bena, yaŋ sa nɔŋ nda thɔŋ thɔma haŋ haŋ baŋ iŋ beŋ, yɔkɔŋ nɔŋ nda huŋ toŋino kolo nama baŋ gbeeŋ ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.”
Awa Yisɔs sekithe kɔɔpu haŋ e thiya Masaala na maamo, e tɛpa, na “Sɛkithaŋ kɔɔpu haŋ haŋ e beŋ huŋ hanande.
There nda ka malɔkɔ mahɛ maŋ, yaŋ sa nɔŋ nda thiiye mampa maŋ maŋ baŋ yɔkɔŋ nɔŋ nda Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ tɛŋ.”
Awa wundɛ sekithe hɛlɛŋ kutoŋ koŋ e thiya Masaala na maamo, e kuŋ thinkinande e bindɛ kuŋ dunkune e tɛpa, na “Wuŋ, kɔtɔ niŋ koŋ kuna, ku dunkuŋ yaŋ koŋ ba beŋ. Niyaŋ wuŋ ba yama kɔ siyuwe.”

Ka gboŋa banthe babɛina hɛlɛŋ, naa thanki bindɛ thɔma, wundɛ dunkune bindɛ kɔɔpu haŋ, e tɛpa, na “Kɔɔpu haŋ haŋ mayuku maŋama ma ka Masaala maŋ mɛna, ma kahitino wasi bakiyaŋ baŋ, ba toŋe yaŋ baŋ ba beŋ.
“Kɛrɛ dethaŋ, wo yama ni gbɔŋ woŋ, ndɛ doŋeŋ iŋ yaŋ ka thɔma haŋ dondo.
Baa, Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ kaaye nɔŋ na tepe nde Masaala na, na nɛŋ ma kaaye. Kɛrɛ nambara bɛ kɔŋ see ka hati lamgba wo ni niŋ gbɔŋ woŋ ka hadeni nama beŋ!”
Kɛna bohe bindɛ thɔnthiŋinuwande ba wo dɛɛnkɛ ba niya wali baŋ baŋ woŋ.
Kuyuŋande see hɛlɛŋ ŋɔti ka mateete ma ka bakarandeni beŋ ba wo si niyɔ bayaha woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma.
Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Gbakuiŋ bi ka siyani bahɛna baŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ tɔŋɔŋ sɛmbɛ ka bi bindɛ ka pothi beŋ, awa bakɛrɛni beŋ bi kɔŋ thunda keŋ, na ‘Bamaseŋ biya.’
Kɛrɛ beŋ, wuŋ ka ba nɛŋ niyɔ, wo bayaha woŋ kɔŋ ba simɔkɔ yɛthɛ nama nɔŋ wothahuwɔy woŋ nthɔŋ nda fooma, awa wo bakɔtɔkɔ woŋ, wundɛ kɔŋ ba niyɔ nɔŋ bawali.
Nkaana yamɛ bukuya, wo dɔŋɔy ka thɔma haŋ woŋ ndo, iŋ wo sisi muthɔma muŋ woŋ? E wo dɔŋɔy ka thɔma haŋ woŋ kutɛ? Kɛrɛ detha hɛ, yaŋ kɔŋ ka mateete makendeŋ nɔŋ basisi muthɔma.
“Beŋ, bena pɛyɛ ka kuwaŋ kukiyaŋ ka malɔkɔ ma yaŋ ka gberiŋinuwo haŋ maŋ.
Nɔŋ na dunkune nthɔŋ yama Fandaŋ woŋ mayoho ba kɛriŋa na, nɛna hɛlɛŋ yaŋ bena dunkune mayoho ba kɛriŋa.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina beŋ kɔŋ niyɔ iŋ mayoho ba thɔma e thiiye ka tha banthe iŋ yaŋ ka Hugbakine hukiyaŋ haŋ, awa beŋ kɔŋ dɛŋa ka thayensi ba kɛriŋiyɛ bɔnsɔni kɔhi iŋ baye ba ka biIsirɛli beŋ baŋ.
“Saimɔŋ, Saimɔŋ, pona kuiha! Sithani dunkuno mayoho iŋ Masaala ba bena gbɛriŋinuwa fooma, ba haliko ba hakinande biyɔhɔy beŋ iŋ binɛnɔy beŋ, nɔŋ na bamahi woŋ hakinande paka baŋ na iŋ ŋawoy ŋaŋ.
Kɛrɛ yaŋ thanki yina niyiyɛ kuraminɛ Saimɔŋ, ba haliko lanɛya bakɛnda baŋ ba be tha thamɔ. Awa naa yi sikiyɔkɔy hɛlɛŋ kiyaŋ, kahina mbɛnda thathukuma.”
Huna tepe Pita, na “Mariki, yando kɔsinɔkɔy ba thiyo iŋ yi ka yeeli. Hali hintiŋ na ba tuka iŋ yi, yando kɔsinɔkɔy!”
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Pita, koki woŋ sa niye kokire huyɛ bahɛ baŋ, yi kɔŋ yama buuhu dɔŋɔ kataati ba dɔma na yi kɔyta yama.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Naa ŋindi nde yaŋ bena beŋ tha thiiti ka gbooti, maa pontho, maa dagbalɛŋ, e beŋ panke nde ntha yo ntha?” Bindɛ tepe, na “Ade.”
“Kɛrɛ ka tete, wɔ yo wɔ wo iŋ kɔbiri maa pontho, diŋɛŋ muŋ ka kaa. Wɔ yo wɔ wo ka iŋ silanhi, wundɛ niyɛŋ kuhɔli nama gbɔŋ, e wundɛ boya silanhi banthe.
Yaŋ tepe bena, magbali ma tɛpɛ maŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Wundɛ kɔnditando iŋ bahakɛŋ beŋ’ tɛŋ ka niyɔ nɔndi kiyaŋ, baa ba thankɛ gbalo baŋ ba yaŋ baŋ thanki thuriye.”
Huna tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Mariki, detha, ya dondo silanhiŋ baye.” Yisɔs tepe bindɛ, na “Atɛŋ.”
Kɛna fuŋ wundɛ. Wundɛ key ka kusɛri ku ka Ɔlifisi nɔŋ na bare nde ndɛ na, awa bakarandeni beŋ yeme niŋ.
Awa naa tɛŋ wundɛ ka tha ka bɛina, wundɛ tepe bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Niyaŋ kuraminɛ haliko beŋ be tha ŋɔti ka mathiiko.”
Kɛna yɔsɔkɔy wundɛ wuyete. Wundɛ kunthuŋe e niya kuraminɛ, e tɛpa,
na “Fandaŋ, mɛnɛ mamɛyi makɛnda mɛna, gbɔnina kɔɔpu hu ka thɔrɔ haŋ haŋ kuwaŋ kukiyaŋ. Kɛrɛ wu bɛiŋ niyɔ ka mamɛyi makiyaŋ nde, kɛrɛ bɛyi yo bɛyi ba thimo yi bɛ be niyɔ, ba niyɔyŋ.”
Kɛna see niŋ maleka tɔŋinɔkɔ ŋaye ka ariana, e wundɛ niŋ si kahina thukuma.
Thukuma nama haŋ see ni thɔrɔ. Kɛna ni wundɛ kuraminɛ wukahɛ-kahɛ haaŋ mamuheyani nama maŋ thonda nɔŋ wasi bɛna thondi ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ.
Naa ŋaye wundɛ ka kuraminɛ koŋ, wundɛ penke bindɛ bi si nine, baa bindɛ niyɔy nkinikiniŋ wumandiŋ.
Huna thonthiŋine ndɛ bindɛ, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ niniye? Ŋayeŋ e beŋ niya kuraminɛ haliko beŋ be tha thɔɔ ka mathiiko.”
Naa wundɛ ka gbonkiya haŋ, kɛna tɛŋ sɛthɛ. Wɔ wunthe wo dɔma na Yudasi, wunthe ka bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ biye bi ka Yisɔs beŋ, kɔtiyɔkɔy bindɛ. Kɛna see wundɛ Yudasi niŋ thuriye ba niŋ si dɔɔkɔ.
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yudasi, e yi aniye Hati ka Wɔ woŋ gbɔŋ ka dɔɔkɔ?”
Naa kute bakarandeni beŋ ba see ka niyɔ baŋ, bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ, na “Mariki, e miŋ yuwa iŋ silanhiŋ baŋ?”
Wunthe ka bindɛ gbari kuiha kuthome ku ka bawali wo ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ koŋ.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe, na “Pɛyaŋ, baŋ nda wuŋ ni!” Kɛna boheke wundɛ kuiha ku ka bawali woŋ koŋ e kuŋ pethina.

Huna tepe Yisɔs bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ iŋ bidethiteke banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ beŋ iŋ bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ fooma bi sɛɛ ba niŋ saa ka bɔha beŋ, na “E beŋ asee iŋ silanhiŋ mɛnɛ ŋagbemgbe ba yama saa ka bɔha nɔŋ batuwaŋ?
Naa nɔŋ yaŋ iŋ beŋ timo tima ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, beŋ tha yama boheke. Kɛrɛ malɔkɔ maŋ mɛna tɛŋɛ ba beŋ, iŋ wo iŋ sɛmbɛ ba ka huntuma haŋ baŋ woŋ ba niya wali.”
Kɛna ni bindɛ yamari ba ndɛ be bɔha e kata niŋ. Naa bindɛ niŋ kati ka banka ba ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ baŋ, Pita yemeŋ kahɛŋ wuthokiye.
Buu ŋindo kɛndɛ ka gbada hu ka banka ba ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ haŋ mateete ba poyi. Pita thuriye ka poyi haŋ.
Kɛna kute niŋ bawali woyɛrɛmɛ wo ka Bafode Womandiŋ woŋ naa doŋe wundɛ ka buu buŋ kuwaŋ. Kɛna dethe wundɛ niŋ natiŋ, e tɛpa, na “Hati lamgba woŋ baŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ iŋ Yisɔs.”
Kɛrɛ Pita thanthiye, e tɛpa, na “Hatiŋ woŋ, yaŋ kɔyta niŋ.”
Wuŋ tha hɛlɛŋ nambi hati lamgba wohɛna kute hɛlɛŋ niŋ. Wundɛ tepe hɛlɛŋ, na “Yi, yi kɔŋ wunthe wo ka bindɛ.” Huna tepe hɛlɛŋ Pita, na “Hatiŋ woŋ, yaŋ ka wunthe wo ka bindɛ.”
Naa daŋande wuŋ bɛrɛ ba wakathi wunthe wɔ hɛna see hɛlɛŋ gbonkoy wukahɛ, e tɛpa, na “Yaathi hati lamgba woŋ, kɔnsɔŋ ndo ka, ndɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ iŋ Yisɔs, baa wɔ ka Kalili na woŋ.”
Kɛrɛ Pita tepe, na “Wɛiŋ woŋ, yaŋ kɔyta hu yi dunkunɔkɔy haŋ.” Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina naa wundɛ dunkunɔkɔy, koki woŋ kokori.
Kɛna sikiyɔkɔy Mariki woŋ e detha Pita na. Pita siyi thampa tha ka Mariki woŋ thaŋ ba dɔma, na “Saanuŋ koki woŋ ba kokira hɛ, yi kɔŋ yama buuhu dɔŋɔ kataati.”
Kɛna fuŋ Pita. Wundɛ bereŋ wuthoonɛ-thoonɛ.
Lamgbeŋ bi bɔhɛ Yisɔs na beŋ bohe hɛtha niŋ e bindɛ niŋ kɔ thorinuwa.
Bindɛ yuku niŋ thaaya, e tɛpa, na “Awa, banabi, hina hɛ wo thorinɛ yina woŋ!”
Kɛna gbonkoy bindɛ bɛyiniŋ bahɛna banɛnɔy babɔyɛ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Yisɔs na.

Naa puthɔy kaŋ woŋ, Kaama wo ka bakalani bibayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ woŋ fooma thuŋande ka tha banthe, thiyitaŋ bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ. Kɛna kato Yisɔs ka Kaama namɛŋ woŋ, e bindɛ tɛpa, na
“Mɛnɛ yina Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri, tepe mina.” Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tepe bindɛ, na “Mɛnɛ yaŋ tepe bena, beŋ sa yama ni kulanɛya.
Awa mɛnɛ yaŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bena, beŋ sa yama ni yaabi.
Kɛrɛ there nda ka lɔkɔ bahɛ baŋ, Hati ka Wɔ woŋ kɔŋ dɔŋɔ ka yɔnkɔ huthome hu ka Masaala wo iŋ sɛmbɛ woŋ haŋ.”
Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ, na “E huna yina nda Hati ka Masaala woŋ?” Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Na tepe nda nɛŋ beŋ.”
Huna tepe bindɛ, na “Mbɛ nda maseri ma nda miŋ deethi? Miŋ fooma yuyɔkɔy nda ŋaye ka hothi hukɛnama!”
Bakaamani beŋ fooma ŋaye narɛ, e kata Yisɔs na ka Pailɛti ka.

Kɛna bohe bindɛ gbonkiya bɛyiniŋ babɔyɛ ba sɔkinɔkɔ Yisɔs na, na “Miŋ bohe hati lamgba woŋ ka thɔkina biya ntuŋ beŋ, e tepe bindɛ ba thana thunkuna duthu ka gbaku womandiŋ woŋ Siisa ka Romaŋ, e hɛlɛŋ ka tɛpa na ndɛ na gbaku woŋ, Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ.”
Huna thonthiŋine niŋ Pailɛti na, na “E yina gbaku wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ?” Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Yi tepe nda nɛŋ.”
Pailɛti tepe bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ iŋ sɛthɛ baŋ fooma, na “Yaŋ tha kutu mathonko ka hati lamgba woŋ baŋ hali.”

Kɛrɛ bindɛ yame ntiŋ kaa ka kɔtɔkɔy kaŋ gbonkiya ma sɔkinɔkɔ Yisɔs na, na “Ndɛ kɔŋ key kaŋ sɔkinuwande biya iŋ mathanani nama maŋ fooma ka Yudiya. Ndɛ therine ka Kalili haaŋ ndɛ na see hɛlɛŋ dondo woŋ.”
Naa yuye huŋ Pailɛti, wundɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ biya beŋ mɛnɛ Yisɔs wo ka Kalili na.
Naa tepo wundɛ ba dɔma na Yisɔs wɔ na wo ŋaye ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku gbaku woŋ Hɛrɔdi kɛriŋiyɛ koŋ, wundɛ toŋite niŋ ka Hɛrɔdi ka. Hɛrɔdi kɔŋ nde ka Yɛrusalɛmi ka malɔkɔ mabɛina.
Naa kute Hɛrɔdi Yisɔs na, wuŋ yehe niŋ wumandiŋ, baa wundɛ thɔkɔti nɔŋ nda niyɔ kufiyo ba kutiyɔkɔ bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba Yisɔs ni baŋ.
Kɛna thɔnthɔŋɔni Hɛrɔdi Yisɔs na wufuyɛ, kɛrɛ Yisɔs tha niŋ ni yaabi.
Bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ karimɔkɔiŋ bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ kɔɔyɛ ka kɔtɔkɔy e gbonkiya wukahɛ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Yisɔs na.
Hɛrɔdi iŋ kurugbani nama beŋ hethe Yisɔs na haaŋ bindɛ niŋ thiminuwa dɛkuiŋ. Kɛna thiye bindɛ niŋ kuhɔli ku ka gbaku e duuta hɛlɛŋ niŋ ka Pailɛti ka.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina gbeeŋ Hɛrɔdi iŋ Pailɛti, bi nɔŋ bithayande beŋ, see bohinande.
Pailɛti thiyi ka tha banthe bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ iŋ bayahɛŋ beŋ iŋ biya beŋ.

Wundɛ tepe bindɛ, na “Beŋ sisi hati lamgba woŋ kiyaŋ do nɔŋ wɔ wo key kaŋ thɔkinuwa biya. Ka tete, yaŋ thanki niŋ thɔnthiŋinuwa fooma ka thaaya ndeŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ tha pɛnki mathonko manthe ka bɛyiniŋ fooma ba thanki beŋ gbonkiya baŋ ma sɔkinɔkɔ niŋ.
Hɛrɔdi gbeeŋ wundɛ tha pɛnki mathonko makɛnama, huna biyɛ ndɛ hɛlɛŋ niŋ duuta kɛntuŋ do. Bɛyi o bɛyi ka ba ni hati lamgba woŋ ba tɛŋɛ wundɛ ba koro.
Bɛna yaŋ kɔŋ ni ba wundɛ gbusuŋo ba niŋ thiya thukuma saanuŋ yaŋ niŋ kɔ pɛyɛna kuyankaŋ.” [
Pailɛti kɔŋ nde iŋ mabari ma ka pɛniyɛ bindɛ wɔ wunthe kuyankaŋ ka malɔkɔ ma ka thɔma humandiŋ haŋ maŋ.]
Kɛrɛ biya beŋ fooma thiye masɔnkɔ, na “Kɔra niŋ e yi mina pɛniyɛ Barabasi na kuyankaŋ.”
Barabasi hati lamgba na nde wo thiyo ka yeeli ba kɔnthɔhili wo biya beŋ ni woŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi e niyɔ wunthe ka bi kɔrɛ wɔmɛti ka dekiya.
Pailɛti kɔŋ kufiyo ba pɛyɛna Yisɔs na kuyankaŋ, huna gbonkitiyande hɛlɛŋ wundɛ biya muŋ.
Kɛrɛ bindɛ yame ntiŋ thiya masɔnkɔ, na “Yanta niŋ ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ! Yanta niŋ!”

Huna tepe hɛlɛŋ bindɛ Pailɛti hutaati haŋ, na “Ka tete, tepeŋ hɛ yama, mbɛ banɛnɔy ba ni wundɛ? Yaŋ tha kutu mathonko manthe ma ni wundɛ ma tɛŋɛ wundɛ ba koro. Bɛna yaŋ kɔŋ ni ba niŋ thiya thukuma e yaŋ niŋ pɛyɛna kuyankaŋ.”
Kɛrɛ bindɛ key ka kɔtɔkɔy thuŋ kaŋ thiya masɔnkɔ wuthoonɛ ba wundɛ be yanta ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ, haaŋ masɔnkɔ makɛnamɛŋ maŋ punka.
Huna yereke Pailɛti ba Yisɔs ba kɔra nɔŋ na thimo bindɛ na.

Wundɛ pɛyɛŋ kuyankaŋ Barabasi na wo thiyo nde ka yeeli woŋ ba thiya kɔnthɔhili iŋ ba kɔra wɔmɛti ka dekiya, nɔŋ na thimo biya beŋ na. Kɛrɛ wundɛ dunkuŋ Yisɔs na ka thɛnkɔ thakɛnamɛŋ, ba niŋ niya ba thimo bindɛ ba niŋ niya.
Naa bindɛ niŋ kati, bindɛ pɛnkande iŋ wɔ dɔma na Saimɔŋ wo ka mɛti ba ka Sairini, wo nde see ba biyande ka Yɛrusalɛmi. Bindɛ ŋote niŋ kɛndɛ ba kata kuyeŋ kubariŋande ka Yisɔs ba ka yanto kɛ.
Sɛthɛ bamandiŋ yeme Yisɔs na. Ka mateete makɛnamɛŋ yɛrɛmɛŋ binɔndi tutɔkɔy thɛnkɔ e bokita Yisɔs na.
Yisɔs sikiyɔkɔy; wundɛ tepe bindɛ, na “Yɛrɛmɛŋ bi ka Yɛrusalɛmi, baŋ bereŋ ba yaŋ! Kɛrɛ berinaŋ ba yɛthɛ bakendeŋ mɛnɛ ba mpati bikendeŋ.
Baa, malɔkɔ mɛ kɔŋ nɔŋ see ma biyamɛti dunkunɔkɔy ba dɔma, na ‘Mayehitɔkɔ ma kɔŋ ka yɛrɛmɛŋ bi tha kutu komisine beŋ, bi tha punku mpaa mpati beŋ, bi tha bɔpɔŋ beŋ hali hanthe!’
Malɔkɔ ma biya tepe ka ŋasɛri ŋabukuyuwɛ ŋaŋ, na ‘Ŋote mina’ iŋ ka ŋasɛri ŋamɛɛsuwɛ ŋaŋ, na ‘Mankuwa mina.’
Mɛnɛ bindɛ ni bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ ka kuyeŋ kuthɔnɛ koŋ, mbɛ mu niyɔ ka beŋ, bendo nɔŋ kuyeŋ kuthithɛ beŋ?”
Biya biye bi kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ bi niyɛ wunɛnɔy; bindɛ kato ka nanthe iŋ Yisɔs ba ka koro.

Naa see bindɛ tɛŋ ka tha ka dɔma kɛ na Kugbomgboroko ku Yaha, bindɛ yanti niŋ ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ. Biya biye hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ yanto ka ŋayeŋ ŋaye ŋahɛna ŋabariŋande bi boho ba niya wunɛnɔy wuŋ beŋ, wunthe ka yɔnkɔ huthome hu ka Yisɔs haŋ, wunthe ka yɔnkɔ hupɔkɔdɔ haŋ.
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Masaala, pɛniyɛ bindɛ bi yama kɔri beŋ, bindɛ kɔyta ba bindɛ ni.” Kɛna yele bindɛ makoro ba hanuwande yabɛŋ ba ka Yisɔs baŋ.

Awa biya beŋ fooma kɔɔyɛ kuwaŋ e bindɛ kɔ detha, kɛrɛ bayahɛŋ beŋ thothe Yisɔs na dɛkuiŋ, na “Wundɛ na ba ni biya kisi woŋ, awa ndɛ niyɔkɔiŋ hɛ kisi, mɛnɛ ndɛ na Banikisi wo yɛthi Masaala woŋ e ndɛ niŋ ŋinda!”
Kurugbani beŋ thɔɔtɔy hɛlɛŋ niŋ ka hɛtha, e wunthe saa kaŋ thara e niŋ si yekiniyɛ mampa managbaiŋ.
Bindɛ tepe, na “Mɛnɛ yina gbaku wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ, niya hɛ yɛthɛ nda kisi!”
Kɛna gbale bindɛ magbali ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ ka thinthi, na “Woŋ, ndɛ na Gbaku wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ.”
Wunthe ka bi yanto ba niya wunɛnɔy beŋ thothe Yisɔs na dɛkuiŋ, na “E yi kutɛ Banikisi woŋ? Niyɔkɔ kisi, e yi mina niya kisi.”
Kɛrɛ wowuntheŋ woŋ pinde niŋ, na “E yi, yi payeta Masaala na? Miŋ fooma miŋ kɔŋ ka kugbasaŋati kunthe koŋ.
Kɛrɛ yaŋ iŋ yi, miŋ kɔŋ iŋ mayoho ba gbasiŋito, baa thunkuno na miŋ thunkuna haŋ ba ba thanki miŋ niya baŋ. Kɛrɛ hati lamgba woŋ baŋ, wundɛ tha ni bɛyi yo bɛyi banɛnɔy.”
Huna kaaye wundɛ ka kɔtɔkɔy e tɛpa, na “Yisɔs, siyuwa yama naa yi dɔŋɔy ka hugbakine hukɛnda haŋ.”
Huna tepe niŋ Yisɔs, na “Yaathi, yaŋ tepe yina, hɛ yi kɔŋ niyɔ iŋ yaŋ ka ariana.”
Naa tɛŋ wuŋ hatɔ teete, kaŋ woŋ dɔmɔi, huntuma humandiŋ putute kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ fooma haaŋ yɔkɔŋ na yilɔy kaŋ woŋ.
Awa thika babimɛ ba yanto nde ba hakinande biya beŋ iŋ makonko ma ka kupɛnkintiyande ku ka Masaala koŋ kaake ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ thɛthande mateete.
Kɛna bereŋ Yisɔs iŋ thampa thatɔɔkɛ, e ndɛ tɛpa, na “Fandaŋ, yaŋ thiyi yina wokiyaŋ woŋ ka thɛnkɔ thakɛnda!” Naa thanki nthɔŋ ndɛ huŋ tɛpa, wundɛ thathaŋ.
Naa kute bayaha wo ka kurugbani beŋ woŋ bɛyiniŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ, wundɛ thunkunu Masaala na e tɛpa, na “Yaathi, hati lamgba wothumbɛ na woŋ.”
Fooma sɛthɛ ba sɛɛ baŋ ba saa ka detha, naa kute bindɛ bɛyiniŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ, bindɛ fooma duu bi sinkinɛ thankaha iŋ nkinikiniŋ ka thathukuma.
Fooma bi barande nɔŋ iŋ Yisɔs beŋ, iŋ yɛrɛmɛŋ bi yemɛ nde niŋ beŋ ŋaye ka Kalili, kɔɔyɛ wuyɔsitɔy wuyete e bindɛ kuta fooma bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ.

Wɔ wunthe kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ keŋ nama kuna Yusufu, wo ka Arimathiya ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya, wɔ yɔhɔy, e ndɛ hɛlɛŋ niyɔ wothumbɛ e kɔ dethiteke ti Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ kɛrɛŋ. Hali na nde ndɛ wunthe wo ka Kaama wo ka biYusu beŋ woŋ, wundɛ tha yɛrɔkɔ makɛrɛŋ ma keriŋe Kaama woŋ maŋ iŋ mani ma ni bindɛ maŋ.
Huna wundɛ key ka Pailɛti ba niŋ ka thɔnthiŋina ba dunkuno kubeli ku ka Yisɔs koŋ.
Pailɛti yɛrɔkɔy. Yusufu key thuhuŋ kubeli koŋ ŋaye ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ. Wundɛ huitutu kuŋ thika bahuhɛ, e kuŋ ka thiya ka yoma hu gbuso ka kuthara nɔŋ makonko ka be nɔŋ hɛ wɔ manko.
Wuŋ, wuŋ niyɔy ka lɔkɔ bakosineke baŋ mahɔnkɔlɛŋ ka Fraide, naa thuriye wuŋ Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ, Sathide, ba sɛsuwa.
Yɛrɛmɛŋ bi sɛɛ iŋ Yisɔs beŋ ŋaye ka Kalili yeme, e bindɛ kuta yoma haŋ, e bindɛ kuta ka tayo kubeli ku ka Yisɔs koŋ.
Kɛna duu bindɛ; bindɛ key kɔsinɔkɔ mayɔ mathimɔy huru ba kubeli koŋ. Ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ bindɛ hɛɛmi nɔŋ na tepe Siraŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ na.
Ka Sɔnde kuputhɔ ku kaŋ, yɛrɛmɛŋ beŋ beŋ key ka yoma haŋ ba kata mayɔ mathimɔy huru ma thanki bindɛ kɔsinɔkɔ maŋ.
Naa tɛŋ bindɛ kɛndɛ, bindɛ penke raka haŋ hu binkilinɔy ŋaye ka biyo hu ka yoma haŋ.
Kɛrɛ naa biyande bindɛ, bindɛ tha kutu kubeli ku ka Yisɔs koŋ.
Naa kooye bindɛ e bindɛ kɔ niya kukabanɛ ba bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, kumaŋ, lamgbeŋ biye bi kooyeŋ kɛndɛ kuwaŋ bi iŋ muthɔɔ mumaleke.
Na thooyo bindɛ payɔ e bindɛ sinkina thaaya ka pothi, biya bibiye beŋ beŋ tepe bindɛ, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ deethuwe wopethɔy woŋ ka mateete ma ka bitukɛ beŋ?
Wundɛ ka dondo. Wundɛ ŋaye ka tuka haŋ. Siyuwaŋ hu tepe nde ndɛ bena haŋ naa nde ndɛ iŋ beŋ ka Kalili,
ba dɔma na yɔkɔŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ dunkuno ka thɛnkɔ tha ka bahakɛŋ, e yanto ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ, awa e ŋayi ka tuka haŋ ka gbɛɛŋ bataati baŋ.”
Kɛna simɔkɔy bindɛ thampɛŋ tha ka Yisɔs thaŋ.
Awa naa bindɛ duu ŋaye ka yoma haŋ, bindɛ key kaŋ tɛɛpuwa bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma ka bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ wunthe beŋ iŋ ka biya bihɛna beŋ.
Mariyama wo ka Makadala, Yoana, iŋ Mariyama nanda ka Yemisi, mɛnɛ nda yɛrɛmɛŋ bihɛna bi nde iŋ bindɛ beŋ, bindɛ bina key tepe baseriŋ bithɔɔkɔ beŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ.
Kɛrɛ bindɛ kute huseri haŋ haŋ nɔŋ sɛkɛlɛ bɛna, awa bindɛ tha huŋ ni kulanɛya hali.
Kɛrɛ Pita ŋayinɔkɔy; wundɛ key kaŋ thara ka yoma ka. Naa putɔy wundɛ e detha kaake, wundɛ kute thika bahuhɛ baŋ ba ŋoye kuwaŋ. Wundɛ duu kaŋ niya kukabanɛ kumandiŋ ba ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ.
Ka lɔkɔ banthe babɛina, bakarandeni biye bi ka Yisɔs bi kɔŋ nde key ka mɛti ba ka Imeyɔsi, wu bɛrɛ ba ŋaragba ŋasɔŋ-ŋaye ŋaye ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
Bindɛ kɔ kaa kaŋ gbonkiya ba bɛyiniŋ ba thankɛ niyɔ baŋ.
Naa bindɛ key kaŋ gbonkiya e bindɛ kɔ kaa kaŋ gbakila, Yisɔs see bindɛ thɔɔtɔ ka kubiyasi koŋ e bindɛ kɔ kaa ka nanthe.
Bindɛ kute niŋ kɛrɛ bindɛ tha niŋ ŋee.
Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ key kaŋ gbonkiya?” Kɛna kɔɔyɛ hintiŋ bindɛ biŋurɛ.
Wunthe ka bindɛ wo dɔma na Kiyopasi thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “E yi wuntheŋ nape ka thahinɛŋ bi sɛɛ ka Yɛrusalɛmi beŋ fooma, yina tha kɔthɔ bɛyiniŋ ba thankɛ daŋande ka mandɛni maŋ maŋ baŋ?”

Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ bɛyiniŋ ba niyɔy?” Huna tepe bindɛ, na “Bɛyiniŋ ba niyɔy ka Yisɔs wo ka Nasarɛthi woŋ, wo simoko woŋ iŋ Masaala mɛnɛ biyamɛti ba wundɛ niyɔ banabi womandiŋ ka bɛyiniŋ ba wundɛ ni iŋ ba wundɛ dunkunɔkɔy,
iŋ na bohe niŋ bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ iŋ bayahɛŋ ntuŋ beŋ e dunkuna niŋ mathonko ba ndɛ be kɔra, awa e yanto ka kuyeŋ kubariŋande koŋ.
Kɛrɛ miŋ tuteŋ nɔŋ yima na ndɛ na si bakaŋ biIsirɛli beŋ. Mahɛŋ mabɛina gbɛɛŋ bataati baŋ bɛna nda baŋ baŋ kabi naa niyɔy wuŋ.
Yɛrɛmɛŋ binɔndi ka mateete makɛntuŋ bi kaayɛ ka yoma ka kuputhɔ ku kaŋ koŋ beŋ tepe hɛlɛŋ mina bɛyi bathakaba,
na bindɛ tha pɛnki kubeli koŋ. Huna see bindɛ e si tɛpa na bindɛ kute malekɛŋ ka maniyɔ mathɔɔkɔ, bi tepe bindɛ ba dɔma na Yisɔs kɔŋ wopethɔy.
Mindo binɔndi key ka yoma ka e miŋ ka pɛnka nanthe nathesi na tepe yɛrɛmɛŋ beŋ na, kɛrɛ bindɛ tha kutu Yisɔs na.”
Huna tepe Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “O beŋ, bendo biya bithɔkɔy beŋ beŋ, e beŋ hɛlɛŋ niyɔ bendo kahɛ ba niya kulanɛya bɛyiniŋ fooma ba gbonkoy banabiŋ beŋ baŋ.
E wuŋ tha nde nda thanki deenko ba Banikisi woŋ ba niyo thɔrɔ, e wundɛ nɛnɛ biyande ka yiki nama baŋ?”
Awa there ka magbali ma ka Musa maŋ haaŋ saaŋ ka ma ka banabiŋ beŋ maŋ, Yisɔs methine bindɛ nagberekethe ba tepo nde ba wundɛ baŋ fooma ka magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ.
Naa thuriye bindɛ mɛti ba nde bindɛ key baŋ, Yisɔs ni nɔŋ ka wundɛ key ka kɔtɔkɔy.
Kɛrɛ bindɛ yikɔŋ niŋ ba wundɛ be hintiŋ niyɔ iŋ bindɛ, baa gbɛɛŋ woŋ yole nda kaa e huntuma nda kɔ saa. Kɛna key wundɛ niyɔ iŋ bindɛ.
Naa dɔŋɔy bindɛ ka thɔma haŋ, wundɛ sekithe kutoŋ koŋ e thiyɛ kuŋ thaduba, e thinkinuwande kuŋ e dunkune bindɛ kuŋ.
Kɛna pɛthɔy ntiŋ thaaya namɛŋ thaŋ. Bindɛ ŋee ntiŋ Yisɔs na, kɛrɛ wundɛ piriŋɔkɔy ka mateete makɛnamɛŋ.
Kɛna bohe bindɛ gbonkiya, na “E thathukuma thakɛntuŋ thaŋ tha hɛ thɛnɛŋ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ naa hɛ ndɛ mina gbonkitiyande ka gboŋa hɛ, naa hɛ ndɛ mina methine magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ?”
Kɛna ŋaye bindɛ kɔɔ hanthe e duwa ka Yɛrusalɛmi. Kɛna pɛnke bindɛ baseriŋ bithɔɔkɔ bikɔhi iŋ wunthe beŋ bi kɔmandeŋ ka tha banthe iŋ biya bihɛna.
Biya beŋ beŋ tepe bindɛ, na “Mariki woŋ ŋaye yaathi, awa wundɛ thanki nda tɔŋinɔkɔ ka Saimɔŋ!”
Kɛna tɛŋɛni ntiŋ bakarandeni biye beŋ nagberekethe ba niyɔy bindɛ ka gboŋa ka baŋ, iŋ nɔŋ na ŋeeye bindɛ Yisɔs na naa thinkiniyande wundɛ bindɛ kutoŋ koŋ ka thɔma haŋ.
Naa bindɛ gbonkoy bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, ka wuthurɔy wubɛina, Yisɔs kɔɔyɛ ka mateete namɛŋ e tɛpa, na “Haliko mathɛbɛ ma niyɔ iŋ beŋ.”
Kɛna thunɔkɔy bindɛ iŋ payɔ humandiŋ. Bindɛ siyi ba dɔma na kuyimɛy na kute bindɛ.
Huna tepe Yisɔs, na “Mbɛ ba beŋ niyeke thɔrɔ? Mbɛ ba beŋ niyeke kɔnthɔhili ka thathukuma thakendeŋ?
Dethaŋ hɛ thɛnkɔ niŋ thaŋ iŋ ŋathaki niŋ ŋaŋ, haliko beŋ be ni lanɛya ba dɔma na yama yaathi. Bohekeŋ hɛ yama e detha, baa kuyimɛy ka iŋ kɔtɔ iŋ bathoy nɔŋ na kute beŋ yama na.”
Naa thanki wundɛ gbonkiya nanaŋ, wundɛ toŋine bindɛ thɛnkɔ nama thaŋ iŋ ŋathaki nama ŋaŋ.
Naa yuye bindɛ huseri haŋ haŋ, bindɛ see thiŋ iŋ mayehitɔkɔ haaŋ bindɛ tha nda kɔthɔ na bindɛ huŋ niye lanɛya. Huna thonthiŋine wundɛ bindɛ, na “E beŋ kɔŋ iŋ muthɔma?”
Kɛna dunkune bindɛ Yisɔs na he woponɔi.
Wundɛ sekithe niŋ e thɔma niŋ ka thaaya ka bakarandeni beŋ fooma.

Huna tepe wundɛ bindɛ, na “Bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ bɛna gbonkitiyande nde yaŋ bena baŋ naa nde hintiŋ yaŋ iŋ beŋ, ba dɔma na bɛyi yo bɛyi ba thankɛ nde gbalo ba yaŋ ka Siraŋ ba ka Musa baŋ, iŋ banabiŋ beŋ, iŋ ka Ŋaiŋa ŋaŋ na, ba boheŋ ba niyɔ nɔŋ na tepe bindɛ na.”
Kɛna ni wundɛ ba bindɛ metho magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ.
Awa wundɛ key ka kɔtɔkɔy kaŋ tepe bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Haŋ haŋ huŋ gbalo nde nda, na Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ iŋ Masaala kɔŋ niya thɔrɔ, ka gbɛɛŋ bataati baŋ ndɛ kɔŋ ŋayina ka tuka haŋ.
Awa ka keŋ kukɛnama koŋ kɛna bohe maseri ma ka sikiyɔkɔ ŋaye ka hakɛŋ mɛnɛ ba peniyo hakɛŋ ba niyo kɛwandi ka siyani baŋ fooma there nthɔŋ nda ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
Beŋ, bena maseri ma ka bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ.
Awa yaŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ bena tɔŋɔti wu dome nde Masaala ba bena tɔŋita wuŋ. Kɛrɛ yumbaŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi haaŋ e beŋ thiyo sɛmbɛ baŋ maŋaye ka thinthi.”
Naa peyete wundɛ bakarandeni beŋ haaŋ ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthani, wundɛ yentheŋeŋ thɛnkɔ nama thaŋ e bindɛ thiyiyɛ thaduba.
Naa wundɛ bindɛ thiyiyɛ thaduba, kɛna piriŋe wundɛ mateete namɛŋ; wundɛ ŋatito ka ariana.
Kɛna ni bindɛ niŋ kubatho e duwa ka Yɛrusalɛmi iŋ mayehitɔkɔ mamandiŋ.
Bindɛ niyɔy ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ timo tima ka thunkunuwa niŋ.
Saanuŋ kafay woŋ ba therino, wɔ wo dɔma Thampa thaŋ woŋ kiŋ nde. Wundɛ kiŋ nde iŋ Masaala, awa ndɛ wobɛina na nde Masaala.
Ndɛ kiŋ ka mathɛrɛŋ maŋ iŋ Masaala.
Awa maŋaye kɛnama yehinuwe na Masaala munki fooma, awa Masaala tha yeheni ntha yo ntha mahɛŋ nama.
Ka Thampa thaŋ kɛna ŋaye sii ba ntha yo ntha ki hɛmɛ. Awa sii babɛina bɛna see niyɔ waŋ ba biyamɛti.
Hiŋ waŋ babɛina ba si bɛndi ka huntuma haŋ kɛrɛ huntuma haŋ sa bɛŋ punku dɔmina.
Wɔ wunthe kiŋ nde wo ŋindi Masaala, keŋ nama kuna dɔma Yɔni.
Ndɛ see nde ba si niya maseri ba waŋ baŋ baŋ, haliko biya fooma bi be ni Masaala na lanɛya ba hu bindɛ tepo haŋ.
Ndɛ Yɔni kutɛ nde waŋ baŋ, kɛrɛ asee ma nde hɔkɔŋ ba si niya maseri ba waŋ baŋ baŋ.
Bɛna nde waŋ bagbeeŋ ba nde tɔŋinɔkɔ kafaydo baŋ e bɛŋ kɔ tɔŋina waŋ ka biyamɛti fooma.
Wɔ wo dɔma Thampa thaŋ woŋ kiŋ nde kafaydo, awa kafaydo yehinuwo nde maŋaye kɛnama, kɛrɛ halisa biya bi kafaydo beŋ tha niŋ ŋee.
Ndɛ see nde ka kuyɛkɛŋ nama koŋ, kɛrɛ biya bikɛnama beŋ tha niŋ yɛrɔkɔ.
Kɛrɛ bindɛ fooma bi yɛrɔkɔy niŋ beŋ ka thathukuma namɛŋ thaŋ e bindɛ niŋ piiteke, ndɛ dunkune bindɛ mayoho ba niyɔ mpati bi ka Masaala.
Bindɛ tha dunkuno sii baŋ baŋ iŋ wɔmɛti, nɔŋ na wɔmɛti mpaa iŋ fandama kafaydo, kɛrɛ Masaala ka yɛthɛ nama baŋ ndɛ na dunkune bindɛ sii baŋ baŋ.

Wɔ wo dɔma Thampa thaŋ woŋ see niyɔ wɔmɛti awa e ndɛ si niya yikiya mateete makɛntuŋ. Wundɛ thimo nde mina wumandiŋ awa e ndɛ mina tepe nɔndi baŋ ba Masaala. Miŋ kute nde yiki ba iŋ wundɛ baŋ, awa yiki ba yɔkɔŋ ndɛ nagbɛti ndɛ na kutɛ bɛŋ maŋaye ka Fandama woŋ.

Yɔni wo Babiye biye hu ka Masaala haŋ woŋ ni maseri ba wundɛ kaŋ yɛla thampa ba dɔma, na “Woŋ baŋ na nde yaŋ dɔŋ woŋ, ‘Hali na ndɛ manke saa ba yaŋ na, kɛrɛ ndɛ yameŋ ba yaŋ, baa ndɛ kiŋ nde nda iŋ sii saanuŋ yaŋ ba mpoo.’ ”
Maŋaye ka makutiyɛ mamandiŋ ma ka wɔ wo dɔma Thampa thaŋ woŋ, miŋ fooma thiyiyo thaduba ka thinthi ka thaduba lɔkɔiŋ fooma.
Masaala dunkuŋ nde Siraŋ nama baŋ ka biyamɛti maŋaye ka Musa. Kɛrɛ makutiyɛ nama maŋ mɛnɛ nɔndi nama baŋ see kafaydo maŋaye ka Yisɔs Kraist.
Wɔ yo ka hɛ wo kutɛ Masaala na hali hanthe. Yɔkɔŋ Hati wowunthe woŋ napethi wo nanthe iŋ Masaala woŋ, wo thuriye Fandama na woŋ, ndɛ na toŋine mina Masaala na.

BiYusu bibayahɛŋ beŋ ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi baŋ ŋindi baseriŋ ka Yɔni wo Babiye woŋ, bafodeni mɛnɛ lamgbeŋ bi ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Libay baŋ ba mase ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ. Awa bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ ba dɔma, na “Mbɛ yina?”
Yɔni ni maseri maŋ maŋ baŋ ba bindɛ niya yaabi. Wundɛ tha baŋaŋ ba niya yaabi awa ndɛ tepe bindɛ nagberekethe e koyinta ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kutɛ Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ.”
Huna bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ hɛlɛŋ niŋ ba dɔma, na “E yina Ilaiya?” Yɔni dome, na “Yaŋ kutɛ.” Bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ hɛlɛŋ, na “E yina Banabi woŋ?” Yɔni ni hɛlɛŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Ade.”
Huna thonthiŋine hɛlɛŋ bindɛ niŋ, na “Mbu mbɛ nda yina gbeeŋ? Miŋ kiŋ ba ka tɔŋa kuna ka bi ŋindɛ mina beŋ. Nama yi dɔmɔkɔ ka yɛthɛ bakɛnda?”
Huna niye Yɔni bindɛ yaabi maŋaye ka magbali ma ka banabi woŋ Aisaya maŋ, na “Yama ‘Wɔ wunthe wo yɛli thampa ka wula baŋ, na Kɔsinɔkɔŋ gboŋa baŋ ba Mariki woŋ.’ ”
Huna thonthiŋine niŋ baseriŋ bi ŋindi kiki ba ka bayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ bi dɔma na biFaresini beŋ ba dɔma, na
“Mbu mbɛ hu yi biiye biya biye hu ka Masaala haŋ mɛnɛ yi kutɛ Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ, maa Ilaiya, maa wunthe ka banabiŋ beŋ?”
Kɛna ni Yɔni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena biye iŋ mandi. Kɛrɛ ka mateete makendeŋ wɔ wunthe kooyeŋ kɛndɛ wo ba beŋ ŋee.
Awa ndɛ na manke saa ba yaŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ sisandeta ba putɔ ba pɛɛka nkala ki ka dagbalɛŋ nama baŋ kiŋ.”
Wuŋ baŋ niyɔy ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthani kuwaŋ kubekede koŋ ka mankɔ ma ka Yɔdaŋ maŋ, ka nde Yɔni biiye biya biye hu ka Masaala haŋ ka.

Ka gbɛɛŋ wowuntheŋ woŋ, Yɔni kute Yisɔs si see ka kooye ndɛ ka iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ. Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Ya taka wohatiyɛ wo fuŋuŋ Masaala woŋ ba niya na biyamɛti bi kafaydo beŋ peniyo hakɛŋ namɛŋ baŋ.
Woŋ baŋ na bare nde yaŋ dɔma woŋ, na ‘Hali na manke wɔ wunthe woŋ saa ba yaŋ na, kɛrɛ ndɛ yameŋ ba yaŋ, baa ndɛ kiŋ nde nda iŋ sii saanuŋ yaŋ ba mpoo.’
Yaŋ gbeeŋ ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ baŋ yaŋ kɔita niŋ. Kɛrɛ huna koteke nde yaŋ ba si biye biya iŋ mandi haliko na ndɛ si toŋino ka biya bi ka Isirɛli beŋ.”
Kɛna ni Yɔni maseri maŋ maŋ ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kute Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ si thuhu maŋaye ka ariana nɔŋ kurotho, e ndɛ niŋ tutɔ e niyɔ iŋ wundɛ.

Kɛrɛ halisa yaŋ tha kɔthɔ ba dɔma na wundɛ na. Kɛrɛ Masaala wo ŋindɛ nde yama woŋ ba si biye biya iŋ mandi, ndɛ na tepe nde yama ba dɔma, na ‘Wɔ wo nɔŋ nthɔŋ yi kutu Yina wokiyaŋ woŋ si thuhu maŋaye ka ariana e ndɛ niŋ tutɔ awa e niyɔ iŋ wundɛ, wɔ bɛina na bena si biye iŋ Yina wokiyaŋ woŋ.’ ”
Yɔni tepe, na “Yaŋ kutuyɔkɔy bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ nagberekethe, awa huna niye yaŋ maseri ba dɔma na ndɛ na Hati ka Masaala woŋ.”
Ka gbɛɛŋ woyemɛ woŋ, Yɔni kooyeŋ nde hɛlɛŋ iŋ lamgbeŋ biye ka bakarandeni nama beŋ.
Naa kute wundɛ Yisɔs si kaande, ndɛ dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Ya taka wohatiyɛ wo fuŋuŋ Masaala woŋ.”
Bakarandeni bibiye bi yuyɛ Yɔni si nɛŋ dɔŋ beŋ pɛyi yema Yɔni na haŋ awa bindɛ thɔɔtɔy Yisɔs na.

Naa bindɛ key, kɛna dethe Yisɔs mahɛŋ e ndɛ kuta bi si niŋ yeŋ. Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Mbɛ mu beŋ deethi?” Huna dome bindɛ kɛnama, na “Rabay, kama niye yi yikiya?” ‘Rabay, thalintando ba dɔma na ‘Karimɔkɔ.’

Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Saaŋ dethi.” Kɛna key bindɛ dethi ka niye ndɛ yikiya ka. Wu kiŋ nde nda bɛrɛ ba ti yɛrɛmɛŋ sesuwe ba tota muhure. Bindɛ key e bindɛ ka niyɔ kɛndɛ iŋ Yisɔs haaŋ kaŋ woŋ thɔɔ.
Wunthe ka beŋ beŋ baŋ ndɛ na dɔma Anduru, wɛnda Saimɔŋ Pita woŋ.

Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina, Anduru kute wɛndama na Saimɔŋ. Ndɛ tepe niŋ ba dɔma, na “Miŋ kute Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ, wo dɔma woŋ na Mɛsaya.” Keŋ ku dɔma koŋ na Mɛsaya, keŋ kunthe kuna iŋ ku dɔma koŋ na Kraist.

Kɛna sisi ndɛ Saimɔŋ na ka Yisɔs. Yisɔs dethe Saimɔŋ na natiŋ, e ndɛ dɔma kɛnama, na “Keŋ nda koŋ kuna dɔma Saimɔŋ hati ka Yɔni woŋ. Yina nda dɔma Sifasi.” Ŋakeŋ ŋaŋaye ŋaŋ ŋaŋ baŋ Sifasi mɛnɛ Pita, keŋ kunthe kuna. Awa ŋakeŋ ŋaŋaye ŋaŋ kuthara kuna domo.
Ka gbɛɛŋ woyemɛ woŋ, Yisɔs dɛɛnki ba kaa ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili. Naa ndɛ key, ndɛ penke Filipi na. Huna dome ndɛ kɛnama, na “Thɔɔtɔ yama.”
Filipi woŋ baŋ ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthɛseda ka ŋaye Anduru ka mɛnɛ Pita.

Awa Filipi kute Nathaniyɛli na, e ndɛ dɔma kɛnama, na “Miŋ kute niŋ wo ba gbale nde Musa ka buku wo ka Siraŋ baŋ woŋ awa wo ba gbale banabiŋ beŋ ka ŋathagba namɛŋ ŋaŋ woŋ. Ndɛ na dɔma Yisɔs hati ka Yusufu wo ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Nasarɛthi baŋ woŋ.”
Huna dome Nathaniyɛli ka Filipi, na “E bɛy bayɔhɔy ba kɔŋ punku ŋaye ka Nasarɛthi?” Huna dome Filipi kɛnama, na “Saa dethiyɔkɔ.”

Naa kute Yisɔs Nathaniyɛli si see ka kooye ndɛ ka, ndɛ tepe ba wundɛ, na “Ya wɔ wunthe wo ŋaye ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka Isirɛli baŋ wo sisande ba domo woIsirɛli woŋ. Hati wowathe woŋ baŋ sa thiiki womo woma thɔkɔ.”

Nathaniyɛli thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Yisɔs na, na “Nama dɔmɛ yi kɔŋ yama kothiye?” Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ niŋ ba dɔma, na “Filipi tha yina niye thiye hu doŋe yi ka niŋ hu ka kuyeŋ ku dɔma koŋ na fiki e yaŋ hɛ nda yina thɔkita kuta.”
Kɛna mɛyiyɛ niŋ Nathaniyɛli iŋ kukabanɛ ba dɔma, na “Karimɔkɔ, yina Hati ka Masaala woŋ! Yina Gbaku wo ka Isirɛli woŋ!”

Huna mɛyiyɛ niŋ Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “E ba na dome yaŋ yina, na yaŋ thɔkɔti hɛ yina kuta yi doŋe ka niŋ hu ka kuyeŋ koŋ haŋ, huna niye yi lanɛya? Yumba, yi kɔŋ kutu bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba yamɛ ba baŋ baŋ.”
Yisɔs dome hɛlɛŋ kɛnama, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe nɔndi baŋ, yi kɔŋ nɔŋ kutu ka ariana pɛthɔ, awa e malekɛŋ bi ka Masaala beŋ kɔ ŋata e bindɛ kɔ thatha ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ.”
Naa daŋande wuŋ hura kaye, kuyɛntande ku kiŋ nde ka mɛti ba ka Kena ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili koŋ. Awa nanda ka Yisɔs kiŋ nde kɛndɛ.
Yisɔs mɛnɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ nde hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ thiyo ba ka penkitiye ka kuyɛntande koŋ.
Naa see biya beŋ thanko mampa, nanda ka Yisɔs tepe Yisɔs na, na “Bindɛ thanko mampa.”
Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Naanaŋ, mbɛ hu yama yi tepe ba yaŋ ba niya? Lɔkɔ ba yaŋ toŋineke baŋ teŋeta hɛ.”
Kɛna dome nandama ka bawaliŋ bigbako beŋ, na “Bɛy yo bɛy ba ndɛ bena tepe ba niya, niyaŋ bɛŋ.”

Ka lɔkɔ babɛina thasokoro tha yehinuwo maŋaye ka tharaka thasɔŋ-hunthe tha kiŋ nde kɛndɛ, tha kiye kɛndɛ biYusu beŋ ba thiye mandi baa bindɛ kiŋ iŋ sirani babɔyɛ ba ka mɛthinɔkɔ ka kuwaŋ ku ka dina namɛŋ woŋ. Sokoro yo sokoro hu kɔŋ sɛkɛthi thakalɔni kɔnthɔ kaye maa kɔnthɔ kataati.
Kɛna dome Yisɔs ka bawaliŋ beŋ, na “Thiŋinuwaŋ thasokoro thaŋ thaŋ mandi.” Huna thiŋini bindɛ thɛŋ mandi nayerere.
Naa nambe wuŋ wuyete, huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Mɛpaŋ manɔndi e beŋ mɛŋ kata ka bayaha ndeŋ wo ka kuyɛntande koŋ woŋ.” Bindɛ mepe mɛŋ e bindɛ mɛŋ kata.

Naa miŋ bayaha wo ka kuyɛntande koŋ woŋ mandi ma sikinando mampa maŋ, ndɛ tha kɔthɔ ka ŋaye mampa mayɔhɔy maŋ maŋ baŋ. Kɛrɛ bawaliŋ bi mɛpɛ mɛŋ beŋ bi kɔthɛŋ ka ŋaye mɛŋ. Kɛna thiyi bayaha wo ka kuyɛntande koŋ woŋ bayɛnti woŋ

e ndɛ dɔma kɛnama, na “Wuŋ niyɔy yama kɔnthɔhili. Timo tima biya bi bareŋ kɔ yenke dunkuno mampa ma yamɛ yɔhɔ maŋ. Awa naa bindɛ thanki mɛŋ thiiye wubɔyɛ, ndɛ dunkuŋ ntiŋ ma ba thanki yɔhɔ maŋ. Kɛrɛ yi kɔsɔŋ hɛ ma yamɛ yɔhɔ maŋ ba mɛŋ manke thiiyo.”

Bɛy bathakaba baŋ baŋ bɛna mayoŋ ba ni Yisɔs ba tɔŋina na ndɛ. Awa ndɛ ni bɛŋ ka mɛti ba ka Kena ba ka Kalili. Ka lɔkɔ baŋ baŋ toŋine ma ntiŋ biya beŋ ba ndɛ niyɔ wɔ sisande ba gbuŋunuwo. Awa bakarandeni nama beŋ ni ntiŋ niŋ lanɛya.
Naa daŋande wuŋ kɛndɛ, Yisɔs iŋ nandama, mɛnɛ mbɛndama bibiyɛthɛŋ, mɛnɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ key ka mɛti ba ka Kapaniyɔmi e bindɛ kɛndɛ ka niyɔ ba gbɛɛni bikɔndande.
Lɔkɔ baŋ thuriye ba biYusu beŋ siyuwe naa puntuyando nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ iŋ maleka wo nde katitɔkɔ tuka haŋ woŋ ka Iyipiti. Huna kaaye Yisɔs ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi.

Naa tɛŋ ndɛ kɛndɛ, ndɛ key biyande ka gbada hu ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ e pɛnka kɛndɛ bi ni gbɔŋ manani, takɛŋ, mɛnɛ kukuni mu biya beŋ boy ba fuŋuna saraka ka Masaala. Ndɛ hɛlɛŋ pɛnka kɛndɛ bi thikipiyɛ biya kɔbiri woŋ beŋ bi doŋe e bindɛ kɔ niya wali namɛŋ baŋ.

Kɛna sekithe ndɛ ŋalansi e ndɛ ŋɛŋ niya kusorigba ba kanthe maamiŋ beŋ fooma, takɛŋ beŋ, mɛnɛ manani beŋ ka gbada hu ka banka ba ka Masaala baŋ haŋ. Ndɛ koŋotoni thebuluiŋ bi ka bathikipiŋ kɔbiri woŋ beŋ, awa e kɔbiri namɛŋ woŋ pankande fooma.
Ndɛ dome ka bi ni kukuni beŋ gbɔŋ beŋ, na “Funkutaŋ muŋ muŋ dondo baŋ fooma. Baŋ ni banka ba ka Fandaŋ baŋ banka ba niye gbɔŋ.”

Kɛna kɔthɛ ntiŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ ba dɔma na wu ni Yisɔs wuŋ, magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ tepe nde huŋ, ma tɛpɛ maŋ ba dɔma, na “Masaala, kufiyo niŋ koŋ ba niya banka nda baŋ yiki kuŋ abɔy, awa ku kɔŋ yama tɔɔni ka thukuma niŋ haŋ nɔŋ buu.”
Kɛna see biYusu bi bohitɛ sɛmbɛ baŋ beŋ ka Yisɔs e bindɛ dɔma kɛnama, na “Mbɛ bɛy bathakaba ba yi ni ba tɔŋɔŋ ba dɔma na yi kiŋ iŋ mayoho ba niya wuŋ baŋ?”
Yisɔs mɛyiyɛ bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Teetuwaŋ yikiya ba ka Masaala baŋ baŋ, awa ka gbɛɛŋ wo tɛŋinɛ wotaati woŋ, yaŋ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ bɛŋ thanki thoya.”
BiYusu beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “E banka ba sɛkithɛ thaninɛŋ kɔnthɔ-kanaŋ iŋ thasɔŋ-hunthe ka thoyo baŋ bɛna yi dɔŋ ba thoya gbɛɛni bitaati?”
Bindɛ tha kɔthɔ ba dɔma na Yisɔs kɔŋ nde thɔyintande kɔtɔ nama koŋ iŋ banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ.
Yɔkɔŋ naa ŋaye Yisɔs ka tuka haŋ, kɛna siyi ntiŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ ba dɔma na ndɛ tepe nde huŋ. Awa bindɛ yame ntiŋ niya magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ lanɛya iŋ hu tepe nde Yisɔs haŋ.

Naa nde hintiŋ Yisɔs ka Yɛrusalɛmi naa nde bindɛ siyi lɔkɔ ba puntuyando nde bindɛ iŋ maleka wo nde katitɔkɔ tuka haŋ woŋ ka Iyipiti maŋ, biya bibɔyɛ ni Yisɔs na lanɛya baa bindɛ kute bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba ni ndɛ ba tɔŋina na ndɛ.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs tha bindɛ piiteke, baa ndɛ kɔthɛŋ na biyamɛti fooma
awa ndɛ kahota ba wɔ niŋ tepe na biyamɛti. Ndɛ gbeeŋ, ka yɛthɛ nama, ndɛ kɔthɛŋ mu kaake ka thukuma hu ka wɔmɛti.
Wɔ wathe wunthe kiŋ nde kɛndɛ wo dɔma na Nikɔdimɔsi, wo nde wunthe ka bakalani bibayahɛŋ beŋ ka biYusu beŋ. Ndɛ nde hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ niyɔ wunthe ka kiki ba ka biFaresini beŋ baŋ.

Hati wowathe woŋ baŋ na kaayɛ nde ka Yisɔs huyɛ e ndɛ ka dɔma kɛnama, na “Karimɔkɔ, miŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na bathanani na yi wo ŋaye ka Masaala. Awa wɔ sa punku niya bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba yi ni baŋ yɔkɔŋ Masaala niyɔy iŋ wɔ bɛina.”
Huna niye niŋ Yisɔs yaabi ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe nɔndi baŋ, wɔ sa punku kuta Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ yɔkɔŋ ndɛ mpoo hɛlɛŋ.”
Kɛna thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Nikɔdimɔsi Yisɔs na, na “Nama hɛlɛŋ wɔ thankɛ nda fuŋa kɔ duu ka mpoo hɛlɛŋ? Yaathi, ndɛ sa nda punku duuwa ka thɔɔ ka kotho hu ka nandama haŋ e ndɛ hɛlɛŋ duuwa ka mpoo hukaye.”

Kɛna mɛyiyɛ niŋ Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe nɔndi baŋ, yɔkɔŋ wɔmɛti mpoo maŋaye ka mandi mɛnɛ maŋaye ka sɛmbɛ ba ka Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ. Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ, ndɛ sa punku biyande ka Hugbakine hu ka Masaala haŋ.
Wɔmɛti na mpuu wɔmɛti, kɛrɛ Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ na dunkuŋ sii ka yina wo ka wɔmɛti woŋ.
Ba ni thakaba ba na tepe yaŋ yina ba dɔma na yɔkɔŋ yi mpoo hɛlɛŋ.
Huru haŋ hu kɔŋ hɔŋ e huŋ kaa ka thimo huŋ ba kaa. Yi kɔŋ yuyɛ kutɔŋa kubɛina, kɛrɛ yi kɔita ka ŋaye huŋ maa ka huŋ key. Nɛna wuŋ niyɔ ka wɔ yo wɔ wo mpaa iŋ Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ.”
Huna thonthiŋine niŋ Nikɔdimɔsi, na “Nama bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ punku niiye?”
Kɛna mɛyiyɛ niŋ Yisɔs, na “E yindo bathanani womandiŋ wo ka Isirɛli woŋ, haaŋ hɛ yi kɔita bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ?
Yaŋ kɔŋ yina tepe nɔndi baŋ, miŋ kɔŋ gbonkoy bɛyiniŋ ba kɔthɛ miŋ, awa e miŋ kɔ niya maseri ba bɛyiniŋ ba thanki miŋ kutuyɔkɔ baŋ. Kɛrɛ wɔ o ka wo yɛrɔkɔ maseri ma thanki miŋ bena tepe maŋ.
Beŋ tha yama ni lanɛya ba bɛyiniŋ ba kafaydo ba thanki yaŋ bena tepe baŋ fooma. Nama beŋ niye lanɛya mɛnɛ yaŋ tepe bena bɛyiniŋ fooma ba ka ariana?
Wɔ yo ka hɛ wo ŋatɛ ka ariana yɔkɔŋ wo thuhɛ woŋ maŋaye ka ariana, wo dɔma Hati ka Wɔ woŋ.”
Awa nɔŋ na ŋataŋ nde nthɔŋ Musa wokɛkɛŋ wodɛwɔi wo kahitinɔy ka kuyeŋ koŋ ka wula baŋ na, nɛna nɔŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ ŋatina ka thinthi.
Huna, mɛnɛ wɔ yo wɔ niŋ ni lanɛya ndɛ kɔŋ kutu sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.
Masaala na thimo kafay woŋ haaŋ e ndɛ dunkuna Hati nama wowunthe woŋ napethi. Huna wɔ yo wɔ wo niŋ ni lanɛya, wɔ bɛina sa tuku, kɛrɛ ndɛ kɔŋ kutu sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.
Awa Masaala tha ŋindi Hati nama woŋ kafaydo ba si thonkine biya bi kafaydo. Kɛrɛ ndɛ ŋindi niŋ haliko biya bi kafaydo beŋ bi be niyɔ kisi maŋaye kɛnama.
Wɔ yo wɔ wo niyɛ niŋ lanɛya, ndɛ sa thonkino. Kɛrɛ wo tha niŋ ni lanɛya, ndɛ thanki nda thonkino, baa ndɛ tha ni lanɛya ka Hati ka Masaala wowunthe woŋ napethi.

Wɔ yo wɔ wo tha ni lanɛya ka Hati ka Masaala woŋ ndɛ kɔŋ thonkino, bɛy bahɛna kutɛ waŋ baŋ see ka faido kɛrɛ biya bi kafaydo beŋ athimo huntuma haŋ e wuŋ yama ba waŋ baŋ, baa bɛyiniŋ ba bindɛ ni baŋ anɛnɔ.
Wɔ yo wɔ wo ni banɛnɔy wundɛ thimota waŋ baŋ, awa ndɛ sa see ka waŋ baŋ, baa bɛyiniŋ ba ndɛ ni banɛnɔy baŋ ba kɔŋ tɔŋinɔkɔ ka waŋ baŋ.
Kɛrɛ wɔ wo ni bɛyiniŋ ba dome Masaala ba bɛŋ niyɔ bayɔhɔy, ndɛ kɔŋ see ka waŋ baŋ, haliko wali nama baŋ ba be kutɔ nagberekethe ba wuŋ niyɔ na ndɛ ni wali bayɔhɔy baa ndɛ putuyɔy Masaala na.
Naa daŋande bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma, Yisɔs mɛnɛ bakarandeni nama beŋ key ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya koŋ. Kɛna niyɔy ndɛ iŋ bindɛ ba hura hukɔndande e ndɛ nde kɛndɛ kɔ biye biya beŋ biye hu ka Masaala haŋ.

Yɔni nde hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ gbeeŋ ndɛ kɔŋ nde biye biya beŋ biye hu ka Masaala haŋ ka mankɔ ma thuriye ka mɛti ba ka Enani baŋ, wuthuriye ka Selimi. Kɛna nde mandi mabɔyɛ, awa biya bibɔyɛ bi kɔŋ nde see kɛnama ba biyo.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina, Yɔni tha nde niye thiyo ka yeeli woŋ.
Lɔkɔ banthe kugbakali see thɔɔ mateete ma ka bakarandeni bi ka Yɔni beŋ mɛnɛ woYu wunthe saathɛ ba ka mɛthinɔkɔ ka kuwaŋ ku ka dina namɛŋ woŋ.

Huna kaaye bakarandeni beŋ ka Yɔni ka e bindɛ ka dɔma kɛnama, na “Karimɔkɔ, wɔ wo nde iŋ miŋ woŋ kuwaŋ kubekede koŋ ka mankɔ ma ka Yɔdaŋ maŋ, wo ba gbonkoy nde yi baŋ, ya niŋ kanka baŋ si biye biya biye hu ka Masaala haŋ. Awa biya muŋ fooma thanki kɔ kaa kɛnama ka.”
Yɔni mɛyiyɛ bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Wɔ yo ka wo punku kuta ntha nɔŋ kiŋ kiŋ baŋ mahɛŋ ma ndɛ tha kiŋ dunkuno iŋ Masaala.
Beŋ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ gbeeŋ bena maseri makiyaŋ ba na dome yaŋ, na ‘Yaŋ kutɛ Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ, kɛrɛ ayenke na yaŋ ŋindo ba ndɛ.’
Bayɛnti woŋ na biyɛ wɔtɔ nama, awa nyathiki wo ka bayɛnti woŋ na kɔɔ ba niŋ poniyɛ kuiha. Ndɛ kɔŋ yehitɔkɔ wumandiŋ ba thampa tha ka bayɛnti woŋ thaŋ. Bɛna, yaŋ yehitɔkɔy wumandiŋ.
Yɔkɔŋ ndɛ be ŋati keŋ e yaŋ thatha keŋ.”

Ndɛ wo ŋaye ka ariana woŋ, ndɛ yameŋ niyɔ wɔ mandiŋ ayaŋ ba wɔ yo wɔ kafaydo. Awa ndɛ wo kafaydo woŋ, ndɛ kiŋ ba kafaydo, awa ndɛ kɔŋ gbonkoy ba bɛyiniŋ ba kafaydo baŋ. Kɛrɛ ndɛ wo ŋaye ka ariana woŋ, ndɛ yameŋ ba ntha yo ntha.
Ndɛ see ni maseri ba bɛyiniŋ fooma ba thanki ndɛ kutuyɔkɔ iŋ ba thanki ndɛ yuyɔkɔ baŋ ka ariana. Kɛrɛ halisa wɔ tha niyɔ wo yɛrɔkɔy hu tepe ndɛ haŋ.
Kɛrɛ wɔ wo yɛrɔkɔ hu ndɛ tɛpi haŋ woŋ, wɔ bɛina ni maseri ba dɔma na Masaala kiŋ banɔndi.
Wɔ wo ŋindi Masaala woŋ see tepe biya thampa tha ka Masaala thaŋ, baa Masaala dunkune niŋ Yina nama woŋ wubɔyɛ.
Fanda ntuŋ woŋ athimo Hati nama woŋ wumandiŋ, wuna biyɛ ndɛ niŋ dunkune ntha yo ntha.
Wɔ wo ni Hati woŋ lanɛya, ndɛ kiŋ iŋ sii ba kɔi o kɔi. Wɔ wo sa putiyɔ Hati ka Masaala woŋ, wɔ bɛina sa kutu sii ba kɔy yo kɔy, awa Masaala sa pɛyi ba gbasiŋita wɔ bɛina.
BiFaresini beŋ yuye ba dɔma na Yisɔs kɔŋ nde yema iŋ biya bibɔyɛ, awa e wundɛ nde hɛlɛŋ kɔ biye bakarandeni bibɔyɛ wuŋ yama ba Yɔni.
Hali na niyɔy nde wuŋ na ndɛ Yisɔs kutɛ nde biye bindɛ. Bakarandeni nama beŋ bina nde biye bindɛ.
Naa yuye Yisɔs hu bindɛ gbonkoy ba ndɛ haŋ, ndɛ pɛyɛŋ ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya ba kaa ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili.
Kɛrɛ saanuŋ ndɛ ba tɛŋa ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili, yɔkɔŋ ndɛ be kɛriŋiyande ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Sameriya koŋ.
Naa daŋande ndɛ ka Sameriya, ndɛ tɛŋ ka mɛti ba dɔma na Saika, wuthuriye kay hu dunkune nde Yakuba hati nama Yusufu na haŋ.
Ka kay hubɛina haŋ haŋ baŋ sobo hu ka Yakuba haŋ hu kiŋ nde kɛndɛ. Naa tɛŋ kɛndɛ Yisɔs, ndɛ thamɔy biyasi haŋ. Awa ndɛ dɔŋɔy kɛndɛ kuwaŋ ka sobo haŋ ba hɛɛmuwa. Wu kiŋ nde nda bɛrɛ ba hatɔ teete.
Ka doŋe Yisɔs kuwaŋ ka sobo haŋ kɛ, kɛna penko ndɛ iŋ hati woyɛrɛmɛ woSameriya wo sɛɛ ka muna. Naa kute niŋ Yisɔs, huna dome ndɛ kɛnama, na “Nkaa yama mandi ba thiiye.”
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina bakarandeni nama beŋ niye nda kaaye ka mɛti ka ba ka boya muthɔma.

Huna thonthiŋine hati woyɛrɛmɛ wo ka Sameriya woŋ Yisɔs na, na “Mbɛ hu yindo woYu yama yawute mandi ba thiiye? Yando wɔ yɛrɛmɛ wo ka Sameriya.” Ndɛ tepe huŋ baa biYusu beŋ thiiyeta ka thakɔɔpu tha biSameriya beŋ thiiye thaŋ.

Naa gbanthaŋ ndɛ, huna niye niŋ Yisɔs yaabi ba dɔma, na “Mɛnɛ yi kɔthɛŋ nde munkii mu ka Masaala muŋ iŋ wo yina dɔŋ woŋ, na ‘Nkaa yama mandi ba thiiye,’ yi kɔŋ nde niŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ ba mandi. Awa ndɛ kɔŋ nde yina dunkune mandi ma dunkuŋ sii.”
Huna dome hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ ka Yisɔs, na “Hɛmɔŋ, yi ka iŋ mumune, awa sobo haŋ hɛlɛŋ husuŋɔy. Kama yi punku kute mandi mabɛina ma dunkuŋ sii maŋ?

E ba hɔŋ yina yamɛ niyɔ wɔ mandiŋ ba mbemba ntuŋ woŋ Yakuba wo dunkune mina sobo haŋ haŋ ba miŋ fooma ndɛɛ kɔ mune mandi ba thiiye? Ndɛ yo, mpati nama yo, mɛnɛ ndansi nama kiŋ thiiye nde ka sobo haŋ haŋ baŋ.”
Kɛna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Wɔ yo wɔ wo thiiye mandi ma ka sobo haŋ haŋ baŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ kaho kumbɛ.
Kɛrɛ wɔ yo wɔ wo thiiye mandi ma yaŋ niŋ dunkune maŋ, ndɛ sa nɔŋ nda kaho kumbɛ. Mandi ma yaŋ niŋ dunkune maŋ ma kɔŋ niyɔ nɔŋ sobo kaake kɛnama hu iŋ mandi ma niŋ dunkune sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.”
Hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ dome kɛnama, na “Hɛmɔŋ, yaandi nkaa yama mandi maŋ maŋ baŋ, haliko yaŋ be tha nda kaho kumbɛ, maa yaŋ be tha nda hɛlɛŋ see dondo baŋ ka muna mandi.”
Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Kaa e yi ka thiya wanda na e beŋ saa dondo baŋ.”
Hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ dome kɛnama, na “Yaŋ ka iŋ wathe wo yɛntɛ yama gbeeŋ.” Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Yi asisande ba dɔma na yi ka iŋ wathe wo yɛntɛ yina gbeeŋ.
Kɛrɛ yi thanki nda yento iŋ biyɛthɛŋ bisɔhi, awa wo nda iŋ yi ka tete woŋ wanda kutɛ gbeeŋ. Yi konde nɔndi baŋ.”
Kɛna dome hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ kɛnama, na “Hɛmɔŋ, yaŋ kute ba dɔma na banabi na yi.

Tepe hɛ yama, mbembɛŋ ntuŋ beŋ bi kɔŋ nde niye Masaala na kubatho ka kusɛri koŋ koŋ baŋ, kɛrɛ bendo biYusu beŋ dome na wo ba niya Masaala na kubatho yɔkɔŋ ndɛ be key ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi; kɛna Masaala ba niyo kubatho. E nɛna huŋ?”
Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Hati woyɛrɛmɛ, niya lanɛya hu yaŋ yina tepe haŋ. Lɔkɔ baŋ ba kɔŋ see ba sa nda biya niye Fanda ntuŋ woŋ kubatho ka kusɛri koŋ koŋ baŋ maa ka Yɛrusalɛmi.
Bendo biSameriya beŋ, bendo ni kubatho mu ba beŋ kɔthɔ. Kɛrɛ mindo biYusu beŋ miŋ kɔthɛŋ Masaala wo miŋ ni kubatho woŋ, baa Masaala ni lahiri ba niya biyamɛti kisi maŋaye ka biYusu beŋ.

Lɔkɔ baŋ ba kɔŋ see, awa bɛŋ tɛŋ nda hintiŋ nthɔŋ, ba biya niye Fanda ntuŋ woŋ kubatho ku gbakita iŋ Yina nama woŋ, awa bi kɔŋ kɔthɔ nɔndi baŋ ba wundɛ. Fanda ntuŋ woŋ kɔŋ deethi biya bi niŋ niye kubatho ka gboŋa baŋ baŋ.
Masaala yina na. Huna biya bi niŋ ni kubatho beŋ yɔkɔŋ bi be niŋ niye kubatho ku gbakita iŋ Yina nama woŋ, awa bi kiŋ ba kɔthɔ nɔndi baŋ ba wundɛ.”

Kɛna dome hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ kɛnama, na “Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na Banikisi wo niyo lahiri woŋ kɔŋ see. Naa ndɛ see, ndɛ kɔŋ mina si toŋinuwe bɛyiniŋ fooma.” Hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ dome niŋ Banikisi. Ndɛ na hɛlɛŋ dɔma Kraist woŋ.
Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Yando yina gbonkitiyande woŋ, yama Banikisi woŋ gbeeŋ.”

Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina bakarandeni nama beŋ see maŋaye ka mɛti ka. Naa penke bindɛ Yisɔs si gbonkoy iŋ hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ, wuŋ niyɔy bindɛ thɛrɛnaŋ wumandiŋ. Kɛrɛ wɔ tha niyɔ wo thɔnthiŋinɛ hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ ba dɔma, na “Mbɛ mu thimo yi?” maa Yisɔs na, na “Mbɛ hu yi gbonkitiyande hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ?”
Kɛna pɛy hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ mumune muŋ, e ndɛ kaa kaŋ thara ka mɛti ka. Ndɛ key tepe biya beŋ, na
“Saaŋ ka detha wɔ wathe wo tepe yama bɛyiniŋ fooma ba thanki nde yaŋ niya. E ba hɔŋ woŋ baŋ kutɛ Banikisi woŋ?”
Biya beŋ fooma ŋaye ka mɛti ka ba ka detha Yisɔs na.
Naa nambe wuŋ wuyete, bakarandeni nama beŋ theteke niŋ, na “Karimɔkɔ, thɔma.”
Kɛrɛ huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kiŋ iŋ muthɔma ba thɔma mu ba beŋ kɔthɔ.”
Kɛna bohe bakarandeni beŋ thɔnthiŋinuwande wunthe iŋ ntɔ nama, na “E ba hɔŋ wɔ na sisiyɛ niŋ muthɔma?”
Yisɔs dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Muthɔma niŋ muŋ muna ba niya mathimo ma ka wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ maŋ, awa iŋ ba thankina wali nama ba ŋindi ndɛ yama ba si niya baŋ.
E beŋ tha dɔŋ, na ‘Ŋɔna haŋ pɛyɛ sɛnkɛni binaŋ’? Kɛrɛ yaŋ tepe bena, dethaŋ hɛ dumgbu baŋ. Beŋ kɔŋ kutu na thithi paka baŋ ba ŋono.
Wɔ wo ŋɔŋ ka lɔkɔ woŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ kutu kuthunkuŋ, awa wɔ bɛina na kɔsinɔkɔ mutiŋ mu ka sii ba kɔy yo kɔy muŋ. Wuna bapay woŋ mɛnɛ baŋɔŋ woŋ yehitɔkɔ ka nanthe.
Wuna hu tepo haŋ niyɔ nɔndi hu tɛpɛ haŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Woŋ paye nthɔŋ, woŋ ŋone.’
Yaŋ kɔŋ ŋindi bena ba ŋɔna dumgbu ba tha beŋ ni wali. Biya bihɛna bina niyɛ kɛndɛ wali. Awa beŋ kɔŋ kutu munahaŋ maŋaye ka wali namɛŋ baŋ.”
BiSameriya bibɔyɛ ka mɛti babɛina ni lanɛya ka Yisɔs saathɛ ba magbonkoy ma ka hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ maŋ, naa dome ndɛ, na “Ndɛ tepe yama bɛyiniŋ fooma ba thanki nde yaŋ niya.”
Naa see biSameriya beŋ ka Yisɔs, bindɛ theteke niŋ ba ndɛ be niyɔ hintiŋ iŋ bindɛ. Awa Yisɔs niyɔy kɛndɛ ba hura kaye.
Awa biya bibɔyɛ ni lanɛya ka Yisɔs ba magbonkoy nama maŋ.

Huna dome bindɛ ka hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ, na “Wuŋ ka nda ba magbonkoy nda maŋ huna niye miŋ lanɛya, baa miŋ nda gbeeŋ ka yɛthɛ bakɛntuŋ miŋ yuyɔkɔy nda. Awa miŋ kɔthɛ nda ba dɔma na ndɛ na wɔ bɛina wo ni biya bi kafaydo beŋ kisi.”
Naa daŋande hura kaye woŋ, Yisɔs pɛyɛŋ kɛndɛ e ndɛ kaa ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili.
Yisɔs tepe nde, na “Banabi ka iŋ yiki ka kuyɛkɛŋ nama koŋ.”

Naa tɛŋ ndɛ ka Kalili, biya bi ka Kalili beŋ yɛritɔy niŋ wuyɔhɔy, baa bindɛ kute nde bɛyiniŋ ba ni ndɛ ka Yɛrusalɛmi baŋ naa ndɛ bindɛ siyi malɔkɔ ma puntuyando nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ iŋ maleka woŋ baŋ. Awa bindɛ fooma bi kiŋ nde kɛndɛ.
Yisɔs key hɛlɛŋ ka mɛti ba ka Kena ba ka Kalili, ka sikinande nde ndɛ mandi maŋ mampa maŋ ka. Awa bayaha wunthe kiŋ nde kɛndɛ wo thoono hati nama wowathe ka mɛti ba ka Kapaniyɔmi.
Naa yuye ndɛ ba dɔma na Yisɔs ŋaye ka Yudiya e ndɛ saa ka Kalili, ndɛ key niŋ theteke ba kaa ba niŋ ka puyiyɛ hati nama woŋ ka Kapaniyɔmi. Hati woŋ baŋ ŋoyeŋ nde nda matuke.
Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Beŋ sa ni lanɛya yɔkɔŋ beŋ kute bɛyiniŋ bathakaba mɛnɛ babukuyuwɛ.”
Kɛna dome bayaha woŋ ka Yisɔs, na “Hɛmɔŋ, yaandi saa, hati niŋ woŋ be tha niye tuke.”
Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Duwa kɛnda ka, hati nda woŋ kɔŋ pethɔ.” Bayaha woŋ baŋ ni lanɛya hu tepe niŋ Yisɔs haŋ. Ndɛ duu ka mɛti nama ka.
Naa bayaha woŋ baŋ duu kɛnama ka, ndɛ pɛnkande iŋ bawaliŋ nama beŋ ka gboŋa bi tepe niŋ ba dɔma, na “Hati nda woŋ sɛsi ba niyɔ hita.”
Huna thonthiŋine ndɛ bindɛ wakathi wo sɛsi hati woŋ ba niiye hita woŋ. Bindɛ tepe niŋ, na “Heŋ naa bohe kaŋ woŋ dɛkinɔ sɛsi na niŋ kɔtɔ kutɔɔkɛ koŋ peyene.”
Fanda ka hati woŋ kɔthɛ ba dɔma na wakathi wo dome heŋ nthɔŋ niŋ Yisɔs woŋ, na “Hati nda woŋ kɔŋ pethɔ.” Ndɛ na pethiye ndɛ woŋ. Awa bayaha woŋ mɛnɛ kubɔri nama koŋ fooma ni lanɛya ka Yisɔs.
Bɛy bathakaba baŋ baŋ bɛna tɛŋinɛ babaye ba ni Yisɔs ba tɔŋina na ndɛ, naa ŋaye ndɛ ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya e ndɛ kaa ka Kalili.
Naa daŋande bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma, Yisɔs key ka Yɛrusalɛmi ba lɔkɔ banthe ka lɔkɔiŋ bathɔɔkɔ baŋ ka nina haŋ ba biYusu beŋ niye Masaala na kubatho baŋ.

Ka mɛti ba ka Yɛrusalɛmi baŋ, tumgbuŋ hu kiŋ nde kɛndɛ kuwaŋ ku ka biyo hunthe hu ka mɛti baŋ hu dɔma haŋ na Biyo hu ka Takɛŋ beŋ haŋ. Awa tumgbuŋ haŋ haŋ baŋ hu kɔŋ nde dɔma na Bɛthɛsetha ka huyuŋ hu ka biYusu beŋ haŋ. Leleni basɔhi ba kiŋ nde kɛndɛ wuthuriye tumgbuŋ haŋ.

Ka tumgbuŋ haŋ haŋ baŋ kuwaŋ ka leleni baŋ kaake kɛna nde bathoonani bihakuwande see ka ŋɔɔkɔ ba puyo. Binɔndi bi kiŋ nde kɛndɛ bimankɔy thaaya, bagbɛthɛŋ mɛnɛ bigbɛsinkɔy. [ Bi kɔŋ nde kɛndɛ kɔ yumbu ba mandi maŋ ma be ŋɛna,

baa maleka wo ka Mariki woŋ na nde kɔ thuhu maŋaye ka ariana e ndɛ si ŋɛna mandi maŋ ka tumgbuŋ haŋ. Bathoonaŋ wo nthɔŋ yenke gbantɔkɔ ka tumgbuŋ haŋ naa mandi maŋ ŋeno, ndɛ na pethɔ nthoonaŋ ndo nthoonaŋ kiŋ iŋ wundɛ.]
Hati lamgba wunthe kiŋ nde kɛndɛ wo thoono bɛrɛ ba thaninɛŋ kɔnthɔ kataati iŋ thasɔŋ-thataati.
Naa kute niŋ Yisɔs ndɛ ŋoye, awa e ndɛ kɔthɔ ba dɔma na ndɛ thɔkɔti nɔŋ nda kɛndɛ ŋɔɔ, Yisɔs dome kɛnama, na “E yi thimoŋ ba puyo?”
Hati lamgba wothoonɔy woŋ dome ka Yisɔs, na “Hɛmɔŋ, yaŋ ka iŋ wɔ yama thiyi ka tumgbuŋ haŋ naa mandi maŋ ŋeno. Naa yaŋ bathɔy nthɔŋ ba thɔɔ, wɔ hɛna yenke thɔɔ ba yaŋ.”
Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “Ŋaye ka kɔɔ, sɛkitha kuwatha nda koŋ e yi kɔ kaa.”
Ka thagbɛmgbɛŋ thabɛina hati lamgba woŋ pethɔy awa ndɛ sekithe kuwatha nama koŋ e ndɛ kɔ kaa. Wuŋ baŋ niyɔy nde ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.
Huna dome biYusu bibayahɛŋ beŋ ka hati lamgba wo puyo woŋ, na “Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ mɛna hɛ. Awa wu kiŋ ma sɔkinɔkɔ Siraŋ ntuŋ baŋ yi ba sɛkitha hɛ kuwatha kukɛnda koŋ e yi kuŋ kɔ kata.”
Kɛrɛ huna niye hati lamgba woŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Hati wowathe wo puyɛ yama woŋ na dɔmɛ yama, na ‘Sɛkitha kuwatha nda koŋ e yi kɔ kaa.’ ”
Bindɛ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ niŋ, na “Mbɛ hati wowathe wobɛina wo dɔmɛ yina, na sɛkitha kuwatha nda koŋ e yi kɔ kaa?”
Kɛrɛ hati lamgba wo puyo woŋ tha kɔthɔ Yisɔs na wo puyɛ niŋ woŋ, baa sɛthɛ baŋ abɔy nde kɛndɛ, awa Yisɔs fuŋ nasɔyi.

Naa daŋande wuŋ kɛndɛ, Yisɔs kute hati lamgba wo puyi ndɛ woŋ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ. Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnama, na “E yi kute na thanki yi pethɔ? Awa ba nda ni hakɛ yo wuna sa bɛy ba yamɛ nɛnɔ hɛlɛŋ yina pɛnki.”
Hati lamgba woŋ key e ndɛ ka tepe bayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ ba dɔma na Yisɔs na puyɛ niŋ.
Awa ba haŋ haŋ baŋ wuna biyɛ biYusu beŋ bi kɔŋ nde sɛsi ba niya Yisɔs na thɔrɔ, baa ndɛ puy hati lamgba woŋ ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Fandaŋ woŋ wo ni wali timo tima, awa yaŋ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ gbeeŋ yɔkɔŋ yaŋ be ni wali.”

Magbonkoy maŋ maŋ baŋ ni hɛlɛŋ ba bayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ deethuwa gboŋɛŋ ba niŋ kɔra. Wuŋ ka hɔkɔŋ ba na thinke Yisɔs Siraŋ ba niya wali ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ, kɛrɛ ba na dome ndɛ Masaala na Fandama. Wuŋ thɔyande ba dɔma ndɛ deŋine yɛthɛ nama nanthe iŋ Masaala.

Huna gbonkiyiyɔkɔy Yisɔs ka bayahɛŋ bi ka biYusu beŋ e dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, na Hati woŋ sa punku niya bɛy yo bɛy ka mayoho nama. Yɔkɔŋ bɛyiniŋ ba ndɛ kutu Fandama woŋ si ni, bɛna ndɛ ni. Wali ba Fandama woŋ ni baŋ, bɛna Hati woŋ ni hɛlɛŋ,

baa komisa wowathe woŋ athimo Hati woŋ wumandiŋ, wuna biyɛ ndɛ kɔŋ niŋ toŋine bɛyiniŋ fooma ba ndɛ ni baŋ. Awa ndɛ kɔŋ hɛlɛŋ niŋ toŋine bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba yamɛ ba baŋ baŋ, wuna beŋ ni thakaba wumandiŋ.
Nɔŋ na nthɔŋ Fandaŋ woŋ ŋayaŋ biya ka tuka haŋ na e ndɛ bindɛ dunkune sii, nɛna hɛlɛŋ yando Hati nama woŋ dunkuŋ sii ka bi thimo ndɛ beŋ.
Fandaŋ woŋ tha kɔnsɔŋɔŋ womo woma, baa ndɛ thanki dunkuna kɔnsiŋina haŋ kiyaŋ yando Hati nama woŋ,
wuna biya beŋ fooma dunkune yando Hati woŋ yiki bamandiŋ, nɔŋ na nthɔŋ bindɛ ni Fandaŋ woŋ yiki na. Wɔ yo wɔ wo sa ni Hati woŋ yiki, ndɛ sa ni yiki Fandaŋ wo ŋindɛ Hati woŋ.

“Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ. Wɔ yo wɔ wo yuyɛ thampa niŋ thaŋ awa e ndɛ niya lanɛya yama, wɔ bɛina kiŋ iŋ sii ba kɔy yo kɔy. Awa ndɛ sa nɔŋ kɔnsiŋina, baa ndɛ buthurɔy nda tuka haŋ e ndɛ nda niyɔ iŋ sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.

Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ. Malɔkɔ maŋ ma kɔŋ see, awa mɛna hintiŋ nthɔŋ nda maŋ maŋ gbeeŋ, ma bi tukɛ beŋ yuye thampa tha ka Hati ka Masaala woŋ thaŋ, awa bi thɛŋ yuyɛ beŋ bi kɔŋ dunkuno sii hɛlɛŋ ka lɔkɔ babɛina.
Nɔŋ na nthɔŋ Fandaŋ woŋ iŋ sɛmbɛ na ba dunkuna sii, nɛna hɛlɛŋ Hati woŋ niyɔ iŋ sɛmbɛ ba dunkune biya sii.
Awa ndɛ dunkune Hati woŋ mayoho ba kɔnsiŋina, baa ndɛ na dɔma Hati ka Wɔ woŋ.
Baŋ ni thakaba wumandiŋ ba haŋ haŋ baŋ. Malɔkɔ maŋ ma kɔŋ see ma bitukɛ beŋ fooma yuye thampa tha ka Hati woŋ thaŋ,

awa e bindɛ fuŋa ka thayoma thaŋ. Bindɛ bi niyɛ nde bɛyiniŋ bayɔhɔy beŋ bi kɔŋ ŋayina maŋaye ka tuka haŋ e bindɛ dunkuno sii hɛlɛŋ. Awa bi niyɛ nde bɛyiniŋ banɛnɔy beŋ bi kɔŋ ŋayina maŋaye ka tuka haŋ e bindɛ thonkino.”

Yisɔs key ka kɔtɔkɔy ba tɛpa, na “Yaŋ sa punku niya bɛy yo bɛy ka mayoho makiyaŋ. Yɔkɔŋ ba yama Fandaŋ woŋ tepe ba niya, bɛna yaŋ ni. Awa kukɔnsɔŋɔŋ niŋ koŋ athumbu, baa yaŋ yoleta ba niya mathimo makiyaŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ kɔŋ ni mathimo ma ka wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ maŋ.
“Mɛnɛ yaŋ bɔhɔkɔy maseri ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ, magbonkoy niŋ maŋ sa yeroko ba mɛŋ niyɔ nɔndi.
Wɔ hɛna kiŋ kɛndɛ wo ni maseri ba yaŋ, awa yaŋ kɔthɛŋ ba dɔma na hu ndɛ gbonkoy ba yaŋ haŋ hu kiŋ nɔndi.
Beŋ ŋindi nde baseriŋ ka Yɔni ka, awa ndɛ gbonkoy nde nɔndi baŋ ba yaŋ.
Wuŋ ka ba dɔma na yɔkɔŋ yaŋ kute maseri maŋaye ka wɔmɛti. Kɛrɛ atɛpɛ na yaŋ haŋ haŋ baŋ haliko beŋ be niyo kisi.
Yɔni athɔyande nde nɔŋ lampu womaye wo iŋ waŋ bamandiŋ. Awa wuŋ yehe nde bena ba detha waŋ babɛina ba wuthurɔy.

Kɛrɛ maseri ma kiŋ kɛndɛ ba yaŋ ma yamɛ ba ma ka Yɔni maŋ nde. Wali ba dunkune yama Fandaŋ woŋ ba yaŋ thankina baŋ, bɛna yaŋ ni baŋ haaŋ nɔŋ, awa bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ bɛna ni maseri ba dɔma na Fandaŋ woŋ na ŋindɛ yama.
Awa Fandaŋ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ gbeeŋ ndɛ ni maseri ba yaŋ. Beŋ yuyeta hɛ nɔŋ thampa nama thaŋ hali hanthe, awa beŋ kuita hɛ niŋ hali hanthe.
Thampa nama thaŋ kahiteta hɛ ka siini bakendeŋ baŋ, baa beŋ niyeta hɛ lanɛya wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ.
Beŋ ni magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ karaŋ kuthɛgbɛ, baa beŋ siyi ba dɔma na ka mɛŋ na beŋ kute sii ba kɔi o kɔi. Awa magbali maŋ maŋ gbeeŋ mɛŋ ni maseri ba yaŋ.
Kɛrɛ halisa beŋ baŋaŋ ba saa kiyaŋ do haliko beŋ be kutu sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.
“Yaŋ yoleta ba niyo yiki iŋ biyamɛti.
Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ bena ba wuŋ niyɔ na beŋ ka iŋ mathimo ba Masaala ka thathukuma ndeŋ thaŋ.
Yaŋ see kendeŋ do iŋ mayoho ma ŋaye ka Fandaŋ woŋ maŋ. Kɛrɛ beŋ tha yama yɛrɔkɔ. Kɛrɛ mɛnɛ wɔ hɛna see iŋ mayoho nama maŋ, ndɛ na beŋ yɛrɔkɔ.
Beŋ thimoŋ ba gbuŋunuwande, kɛrɛ beŋ niyeta na bena Masaala gbuŋunuwe. Huna, nama beŋ yama niye lanɛya?
Baŋ siyi ba dɔma na yaŋ see ba beŋ kuta mathonko ka Fandaŋ woŋ. Musa wo kahe nde beŋ thukuma woŋ na bena thonkine.
Mɛnɛ beŋ nde nɔŋ niya Musa na lanɛya, beŋ kɔŋ nde yama ni lanɛya, baa ndɛ gbale nde ba yaŋ.
Kɛrɛ na tha nde beŋ ni magbali nama maŋ lanɛya na, nama beŋ niye lanɛya hu yaŋ tɛpi haŋ?”
Naa daŋande wuŋ, Yisɔs thuhande mankɔ ma ka Kalili ma hɛlɛŋ dɔma maŋ na mankɔ ma ka Taibiriyɔsi maŋ.
Kɛna yemo ndɛ iŋ sɛthɛ bamandiŋ baa bindɛ kute nde bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba ni nde wundɛ baŋ na puy ndɛ bithoonɔy beŋ.
Naa kute Yisɔs sɛthɛ baŋ, ndɛ dunkɔy ka kusɛri koŋ ka thinthi iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ e bindɛ kɛndɛ ka dɔŋɔ.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina malɔkɔ ma biYusu beŋ siyuwe naa puntuyando nde bindɛ iŋ maleka wo nde katitɔkɔ tuka haŋ woŋ ka Iyipiti thuriye.
Yisɔs yili thaaya e ndɛ kuta sɛthɛ bamandiŋ ba si see kɛnama. Huna thonthiŋine ndɛ Filipi na, na “Kama miŋ boye muthɔma mu biya beŋ beŋ baŋ thɔŋ e bindɛ thimbɔ?”
Yisɔs thɔnthɔŋɔŋ Filipi na haliko ba niŋ gbɛriŋina ba kɔthɔ hu ka thukuma nama, halisa ndɛ Yisɔs gbeeŋ ndɛ kɔthɛŋ ba ndɛ ba niya.
Kɛna mɛyiyɛ niŋ Filipi ba dɔma, na “Kuthunkuŋ ku sɛnkɛni bisɔŋ-bitaati ba wɔ wunthe sa tɛŋ ba boya muthɔma mu tɛŋ ba womo woma ka beŋ beŋ ba kuta wuyete-wuyete.”
Kɛna dome bakarandeŋ nama wunthe kɛnama, wo dɔma Anduru woŋ wɛnda Saimɔŋ Pita, na
“Ya hati wathe dondo baŋ wo iŋ ŋatoŋ ŋasɔhi mɛnɛ muheni muye. Kɛrɛ muŋ sa tɛŋ ba sɛthɛ bamandiŋ baŋ baŋ.”

Ka lɔkɔ babɛina hande huyɔhɔy ba biya ba kɛndɛ dɔŋɔ hu kiŋ nde kɛndɛ. Huna dome Yisɔs ka bakarandeni beŋ, na “Niyaŋ ba biya beŋ dɔɔnkɔ.” Kɛna dɔɔnkɔy biya beŋ fooma. Naa kondo bindɛ, bɛrɛ ba biyɛthɛŋ wuluiŋ bisɔhi bina nde kɛndɛ ka sɛthɛ baŋ.
Yisɔs sekithe ŋatoŋ ŋaŋ e ndɛ thiya Masaala na maamo, awa e ndɛ niya ba ŋɛŋ hano ka bi dɔɔnkɔy beŋ fooma. Nɛna ni hɛlɛŋ ndɛ muheni muŋ, awa biya muŋ thɔŋ haaŋ e bindɛ thimbuwɔ.
Naa thɔŋ bindɛ fooma e bindɛ thimbuwɔ, huna dome Yisɔs ka bakarandeni nama beŋ, na “Kɔminandeŋ magbanthi ma pɛyɛtɔy maŋ ka tha banthe, haliko ntha ki be tha teetuwɔ.”
Bindɛ kɔminande muŋ ka tha banthe e magbanthi maŋ tɛŋa thadebe kɔhi iŋ thaye mu pɛyɛtɔy muŋ naa thɔŋ bindɛ ŋatoŋ ŋasɔhi ŋaŋ.
Naa kute biya muŋ bɛyi bathakaba ba ni ndɛ baŋ, huŋ tepe mɛŋ ba dɔma, na “Banabi na woŋ baŋ yaathi wo domo nde ba saa kafaydo woŋ.”
Naa ŋeete Yisɔs ba dɔma na bi kiŋ ba niŋ si bɔha ka kansuŋ ba niŋ niya gbaku, ndɛ fuŋ kɛndɛ nasɔyi e ndɛ kaa ka ŋasɛri ŋaŋ ka key ndɛ niyɔ ndɛ wuntheŋ.
Naa tɛŋ wuŋ mahɔnkɔlɛŋ, bakarandeni bi ka Yisɔs beŋ thathe ka mankɔ ka.
Bindɛ key thɔɔ ka gbe ba thuhande mankɔ maŋ ba kaa ka Kapaniyɔmi. Naa thɔɔyɛ kaŋ woŋ, wuŋ nambe haaŋ Yisɔs tha see kɛnamɛŋ.
Kɛna see huru humandiŋ hɔŋ ka mandi maŋ ka, awa thamunkulu thaŋ bohe gbantuwande gbe baŋ.
Naa ŋɛŋ bindɛ gbe baŋ bɛrɛ ba ŋaragba ŋataati maa ŋanaŋ, bindɛ kute Yisɔs si kaande ka mankɔ maŋ ka thinthi e ndɛ kɔ thuriye gbe baŋ. Kɛna see payɔ humandiŋ bindɛ thɔɔ.
Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yama. Baŋ payɔ.”
Kɛna yehitɔkɔy bindɛ wumandiŋ e bindɛ thiya Yisɔs na ka gbe baŋ. Ka wuthurɔy wubɛina gbe baŋ tɛŋ ka thuhaŋ ka bindɛ key ka.

Ka gbɛɛŋ wo yeme woŋ, sɛthɛ bamandiŋ ba pɛyɛ heŋ thuhaŋ mankɔ maŋ kute ba dɔma na gbe banthe napethi bɛna kaayɛ. Awa Yisɔs tha thɔɔ gbe babɛina iŋ bakarandeni nama beŋ. Bakarandeni nama beŋ key bindɛ bithɔ.
Gbeni bahɛna see ba ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Taibiriyɔsi e bɛŋ si kɔɔ wuthuriye ka thome nde bindɛ ŋatoŋ ŋa thiyiyɛ nde Mariki woŋ Masaala na maamo ŋaŋ.
Naa kute sɛthɛ baŋ ba dɔma na Yisɔs ka kɛndɛ, awa bakarandeni nama beŋ ka hɛlɛŋ kɛndɛ, bindɛ fooma thɔɔyɛ ka gbeni baŋ baŋ e bindɛ kaa ka mɛti ba ka Kapaniyɔmi kaŋ deethuwa Yisɔs na.
Naa kute bindɛ niŋ thuhaŋ mankɔ maŋ, bindɛ dome kɛnama, na “Karimɔkɔ, tima see yi dondo baŋ?”

Huna niye Yisɔs bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, beŋ deethuweta yama ba bɛyiniŋ bathakaba ba kute nde beŋ yaŋ si ni baŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ kɔŋ yama deethi ba na thɔŋ nde beŋ ŋatoŋ ŋaŋ e beŋ thimbɔ.

Baŋ hɔkɔŋ ni wali ba muthɔma mu daŋande muŋ, kɛrɛ niyaŋ wali ba muthɔma mu bena dunkune sii ba kɔi o kɔi, mu Hati ka Wɔ woŋ bena dunkune muŋ, baa ndɛ na thanki Masaala wo Fanda ntuŋ woŋ yɛtha ba wuŋ niya.”
Huna dome biya beŋ kɛnama, na “Nama miŋ siseke niya gbeeŋ ba niya bɛyiniŋ ba yeheŋ Masaala na thukuma?”
Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Bɛy ba yeheŋ Masaala na thukuma bɛna baŋ baŋ: piitekeŋ wo ŋindi ndɛ woŋ.”
Huna thonthiŋine bindɛ niŋ, na “Mbɛ bɛy bathakaba ba yi ni, ba miŋ kutuyɔkɔ ba ni ba miŋ yina piiteke? Mbɛ wali bamandiŋ ba yi ni?
Mbembɛŋ ntuŋ beŋ thɔŋ nde muthɔma mu dɔma muŋ na mana ka wula baŋ, nɔŋ na tepo nde wuŋ na ka magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ ba dɔma, na ‘Ndɛ dunkune nde bindɛ ŋatoŋ ba thɔma ŋa ŋaye ka ariana.’ ”
Yisɔs dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ ba dɔma, na Nabi Musa tha nde bena dunkune ŋatoŋ ŋagbeeŋ ŋaŋ ŋa ŋaye ka ariana. Fandaŋ woŋ kɔŋ bena dunkune kutoŋ kugbeeŋ koŋ ku ŋaye ka ariana.
Kutoŋ ku ka Masaala koŋ kuna ku ŋaye ka ariana koŋ, ku sɛɛ ba dunkuna sii kafaydo.”
Huna dome bindɛ kɛnama, na “Hɛmɔŋ, yaandi kɔ mina dunkune kutoŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ timo tima.”
Kɛna ni Yisɔs bindɛ yaabi, na “Yama kutoŋ ku dunkuŋ sii baŋ koŋ, awa wɔ yo wɔ wo see kiyaŋ do, ndɛ sa nɔŋ nda kaho kɔnthɔ, awa wɔ yo wɔ wo yama piiteke, ndɛ sa nɔŋ nda kaho kumbɛ.
Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe ba dɔma na beŋ thanki nda yama kuta kɛrɛ beŋ tha yama piiteke.
Bi dunkune yama Fandaŋ woŋ beŋ fooma bi kɔŋ see kiyaŋ do, awa womo woma wo see kiyaŋ do yaŋ sa niŋ kanthi,
baa yaŋ see ŋaye ka ariana, wuŋ ka hɔkɔŋ ba niya mathimo makiyaŋ, kɛrɛ ba niya mathimo ma ka wundɛ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ maŋ.

Awa mathimo ma ka wundɛ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ maŋ mɛna maŋ maŋ baŋ, yaŋ be tha piriŋiŋ wunthe ka bi thanki ndɛ yama dunkune beŋ, kɛrɛ yaŋ be nɔŋ bindɛ ŋayaŋ ka lɔkɔ bamankɛ baŋ ka tuka haŋ ba niyɔ iŋ sii.

Mathimo ma ka Fandaŋ woŋ maŋ mɛna maŋ maŋ baŋ, ba wɔ yo wɔ wo kutu Hati woŋ e ndɛ niŋ piiteke wɔ bɛina be kutu sii ba kɔy yo kɔy, awa yaŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ niŋ ŋayaŋ ka tuka haŋ ba niyɔ iŋ sii ka lɔkɔ bamankɛ baŋ.”
Naa yuye niŋ biYusu beŋ, bindɛ bohe gbonkiyɔkɔ ba na dome ndɛ, na “Yama kutoŋ ku ŋaye ka ariana koŋ.”
Huna bohe bindɛ thɔnthiŋinuwande ba dɔma, na “E Yisɔs kutɛ woŋ baŋ, hati ka Yusufu woŋ? Miŋ kɔthɛŋ fandama iŋ nandama na. Nama dɔmɛ ndɛ kɔŋ tɛpi ba dɔma, na ‘Yaŋ see ŋaye ka ariana’?”
Kɛna ni Yisɔs yaabi e ndɛ dɔma kɛnamɛŋ, na “Pɛyaŋ gbonkiyɔkɔ haŋ.
Wɔ yo wɔ sa punku saa kiyaŋ do yɔkɔŋ Fandaŋ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ na niŋ yɔɔsi kiyaŋ do, awa wo nɛnɛ see kiyaŋ do, yaŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ niŋ ŋayaŋ ka tuka haŋ ba niyɔ iŋ sii ka lɔkɔ bamankɛ baŋ.
Banabiŋ beŋ gbale nde ba dɔma, na ‘Masaala kɔŋ bindɛ thanani fooma.’ Yaŋ tepe bena, wɔ o wɔ wo yuyɛ Fandaŋ woŋ e ndɛ thanuwa maŋaye kɛnama, wɔ bɛina sɛɛŋ kiyaŋ do.
Wuŋ ka ba dɔma na wɔ yo wɔ thanki nde nda kuta Fandaŋ woŋ. Ndɛ wo ŋaye ka Masaala ka woŋ nagbɛti, ndɛ na kutɛ Fandama na.
Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, wɔ wo yama piiteke, ndɛ kiŋ iŋ sii ba kɔy yo kɔy.
Yama kutoŋ ku dunkuŋ sii baŋ koŋ.
Mbembɛŋ ndeŋ beŋ thɔŋ nde muthɔma mu dɔma muŋ na mana ka wula baŋ, kɛrɛ bindɛ thanki hɛ tuukuwa fooma.
Kɛrɛ kutoŋ ku ŋaye ka ariana koŋ, kuna wɔ thɔŋ kuŋ koŋ ndɛ sa tuku.

Yama kutoŋ ku iŋ sii baŋ koŋ ku ŋaye ka ariana koŋ. Mɛnɛ wɔ thɔŋ kutoŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ, wɔ bɛina kɔŋ niyɔ kɔy yo kɔy, awa kutoŋ ku yaŋ dunkuŋ ba biya bi kafaydo beŋ bi be niyɔ iŋ sii kuna kɔtɔ kukiyaŋ koŋ.”
Naa yuye huŋ biYusu beŋ, wuŋ thoŋ bindɛ wumandiŋ, awa bindɛ sɛsi gbakila bindɛ bithɔ kaŋ thɔnthiŋinuwande, na “Nama hati wowathe woŋ baŋ punke dunkune mina kɔtɔ nama koŋ ba miŋ kuŋ thɔma?”
Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe nɔndi baŋ, yɔkɔŋ beŋ thɔŋ kɔtɔ ku ka Hati ka Wɔ woŋ koŋ awa e beŋ thiiye wasi nama baŋ. Mɛnɛ huŋ kutɛ, beŋ sa niyɔ iŋ sii.
Kɛrɛ wɔ wo thɔŋ kɔtɔ niŋ koŋ awa e ndɛ thiiye wasi niŋ baŋ, ndɛ kiŋ iŋ sii ba kɔy yo kɔy, awa yaŋ kɔŋ nɔŋ niŋ ŋayaŋ ka tuka haŋ ba niyɔ iŋ sii ka malɔkɔ mamankɛ maŋ.
Kɔtɔ niŋ koŋ kuna muthɔma mugbeeŋ mu wɔmɛti ba thɔma, awa wasi niŋ baŋ bɛna bageeŋ ba wɔmɛti ba thiiye.
Wɔ wo thɔŋ kɔtɔ niŋ koŋ e ndɛ thiiye wasi niŋ baŋ, ndɛ iŋ yaŋ, miŋ kɔŋ niyɔ iŋ mabohinande nɔŋ wɔ wunthe na miŋ.
Nɔŋ na ŋindi nthɔŋ yama Fandaŋ wo dunkuŋ sii woŋ na, awa e yaŋ niyɔ saathɛ ba ka Fandaŋ woŋ, nɛna wɔ wo yama thɔŋ woŋ niyɔ saathɛ ba kiyaŋ.
Kɔtɔ niŋ koŋ kuna kutoŋ ku thuhɛ ŋaye ka ariana koŋ. Awa kuŋ thɔyandeta iŋ kutoŋ ku thɔŋ nde mbembɛŋ ndeŋ beŋ koŋ e bindɛ manke tuukuwa. Wɔ wo thɔŋ kutoŋ koŋ koŋ baŋ ndɛ kɔŋ niyɔ kɔy yo kɔy.”
Ka banka bathuŋuyande ba ka biYusu beŋ baŋ ka Kapaniyɔmi kɛna tepe Yisɔs biya beŋ bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ naa nde ndɛ bindɛ thanani.
Naa yuye bakarandeni nama bibɔyɛ ndɛ si neŋ tɛpi, bindɛ dome, na “Magbonkoy makahɛ mɛna maŋ maŋ baŋ, awa nkaana mɛŋ punku poniyɛ kuiha?”
Wɔ tha niyɔ wo tepe Yisɔs na, kɛrɛ Yisɔs kɔthɛ ba dɔma na bi kɔŋ gbonkiyɔkɔ. Huna dome ndɛ kɛnamɛŋ, na “E hu tepe yaŋ haŋ teeti bena thathukuma?
Mbu na beŋ kute nɔŋ ntiŋ Hati ka Wɔ woŋ si ŋati ka ariana ka nde ndɛ ka?
Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ na dunkuŋ sii, kɛrɛ wɔmɛti sa punku niya bɛy yo bɛy. Yina wo ka Masaala wo bena dunkune sii woŋ wundɛ kɔŋ see ka mathanani ma yaŋ bena thanani maŋ.
Kɛrɛ haaŋ hɛ biya bi kiŋ mateete makendeŋ bi ba ni lanɛya mathanani niŋ maŋ.” Kabi ka mathɛrɛŋ maŋ Yisɔs nde kɔthɔ bi sa niŋ ni lanɛya beŋ, awa iŋ wo niŋ si ni gbɔŋ woŋ.
Huna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Wuna biyɛ nde yaŋ kɔŋ bena tepe ba dɔma na wɔ sa punku saa kiyaŋ do yɔkɔŋ Fandaŋ woŋ na niŋ sisi kiyaŋ do.”
Awa ba saabu baŋ baŋ, bakarandeni nama bibɔyɛ duuku kɛnamɛŋ awa bindɛ tha nda niŋ yeŋ hali.
Huna thonthiŋine Yisɔs bakarandeni nama bikɔhi iŋ biye beŋ, na “E beŋ hɛlɛŋ beŋ kɔŋ duu?”
Saimɔŋ Pita ni niŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Mariki, ka nkaana miŋ key? Yɔkɔŋ yi nagbɛti yina iŋ mathanani ma dunkuŋ sii baŋ maŋ,
awa miŋ ni yina lanɛya, awa miŋ see kɔthɔ ba dɔma na yina Wɔ Mɛthɛ woŋ, wo ŋaye ka Masaala ka woŋ.”
Yisɔs tepe bindɛ ba dɔma, na “Kɔhi iŋ biye bina yɛthi yaŋ, kɛrɛ wunthe ka beŋ wayi wonɛnɔy na ndɛ.”
Yisɔs kɔŋ nde gbonkoy ba Yudasi hati ka Saimɔŋ Isakariyɔti woŋ. Hali na niyɔy nde wuŋ ndɛ na nde wunthe ka bakarandeni kɔhi iŋ biye beŋ, wo nde ba niya Yisɔs na gbɔŋ woŋ.

Naa daŋande bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ fooma, Yisɔs kɔŋ nde kaande ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili koŋ kamo kama. Ndɛ tha kaande ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya koŋ, baa biYusu bibayahɛŋ beŋ kɛndɛ bi kɔŋ nde deethi ba niŋ kɔra.
Wiki woŋ thuriye wo biYusu beŋ ni yikiya ka ŋabankaŋ ŋaŋ ba siyuwa nɔŋ na nde mbembɛŋ namɛŋ beŋ ka wula baŋ naa fuŋ bindɛ ka huwaayine haŋ ka Iyipiti.
Huna dome mbɛndama bibiyɛthɛŋ beŋ kɛnama, na “Ŋaye dondo baŋ e yi kaa ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Yudiya koŋ, wuna bakarandeni nda beŋ kutu waliŋ bamandiŋ ba yi ni baŋ.
Wɔ wo thimo ba wali nama baŋ kuto nagberekethe thimota ba niya wali baŋ ka nunɔkɔy. Yi kɔŋ ni bɛyiniŋ baŋ baŋ, awa tɔŋinɔkɔ kafaydo nagberekethe.”
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina hali nde hintiŋ mbɛndama beŋ gbeeŋ bindɛ niyeta nde niŋ lanɛya.
Kɛna dome Yisɔs kɛnamɛŋ, na “Lɔkɔ basisande baŋ teŋeta hɛ ba yaŋ, kɛrɛ lɔkɔ o lɔkɔ bɛŋ asisande ba beŋ.
Biya bi kafaydo beŋ sa niyɔ iŋ saabu ba bena thambo, kɛrɛ bi kɔŋ yama thambo, baa yando bindɛ tepe banɛnɔy namɛŋ baŋ.
Kaaŋ hɔkɔŋ ka mathuŋande mamandiŋ maŋ maŋ baŋ. Lɔkɔ niŋ baŋ teŋeta hɛ.”
Naa thanki nthɔŋ nɛŋ Yisɔs gbonkiya, ndɛ pɛyɛ kɛndɛ ka Kalili ka.
Kɛrɛ naa key nthɔŋ mbɛndama beŋ ka mathuŋande mathɔɔkɔ maŋ maŋ baŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi, ndɛ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ ndɛ key nasɔyi kɛndɛ.
Ka lɔkɔ babɛina biYusu bibayahɛŋ beŋ ka Yɛrusalɛmi bi kɔŋ nde niŋ deethi ka mathuŋande maŋ e bindɛ kɔ thɔnthiŋinuwa, na “Thɔɔ ka ndɛ?”
Kɛna bohe biya muŋ ŋɔyintande wubɔyɛ ba wundɛ. Binɔndi bi kɔŋ nde dɔŋ, na “Wɔ yɔhɔy na ndɛ,” awa binɔndi nɛnɛ kɔy dɔma, na “Ade, bathɔkɔŋ biya na ndɛ.”
Wɔ tha niyɔ wo koyintɛ ka gbonkiya ba Yisɔs, baa biya beŋ payɔy biYusu bibayahɛŋ beŋ wumandiŋ.
Naa tɛŋ nthɔŋ bindɛ mathuŋande maŋ mateete, Yisɔs key biyande ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ e ndɛ ka dɔŋɔ ka thaninuwa biya beŋ.

Naa yuye niŋ biYusu beŋ si thanani, bindɛ ni thakaba wumandiŋ ba mathanani nama maŋ, awa huna bohe bindɛ thɔnthiŋinuwande, na “Nama dɔmɛ hati wowathe woŋ baŋ kɔŋ kute mathanani maŋ maŋ baŋ, mahɛŋ ma ndɛ tha thaninuwa ba niyɔ karimɔkɔ wo ka Siraŋ ntuŋ baŋ?”
Kɛna gbonkiyiyɔkɔy Yisɔs ba dɔma, na “Mathanani ma yaŋ bena thanani maŋ yaŋ kutɛ biyɛ mɛŋ, kɛrɛ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ na biyɛ mɛŋ.
Mɛnɛ wɔ yɛrɔkɔy ba niya ba yeheŋ Masaala na thukuma baŋ, wɔ bɛina kɔŋ kɔthɔ mɛnɛ mathanani maŋ maŋ baŋ ŋaye ka Masaala maa yando gbonkoy ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ hɔkɔŋ.
Hanimaa wɔ wo gbonkoy ka sɛmbɛ bakɛnama baŋ, ndɛ kɔŋ deethiyɔkɔ yiki. Kɛrɛ wɔ wo deethi yiki ba wo ŋindɛ niŋ woŋ, wɔ seŋa na ndɛ, awa wɔ bɛina ka bahothi hali.
Musa na dunkune nde bena Siraŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, kɛrɛ hali wɔ wunthe ka beŋ ndɛ tha bɛŋ kɔsɔŋ. Mbɛ hu beŋ yama deethuwe ba yama kɔra?”
Huna niye biya beŋ niŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “Wayi na bɔhɛ yina! Mbɛ biya na bi yɔli ba yina kɔra?”
Yisɔs ni bindɛ yaabi, na “Yaŋ ni nde bɛy banthe bamandiŋ, awa beŋ ni nde thakaba ba bɛŋ.

Musa ni nde bena yamari ba thiya mpati ndeŋ bibiyɛthɛŋ beŋ ka bintɔni namɛŋ. Kɛrɛ wuŋ ka ba dɔma na Musa na thɛrinɛ naamu woŋ baŋ. Mbembɛŋ bikɛntuŋ bi kɔtiyɔkɔy Musa na beŋ bina thɛrinɛ wuŋ. Awa beŋ kɔŋ nde thiyi hati malɛɛthɛ wowathe ka bintɔni nama hali wuŋ niyɔŋ ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ.

Ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ na nde beŋ thiye malɛɛthɛ maŋ ka bintɔni nama haliko Siraŋ ba ka Musa baŋ ba be tha teetuwa ba tɛpɛ baŋ na wu kiŋ ba niyo ka gbɛɛŋ wosɔŋ-bitaati woŋ. Mbu mbɛ hu beŋ thooye ka mathoŋ ba na puyi yaŋ hati lamgba woŋ natharaŋ ka Malɔkɔ Mahemuwe maŋ?
Pɛyaŋ kɛriŋa thasɔkɔiŋ thaŋ ka na beŋ thɛŋ yenke kute na, kɛrɛ konsiŋineŋ thɛŋ ka gboŋa bathumbɛ baŋ.”
Kɛna bohe biya binɔndi bi ka Yɛrusalɛmi beŋ thɔnthiŋinuwande, na “E ba hɔŋ hati wowathe woŋ baŋ kutɛ bayahɛŋ beŋ deethi ba kɔra woŋ?
Dethaŋ hɛ na ndɛ gbonkoy dondo baŋ ka biya muŋ ka teete, kɛrɛ hali wɔ sɔkinɔkɔy niŋ. E ba hɔŋ akɔthɛ na bayahɛŋ beŋ ba dɔma na ndɛ na Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ gbeeŋ?
Miŋ, miŋ kɔthɛŋ ka ŋaye hati wowathe woŋ baŋ. Kɛrɛ ti wo domo Banikisi woŋ tɛŋ, wɔ yo wɔ sa kɔthɔ ka wundɛ ŋaye.”

Naa Yisɔs bindɛ thanani ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, ndɛ ŋataŋ ka gbonkiye bindɛ e dɔma, na “E beŋ kɔthɛŋ yama, awa e beŋ kɔthɛŋ ka ŋaye yaŋ? Yaŋ tha see kafaydo ka yɛthɛ bakiyaŋ. Wɔ wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ wɔ na woseŋa, awa beŋ kɔita niŋ.
Yaŋ kɔthɛŋ niŋ, baa kɛnama kɛna ŋaye yaŋ awa ndɛ na ŋindɛ yama.”
Naa gbanthaŋ Yisɔs, kɛna ŋaye bindɛ narɛ ba niŋ bɔha, kɛrɛ wɔ tha niyɔ wo tɔpinɛ niŋ yɔnkɔ, baa lɔkɔ ba ndɛ ba boho baŋ teŋeta hɛ.
Kɛrɛ halisa biya binɔndi ka biya beŋ ni niŋ lanɛya e bindɛ dɔma, na “E ba hɔŋ na wo dɔma Banikisi woŋ see ndɛ kɔŋ si ni bɛyiniŋ bathakaba babɔyɛ wuŋ yama ba thanki hati wowathe woŋ niya baŋ?”
BiFaresini binɔndi yuye biya beŋ bi si ŋɔyintande wubɔyɛ ba Yisɔs, huna bindɛ mɛnɛ bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ ŋindi kurugbani namɛŋ beŋ ba ka bɔha Yisɔs na.
Naa kute Yisɔs bindɛ, ndɛ dome kɛnamɛŋ, na “Yaŋ kiŋ nda hɔkɔŋ iŋ beŋ ba wuthurɔy, awa yaŋ kɔŋ teŋiteke ka wo ŋindɛ yama woŋ.
Beŋ kɔŋ deethi ba yaŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ sa yama kutu, baa ka yaŋ ka niyɔ ka, beŋ sa kɛndɛ punku tɛŋa.”

BiYusu beŋ bohe thɔnthiŋinuwande wunthe iŋ ntɔ nama, na “Kama hati wowathe woŋ baŋ dɔŋ ba kaa ka sa miŋ niŋ punku kute? E ba hɔŋ ndɛ kiŋ ba kaa ka mɛtiŋ ba ka ŋakuyɛkɛŋ ŋahɛna ŋaŋ ka biya ntuŋ beŋ ka e thaninuwa biya bi ka siyani bahɛna baŋ beŋ kɛndɛ?
Mbɛ mu dɔmɛ ndɛ kɔŋ tɛpi ba dɔma, na ‘Beŋ kɔŋ deethi ba yaŋ, kɛrɛ beŋ sa yama kutu,’ awa ‘ka yaŋ niyɔ, beŋ sa kɛndɛ punku kaa’?”
Ka lɔkɔ bamankɛ bamandiŋ baŋ ka mathuŋande maŋ, Yisɔs kɔɔyɛ mateete ka biya beŋ e ndɛ koyiŋa ba dɔma, na “Mɛnɛ wɔ kaho kumbɛ, ndɛ sɛɛŋ kiyaŋ do, ndɛ be si thiiye mandi.
Wɔ wo yama ni lanɛya woŋ, nɔŋ na tepe magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ na, na ‘Mandi ma dunkuŋ sii ma kɔŋ buulu ka thukuma nama haŋ.’ ”
Yisɔs kɔŋ nde dɔŋ Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ, wo bi niyɛ niŋ lanɛya beŋ kutu woŋ. Ka lɔkɔ babɛina Yina wo ka Masaala woŋ dunkunɔita nde hɛ, baa Yisɔs ŋatinɔita nde hɛ ka thinthi e ndɛ niyo yiki.
Naa yuye biya beŋ magbonkoy maŋ maŋ baŋ, biya binɔndi ka biya beŋ tepe ba dɔma, na “Banabi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ na woŋ baŋ gbeeŋ.”
Awa biya binɔndi tepe ba dɔma, na “Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ na woŋ baŋ.” Kɛrɛ biya binɔndi tepe ba dɔma, na “Banikisi wo niyo nde lahiri woŋ sa ŋaye ka kuyɛkɛŋ ku ka Kalili koŋ.
Magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ tepe ba dɔma, na Banikisi woŋ kɔŋ ŋaye ka bɔnsɔŋ ba ka gbaku woŋ Dauda baŋ, awa na ndɛ kɔŋ ŋaye ka mɛti ba ka Bɛthɛlɛhɛmi baŋ, mɛti ba ka nde gbaku woŋ Dauda baŋ.”
Kɛna see mahakuwande niyɔ mateete ma ka biya beŋ saathɛ ba ka Yisɔs.
Binɔndi ka biya beŋ thimo nde ba niŋ bɔha, kɛrɛ wɔ tha niyɔ wo tɔpinɛ niŋ yɔnkɔ.
Naa duu kurugbani bi ŋindo nde beŋ iŋ bafodeni bibukuyuwɛ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini beŋ, bindɛ key tɔŋ kuna. Kɛna thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bi ŋindɛ bindɛ beŋ, na “Mbɛ hu tha beŋ niŋ diŋe ka saa?”
Kurugbani bi ŋindo beŋ ni yaabi, na “Miŋ yuyeta hɛ nɔŋ hali hanthe wɔ si gbonkoy nɔŋ na hati wowathe woŋ gbonkiye na.”
BiFaresini beŋ thɔnthɔŋɔŋ, na “E beŋ hɛlɛŋ athiika thɔkɔ iŋ hati wowathe woŋ baŋ?
E wunthe ka bayahɛŋ beŋ maa ka biFaresini beŋ ni niŋ lanɛya?
Kɛrɛ sɛthɛ baŋ baŋ tha kɔthɔ Siraŋ ba ka Musa baŋ, huna Masaala thiyiyɛ bindɛ danka.”
Nikɔdimɔsi wo kaayɛ nde ka Yisɔs huyɛ woŋ, wo nde wunthe ka biFaresini beŋ woŋ, thɔnthɔŋɔŋ bindɛ, na
“E Siraŋ bakɛntuŋ baŋ ba kɔŋ mɛkɛŋ ba kɔnsiŋina wɔ mahɛŋ ma ndɛ tha hintiŋ yenke poniyo kuiha, awa e wuŋ yenke kothiyo ba ni ndɛ baŋ?”

Bindɛ ni niŋ yaabi ba dɔma, na “E ka Kalili kɛna ŋaye yi nɔŋ na ŋaye kɛndɛ Yisɔs wobɛina na?” Kɛna tepe bindɛ niŋ ba dɔma, na “Detha ka magbali ma ka Masaala maŋ awa yi kɔŋ kutu ba dɔma na haaŋ nɔŋ banabi sa fuŋ ka Kalili.”
Biya beŋ fooma duuku ka bankɛŋ namɛŋ,
kɛrɛ Yisɔs nɛnɛ ndɛ key ka kusɛri ku dɔma koŋ na Ɔlifisi.
Naa puthɔy kaŋ woŋ sanka, Yisɔs key hɛlɛŋ ka banka bamandiŋ ba ka Masaala baŋ, awa biya beŋ fooma key kɛnama ka, awa kɛna dɔŋɔy ndɛ ka thaninuwa bindɛ.

Ka nde wundɛ thanani biya beŋ ka, karimɔkɔiŋ binɔndi bi ka Siraŋ baŋ beŋ mɛnɛ biFaresini binɔndi sisi hati yɛrɛmɛ woyɛntɔy kɛnama wo bohitande bindɛ ka niya kubɛy, e bindɛ niŋ si kiya mateete ka biya beŋ.
Bindɛ dome ka Yisɔs, na “Karimɔkɔ, hati woyɛrɛmɛ woyɛntɔy woŋ baŋ na bohitande miŋ ka niya kubɛi.
Awa Siraŋ ba dunkuno nde miŋ baŋ iŋ Musa ni mina yamari ba dɔma na wɔ yo wɔ wo bohitando ka maniyɔ maŋ maŋ baŋ, yɔkɔŋ wɔ bɛina be lɔɔpuwa tharaka haaŋ ndɛ koro. Mbu yi? Nama tepe yi ba wundɛ?”

Bindɛ see tɛpi haŋ haŋ baŋ ka Yisɔs ba niŋ gbɛriŋinuwa haliko ba kuta na bindɛ niŋ bohe ka magbonkoy ba kuta na bindɛ niŋ thonkine. Naa gbanthaŋ bindɛ, Yisɔs putɔy e ndɛ kɔ gbala ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ iŋ kuthenke nama koŋ.

Kɛrɛ naa bindɛ niŋ thɔnthɔŋɔni thuuŋ, kɛna ŋayinɔkɔy Yisɔs ka pute nde wundɛ kɛ e bindɛ tepe ba dɔma, na “Wɔ wo kɔthɛ woŋ ka beŋ ba dɔma na ndɛ niyeta hɛ hakɛ hali hanthe, wɔ bɛina sɛkithɛŋ hɛ raka e yenke lɔɔpa hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ baŋ.”
Yisɔs putɔy hɛlɛŋ e ndɛ kɔ gbala ka kuyɛkɛŋ koŋ iŋ kuthenke nama koŋ.
Naa yuye bindɛ hu tepe bindɛ Yisɔs haŋ, bindɛ bohe funka ka wunthe-wunthe there ka bi yamɛ niyɔ bakalani beŋ. Kɛna pɛyɛ Yisɔs kɛndɛ ti bindɛ biye iŋ hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ.
Yisɔs ŋayinɔkɔy e thɔnthiŋina hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ, na “Kama kaaye bi sɛɛ yina ka fuŋutiyɛ beŋ? E wɔ wunthe ka bindɛ tha niyɔ wo thonkine yina?”
Hati woyɛrɛmɛ woŋ ni niŋ yaabi, na “Ndo hɛmɔŋ, wɔ tha niyɔ wo thonkine yama.” Yisɔs dome kɛnama, na “Yaŋ hɛlɛŋ nɛŋ gbeeŋ, yaŋ sa yina thonkine. Kɛrɛ kaa; ba nda hɛlɛŋ ka ni hakɛ ye.”
